File: code_3/admin/admin.php

  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /*
  4: Class Name: WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Admin
  5: Author: Andy Ha (support@villatheme.com)
  6: Author URI: http://villatheme.com
  7: Copyright 2015 villatheme.com. All rights reserved.
  8: */
  9: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 10: 	exit;
 11: }
 12: 
 13: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Admin {
 14: 	protected $settings;
 15: 
 16: 	public function __construct() {
 17: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 18: 		add_filter(
 19: 			'plugin_action_links_woo-multi-currency/woo-multi-currency.php', array(
 20: 				$this,
 21: 				'settings_link'
 22: 			)
 23: 		);
 24: 		add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'init' ) );
 25: 		add_action( 'admin_init', array( $this, 'admin_init' ) );
 26: 		add_action( 'admin_menu', array( $this, 'menu_page' ) );
 27: 		add_action( 'admin_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'admin_enqueue_scripts' ), 99 );
 28: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_general_settings', array( $this, 'woocommerce_general_settings' ) );
 29: 	}
 30: 
 31: 	/**
 32: 	 * Remove currency, decimal, posistion, setting in backend
 33: 	 *
 34: 	 * @param $datas
 35: 	 *
 36: 	 * @return mixed
 37: 	 */
 38: 	public function woocommerce_general_settings( $datas ) {
 39: 		foreach ( $datas as $k => $data ) {
 40: 			if ( isset( $data['id'] ) ) {
 41: 				if ( $data['id'] == 'woocommerce_currency' || $data['id'] == 'woocommerce_price_num_decimals' || $data['id'] == 'woocommerce_currency_pos' ) {
 42: 					unset( $datas[ $k ] );
 43: 				}
 44: 				if ( $data['id'] == 'pricing_options' ) {
 45: 					$datas[ $k ]['desc'] = esc_html__( 'The following options affect how prices are displayed on the frontend. Multi Currency for WooCommerce is working. Please go to ', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . '<a href="' . admin_url( '?page=woo-multi-currency' ) . '">' . esc_html__( 'Multi Currency for WooCommerce setting page', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . '</a>' . esc_html__( ' to set default currency.', 'woo-multi-currency' );
 46: 				}
 47: 			}
 48: 		}
 49: 
 50: 		return $datas;
 51: 	}
 52: 
 53: 	/*Check Auto update*/
 54: 	public function admin_init() {
 55: 
 56: 		$old_data = get_option( 'wmc_selected_currencies', array() );
 57: 		if ( count( $old_data ) ) {
 58: 			$currency         = $currency_rate = $currency_decimals = $currency_custom = $currency_pos = array();
 59: 			$currency_default = '';
 60: 			$by_countries     = json_decode( get_option( 'wmc_currency_by_country', array() ), true );
 61: 
 62: 			/*Move Data Currency*/
 63: 
 64: 			foreach ( $old_data as $k => $data ) {
 65: 				if ( $data['is_main'] == 1 ) {
 66: 					$currency_default = $k;
 67: 				}
 68: 				$currency[]          = $k;
 69: 				$currency_rate[]     = $data['rate'];
 70: 				$currency_decimals[] = $data['num_of_dec'];
 71: 				$currency_pos[]      = $data['pos'];
 72: 				if ( strpos( $data['custom_symbol'], '#PRICE#' ) === false ) {
 73: 					$currency_custom[] = '';
 74: 				} else {
 75: 					$currency_custom[] = $data['custom_symbol'];
 76: 				}
 77: 			}
 78: 			$by_country_args = array();
 79: 			/*Move Data Currency By Country*/
 80: 			foreach ( $by_countries as $code => $by_country ) {
 81: 				$by_country_args[ $code . '_by_country' ] = $by_country;
 82: 			}
 83: 			/*Move Key data*/
 84: 			if ( get_option( 'wmc_oder_id' ) && get_option( 'wmc_email' ) ) {
 85: 				$key = trim( get_option( 'wmc_oder_id' ) ) . ',' . trim( get_option( 'wmc_email' ) );
 86: 			} else {
 87: 				$key = '';
 88: 			}
 89: 
 90: 			$args = array(
 91: 				'enable'                     => 1,
 92: 				'enable_fixed_price'         => 0,
 93: 				'currency_default'           => $currency_default,
 94: 				'currency'                   => $currency,
 95: 				'currency_rate'              => $currency_rate,
 96: 				'currency_decimals'          => $currency_decimals,
 97: 				'currency_custom'            => array(),
 98: 				'currency_pos'               => $currency_pos,
 99: 				'auto_detect'                => get_option( 'wmc_enable_approxi' ) ? get_option( 'wmc_enable_approxi' ) : 0,
100: 				'enable_currency_by_country' => get_option( 'wmc_price_by_currency' ) == 'yes' ? 1 : 0,
101: 				'enable_multi_payment'       => get_option( 'wmc_allow_multi' ) == 'yes' ? 1 : 0,
102: 				'key'                        => $key,
103: 				'update_exchange_rate'       => get_option( 'wmc_price_by_currency' ) == 'yes' ? 2 : 0,
104: 				'enable_design'              => 0,
105: 				'title'                      => '',
106: 				'design_position'            => 0,
107: 				'text_color'                 => '#fff',
108: 				'background_color'           => '#212121',
109: 				'main_color'                 => '#f78080',
110: 				'flag_custom'                => ''
111: 			);
112: 
113: 			$args = array_merge( $args, $by_country_args );
114: 			update_option( 'woo_multi_currency_params', $args );
115: 			update_option( 'woo_multi_currency_old_version', 1 );
116: 			delete_option( 'wmc_selected_currencies' );
117: 		}
118: 		/*Set currency again in backend*/
119: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
120: 			$frontend_call_admin = false;
121: 			//Fix with Jetpack stats request from frontend
122: 			if ( ! isset( $_GET['wmc_admin_nonce'] ) || wp_verify_nonce( wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc_admin_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_admin_nonce' ) ) {
123: 				if ( isset( $_GET['page'], $_GET['chart'] ) && sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['page'] ) ) === 'stats' && in_array( sanitize_text_field( $_GET['chart'] ), array(
124: 						'admin-bar-hours-scale',
125: 						'admin-bar-hours-scale-2x'
126: 					) ) ) {
127: 					$frontend_call_admin = true;
128: 				}
129: 				if ( ! $frontend_call_admin ) {
130: 					$current_currency = get_option( 'woocommerce_currency' );
131: 					$this->settings->set_current_currency( $current_currency );
132: 				}
133: 			}
134: 		}
135: 	}
136: 
137: 
138: 	/**
139: 	 * Init Script in Admin
140: 	 */
141: 	public function admin_enqueue_scripts() {
142: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_settings' ) ) {
143: 			return;
144: 		}
145: 		$page = isset( $_REQUEST['page'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_REQUEST['page'] ) ) : '';
146: 		if ( $page == 'woo-multi-currency' ) {
147: 			global $wp_scripts;
148: 			$scripts = $wp_scripts->registered;
149: 			foreach ( $scripts as $k => $script ) {
150: 				preg_match( '/^\/wp-/i', $script->src, $result );
151: 				if ( count( array_filter( $result ) ) < 1 ) {
152: 					if ( $script->handle == 'query-monitor' ) {
153: 						continue;
154: 					}
155: 					wp_dequeue_script( $script->handle );
156: 				}
157: 			}
158: 			$src_min = WP_DEBUG ? '' : '.min';
159: 			wp_dequeue_style( 'eopa-admin-css' );
160: 			/*Stylesheet*/
161: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-button', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'button.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
162: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-table', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'table.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
163: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-transition', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'transition.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
164: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-form', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'form.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
165: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-icon', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'icon.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
166: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-dropdown', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'dropdown.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
167: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-checkbox', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'checkbox.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
168: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-segment', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'segment.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
169: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-menu', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'menu.min.css', [], '2.1.7' );
170: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-tab', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'tab.css', [], '2.1.7' );
171: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-input', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'input.min.css', [], '2.2.12' );
172: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-popup', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'popup.min.css', [], '2.3.1' );
173: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'semantic-ui-message', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'message.min.css', [], '2.3.1' );
174: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'woo-multi-currency', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'woo-multi-currency-admin' . $src_min . '.css', [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
175: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'select2', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'select2.min.css', [], '4.0.3' );
176: 
177: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'select2' );
178: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'semantic-ui-transition', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'transition.min.js', array( 'jquery' ), '2.1.7', false );
179: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'semantic-ui-dropdown', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'dropdown.js', array( 'jquery' ), '2.1.7', false );
180: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'semantic-ui-checkbox', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'checkbox.js', array( 'jquery' ), '2.1.7', false );
181: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'semantic-ui-tab', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'tab.js', array( 'jquery' ), '2.4.2', false );
182: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woo-multi-currency-address', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'jquery.address-1.6.min.js', array( 'jquery' ), '1.6', false );
183: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'jquery-ui-sortable' );
184: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woo-multi-currency', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'woo-multi-currency-admin' . $src_min . '.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
185: 			/*Color picker*/
186: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'iris' );
187: 
188: 			wp_localize_script( 'woo-multi-currency', 'wmcParams', [ 'nonce' => wp_create_nonce( 'wmc_ajax_nonce' ) ] );
189: 		}
190: 	}
191: 
192: 	/**
193: 	 * Link to Settings
194: 	 *
195: 	 * @param $links
196: 	 *
197: 	 * @return mixed
198: 	 */
199: 	public function settings_link( $links ) {
200: 		$settings_link = '<a href="admin.php?page=woo-multi-currency" title="' . esc_html__( 'Settings', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . '">' . esc_html__( 'Settings', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . '</a>';
201: 		array_unshift( $links, $settings_link );
202: 
203: 		return $links;
204: 	}
205: 
206: 
207: 	/**
208: 	 * Function init when run plugin+
209: 	 */
210: 	function init() {
211: 		/*Register post type*/
212: 
213: //		load_plugin_textdomain( 'woo-multi-currency' );
214: 		$this->load_plugin_textdomain();
215: 	}
216: 
217: 
218: 	/**
219: 	 * load Language translate
220: 	 */
221: 	public function load_plugin_textdomain() {
222: 		$locale   = apply_filters( 'plugin_locale', get_locale(), 'woo-multi-currency' );
223: 		$basename = 'woo-multi-currency';
224: 		unload_textdomain( 'woo-multi-currency' );
225: 
226: 		// Global + Frontend Locale
227: 		load_textdomain( 'woo-multi-currency', WP_LANG_DIR . "/{$basename}/{$basename}-{$locale}.mo" );
228: 		load_plugin_textdomain( 'woo-multi-currency', false, $basename . '/languages' );
229: 	}
230: 
231: 	/**
232: 	 * Register a custom menu page.
233: 	 */
234: 	public function menu_page() {
235: 		add_menu_page(
236: 			esc_html__( 'Multi Currency for WooCommerce', 'woo-multi-currency' ), esc_html__( 'Multi Currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ), 'manage_woocommerce', 'woo-multi-currency', array(
237: 			'WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Settings',
238: 			'page_callback'
239: 		), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_IMAGES . 'icon.svg', 2
240: 		);
241: 
242: 	}
243: 
244: }

================
File: code_3/admin/analytics.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Analytics
  8:  */
  9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Analytics {
 10: 	protected $settings;
 11: 	protected $args;
 12: 	protected $default_currency;
 13: 
 14: 	public function __construct() {
 15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 16: 		$this->default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 17: 		/*Orders*/
 18: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_orders_select_query', array(
 19: //			$this,
 20: //			'woocommerce_analytics_orders_select_query'
 21: //		) );
 22: //		/*Orders stats*/
 23: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_orders_stats_query_args', array(
 24: //			$this,
 25: //			'woocommerce_analytics_query_args'
 26: //		) );
 27: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_orders_stats_select_query', array(
 28: //			$this,
 29: //			'convert_orders_stats'
 30: //		) );
 31: //		/*Revenue*/
 32: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_revenue_query_args', array(
 33: //			$this,
 34: //			'woocommerce_analytics_query_args'
 35: //		) );
 36: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_revenue_select_query', array(
 37: //			$this,
 38: //			'convert_orders_stats'
 39: //		) );
 40: //		/*Products*/
 41: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_products_query_args', array(
 42: //			$this,
 43: //			'woocommerce_analytics_query_args'
 44: //		) );
 45: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_products_select_query', array(
 46: //			$this,
 47: //			'convert_orders_stats'
 48: //		) );
 49: //		/*Products stats*/
 50: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_products_stats_query_args', array(
 51: //			$this,
 52: //			'woocommerce_analytics_query_args'
 53: //		) );
 54: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_products_stats_select_query', array(
 55: //			$this,
 56: //			'convert_orders_stats'
 57: //		) );
 58: //		/*Categories*/
 59: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_categories_query_args', array(
 60: //			$this,
 61: //			'woocommerce_analytics_query_args'
 62: //		) );
 63: //		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_categories_select_query', array(
 64: //			$this,
 65: //			'convert_orders_stats'
 66: //		) );
 67: 
 68: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_analytics_update_order_stats_data', [ $this, 'import_order_to_order_stats_table' ], 10, 2 );
 69: 		add_action( 'woocommerce_analytics_update_product', [ $this, 'import_order_product_to_order_product_lookup_table' ], 10, 2 );
 70: 		add_action( 'woocommerce_analytics_update_coupon', [ $this, 'import_order_coupon_to_order_coupon_lookup_table' ], 10, 2 );
 71: 		add_action( 'woocommerce_analytics_update_tax', [ $this, 'import_order_tax_to_order_tax_lookup_table' ], 10, 2 );
 72: 	}
 73: 
 74: 	/**
 75: 	 * @param $order WC_Order
 76: 	 *
 77: 	 * @return float|int
 78: 	 */
 79: 	public function get_rate( $order ) {
 80: 		$order = $order->get_parent_id() ? wc_get_order( $order->get_parent_id() ) : $order;
 81: 
 82: 		$rate             = 1;
 83: 		$order_id         = $order->get_id();
 84: 		$order_currency   = $order->get_currency();
 85: 		$default_currency = $this->default_currency;
 86: 		$order_info       = $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
 87: 
 88: 		if ( isset( $order_info[ $order_currency ], $order_info[ $default_currency ], $order_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] )
 89: 		     && $order_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] == 1
 90: 		     && $order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] > 0 ) {
 91: 
 92: 			$rate = floatval( $order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] );
 93: 		}
 94: 
 95: 		return $rate;
 96: 	}
 97: 
 98: 	public function import_order_to_order_stats_table( $order_data, $order ) {
 99: 		$rate = $this->get_rate( $order );
100: 
101: 		if ( $rate && $rate != 1 ) {
102: 			$order_data['total_sales']    = $order_data['total_sales'] / $rate;
103: 			$order_data['tax_total']      = $order_data['tax_total'] / $rate;
104: 			$order_data['shipping_total'] = $order_data['shipping_total'] / $rate;
105: 			$order_data['net_total']      = $order_data['net_total'] / $rate;
106: 		}
107: 
108: 		return $order_data;
109: 	}
110: 
111: 	public function import_order_product_to_order_product_lookup_table( $order_item_id, $order_id ) {
112: 		global $wpdb;
113: 		$table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'wc_order_product_lookup';
114: 		$order      = wc_get_order( $order_id );
115: 		$rate       = $this->get_rate( $order );
116: 
117: 		if ( $rate && $rate != 1 ) {
118: 			$items      = $order->get_items();
119: 			$order_item = $items[ $order_item_id ];
120: 			$decimals   = wc_get_price_decimals();
121: 			$round_tax  = 'no' === get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_round_at_subtotal' );
122: 
123: 			// Tax amount.
124: 			$tax_amount  = 0;
125: 			$order_taxes = $order->get_taxes();
126: 			$tax_data    = $order_item->get_taxes();
127: 			foreach ( $order_taxes as $tax_item ) {
128: 				$tax_item_id = $tax_item->get_rate_id();
129: 				$tax_amount  += isset( $tax_data['total'][ $tax_item_id ] ) ? (float) $tax_data['total'][ $tax_item_id ] : 0;
130: 			}
131: 
132: 			$net_revenue = round( $order_item->get_total( 'edit' ) / $rate, $decimals );
133: 
134: 			if ( $round_tax ) {
135: 				$tax_amount = round( $tax_amount, $decimals );
136: 			}
137: 
138: 			$tax_amount          = $tax_amount / $rate;
139: 			$coupon_amount       = $order->get_item_coupon_amount( $order_item ) / $rate;
140: 			$shipping_amount     = $order->get_item_shipping_amount( $order_item ) / $rate;
141: 			$shipping_tax_amount = $order->get_item_shipping_tax_amount( $order_item ) / $rate;
142: 
143: 			$wpdb->update( $table_name,// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching
144: 				[
145: 					'product_net_revenue'   => $net_revenue,
146: 					'coupon_amount'         => $coupon_amount,
147: 					'tax_amount'            => $tax_amount,
148: 					'shipping_amount'       => $shipping_amount,
149: 					'shipping_tax_amount'   => $shipping_tax_amount,
150: 					'product_gross_revenue' => $net_revenue + $tax_amount + $shipping_amount + $shipping_tax_amount,
151: 				],
152: 				[ 'order_item_id' => $order_item_id ],
153: 				[
154: 					'%f', // product_net_revenue.
155: 					'%f', // coupon_amount.
156: 					'%f', // tax_amount.
157: 					'%f', // shipping_amount.
158: 					'%f', // shipping_tax_amount.
159: 					'%f', // product_gross_revenue.
160: 				]
161: 			);
162: 		}
163: 	}
164: 
165: 	public function import_order_coupon_to_order_coupon_lookup_table( $coupon_id, $order_id ) {
166: 		global $wpdb;
167: 		$table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'wc_order_coupon_lookup';
168: 		$order      = wc_get_order( $order_id );
169: 		$rate       = $this->get_rate( $order );
170: 
171: 		if ( $rate && $rate != 1 ) {
172: 			$coupon_items    = $order->get_items( 'coupon' );
173: 			$discount_amount = 0;
174: 
175: 			foreach ( $coupon_items as $coupon_item ) {
176: 				$c_data = $coupon_item->get_meta( 'coupon_data', true );
177: 				$c_id   = $c_data['id'] ?? wc_get_coupon_id_by_code( $coupon_item->get_code() );
178: 				if ( $c_id == $coupon_id ) {
179: 					$discount_amount = $coupon_item->get_discount();
180: 				}
181: 			}
182: 
183: 			$discount_amount = $discount_amount / $rate;
184: 
185: 			$wpdb->update( $table_name, [ 'discount_amount' => $discount_amount, ], [ 'order_id' => $order_id ], [ '%f', ] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching
186: 		}
187: 	}
188: 
189: 	public function import_order_tax_to_order_tax_lookup_table( $tax_rate_id, $order_id ) {
190: 		global $wpdb;
191: 		$table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'wc_order_tax_lookup';
192: 		$order      = wc_get_order( $order_id );
193: 		$rate       = $this->get_rate( $order );
194: 
195: 		if ( $rate && $rate != 1 ) {
196: 			$tax_items = $order->get_items( 'tax' );
197: 
198: 			$shipping_tax = 0;
199: 			$order_tax    = 0;
200: 			$total_tax    = 0;
201: 
202: 			foreach ( $tax_items as $tax_item ) {
203: 				if ( $tax_item->get_rate_id() == $tax_rate_id ) {
204: 					$shipping_tax = $tax_item->get_shipping_tax_total() / $rate;
205: 					$order_tax    = $tax_item->get_tax_total() / $rate;
206: 					$total_tax    = ( (float) $tax_item->get_tax_total() + (float) $tax_item->get_shipping_tax_total() ) / $rate;
207: 				}
208: 			}
209: 
210: 			$wpdb->update( $table_name,// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching
211: 				[
212: 					'shipping_tax' => $shipping_tax,
213: 					'order_tax'    => $order_tax,
214: 					'total_tax'    => $total_tax
215: 				],
216: 				[ 'order_id' => $order_id ], [ '%f', '%f', '%f', ] );
217: 		}
218: 	}
219: 
220: 	/**
221: 	 * Only to save args for later use
222: 	 *
223: 	 * @param $args
224: 	 *
225: 	 * @return mixed
226: 	 */
227: 	public function woocommerce_analytics_query_args( $args ) {
228: 		$this->args = $args;
229: 
230: 		return $args;
231: 	}
232: 
233: 	/**
234: 	 * Convert order stats based on rate stored in order meta wmc_order_info
235: 	 *
236: 	 * @param $order_data
237: 	 * @param $default_currency
238: 	 *
239: 	 * @return array
240: 	 */
241: 	private static function get_converted_order( $order_data, $default_currency ) {
242: 		$order_id   = $order_data['order_id'];
243: 		$parent_id  = $order_data['parent_id'] ?? '';
244: 		$order = wc_get_order( $order_id );
245: 		if ( $parent_id ) {
246: 			$order_info = get_post_meta( $parent_id, 'wmc_order_info', true );
247: 		} else {
248: 			$order_info = $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
249: 		}
250: 		$currency   = $order->get_meta( $order_id, '_order_currency', true );
251: 		$rate       = 1;
252: 		if ( isset( $order_info[ $currency ], $order_info[ $default_currency ], $order_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] ) && $order_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] == 1 && $order_info[ $currency ]['rate'] > 0 ) {
253: 			$rate = floatval( $order_info[ $currency ]['rate'] );
254: 		}
255: 		$converted_order = array(
256: 			'date_created' => strtotime( $order_data['date_created'] ),
257: 			'gross_sales'  => 0,
258: 			'refunds'      => 0,
259: 			'net_revenue'  => self::format_price( floatval( $order_data['net_total'] ) / $rate ),
260: 			'coupons'      => 0,
261: 			'taxes'        => 0,
262: 			'shipping'     => 0,
263: 			'total_sales'  => self::format_price( floatval( $order_data['total_sales'] ) / $rate ),
264: 		);
265: 
266: 		if ( $order ) {
267: 			if ( $order_data['net_total'] < 0 ) {
268: 				$converted_order['refunds'] = abs( $converted_order['net_revenue'] );
269: 			}
270: 			$converted_order['coupons']  = self::format_price( floatval( $order->get_total_discount() ) / $rate );
271: 			$converted_order['taxes']    = self::format_price( floatval( $order->get_total_tax() ) / $rate );
272: 			$converted_order['shipping'] = self::format_price( floatval( $order->get_shipping_total() ) / $rate );
273: 		}
274: 		$converted_order['gross_sales'] = $converted_order['total_sales'] + $converted_order['coupons'] - $converted_order['taxes'] - $converted_order['shipping'] + $converted_order['refunds'];
275: 
276: 		return $converted_order;
277: 	}
278: 
279: 	/**
280: 	 * Convert orders stats
281: 	 *
282: 	 * @param $results
283: 	 *
284: 	 * @return mixed
285: 	 * @throws Exception
286: 	 */
287: 	public function convert_orders_stats( $results ) {
288: 		if ( $this->args !== null ) {
289: 			$args           = $this->args;
290: 			$args['fields'] = '';
291: //			$args['extended_info'] = 1;
292: 			$data_store     = \WC_Data_Store::load( 'report-orders' );
293: 			$results_orders = $data_store->get_data( $args );
294: 			$converted      = array(
295: 				'gross_sales' => 0,
296: 				'refunds'     => 0,
297: 				'net_revenue' => 0,
298: 				'coupons'     => 0,
299: 				'taxes'       => 0,
300: 				'shipping'    => 0,
301: 				'total_sales' => 0,
302: 			);
303: 			if ( count( $results_orders->data ) ) {
304: 				$orders_data = $results_orders->data;
305: 				if ( $results_orders->pages > 1 ) {
306: 					for ( $i = 2; $i <= $results_orders->pages; $i ++ ) {
307: 						$args['page']   = $i;
308: 						$results_orders = $data_store->get_data( $args );
309: 						if ( count( $results_orders->data ) ) {
310: 							$orders_data = array_merge( $orders_data, $results_orders->data );
311: 						}
312: 					}
313: 				}
314: 
315: 				$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
316: 				$converted_orders = array();
317: 				foreach ( $orders_data as $order_data ) {
318: 					if ( ! empty( $order_data['order_id'] ) ) {
319: 						$converted_order = self::get_converted_order( $order_data, $default_currency );
320: 						foreach ( $converted_order as $converted_order_k => $converted_order_v ) {
321: 							if ( isset( $converted[ $converted_order_k ] ) ) {
322: 								$converted[ $converted_order_k ] += $converted_order_v;
323: 							}
324: 						}
325: 						$converted_orders[] = $converted_order;
326: 					}
327: 				}
328: 				foreach ( $converted as $key => $value ) {
329: 					if ( isset( $results->totals->{$key} ) ) {
330: 						$results->totals->{$key} = $value;
331: 					}
332: 				}
333: 				if ( isset( $results->totals->avg_order_value, $results->totals->orders_count ) && $results->totals->orders_count > 0 ) {
334: 					$results->totals->avg_order_value = $results->totals->net_revenue / $results->totals->orders_count;
335: 				}
336: 				if ( isset( $results->intervals ) && count( $results->intervals ) && count( $converted_orders ) ) {
337: 					foreach ( $results->intervals as $key => $interval ) {
338: 						if ( isset( $interval['subtotals'] ) && isset( $interval['subtotals']->gross_sales, $interval['subtotals']->total_sales, $interval['subtotals']->net_revenue ) && ( $interval['subtotals']->gross_sales > 0 || $interval['subtotals']->net_revenue > 0 || $interval['subtotals']->gross_sales > 0 ) ) {
339: 							$subtotals = array(
340: 								'gross_sales'     => 0,
341: 								'total_sales'     => 0,
342: 								'coupons'         => 0,
343: 								'refunds'         => 0,
344: 								'taxes'           => 0,
345: 								'shipping'        => 0,
346: 								'net_revenue'     => 0,
347: 								'avg_order_value' => 0,
348: 							);
349: 							$found     = false;
350: 							foreach ( $converted_orders as $converted_order ) {
351: 								if ( $converted_order['date_created'] >= strtotime( $interval['date_start'] ) && $converted_order['date_created'] <= strtotime( $interval['date_end'] ) ) {
352: 									$found                    = true;
353: 									$subtotals['net_revenue'] += $converted_order['net_revenue'];
354: 									$subtotals['total_sales'] += $converted_order['total_sales'];
355: 									$subtotals['refunds']     += $converted_order['refunds'];
356: 									$subtotals['coupons']     += $converted_order['coupons'];
357: 									$subtotals['taxes']       += $converted_order['taxes'];
358: 									$subtotals['shipping']    += $converted_order['shipping'];
359: 									$subtotals['gross_sales'] += $converted_order['gross_sales'];
360: 								} elseif ( $found ) {
361: 									break;
362: 								}
363: 							}
364: 							if ( $found ) {
365: 								if ( isset( $interval['subtotals']->avg_order_value, $interval['subtotals']->orders_count ) && $interval['subtotals']->orders_count > 0 ) {
366: 									$subtotals['avg_order_value'] = $subtotals['net_revenue'] / $interval['subtotals']->orders_count;
367: 								}
368: 								foreach ( $subtotals as $subtotals_k => $subtotals_v ) {
369: 									if ( isset( $interval['subtotals']->{$subtotals_k} ) ) {
370: 										$results->intervals[ $key ]['subtotals']->{$subtotals_k} = $subtotals_v;
371: 									}
372: 								}
373: 							}
374: 						}
375: 					}
376: 				}
377: 			}
378: 			$this->args = null;
379: 		}
380: 
381: 		return $results;
382: 	}
383: 
384: 	/**
385: 	 * Convert net_total and total_sales of every order
386: 	 *
387: 	 * @param $results
388: 	 *
389: 	 * @return mixed
390: 	 */
391: 	public function woocommerce_analytics_orders_select_query( $results ) {
392: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
393: 		foreach ( $results->data as $key => $order_data ) {
394: 			if ( ! empty( $order_data['order_id'] ) ) {
395: 				$converted_order                      = self::get_converted_order( $order_data, $default_currency );
396: 				$results->data[ $key ]['net_total']   = $converted_order['net_revenue'];
397: 				$results->data[ $key ]['total_sales'] = $converted_order['total_sales'];
398: 			}
399: 		}
400: 
401: 		return $results;
402: 	}
403: 
404: 	/**
405: 	 * Format price after converting
406: 	 *
407: 	 * @param $price
408: 	 *
409: 	 * @return float
410: 	 */
411: 	private static function format_price( $price ) {
412: 		return $price > 0 ? floatval( str_replace( ',', '', number_format( $price, wc_get_price_decimals(), '.', ',' ) ) ) : $price;
413: 	}
414: }

================
File: code_3/admin/cryptocurrency.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Cryptocurrency
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Cryptocurrency {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_currencies', array( $this, 'woocommerce_currencies' ) );
16: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_currency_symbols', array( $this, 'woocommerce_currency_symbols' ) );
17: 	}
18: 
19: 	/**
20: 	 * @param $currency
21: 	 *
22: 	 * @return mixed
23: 	 */
24: 	public function woocommerce_currencies( $currency ) {
25: 		if ( is_admin() || $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
26: 			$currency['LTC'] = esc_html__( 'Litecoin', 'woo-multi-currency' );
27: 			$currency['ETH'] = esc_html__( 'Ethereum', 'woo-multi-currency' );
28: 			$currency['ZWL'] = esc_html__( 'Zimbabwe', 'woo-multi-currency' );
29: 		}
30: 
31: 		return $currency;
32: 	}
33: 
34: 	/**
35: 	 * @param $symbols
36: 	 *
37: 	 * @return mixed
38: 	 */
39: 	public function woocommerce_currency_symbols( $symbols ) {
40: 		if ( is_admin() || $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
41: 			$symbols['LTC'] = "LTC";
42: 			$symbols['ETH'] = "ETH";
43: 			$symbols['ZWL'] = "ZWL";
44: 		}
45: 
46: 		return $symbols;
47: 	}
48: }

================

  1: <?php
  2: /*
  3: Class Name: WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Order
  4: Author: Andy Ha (support@villatheme.com)
  5: Author URI: http://villatheme.com

  7: */

 11: 	exit;
 12: }

 14: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Order {
 15: 	public function __construct() {
 16: 		add_action( 'admin_init', array( $this, 'add_metabox' ), 1 );
 17: 		add_action( 'manage_shop_order_posts_custom_column', array( $this, 'currency_columns' ), 2 );
 18: 		if ( ! is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-pdf-invoices-packing-slips/woocommerce-pdf-invoices-packingslips.php' ) ) {
 19: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_formatted_order_total', array( $this, 'get_formatted_order_total' ), 10, 4 );
 20: 			if ( OrderUtil::custom_orders_table_usage_is_enabled() ) {
 21: 				add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_formatted_order_total', array(
 22: 					$this,
 23: 					'get_formatted_order_total_custom_column'
 24: 				), 10, 4 );
 25: 			}
 26: 		}
 27: 	}
 28: 
 29: 	/**
 30: 	 * Add metabox to order post
 31: 	 */
 32: 	public function add_metabox() {
 33: //		add_meta_box( 'wmc_order_metabox', esc_html__( 'Currency Information', 'woo-multi-currency' ), array(
 34: //			$this,
 35: //			'order_metabox'
 36: //		), 'shop_order', 'side', 'default' );
 37: 
 38: 		if ( ! OrderUtil::custom_orders_table_usage_is_enabled() ) {
 39: 			add_meta_box( 'wmc_order_metabox', esc_html__( 'Currency Information', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 40: 				array( $this, 'order_metabox' ), [ 'shop_order', 'shop_subscription' ], 'side', 'default' );
 41: 		} else {
 42: 			$screen = class_exists( '\Automattic\WooCommerce\Internal\DataStores\Orders\CustomOrdersTableController' )
 43: 				? wc_get_page_screen_id( 'shop-order' )
 44: 				: 'shop_order';
 45: 
 46: 			add_meta_box(
 47: 				'wmc_order_metabox',
 48: 				esc_html__( 'Currency Information', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 49: 				array( $this, 'order_metabox' ),
 50: 				$screen,
 51: 				'side',
 52: 				'high'
 53: 			);
 54: 		}
 55: 	}
 56: 
 57: 	/**
 58: 	 * @param $col
 59: 	 */
 60: 	public function currency_columns( $col ) {
 61: 		global $post, $the_order;
 62: 
 63: 		if ( empty( $the_order ) || $the_order->get_id() !== $post->ID ) {
 64: 			$the_order = wc_get_order( $post->ID );
 65: 		}
 66: 		if ( $col == 'order_total' ) {
 67: 			?>
 68:             <div class="wmc-order-currency">
 69: 				<?php echo esc_html__( 'Currency: ', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . esc_html( $the_order->get_currency() ); ?>
 70:             </div>
 71: 			<?php
 72: 		}
 73: 	}
 74: 
 75: 	/**
 76: 	 * @param $post
 77: 	 */
 78: 	public function order_metabox( $post ) {
 79: 		$order = wc_get_order( $post->ID );
 80: 
 81: 		$order_currency = $order && is_a( $order, 'WC_Order' ) ? $order->get_currency() : get_woocommerce_currency();
 82: 		$wmc_order_info = $order && is_object( $order ) ? $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true ) :
 83: 			get_post_meta( $post->ID, 'wmc_order_info', true );
 84: 
 85: 		//		$rate           = 0;
 86: 		$has_info = 1;
 87: 		if ( ! isset( $wmc_order_info ) || ! is_array( $wmc_order_info ) ) {
 88: 			$has_info = 0;
 89: 		}
 90: 
 91: 		?>
 92:         <div id="wmc_order_metabox">
 93: 			<?php if ( ! $has_info ) {
 94: 				$wmc_order_base_currency = $order_currency;
 95: 				$rate                    = 1;
 96: 			} else {
 97: 				foreach ( $wmc_order_info as $code => $currency_info ) {
 98: 					if ( isset( $currency_info['is_main'] ) && $currency_info['is_main'] == 1 ) {
 99: 						$wmc_order_base_currency = $code;
100: 						break;
101: 					}
102: 				}
103: 
104: 				$rate = $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'];
105: 			}
106: 			?>
107:             <div id="wmc_order_currency_text">
108:                 <p>
109: 					<?php esc_html_e( 'Currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?> :
110:                     <span><?php echo esc_html( $order_currency ); ?></span>
111:                 </p>
112:             </div>
113:             <div id="wmc_order_base_currency">
114:                 <p>
115: 					<?php esc_html_e( 'Base on Currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?>
116:                     : <span><?php echo esc_html( $wmc_order_base_currency ); ?></span>
117:                 </p>
118:             </div>
119:             <div id="wmc_order_base_currency">
120:                 <p>
121: 					<?php esc_html_e( 'Currency Rate', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?>
122:                     : <span><?php echo esc_html( $rate ); ?></span>
123:                 </p>
124:             </div>
125:         </div>
126: 		<?php
127: 	}
128: 
129: 	public function get_formatted_order_total_custom_column( $formatted_total, $this_order, $tax_display, $display_refunded ) {
130: 		if ( ! is_admin() || ! function_exists( 'get_current_screen' ) || ( get_current_screen() && 'woocommerce_page_wc-orders' != get_current_screen()->id ) ) {
131: 			return $formatted_total;
132: 		}
133: 		$order_currency = $this_order->get_currency();
134: 		ob_start();
135: 		?>
136:         <div class="wmc-order-currency">
137: 			<?php echo esc_html__( 'Currency: ', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . esc_html( $order_currency ); ?>
138:         </div>
139: 		<?php
140: 		$order_custom_text = ob_get_clean();
141: 		$order_custom_text .= $formatted_total;
142: 		$wmc_order_info = $this_order->get_meta( 'wmc_order_info', true );
143: 		if ( is_array( $wmc_order_info ) && count( $wmc_order_info ) ) {
144: 			foreach ( $wmc_order_info as $code => $currency_info ) {
145: 				if ( isset( $currency_info['is_main'] ) && $currency_info['is_main'] == 1 && isset( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ] ) ) {
146: 					if ( $order_currency != $code && floatval( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] ) ) {
147: 						$price_in_base_currency = ( $this_order->get_total() - $this_order->get_total_refunded() ) / $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'];
148: 						ob_start();
149: 						?>
150:                         <p class="wmc-order-base-currency" style="color:red">
151: 							<?php echo esc_html( $code ) . ': ' ?>
152:                             <span>
153:                                 <?php echo wc_price( $price_in_base_currency, array(// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
154:                                     'currency' => $code,
155:                                     'decimals' => ! empty( $wmc_order_info[ $code ]['decimals'] ) ? (int) $wmc_order_info[ $code ]['decimals'] : 0
156:                                 ) ) ?>
157:                             </span>
158:                         </p>
159: 						<?php
160: 						$order_custom_text .= ob_get_clean();
161: 					}
162: 					break;
163: 				}
164: 			}
165: 		}
166: 
167: 		return $order_custom_text;
168: 	}
169: 
170: 
171: 	/**
172: 	 * @param $formatted_total
173: 	 * @param $order WC_Order
174: 	 * @param $tax_display
175: 	 * @param $display_refunded
176: 	 *
177: 	 * @return string
178: 	 */
179: 	public function get_formatted_order_total( $formatted_total, $order, $tax_display, $display_refunded ) {
180: 		if ( ! $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true ) ) {
181: 			return $formatted_total;
182: 		}
183: 		$order_currency = $order->get_currency();
184: 		if ( ! isset( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ] ) ) {
185: 			return $formatted_total;
186: 		}
187: 		$wmc_order_info  = $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
188: 		$total           = $order->get_meta('_order_total', true );
189: 		$decimal         = intval( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['decimals'] );
190: 		$formatted_total = wc_price( $total, array(
191: 			'currency' => $order_currency,
192: 			'decimals' => $decimal
193: 		) );
194: 
195: 		$order_total    = $order->get_total();
196: 		$total_refunded = $order->get_total_refunded();
197: 		$tax_string     = '';
198: 
199: 		// Tax for inclusive prices.
200: 		if ( wc_tax_enabled() && 'incl' === $tax_display ) {
201: 			$tax_string_array = array();
202: 			$tax_totals       = $order->get_tax_totals();
203: 			if ( 'itemized' === get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_total_display' ) ) {
204: 				foreach ( $tax_totals as $code => $tax ) {
205: 					$tax_amount         = ( $total_refunded && $display_refunded ) ? wc_price( WC_Tax::round( $tax->amount - $order->get_total_tax_refunded_by_rate_id( $tax->rate_id ) ), array(
206: 						'currency' => $order->get_currency(),
207: 						'decimals' => $decimal
208: 					) ) : $tax->formatted_amount;
209: 					$tax_string_array[] = sprintf( '%s %s', $tax_amount, $tax->label );
210: 				}
211: 			} elseif ( ! empty( $tax_totals ) ) {
212: 				$tax_amount         = ( $total_refunded && $display_refunded ) ? $order->get_total_tax() - $order->get_total_tax_refunded() : $order->get_total_tax();
213: 				$tax_string_array[] = sprintf( '%s %s', wc_price( $tax_amount, array(
214: 					'currency' => $order->get_currency(),
215: 					'decimals' => $decimal
216: 				) ), WC()->countries->tax_or_vat() );
217: 			}
218: 
219: 			if ( ! empty( $tax_string_array ) ) {
220: 				/* translators: %s: taxes */
221: 				$tax_string = ' <small class="includes_tax">' . sprintf( esc_html__( '(includes %s)', 'woocommerce' ), implode( ', ', $tax_string_array ) ) . '</small>';
222: 			}
223: 		}
224: 
225: 		if ( $total_refunded && $display_refunded ) {
226: 			$formatted_total = '<del>' . wp_strip_all_tags( $formatted_total ) . '</del> <ins>' . wc_price( $order_total - $total_refunded, array(
227: 					'currency' => $order->get_currency(),
228: 					'decimals' => $decimal
229: 				) ) . $tax_string . '</ins>';
230: 		} else {
231: 			$formatted_total .= $tax_string;
232: 		}
233: 
234: 		/**
235: 		 * Filter WooCommerce formatted order total.
236: 		 *
237: 		 * @param string $formatted_total Total to display.
238: 		 * @param WC_Order $order Order data.
239: 		 * @param string $tax_display Type of tax display.
240: 		 * @param bool $display_refunded If should include refunded value.
241: 		 */
242: 
243: 		return $formatted_total;
244: 	}
245: }

 13: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Product {
 14: 	protected $settings;
 15: 	protected $decimal_separator;
 16: 
 17: 	public function __construct() {
 18: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 19: 		if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
 20: 			/*Simple product*/
 21: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_product_options_pricing', array( $this, 'simple_price_input' ) );
 22: 			/*Variable product*/
 23: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_variation_options_pricing', array( $this, 'variation_price_input' ), 10, 3 );
 24: 			/*Save data*/
 25: 			$product_types = apply_filters( 'wmc_simple_product_type_register', array(
 26: 				'simple',
 27: 				'external',
 28: 				'bundle',
 29: 				'course',
 30: 				'subscription',
 31: 				'woosb',
 32: 				'composite',
 33: 				'appointment',
 34: 			) );
 35: 			foreach ( $product_types as $type ) {
 36: 				add_action( 'woocommerce_process_product_meta_' . $type, array( $this, 'save_meta_simple_product' ) );
 37: 			}
 38: 
 39: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_save_product_variation', array( $this, 'save_meta_product_variation' ), 10, 2 );
 40: 
 41: 			/*Bulk action*/
 42: 			add_action( 'admin_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'init_scripts' ), 12 );
 43: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_variable_product_bulk_edit_actions', array( $this, 'bulk_edit_actions' ) );
 44: 
 45: 		}
 46: 	}

 48: 	/**
 49: 	 * Init list currencies for bulk acction
 50: 	 */
 51: 	public function init_scripts() {
 52: 		$screen    = get_current_screen();
 53: 		$screen_id = $screen ? $screen->id : '';
 54: 		if ( in_array( $screen_id, array( 'product', 'edit-product' ) ) ) {
 55: 			$currencies       = $this->settings->get_currencies();
 56: 			$currency_default = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 57: 
 58: 			$index = array_search( $currency_default, $currencies );
 59: 			unset( $currencies[ $index ] );
 60: 			$params = array(
 61: 				'currencies' => array_values( $currencies )
 62: 			);
 63: 			$src_min = WP_DEBUG ? '' : '.min';
 64: 			wp_localize_script( 'wc-admin-variation-meta-boxes', 'wmc_params', $params );
 65: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woo-multi-currency-bulk-actions', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'woo-multi-currency-bulk-actions' . $src_min . '.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
 66: 		}
 67: 	}
 68: 
 69: 	/**
 70: 	 * Show bulk action in product edit page
 71: 	 */
 72: 	public function bulk_edit_actions() {
 73: 		$currencies = $this->settings->get_currencies();
 74: 
 75: 		?>
 76:         <optgroup label="<?php esc_attr_e( 'Multi Currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?>">
 77: 			<?php if ( count( $currencies ) ) {
 78: 				foreach ( $currencies as $currency ) {
 79: 					if ( $currency == $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 80: 						continue;
 81: 					}
 82: 					?>
 83:                     <option value="wbs_regular_price-<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ) ?>"><?php echo esc_html__( 'Set regular prices', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $currency ) . ')'; ?></option>
 84:                     <option value="wbs_sale_price-<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ) ?>"><?php echo esc_html__( 'Set sale prices', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $currency ) . ')'; ?></option>
 85: 				<?php }
 86: 			} ?>
 87:         </optgroup>
 88: 	<?php }
 89: 
 90: 	/**
 91: 	 * Add Regular price, Sale price with Simple product
 92: 	 * Working with currency by country
 93: 	 */
 94: 	public function simple_price_input() {
 95: 		global $post;
 96: 		$currencies    = $this->settings->get_currencies();
 97: 		$wc_product    = wc_get_product( $post->ID );
 98: 		$regular_price = $this->adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $wc_product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
 99: 		$sale_price    = $this->adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $wc_product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
100: 		foreach ( $currencies as $currency ) {
101: 			if ( $currency != $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
102: 				?>
103:                 <div style="border-left: 5px solid #f78080;">
104:                     <p class="form-field ">
105:                         <label for="_regular_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>"><?php echo esc_html__( 'Regular Price', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $currency ) . ')'; ?></label>
106:                         <input id="_regular_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>"
107:                                class="short wc_input_price"
108:                                type="text"
109:                                value="<?php echo isset( $regular_price[ $currency ] ) ? esc_attr( $regular_price[ $currency ] ) : ''; ?>"
110:                                name="_regular_price_wmcp[<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>]">
111:                     </p>
112:                     <p class="form-field ">
113:                         <label for="_sale_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>"><?php echo esc_html__( 'Sale Price', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $currency ) . ')'; ?></label>
114:                         <input id="_sale_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>" class="short wc_input_price"
115:                                type="text"
116:                                value="<?php echo isset( $sale_price[ $currency ] ) ? esc_attr( $sale_price[ $currency ] ) : ''; ?>"
117:                                name="_sale_price_wmcp[<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>]">
118:                     </p>
119:                 </div>
120: 				<?php
121: 			}
122: 		}
123: 		wp_nonce_field( 'wmc_save_simple_product_currency', '_wmc_nonce' );
124: 
125: 	}
126: 
127: 	/**
128: 	 * Add Regular price, Sale price with Variation product
129: 	 * Working with currency by country
130: 	 *
131: 	 * @param $loop
132: 	 * @param $variation_data
133: 	 * @param $variation
134: 	 */
135: 	public function variation_price_input( $loop, $variation_data, $variation ) {
136: 		$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_currencies();
137: 		$variation_product   = wc_get_product( $variation->ID );
138: 		$regular_price       = $this->adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $variation_product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
139: 		$sale_price          = $this->adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $variation_product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
140: 		foreach ( $selected_currencies as $code ) {
141: 			$_regular_price = $_sale_price = "";
142: 			if ( isset( $regular_price[ $code ] ) ) {
143: 				$_regular_price = $regular_price[ $code ];
144: 			}
145: 			if ( isset( $sale_price[ $code ] ) ) {
146: 				$_sale_price = $sale_price[ $code ];
147: 			}
148: 			if ( $code != $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
149: 				?>
150:                 <div>
151:                     <p class="form-row form-row-first">
152:                         <label><?php echo esc_html__( 'Regular Price:', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $code ) . ')'; ?></label>
153:                         <input type="text" size="5"
154:                                name="variable_regular_price_wmc[<?php echo esc_attr( $loop ) ?>][<?php echo esc_attr( $code ); ?>]"
155:                                value="<?php echo ( isset( $_regular_price ) ) ? esc_attr( $_regular_price ) : '' ?>"
156:                                class="wc_input_price wbs-variable-regular-price-<?php echo esc_attr( $code ) ?>"/>
157:                     </p>
158:                     <p class="form-row form-row-last">
159:                         <label><?php echo esc_html__( 'Sale Price:', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $code ) . ')'; ?> </label>
160:                         <input type="text" size="5"
161:                                name="variables_sale_price_wmc[<?php echo esc_attr( $loop ) ?>][<?php echo esc_attr( $code ); ?>]"
162:                                value="<?php echo ( isset( $_sale_price ) ) ? esc_attr( $_sale_price ) : '' ?>"
163:                                class="wc_input_price wbs-variable-sale-price-<?php echo esc_attr( $code ) ?>"" />
164:                     </p>
165:                 </div>
166: 				<?php
167: 			}
168: 		}
169: 		wp_nonce_field( 'wmc_save_variable_product_currency', '_wmc_nonce' );
170: 
171: 	}
172: 
173: 	/**
174: 	 * Save Price by country of Simple Product
175: 	 *
176: 	 * @param $post_id
177: 	 */
178: 	public function save_meta_simple_product( $post_id ) {
179: 		/*Check Permission*/
180: 		if ( ! current_user_can( 'manage_woocommerce' ) ) {
181: 			return;
182: 		}
183: 		/*Check send from product edit page*/
184: 		if ( ! isset( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ) || ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ), 'wmc_save_simple_product_currency' ) ) {
185: 			return;
186: 		}
187: 		$simple_product = wc_get_product( $post_id );
188: 		$update_meta = false;
189: 
190: 		if ( isset( $_POST['_regular_price_wmcp'] ) ) {
191: 			$_regular_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( wc_clean( $_POST['_regular_price_wmcp'] ) );
192: 			$simple_product->update_meta_data('_regular_price_wmcp', wp_json_encode( $_regular_price_wmcp ) );
193: 			$update_meta = true;
194: 		}
195: 		if ( isset( $_POST['_sale_price_wmcp'] ) && ! empty( $_POST['_sale_price'] ) ) {
196: 			$_sale_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( wc_clean( $_POST['_sale_price_wmcp'] ) );
197: 			$simple_product->update_meta_data('_sale_price_wmcp', wp_json_encode( $_sale_price_wmcp ) );
198: 			$update_meta = true;
199: 		} else {
200: 			$simple_product->update_meta_data('_sale_price_wmcp', '' );
201: 			$update_meta = true;
202: 		}
203: 
204: 		$date_to = isset( $_POST['_sale_price_dates_to'] ) ? wc_clean( $_POST['_sale_price_dates_to'] ) : '';
205: 
206: 		if ( $date_to && strtotime( $date_to ) < strtotime( 'NOW', current_time( 'timestamp' ) ) ) {
207: 			$simple_product->update_meta_data('_sale_price_wmcp', '' );
208: 			$update_meta = true;
209: 		}
210: 		if ( $update_meta ) {
211: 			$simple_product->save_meta_data();
212:         }
213: 	}
214: 
215: 	/**
216: 	 * Save Currency by Country of Variation product
217: 	 *
218: 	 * @param $variation_id
219: 	 * @param $i
220: 	 */
221: 	public function save_meta_product_variation( $variation_id, $i ) {
222: 		/*Check Permission*/
223: 		if ( ! current_user_can( 'manage_woocommerce' ) ) {
224: 			return;
225: 		}
226: 		/*Check send from product edit page*/
227: 		if ( ! isset( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ) || ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ), 'wmc_save_variable_product_currency' ) ) {
228: 			return;
229: 		}
230: 		$variation_product = wc_get_product( $variation_id );
231: 		$update_meta = false;
232: 
233: 		if ( isset( $_POST['variable_regular_price_wmc'] ) ) {
234: 			$_regular_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( wc_clean( $_POST['variable_regular_price_wmc'] ) );
235: 			$variation_product->update_meta_data('_regular_price_wmcp', wp_json_encode( $_regular_price_wmcp[ $i ] ) );
236: 			$update_meta = true;
237: 		}
238: 		if ( isset( $_POST['variables_sale_price_wmc'] ) && ! empty( $_POST['variable_sale_price'][ $i ] ) ) {
239: 			$_sale_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( wc_clean( $_POST['variables_sale_price_wmc'] ) );
240: 			$variation_product->update_meta_data('_sale_price_wmcp', wp_json_encode( $_sale_price_wmcp[ $i ] ) );
241: 			$update_meta = true;
242: 		} else {
243: 			$variation_product->update_meta_data('_sale_price_wmcp', '' );
244: 			$update_meta = true;
245: 		}
246: 		$variable_sale_price_dates_to = wc_clean( $_POST['variable_sale_price_dates_to'] );
247: 		$date_to                      = ( $variable_sale_price_dates_to[ $i ] );
248: 		if ( $date_to && strtotime( $date_to ) < strtotime( 'NOW', current_time( 'timestamp' ) ) ) {
249: 			$variation_product->update_meta_data('_sale_price_wmcp', '' );
250: 			$update_meta = true;
251: 		}
252: 		if ( $update_meta ) {
253: 			$variation_product->save_meta_data();
254: 		}
255: 
256: 	}
257: 
258: 	/**
259: 	 * @param $fixed_price
260: 	 *  Replace '.' with currently used decimal separator for fixed price input fields
261: 	 *
262: 	 * @return array
263: 	 */
264: 	private function adjust_fixed_price( $fixed_price ) {
265: 		if ( ! $this->decimal_separator ) {
266: 			$this->decimal_separator = stripslashes( get_option( 'woocommerce_price_decimal_sep', '.' ) );
267: 		}
268: 		if ( $this->decimal_separator !== '.' && is_array( $fixed_price ) && count( $fixed_price ) ) {
269: 			foreach ( $fixed_price as $key => $value ) {
270: 				$fixed_price[ $key ] = str_replace( '.', $this->decimal_separator, $value );
271: 			}
272: 		}
273: 
274: 		return $fixed_price;
275: 	}
276: 
277: 	function format_json_price_meta( $price_meta ) {
278: 
279: 		return is_string( $price_meta ) ? json_decode( $price_meta, true ) : $price_meta;
280: 	}
281: 
282: } ?>

================
File: code_3/admin/reports.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_Admin_Reports
  8:  */
  9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Reports {
 10: 	protected $settings;
 11: 	protected $currencies;
 12: 	protected $currency;
 13: 	protected $results;
 14: 	protected $chart_interval;
 15: 	protected $where_meta;
 16: 	protected $total_sales;
 17: 	protected $order_items;
 18: 	protected $current_range;
 19: 	protected $default_currency;
 20: 	protected $is_dashboard;
 21: 
 22: 	function __construct() {
 23: 		$this->settings     = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 24: 		$this->is_dashboard = false;
 25: 		add_action( 'admin_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'admin_enqueue_scripts' ) );
 26: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_args', array( $this, 'report_by_currency' ) );
 27: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data', array(
 28: 			$this,
 29: 			'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_for_dashboard'
 30: 		), 10, 2 );
 31: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_currency', array( $this, 'woocommerce_currency' ), 99 );
 32: 		add_filter( 'wc_get_price_decimals', array( $this, 'wc_get_price_decimals' ), 99 );
 33: 		$this->default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 34: 		$this->currencies       = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 35: 	}
 36: 
 37: 	/**Get current range to recalculate report data
 38: 	 * @return string
 39: 	 */
 40: 	public function get_current_range() {
 41: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_reports' ) ) {
 42: 			return '7day';
 43: 		}
 44: 		if ( $this->current_range === null ) {
 45: 			$this->current_range = ! empty( $_GET['range'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['range'] ) ) : '7day';
 46: 			if ( ! in_array( $this->current_range, array(
 47: 				'custom',
 48: 				'year',
 49: 				'last_month',
 50: 				'month',
 51: 				'7day'
 52: 			), true ) ) {
 53: 				$this->current_range = '7day';
 54: 			}
 55: 		}
 56: 
 57: 		return $this->current_range;
 58: 	}
 59: 
 60: 	public function admin_enqueue_scripts() {
 61: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_reports' ) ) {
 62: 			return;
 63: 		}
 64: 		$screen    = get_current_screen();
 65: 		$screen_id = $screen ? $screen->id : '';
 66: 		if ( 'woocommerce_page_wc-reports' == $screen_id ) {
 67: 			$tab          = isset( $_GET['tab'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['tab'] ) ) : 'orders';
 68: 			$report       = isset( $_GET['report'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['report'] ) ) : '';
 69: 			$currency     = isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ? strtoupper( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) ) : '';
 70: 			$view_default = isset( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ) : '';
 71: 			if ( ( $tab === 'orders' && $report !== 'coupon_usage' ) || ( $tab === 'customers' && $report === 'customers' ) ) {
 72: 				$src_min = WP_DEBUG ? '' : '.min';
 73: 				wp_enqueue_style( 'woocommerce-multi-currency-admin-reports', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'reports' . $src_min . '.css', '', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 74: 				wp_enqueue_script( 'woocommerce-multi-currency-admin-reports', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'reports' . $src_min . '.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
 75: 				wp_localize_script( 'woocommerce-multi-currency-admin-reports', 'woocommerce_multi_currency_admin_reports', array(
 76: 					'currency' => $currency ? $currency : 'all-currencies'
 77: 				) );
 78: 				add_action( 'admin_footer', array( $this, 'admin_footer' ) );
 79: 			}
 80: 			if ( ! $currency ) {
 81: 				if ( $tab === 'orders' ) {
 82: 					if ( ! $report || $report === 'sales_by_date' ) {
 83: 						add_filter( 'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_args', array(
 84: 							$this,
 85: 							'add_return_order_id'
 86: 						) );
 87: 						add_filter( 'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data', array(
 88: 							$this,
 89: 							'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_1'
 90: 						), 10, 2 );
 91: 					} elseif ( $report === 'sales_by_product' && ! empty( $_REQUEST['product_ids'] ) ) {
 92: 						include_once( WC()->plugin_path() . '/includes/admin/reports/class-wc-admin-report.php' );
 93: 						include_once( WC()->plugin_path() . '/includes/admin/reports/class-wc-report-sales-by-product.php' );
 94: 						$current_range = $this->get_current_range();
 95: 						$results       = array();
 96: 						if ( count( $this->currencies ) ) {
 97: 							foreach ( $this->currencies as $currency_code => $currency_data ) {
 98: 								$this->currency = $currency_code;
 99: 								add_filter( 'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_args', array(
100: 									$this,
101: 									'report_by_currency_for_all'
102: 								) );
103: 								$report = new WC_Report_Sales_By_Product();
104: 								$report->check_current_range_nonce( $current_range );
105: 								$report->calculate_current_range( $current_range );
106: 								$total_sales = $report->get_order_report_data(
107: 									array(
108: 										'data'         => array(
109: 											'_line_total' => array(
110: 												'type'            => 'order_item_meta',
111: 												'order_item_type' => 'line_item',
112: 												'function'        => 'SUM',
113: 												'name'            => 'order_item_amount',
114: 											),
115: 										),
116: 										'where_meta'   => array(
117: 											'relation' => 'OR',
118: 											array(
119: 												'type'       => 'order_item_meta',
120: 												'meta_key'   => array( '_product_id', '_variation_id' ), // phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_key
121: 												'meta_value' => $report->product_ids, // phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_value
122: 												'operator'   => 'IN',
123: 											),
124: 										),
125: 										'query_type'   => 'get_var',
126: 										'filter_range' => true,
127: 										'order_status' => array( 'completed', 'processing', 'on-hold', 'refunded' ),
128: 									)
129: 								);
130: 
131: 								$results[] = self::convert_to_default_currency( $total_sales, $currency_data['rate'] );
132: 								remove_filter( 'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_args', array(
133: 									$this,
134: 									'report_by_currency_for_all'
135: 								) );

140: 							'woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data'
141: 						), 10, 2 );

146: 						$current_range = $this->get_current_range();
147: 						$results       = array();

149: 							foreach ( $this->currencies as $currency_code => $currency_data ) {
