368: 		}
369: 	}
370: 
371: 	/**
372: 	 * @param $price
373: 	 * @param $rate
374: 	 *
375: 	 * @return float|int
376: 	 */
377: 	public static function convert_to_default_currency( $price, $rate ) {
378: 		return floatval( $price ) / floatval( $rate );
379: 	}
380: 
381: 	/**
382: 	 *
383: 	 */
384: 	public function admin_footer() {
385: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_reports' ) ) {
386: 			return;
387: 		}
388: 		$currency          = isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ? strtoupper( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) ) : '';
389: 		$view_default      = isset( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ) : '';
390: 		$request_uri       = isset( $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] ) ? esc_url_raw( wp_unslash( $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] ) ) : '';
391: 		$view_default_link = $view_default === 'yes' ? remove_query_arg( 'wmc-view-default-currency', $request_uri ) : add_query_arg( array( 'wmc-view-default-currency' => 'yes' ), $request_uri );
392: 		$links             = $this->settings->get_links();
393: 		$currency_name     = get_woocommerce_currencies();
394: 		?>
395:         <li class="wmc-reports-currency-selector">
396:             <div class="woocommerce-multi-currency shortcode">
397:                 <div class="wmc-currency">
398:                     <select class="wmc-nav"
399:                             onchange="this.options[this.selectedIndex].value && (window.location = this.options[this.selectedIndex].value);">
400:                         <option value="<?php echo esc_url( remove_query_arg( 'wmc-currency', $request_uri ) ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'All currencies', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
401: 						<?php
402: 						foreach ( $links as $code => $link ) {
403: 							?>
404:                             <option <?php selected( $currency, $code ) ?>
405:                                     value="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>"><?php echo esc_html( $currency_name[ $code ] ) ?></option>
406: 							<?php
407: 						}
408: 						?>
409:                     </select>
410:                 </div>
411:             </div>
412:         </li>
413: 		<?php
414: 		if ( $currency && $currency !== $this->default_currency ) {
415: 			?>
416:             <li class="wmc-view-default-currency-container">
417:                 <input id="wmc-view-default-currency" type="checkbox"
418:                        value="yes" <?php checked( $view_default, 'yes' ) ?>
419:                        data-report_link="<?php echo esc_url( $view_default_link ) ?>"><label
420:                         for="wmc-view-default-currency"><?php esc_html_e( 'View in default currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></label>
421:             </li>
422: 			<?php
423: 		}
424: 	}
425: 
426: 	/**Filter orders by each currency
427: 	 *
428: 	 * @param $args
429: 	 *
430: 	 * @return mixed
431: 	 */
432: 	public function report_by_currency_for_all( $args ) {
433: 		$args['where_meta'][]           = array(
434: 			'meta_key'   => '_order_currency',// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_key
435: 			'meta_value' => $this->currency,// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_value
436: 			'operator'   => '=',
437: 		);
438: 		$args['where_meta']['relation'] = 'AND';
439: 
440: 		$args['nocache'] = true;
441: 
442: 		return $args;
443: 	}
444: 
445: 	public function add_return_order_id( $args ) {
446: 		if ( ! isset( $args['data']['ID'] ) ) {
447: 			if ( ! empty( $args['data']['_order_total'] ) ) {
448: 				$args['data']['ID']                       = array(
449: 					'type'     => 'post_data',
450: 					'function' => '',
451: 					'name'     => 'order_id',
452: 				);
453: 				$args['group_by']                         = 'order_id';
454: 				$args['data']['_order_total']['function'] = '';
455: 			} elseif ( ! empty( $args['data']['_line_total'] ) ) {
456: 				$args['data']['ID']                      = array(
457: 					'type'     => 'post_data',
458: 					'function' => '',
459: 					'name'     => 'order_id',
460: 				);
461: 				$args['group_by']                        = 'order_id';
462: 				$args['data']['_line_total']['function'] = '';
463: 			}
464: 
465: 		}
466: 		$args['nocache'] = true;
467: 
468: 		return $args;
469: 	}
470: 
471: 	/**Convert to default currency for WooCommerce Status in WP dashboard
472: 	 *
473: 	 * @param $result
474: 	 * @param $data
475: 	 *
476: 	 * @return mixed
477: 	 */
478: 	public function woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_for_dashboard( $result, $data ) {
479: 		if ( $this->is_dashboard ) {
480: 			if ( count( array_keys( $data ) ) === 3 && count( array_intersect( array_keys( $data ), array(
481: 					'_order_total',
482: 					'post_date',
483: 					'ID'
484: 				) ) ) === 3 ) {
485: 				if ( is_array( $result ) && count( $result ) ) {
486: 					foreach ( $result as $key => $value ) {
487: 						$order_id        = $value->order_id;
488: 						$line_product    = wc_get_order( $order_id );
489: 						$_order_currency = $line_product->get_meta('_order_currency', true );
490: 						$wmc_order_info  = $line_product->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
491: 						$rate            = 0;
492: 						if ( isset( $wmc_order_info[ $this->default_currency ] ) && isset( $wmc_order_info[ $this->default_currency ]['is_main'] ) && $wmc_order_info[ $this->default_currency ]['is_main'] == 1 ) {
493: 							if ( isset( $wmc_order_info[ $_order_currency ] ) ) {
494: 								$rate = $wmc_order_info[ $_order_currency ]['rate'];
495: 							}
496: 							if ( isset( $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ] ) ) {
497: 								$rate = $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ]['rate'];
498: 							}
499: 
500: 						} elseif ( isset( $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ] ) ) {
501: 							$rate = $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ]['rate'];
502: 						}
503: 						if ( $rate > 0 ) {
504: 							$value->sparkline_value = self::convert_to_default_currency( $value->sparkline_value, $rate );
505: 						}
506: 					}
507: 				}
508: 			} else {
509: 				$result = $this->woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_1( $result, $data );
510: 			}
511: 			$this->is_dashboard = false;
512: 		}
513: 
514: 		return $result;
515: 	}
516: 
517: 	/**
518: 	 * @param $result
519: 	 * @param $data
520: 	 *
521: 	 * @return mixed
522: 	 */
523: 	public function woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data_1( $result, $data ) {
524: 		if ( isset( $data['ID'] ) && ( ! empty( $data['_order_total'] ) || ! empty( $data['_line_total'] ) ) ) {
525: 			foreach ( $result as $data_k => $data_obj ) {
526: 				$order_id = isset( $data_obj->order_id ) ? $data_obj->order_id : ( isset( $data_obj->refund_id ) ? $data_obj->refund_id : '' );
527: 				if ( $order_id ) {
528: 				    $line_order = wc_get_order( $order_id );
529: 					$_order_currency = $line_order->get_meta('_order_currency', true );
530: 					if ( $this->default_currency !== $_order_currency ) {
531: 						$wmc_order_info = $line_order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
532: 						$rate           = 0;
533: 						if ( isset( $wmc_order_info[ $this->default_currency ] ) && isset( $wmc_order_info[ $this->default_currency ]['is_main'] ) && $wmc_order_info[ $this->default_currency ]['is_main'] == 1 ) {
534: 							if ( isset( $wmc_order_info[ $_order_currency ] ) ) {
535: 								$rate = $wmc_order_info[ $_order_currency ]['rate'];
536: 							}
537: 							if ( isset( $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ] ) ) {
538: 								$rate = $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ]['rate'];
539: 							}
540: 
541: 						} elseif ( isset( $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ] ) ) {
542: 							$rate = $this->currencies[ $_order_currency ]['rate'];
543: 						}
544: 						if ( $rate > 0 ) {
545: 							foreach ( $data_obj as $data_obj_k => $data_obj_v ) {
546: 								if ( ! in_array( $data_obj_k, array( 'post_date', 'order_id', 'refund_id' ) ) ) {
547: 									$data_obj->{$data_obj_k} = self::convert_to_default_currency( $data_obj_v, $rate );
548: 								}
549: 							}
550: 						}
551: 					}
552: 				}
553: 			}
554: 		}
555: 
556: 		return $result;
557: 	}
558: 
559: 	/**
560: 	 * @param $result
561: 	 * @param $data
562: 	 *
563: 	 * @return mixed
564: 	 */
565: 	public function woocommerce_reports_get_order_report_data( $result, $data ) {
566: 		if ( isset( $data['_line_total'] ) ) {
567: 			if ( $this->total_sales !== null && ! is_array( $result ) ) {
568: 				$result = $this->total_sales;
569: 			} elseif ( $this->order_items !== null && is_array( $result ) ) {
570: 				$result = $this->order_items;
571: 			}
572: 		}
573: 
574: 		return $result;
575: 	}
576: 
577: 	/**Recalculate report data after converting all to default currency
578: 	 *
579: 	 * @param $report_data
580: 	 *
581: 	 * @return mixed
582: 	 */
583: 	public function woocommerce_admin_report_data( $report_data ) {
584: 		if ( is_array( $this->results ) && count( $this->results ) ) {
585: 			$report_data->orders          = array();
586: 			$report_data->refund_lines    = array();
587: 			$report_data->refunded_orders = array();
588: 			$report_data->full_refunds    = array();
589: 			foreach ( $this->results as $result ) {
590: 				if ( isset( $result->orders ) && is_array( $result->orders ) && count( $result->orders ) ) {
591: 					$report_data->orders = array_merge( $report_data->orders, $result->orders );
592: 				}
593: 				if ( isset( $result->refund_lines ) && is_array( $result->refund_lines ) && count( $result->refund_lines ) ) {
594: 					$report_data->refund_lines = array_merge( $report_data->refund_lines, $result->refund_lines );
595: 				}
596: 				if ( isset( $result->refunded_orders ) && is_array( $result->refunded_orders ) && count( $result->refunded_orders ) ) {
597: 					$report_data->refunded_orders = array_merge( $report_data->refunded_orders, $result->refunded_orders );
598: 				}
599: 				if ( isset( $result->full_refunds ) && is_array( $result->full_refunds ) && count( $result->full_refunds ) ) {
600: 					$report_data->full_refunds = array_merge( $report_data->full_refunds, $result->full_refunds );
601: 				}
602: 			}
603: 			$report_data->total_tax_refunded          = 0;
604: 			$report_data->total_shipping_refunded     = 0;
605: 			$report_data->total_shipping_tax_refunded = 0;
606: 			$report_data->total_refunds               = 0;
607: 
608: 			$report_data->refunded_orders = array_merge( $report_data->partial_refunds, $report_data->full_refunds );
609: 
610: 			foreach ( $report_data->refunded_orders as $key => $value ) {
611: 				$report_data->total_tax_refunded          += floatval( $value->total_tax < 0 ? $value->total_tax * - 1 : $value->total_tax );
612: 				$report_data->total_refunds               += floatval( $value->total_refund );
613: 				$report_data->total_shipping_tax_refunded += floatval( $value->total_shipping_tax < 0 ? $value->total_shipping_tax * - 1 : $value->total_shipping_tax );
614: 				$report_data->total_shipping_refunded     += floatval( $value->total_shipping < 0 ? $value->total_shipping * - 1 : $value->total_shipping );
615: 
616: 				// Only applies to parial.
617: 				if ( isset( $value->order_item_count ) ) {
618: 					$report_data->refunded_order_items += floatval( $value->order_item_count < 0 ? $value->order_item_count * - 1 : $value->order_item_count );
619: 				}
620: 			}
621: 			// Totals from all orders - including those refunded. Subtract refunded amounts.
622: 			$report_data->total_tax          = wc_format_decimal( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->orders, 'total_tax' ) ) - $report_data->total_tax_refunded, 2 );
623: 			$report_data->total_shipping     = wc_format_decimal( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->orders, 'total_shipping' ) ) - $report_data->total_shipping_refunded, 2 );
624: 			$report_data->total_shipping_tax = wc_format_decimal( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->orders, 'total_shipping_tax' ) ) - $report_data->total_shipping_tax_refunded, 2 );
625: 
626: 			// Total the refunds and sales amounts. Sales subract refunds. Note - total_sales also includes shipping costs.
627: 			$report_data->total_sales = wc_format_decimal( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->orders, 'total_sales' ) ) - $report_data->total_refunds, 2 );
628: 			$report_data->net_sales   = wc_format_decimal( $report_data->total_sales - $report_data->total_shipping - max( 0, $report_data->total_tax ) - max( 0, $report_data->total_shipping_tax ), 2 );
629: 
630: 			// Calculate average based on net.
631: 			$report_data->average_sales       = wc_format_decimal( $report_data->net_sales / ( $this->chart_interval + 1 ), 2 );
632: 			$report_data->average_total_sales = wc_format_decimal( $report_data->total_sales / ( $this->chart_interval + 1 ), 2 );
633: 
634: 			// Total orders and discounts also includes those which have been refunded at some point.
635: 			$report_data->total_coupons         = number_format( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->coupons, 'discount_amount' ) ), 2, '.', '' );
636: 			$report_data->total_refunded_orders = absint( count( $report_data->full_refunds ) );
637: 
638: 			// Total orders in this period, even if refunded.
639: 			$report_data->total_orders = absint( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->order_counts, 'count' ) ) );
640: 
641: 			// Item items ordered in this period, even if refunded.
642: 			$report_data->total_items = absint( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $report_data->order_items, 'order_item_count' ) ) );
643: 			$this->results            = array();
644: 		}
645: 
646: 		return $report_data;
647: 	}
648: 
649: 	/**Set price decimal for each currency for report
650: 	 *
651: 	 * @param $decimal
652: 	 *
653: 	 * @return int
654: 	 */
655: 	public function wc_get_price_decimals( $decimal ) {
656: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_reports' ) ) {
657: 			return $decimal;
658: 		}
659: 		$view_default = isset( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ) : '';
660: 		if ( is_admin() && ! empty( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) && $view_default !== 'yes' ) {
661: 			$currency = strtoupper( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) );
662: 			if ( $currency !== $this->default_currency ) {
663: 				$decimal = isset( $this->currencies[ $currency ]['decimals'] ) ? $this->currencies[ $currency ]['decimals'] : 0;
664: 			}
665: 		}
666: 
667: 		return (int) $decimal;
668: 	}
669: 
670: 	/**Set currency for report
671: 	 *
672: 	 * @param $woocommerce_currency
673: 	 *
674: 	 * @return string
675: 	 */
676: 	public function woocommerce_currency( $woocommerce_currency ) {
677: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_reports' ) ) {
678: 			return $woocommerce_currency;
679: 		}
680: 		$view_default = isset( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-view-default-currency'] ) ) : '';
681: 		$currency     = isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ? strtoupper( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) ) : '';
682: 		if ( is_admin() && ! empty( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) && $view_default !== 'yes' ) {
683: 			if ( $currency !== $this->default_currency ) {
684: 				$woocommerce_currency = $currency;
685: 			}
686: 		}
687: 
688: 		return $woocommerce_currency;
689: 	}
690: 
691: 	/**Filter orders by selected currency
692: 	 *
693: 	 * @param $args
694: 	 *
695: 	 * @return mixed
696: 	 */
697: 	public function report_by_currency( $args ) {
698: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_reports' ) ) {
699: 			return $args;
700: 		}
701: 		global $pagenow;
702: 		if ( $pagenow === 'index.php' ) {
703: 			/**
704: 			 * For WooCommerce Status in WP dashboard
705: 			 */
706: 			if ( ( ! empty( $args['data']['_order_total'] ) || ( ! empty( $args['data']['_product_id'] ) && ! empty( $args['data']['_line_total'] ) ) ) && empty( $args['data']['ID'] ) ) {
707: 				$args['data']['ID'] = array(
708: 					'type'     => 'post_data',
709: 					'function' => '',
710: 					'name'     => 'order_id',
711: 				);
712: 				$args['group_by']   = 'order_id';
713: 				$args['nocache']    = true;
714: 				$this->is_dashboard = true;
715: 			}
716: 		} else {
717: 			$report   = isset( $_GET['report'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['report'] ) ) : '';
718: 			$tab      = isset( $_GET['tab'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['tab'] ) ) : 'orders';
719: 			$currency = isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ? strtoupper( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) ) : '';
720: 			if ( $currency ) {
721: 				if ( $currency !== $this->default_currency ) {
722: 					$args['nocache'] = true;
723: 				}
724: 				if ( ( $tab === 'orders' && $report !== 'coupon_usage' ) || ( $tab === 'customers' && $report === 'customers' ) ) {
725: 					$args['where_meta'][]           = array(
726: 						'meta_key'   => '_order_currency',// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_key
727: 						'meta_value' => $currency,// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_value
728: 						'operator'   => '=',
729: 					);
730: 					$args['where_meta']['relation'] = 'AND';
731: 				}
732: 			}
733: 		}
734: 
735: 		return $args;
736: 	}
737: }

================
File: code_3/admin/settings.php
================
   1: <?php
   2: 
   3: /*
   4: Class Name: WP_SM_Admin_Settings
   5: Author: Andy Ha (support@villatheme.com)
   6: Author URI: http://villatheme.com
   7: Copyright 2015-2017 villatheme.com. All rights reserved.
   8: */
   9: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  10: 	exit;
  11: }
  12: 
  13: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Settings {
  14: 	static $params;
  15: 
  16: 	public function __construct() {
  17: 		add_action( 'admin_init', array( $this, 'save_meta_boxes' ) );
  18: 		add_action( 'wp_ajax_woomulticurrency_exchange', array( $this, 'woomulticurrency_exchange' ) );
  19: 		add_action( 'wp_ajax_nopriv_woomulticurrency_exchange', array( $this, 'woomulticurrency_exchange' ) );
  20: 	}
  21: 
  22: 	public function woomulticurrency_exchange() {
  23: 		check_ajax_referer( 'wmc_ajax_nonce', 'nonce' );
  24: 
  25: 		if ( ! current_user_can( 'manage_woocommerce' ) || empty( $_POST['original_price'] ) || empty( $_POST['other_currencies'] ) ) {
  26: 			wp_die();
  27: 		}
  28: 
  29: 		$original_price   = sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_POST['original_price'] ) );
  30: 		$other_currencies = wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_POST['other_currencies'] ) );
  31: 
  32: 		if ( ! is_array( $other_currencies ) ) {
  33: 			$other_currencies = (array) $other_currencies;
  34:         }
  35: 
  36: 		if ( ! empty( $other_currencies ) ) {
  37: 			$other_currencies = implode( ',', $other_currencies );
  38: 		}
  39: 
  40: 		$data  = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
  41: 		$rates = $data->get_exchange( $original_price, $other_currencies );
  42: 		wp_send_json( $rates );
  43: 	}
  44: 
  45: 	private function stripslashes_deep( $value ) {
  46: 		$value = is_array( $value ) ? array_map( 'stripslashes_deep', $value ) : stripslashes( $value );
  47: 
  48: 		return $value;
  49: 	}
  50: 
  51: 	/**
  52: 	 *
  53: 	 */
  54: 	public function save_meta_boxes() {
  55: 		if ( ! isset( $_POST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) || ! isset( $_POST['woo_multi_currency_params'] ) ) {
  56: 			return;
  57: 		}
  58: 		if ( ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_POST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_settings' ) ) {
  59: 			return;
  60: 		}
  61: 		if ( ! current_user_can( 'manage_woocommerce' ) ) {
  62: 			return;
  63: 		}
  64: 		$data                     = wc_clean( $_POST['woo_multi_currency_params'] );
  65: 		$data['conditional_tags'] = $this->stripslashes_deep( $data['conditional_tags'] );
  66: 		$data['custom_css']       = $this->stripslashes_deep( $data['custom_css'] );
  67: 
  68: 		/*Override WooCommerce Currency*/
  69: 		if ( isset( $data['currency_default'] ) && $data['currency_default'] && isset( $data['currency'] ) ) {
  70: 			update_option( 'woocommerce_currency', $data['currency_default'] );
  71: 			$index = array_search( $data['currency_default'], $data['currency'] );
  72: 			/*Override WooCommerce Currency*/
  73: 			if ( isset( $data['currency_pos'][ $index ] ) && $index && $data['currency_pos'][ $index ] ) {
  74: 				update_option( 'woocommerce_currency_pos', $data['currency_pos'][ $index ] );
  75: 			}
  76: 			if ( isset( $data['currency_decimals'][ $index ] ) ) {
  77: 				update_option( 'woocommerce_price_num_decimals', $data['currency_decimals'][ $index ] );
  78: 			}
  79: 			if ( count( $data['currency'] ) > 2 ) {
  80: 				array_splice( $data['currency'], 0, 2 );
  81: 				array_splice( $data['currency_decimals'], 0, 2 );
  82: 				array_splice( $data['currency_pos'], 0, 2 );
  83: 				array_splice( $data['currency_rate'], 0, 2 );
  84: 				array_splice( $data['currency_custom'], 0, 2 );
  85: 			}
  86: 		}
  87: 		update_option( 'woo_multi_currency_params', $data );
  88: 		delete_transient( 'wmc_update_exchange_rate' );
  89: 	}
  90: 
  91: 
  92: 	/**
  93: 	 * Set field in meta box
  94: 	 *
  95: 	 * @param      $field
  96: 	 * @param bool $multi
  97: 	 *
  98: 	 * @return string
  99: 	 */
 100: 	protected static function set_field( $field, $multi = false ) {
 101: 		if ( $field ) {
 102: 			if ( $multi ) {
 103: 				return esc_attr( 'woo_multi_currency_params[' . $field . '][]' );
 104: 			} else {
 105: 				return esc_attr( 'woo_multi_currency_params[' . $field . ']' );
 106: 			}
 107: 		} else {
 108: 			return '';
 109: 		}
 110: 	}
 111: 
 112: 	/**
 113: 	 * @param $field
 114: 	 * @param string $default
 115: 	 *
 116: 	 * @return string
 117: 	 */
 118: 	public static function get_field( $field, $default = '' ) {
 119: 		global $wmc_settings;
 120: 		$params = $wmc_settings;
 121: 
 122: 		if ( self::$params ) {
 123: 			$params = self::$params;
 124: 		} else {
 125: 			self::$params = $params;
 126: 		}
 127: 		if ( isset( $params[ $field ] ) && $field ) {
 128: 			return $params[ $field ];
 129: 		} else {
 130: 			return $default;
 131: 		}
 132: 	}
 133: 
 134: 	/**
 135: 	 * Check element in array
 136: 	 *
 137: 	 * @param $arg
 138: 	 * @param $index
 139: 	 *
 140: 	 * @return bool
 141: 	 */
 142: 	static protected function data_isset( $arg, $index, $default = false ) {
 143: 		if ( isset( $arg[ $index ] ) ) {
 144: 			return $arg[ $index ];
 145: 		} else {
 146: 			return $default;
 147: 		}
 148: 	}
 149: 
 150: 	/**
 151: 	 *
 152: 	 */

 154: 		self::$params = get_option( 'woo_multi_currency_params', array() );

 315:                                     <tbody>
 316: 									<?php
 317: 
 318: 									$currencies        = self::get_field( 'currency', array( get_option( 'woocommerce_currency' ) ) );
 319: 									$currency_pos      = self::get_field( 'currency_pos', array( get_option( 'woocommerce_currency_pos' ) ) );
 320: 									$currency_rate     = self::get_field( 'currency_rate', array( 1 ) );
 321: 									$currency_rate_fee = self::get_field( 'currency_rate_fee', array( 0.0000 ) );
 322: 									$currency_decimals = self::get_field( 'currency_decimals', array( get_option( 'woocommerce_price_num_decimals' ) ) );
 323: 									$currency_custom   = self::get_field( 'currency_custom', array() );
 324: 									$currency_hidden   = self::get_field( 'currency_hidden', array() );
 325: 									if ( is_array( $currencies ) ) {
 326: 										if ( count( array_filter( $currencies ) ) < 1 ) {
 327: 											$currencies        = array();
 328: 											$currency_pos      = array();
 329: 											$currency_rate     = array();
 330: 											$currency_rate_fee = array();
 331: 											$currency_decimals = array();
 332: 											$currency_custom   = array();
 333: 										}
 334: 									} else {
 335: 										$currencies        = array();
 336: 										$currency_pos      = array();
 337: 										$currency_rate     = array();
 338: 										$currency_rate_fee = array();
 339: 										$currency_decimals = array();
 340: 										$currency_custom   = array();
 341: 									}
 342: 									$wc_currencies = get_woocommerce_currencies();
 343: 									foreach ( $currencies as $key => $currency ) {
 344: 										if ( $key > 1 ) {
 345: 											break;
 346: 										}
 347: 										if ( self::get_field( 'currency_default', get_option( 'woocommerce_currency' ) ) == $currency ) {
 348: 											$disabled = 'readonly';
 349: 										} else {
 350: 											$disabled = '';
 351: 										}
 352: 										?>
 353:                                         <tr class="wmc-currency-data <?php echo esc_attr( $currency . '-currency' ) ?>">
 354:                                             <td class="collapsing">
 355:                                                 <div class="vi-ui toggle checkbox">
 356:                                                     <input type="radio" <?php checked( self::get_field( 'currency_default', get_option( 'woocommerce_currency' ) ), $currency ) ?>
 357:                                                            tabindex="0" class="hidden"
 358:                                                            value="<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ) ?>"
 359:                                                            name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_default' ) ) ?>"/>
 360:                                                     <label></label>
 361:                                                 </div>
 362:                                             </td>
 363:                                             <td class="collapsing"
 364:                                                 title="<?php esc_attr_e( 'Hidden currencies on widget, shortcode and sidebar', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"
 365:                                                 data-tooltip="<?php esc_attr_e( 'Hidden currencies on widget, shortcode and sidebar', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>">
 366:                                                 <select name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_hidden', 1 ) ) ?>">
 367:                                                     <option <?php selected( self::data_isset( $currency_hidden, $key, 0 ), 0 ) ?>
 368:                                                             value="0"><?php esc_html_e( 'No', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 369:                                                     <option <?php selected( self::data_isset( $currency_hidden, $key ), 1 ) ?>
 370:                                                             value="1"><?php esc_html_e( 'Yes', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 371:                                                 </select>
 372:                                             </td>
 373:                                             <td>
 374:                                                 <select name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency', 1 ) ) ?>"
 375:                                                         class="vi-ui select2">
 376: 													<?php foreach ( $wc_currencies as $k => $wc_currency ) { ?>
 377:                                                         <option <?php selected( $currency, $k ) ?>
 378:                                                                 value="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>"><?php echo esc_attr( $k ) . '-' . esc_html( $wc_currency ) . ' (' . esc_html( get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k ) ) . ')' ?></option>
 379: 													<?php } ?>
 380:                                                 </select>
 381:                                             <td>
 382:                                                 <select name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_pos', 1 ) ) ?>">
 383:                                                     <option <?php selected( self::data_isset( $currency_pos, $key ), 'left' ) ?>
 384:                                                             value="left"><?php esc_html_e( 'Left $99', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 385:                                                     <option <?php selected( self::data_isset( $currency_pos, $key ), 'right' ) ?>
 386:                                                             value="right"><?php esc_html_e( 'Right 99$', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 387:                                                     <option <?php selected( self::data_isset( $currency_pos, $key ), 'left_space' ) ?>
 388:                                                             value="left_space"><?php esc_html_e( 'Left with space $ 99', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 389:                                                     <option <?php selected( self::data_isset( $currency_pos, $key ), 'right_space' ) ?>
 390:                                                             value="right_space"><?php esc_html_e( 'Right with space 99 $', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 391:                                                 </select>
 392:                                             </td>
 393:                                             <td>
 394: 
 395:                                                 <input <?php echo esc_attr( $disabled ) ?> type="text"
 396:                                                                                            name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_rate', 1 ) ) ?>"
 397:                                                                                            value="<?php echo esc_attr( self::data_isset( $currency_rate, $key, '1' ) ) ?>"/>
 398: 
 399:                                             </td>

 402:                                                      data-tooltip="<?php esc_attr_e( 'It is fixed rate. Eg: (Original rate)1.62 + 0.1(Exchange fee rate) = 1.72(End rate)', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>">

 404:                                                     <input <?php echo esc_attr( $disabled ) ?> type="number"
 405:                                                                                                name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_rate_fee', 1 ) ) ?>"
 406:                                                                                                value="<?php echo esc_attr( self::data_isset( $currency_rate_fee, $key, '0.0000' ) ) ?>"
 407:                                                                                                step="any"/>
 408:                                                 </div>
 409:                                             </td>
 410:                                             <td>
 411:                                                 <input type="text"
 412:                                                        name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_decimals', 1 ) ) ?>"
 413:                                                        value="<?php echo esc_attr( self::data_isset( $currency_decimals, $key, '2' ) ) ?>"/>
 414:                                             </td>
 415:                                             <td>
 416:                                                 <input type="text" placeholder="eg: CAD $"
 417:                                                        name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'currency_custom', 1 ) ) ?>"
 418:                                                        value="<?php echo esc_attr( self::data_isset( $currency_custom, $key ) ) ?>"/>
 419:                                             </td>
 420:                                             <td>

 433:                                                         <i class="trash icon"></i>
 434:                                                     </div>
 435:                                                 </div>
 436:                                             </td>
 437:                                         </tr>
 438: 									<?php } ?>

 536:                                            type="checkbox" <?php checked( self::get_field( 'enable_currency_by_country' ), 1 ) ?>
 537:                                            tabindex="0" class="hidden" value="1"
 538:                                            name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( 'enable_currency_by_country' ) ) ?>"/>

 541:                                 <p class="description"><?php esc_html_e( 'Only working with AUTO SELECT CURRENCY feature. Currency will be selected base on country.', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></p>
 542:                             </td>
 543:                         </tr>
 544: 
 545:                         <tr>
 546: 
 547:                             <td colspan="2">
 548:                                 <table class="vi-ui table">
 549:                                     <thead>
 550:                                     <tr>
 551:                                         <th class="two wide"><?php esc_html_e( 'Currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></th>
 552:                                         <th><?php esc_html_e( 'Countries', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></th>
 553:                                         <th class="four wide"><?php esc_html_e( 'Actions', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></th>
 554:                                     </tr>
 555:                                     </thead>
 556:                                     <tbody>
 557: 									<?php foreach ( $currencies as $key => $currency ) {
 558: 										$wc_countries = $countries = WC()->countries->countries;
 559: 
 560: 										?>
 561:                                         <tr>
 562:                                             <td><?php echo esc_html( '(' . get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $currency ) . ') ' . $currency ) ?></td>
 563:                                             <td>
 564:                                                 <select multiple="multiple"
 565:                                                         name="<?php echo esc_attr( self::set_field( $currency . '_by_country', 1 ) ) ?>"
 566:                                                         class="vi-ui select2-multiple"
 567:                                                         data-placeholder="<?php esc_attr_e( 'Please select countries', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>">
 568: 													<?php
 569: 													$countries_assign = self::get_field( $currency . '_by_country', array() );
 570: 
 571: 													foreach ( $wc_countries as $k => $wc_country ) {
 572: 														$selected = '';
 573: 
 574: 														if ( is_array( $countries_assign ) && in_array( $k, $countries_assign ) ) {
 575: 															$selected = 'selected="selected"';
 576: 														}
 577: 
 578: 														?>
 579:                                                         <option <?php echo esc_attr( $selected ) ?>
 580:                                                                 value="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>"><?php echo esc_html( $wc_country ) ?></option>
 581: 													<?php } ?>
 582:                                                 </select>
 583: 
 584:                                             </td>
 585:                                             <td>
 586:                                                 <div class="vi-ui  small button wmc-select-all-countries">
 587: 													<?php esc_html_e( 'Select all', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>
 588:                                                 </div>
 589:                                                 <div class="vi-ui  small red button wmc-remove-all-countries">
 590: 													<?php esc_html_e( 'Remove All', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>
 591:                                                 </div>
 592:                                             </td>
 593:                                         </tr>
 594: 									<?php } ?>
 595:                                     </tbody>
 596:                                 </table>
 597:                             </td>
 598:                         </tr>
 599:                         </tbody>
 600:                     </table>
 601:                     <!--					Polylang-->
 602: 					<?php if ( class_exists( 'Polylang' ) ) { ?>
 603:                         <h3>
 604: 							<?php esc_html_e( 'Polylang', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>

 999:                             </td>

File: code_3/admin/system.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /*
  4: Class Name: WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_System
  5: Author: Andy Ha (support@villatheme.com)
  6: Author URI: http://villatheme.com
  7: Copyright 2015-2017 villatheme.com. All rights reserved.
  8: */
  9: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 10: 	exit;
 11: }
 12: 
 13: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_System {
 14: 
 15: 
 16: 	public function __construct() {
 17: 		add_action( 'admin_menu', array( $this, 'menu_page' ) );
 18: 	}
 19: 
 20: 	public function page_callback() {
 21: 		?>
 22:         <h2><?php esc_html_e( 'System Status', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></h2>
 23:         <table cellspacing="0" id="status" class="widefat">
 24:             <tbody>
 25:             <tr>
 26:                 <td data-export-label="file_get_contents">file_get_contents</td>
 27:                 <td>
 28: 					<?php
 29: 					if ( function_exists( 'file_get_contents' ) ) {
 30: 						echo '<mark class="yes">&#10004; <code class="private"></code></mark> ';
 31: 					} else {
 32: 						echo '<mark class="error">&#10005; </mark>';
 33: 					}
 34: 					?>
 35:                 </td>
 36:             </tr>
 37:             <tr>
 38:                 <td data-export-label="file_put_contents">file_put_contents</td>
 39:                 <td>
 40: 					<?php
 41: 					if ( function_exists( 'file_put_contents' ) ) {
 42: 						echo '<mark class="yes">&#10004; <code class="private"></code></mark> ';
 43: 					} else {
 44: 						echo '<mark class="error">&#10005; </mark>';
 45: 					}
 46: 					?>
 47: 
 48:                 </td>
 49:             </tr>
 50: 
 51:             <tr>
 52:                 <td data-export-label="<?php esc_html_e( 'PHP Time Limit', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'PHP Time Limit', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></td>
 53:                 <td><?php echo esc_html( ini_get( 'max_execution_time' ) ); ?></td>
 54:             </tr>
 55:             <tr>
 56:                 <td data-export-label="<?php esc_html_e( 'PHP Max Input Vars', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'PHP Max Input Vars', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></td>
 57: 
 58:                 <td><?php echo esc_html( ini_get( 'max_input_vars' ) ); ?></td>
 59:             </tr>
 60:             <tr>
 61:                 <td data-export-label="<?php esc_html_e( 'Memory Limit', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Memory Limit', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></td>
 62: 
 63:                 <td><?php echo esc_html( ini_get( 'memory_limit' ) ); ?></td>
 64:             </tr>
 65:             <tr>
 66:                 <td data-export-label="<?php esc_html_e( 'Allow URL Open', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Allow URL Open', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></td>
 67:                 <td>
 68: 					<?php
 69: 					if ( ini_get( 'allow_url_fopen' ) ) {
 70: 						echo '<mark class="yes">&#10004; <code class="private"></code></mark> ';
 71: 					} else {
 72: 						echo '<mark class="error">&#10005; </mark>';
 73: 					}
 74: 					?>
 75:                 </td>
 76:             </tr>
 77:             <tr>
 78:                 <td data-export-label="<?php esc_html_e( 'Session path', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Session path', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></td>
 79:                 <td><?php
 80: 					$check_session = @fopen( session_save_path() . 'test-log.log', 'a' ) ? true : false;// phpcs:ignore WordPress.WP.AlternativeFunctions.file_system_operations_fopen
 81: 					if ( $check_session ) {
 82: 						echo '<mark class="yes"><span class="dashicons dashicons-yes"></span> <code class="private">' . esc_html( session_save_path() ) . '</code></mark> ';
 83: 					} else {
 84: 						/* translators: %1$s: logging file path */
 85: 						echo '<mark class="error"><span class="dashicons dashicons-warning"></span> ' . sprintf( esc_html__( 'To allow logging, make %1$s writable.', 'woo-multi-currency' ), '<code>' . esc_html( session_save_path() ) . '</code>' ) . '</mark>';
 86: 					}
 87: 					?></td>
 88:             </tr>
 89:             <tr>
 90:                 <td data-export-label="<?php esc_html_e( 'Your IP', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Your IP', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></td>
 91:                 <td>
 92:                     <ul>
 93:                         <li><strong>
 94: 								<?php
 95: 								$ip = new WC_Geolocation();
 96: 								esc_html_e( '[WooCommerce] Your IP', 'woo-multi-currency' )
 97: 								?> : <?php echo esc_html( $ip->get_ip_address() ) ?>
 98:                             </strong>
 99:                         </li>
100:                         <li><strong>
101: 								<?php
102: 								esc_html_e( '[WooCommerce] Your GEO IP', 'woo-multi-currency' )
103: 								?> : <?php echo esc_html( wp_json_encode( $ip->geolocate_ip() ) ) ?>
104:                             </strong>
105:                         </li>
106:                         <li><h3>
107: 								<?php
108: 								esc_html_e( '_SERVER system', 'woo-multi-currency' )
109: 								?></h3>
110:                             <pre><?php print_r( array_map( 'esc_html', $_SERVER ) ) ?></pre>
111:                         </li>
112:                     </ul>
113:                 </td>
114:             </tr>
115:             </tbody>
116:         </table>
117: 		<?php
118: 	}
119: 
120: 	/**
121: 	 * Register a custom menu page.
122: 	 */
123: 	public function menu_page() {
124: 		add_submenu_page(
125: 			'woo-multi-currency', esc_html__( 'System Status', 'woo-multi-currency' ), esc_html__( 'System Status', 'woo-multi-currency' ), 'manage_woocommerce', 'woo-multi-currency-system-status', array(
126: 				$this,
127: 				'page_callback'
128: 			)
129: 		);
130: 	}
131: }

================
File: code_3/admin/widget.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /*
 4: Class Name: WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Widget
 5: Author: Andy Ha (support@villatheme.com)
 6: Author URI: http://villatheme.com
 7: Copyright 2015-2017 villatheme.com. All rights reserved.
 8: */
 9: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
10: 	exit;
11: }
12: 
13: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Admin_Widget {
14: 	protected $settings;
15: 
16: 	public function __construct() {
17: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
18: 
19: 		add_action( 'widgets_init', array( $this, 'widgets_init' ) );
20: 
21: 
22: 	}
23: 
24: 
25: 	/**
26: 	 * Init widget
27: 	 */
28: 	public function widgets_init() {
29: 		register_widget( 'WMC_Widget' );
30: 		register_widget( 'WMC_Widget_Rates' );
31: 	}
32: 
33: 
34: }
35: 
36: ?>

================
File: code_3/css/button.min.css
================
1: /*!
2:  * # Semantic UI 2.2.12 - Button
3:  * http://github.com/semantic-org/semantic-ui/
4:  *
5:  *
6:  * Released under the MIT license
7:  * http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
8:  *
9:  */.vi-ui.button{height:auto;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;min-height:1em;outline:0;border:none;vertical-align:baseline;background:#e0e1e2 ================
File: code_3/css/flags-64.min.css
================

================
File: code_3/css/woo-multi-currency.scss
================
  1: .woo-multi-currency {
  2:   img {
  3:     max-width: 100%;
  4:   }
  5: 
  6:   .vi-flag-64 {
  7:     vertical-align: top;
  8:   }
  9: }
 10: 
 11: .woo-multi-currency.wmc-sidebar {
 12:   position: fixed;
 13:   z-index: 9999999999;
 14:   -webkit-transition: all .25s ease;

File: code_3/fonts/brand-icons.svg
================
   1: <?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?>

   5: -->

357:       horiz-adv-x="512" d=" M464 416H48C21.5 416 0 394.5 0 368V16C0 -10.5 21.5 -32 48 -32H464C490.5 -32 512 -10.5 512 16V368C512 394.5 490.5 416 464 416zM464 22C464 18.7 461.3 16 458 16H54C50.7 16 48 18.7 48 22V256H464V22z" />
358:     <glyph glyph-name="window-minimize"
359:       unicode="&#xF2D1;"
360:       horiz-adv-x="512" d=" M480 -32H32C14.3 -32 0 -17.7 0 0S14.3 32 32 32H480C497.7 32 512 17.7 512 0S497.7 -32 480 -32z" />
361:     <glyph glyph-name="window-restore"
362:       unicode="&#xF2D2;"
363:       horiz-adv-x="512" d=" M464 448H144C117.5 448 96 426.5 96 400V352H48C21.5 352 0 330.5 0 304V-16C0 -42.5 21.5 -64 48 -64H368C394.5 -64 416 -42.5 416 -16V32H464C490.5 32 512 53.5 512 80V400C512 426.5 490.5 448 464 448zM368 -16H48V192H368V-16zM464 80H416V304C416 330.5 394.5 352 368 352H144V400H464V80z" />
364:   </font>
365: </defs>
366: </svg>

================
File: code_3/frontend/widgets/widget-rates.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 3: 	exit;
 4: }
 5: /**
 6:  * Class WMC_Widget
 7:  */
 8: if ( ! class_exists( 'WMC_Widget_Rates' ) ) {
 9: 
10: 
11: 	class WMC_Widget_Rates extends WP_Widget {
12: 		protected $settings;
13: 
14: 		function __construct() {
15: 			$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
16: 			parent::__construct(
17: 				'wmc_widget_rates', // Base ID
18: 				esc_attr__( 'List Currency Rates', 'woo-multi-currency' ), // Name
19: 				array( 'description' => esc_attr__( 'Show list currency exchange rates of Multi Currency for WooCommerce by VillaTheme', 'woo-multi-currency' ), ) // Args
20: 			);
21: 		}
22: 
23: 		/**
24: 		 * Show front end
25: 		 *
26: 		 * @param $args
27: 		 * @param $instance
28: 		 */
29: 		public function widget( $args, $instance ) {
30: 			if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
31: 				echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $args['before_widget'] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
32: 				if ( ! empty( $instance['title'] ) ) {
33: 					echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $args['before_title'] . apply_filters( 'widget_title', $instance['title'] ) . $args['after_title'] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
34: 				}
35: 
36: 				echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( do_shortcode( apply_filters( 'wmc_shortcode', "[woo_multi_currency_rates]", $instance ) ) );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
37: 
38: 				echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $args['after_widget'] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
39: 			}
40: 		}
41: 
42: 		/**
43: 		 * Fields in widget configuration
44: 		 *
45: 		 * @param $instance
46: 		 */
47: 		public function form( $instance ) {
48: 			$title = ! empty( $instance['title'] ) ? $instance['title'] : '';
49: 
50: 			?>
51:             <p>
52:                 <label for="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'title' ) ); ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Title:', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?></label>
53:                 <input placeholder="<?php echo esc_attr__( 'Please enter your title', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"
54:                        class="widefat" id="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'title' ) ); ?>"
55:                        name="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_name( 'title' ) ); ?>" type="text"
56:                        value="<?php echo esc_attr( $title ); ?>">
57:             </p>
58: 			<?php do_action( 'wmc_after_widget_form', $instance, $this ) ?>
59: 			<?php
60: 		}
61: 
62: 		/**
63: 		 * Save widget configuration
64: 		 *
65: 		 * @param $new_instance
66: 		 * @param $old_instance
67: 		 *
68: 		 * @return array
69: 		 */
70: 		public function update( $new_instance, $old_instance ) {
71: 			$instance          = array();
72: 			$instance['title'] = ( ! empty( $new_instance['title'] ) ) ? wp_strip_all_tags( $new_instance['title'] ) : '';
73: 
74: 			return apply_filters( 'wmc_save_widget_data', $instance, $new_instance, $old_instance );
75: 		}
76: 
77: 
78: 	}
79: }
80: ?>

================
File: code_3/frontend/widgets/widget-selector.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: /**
  6:  * Class WMC_Widget
  7:  */
  8: if ( ! class_exists( 'WMC_Widget' ) ) {
  9: 
 10: 
 11: 	class WMC_Widget extends WP_Widget {
 12: 		protected $settings;
 13: 
 14: 		function __construct() {
 15: 			$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 16: 			parent::__construct(
 17: 				'wmc_widget', // Base ID
 18: 				esc_html__( 'Currency Selector', 'woo-multi-currency' ), // Name
 19: 				array( 'description' => esc_html__( 'Change display currency on shop page. Widget of Multi Currency for WooCommerce by VillaTheme', 'woo-multi-currency' ), ) // Args
 20: 			);
 21: 		}
 22: 
 23: 		/**
 24: 		 * Show front end
 25: 		 *
 26: 		 * @param $args
 27: 		 * @param $instance
 28: 		 */
 29: 		public function widget( $args, $instance ) {
 30: 			if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 31: 				echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $args['before_widget'] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
 32: 				if ( ! empty( $instance['title'] ) ) {
 33: 					echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $args['before_title'] . apply_filters( 'widget_title', $instance['title'] ) . $args['after_title'] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
 34: 				}
 35: 				echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( do_shortcode( apply_filters( 'wmc_shortcode', "[woo_multi_currency]", $instance ) ) );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
 36: 				echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $args['after_widget'] );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
 37: 			}
 38: 		}
 39: 
 40: 		/**
 41: 		 * Fields in widget configuration
 42: 		 *
 43: 		 * @param $instance
 44: 		 */
 45: 		public function form( $instance ) {
 46: 			$setting   = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 47: 			$title     = ! empty( $instance['title'] ) ? $instance['title'] : '';
 48: 			$layout    = isset( $instance['layout'] ) ? $instance['layout'] : '';
 49: 			$flag_size = isset( $instance['flag_size'] ) ? $instance['flag_size'] : 0;
 50: 			$items     = $setting->get_list_shortcodes();
 51: 			?>
 52:             <p>
 53:                 <label for="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'title' ) ); ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Title:', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?></label>
 54:                 <input placeholder="<?php echo esc_attr__( 'Please enter your title', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>"
 55:                        class="widefat" id="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'title' ) ); ?>"
 56:                        name="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_name( 'title' ) ); ?>" type="text"
 57:                        value="<?php echo esc_attr( $title ); ?>">
 58:             </p>
 59:             <p>
 60:                 <label for="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'layout' ) ); ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Layout', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></label>
 61:                 <br/>
 62:                 <select class="widefat" id="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'layout' ) ); ?>"
 63:                         name="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_name( 'layout' ) ); ?>">
 64: 					<?php foreach ( $items as $k => $item ) { ?>
 65:                         <option value="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>" <?php selected( $k, $layout ) ?>><?php echo esc_html( $item ) ?></option>
 66: 					<?php } ?>
 67:                 </select>
 68:             </p>
 69:             <p>
 70:                 <label for="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'flag_size' ) ); ?>"><?php esc_html_e( 'Flag size', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></label>
 71:                 <br/>
 72:                 <select class="widefat" id="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_id( 'flag_size' ) ); ?>"
 73:                         name="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->get_field_name( 'flag_size' ) ); ?>">
 74: 
 75:                     <option value="0" <?php selected( $flag_size, 0 ) ?>><?php esc_html_e( 'Small', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 76:                     <option value="1" <?php selected( $flag_size, 1 ) ?>><?php esc_html_e( 'Large', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?></option>
 77: 
 78:                 </select>
 79:             </p>
 80: 			<?php do_action( 'wmc_after_widget_form', $instance, $this ) ?>
 81: 			<?php
 82: 		}
 83: 
 84: 		/**
 85: 		 * Save widget configuration
 86: 		 *
 87: 		 * @param $new_instance
 88: 		 * @param $old_instance
 89: 		 *
 90: 		 * @return array
 91: 		 */
 92: 		public function update( $new_instance, $old_instance ) {
 93: 			$instance              = array();
 94: 			$instance['title']     = ( ! empty( $new_instance['title'] ) ) ? wp_strip_all_tags( $new_instance['title'] ) : '';
 95: 			$instance['layout']    = ( ! empty( $new_instance['layout'] ) ) ? $new_instance['layout'] : '';
 96: 			$instance['flag_size'] = ( ! empty( $new_instance['flag_size'] ) ) ? $new_instance['flag_size'] : 0;
 97: 
 98: 			return apply_filters( 'wmc_save_widget_data', $instance, $new_instance, $old_instance );
 99: 		}
100: 	}
101: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/cache.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_Frontend_Update
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Cache {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'clear_browser_cache' ) );
 17: 			add_action( 'wp_ajax_wmc_get_products_price', array( $this, 'get_products_price' ) );
 18: 			add_action( 'wp_ajax_nopriv_wmc_get_products_price', array( $this, 'get_products_price' ) );
 19: 			if ( $this->settings->get_param( 'cache_compatible' ) ) {
 20: 				add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_price_html', array( $this, 'compatible_cache_plugin' ), PHP_INT_MAX, 2 );
 21: 			}
 22: 		}
 23: 	}
 24: 
 25: 	/**
 26: 	 * @param $price
 27: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
 28: 	 *
 29: 	 * @return string
 30: 	 */
 31: 	public function compatible_cache_plugin( $price, $product ) {
 32: 		if ( wp_doing_ajax() ) {
 33: 			return $price;
 34: 		}
 35: 
 36: 		$wrap = 'span';
 37: 		if ( strpos( $price, '<div' ) !== false || strpos( $price, '<p' ) !== false ) {
 38: 			$wrap = 'div';
 39: 		}
 40: 
 41: 		$loading = $this->settings->get_param( 'loading_price_mask' ) ? 'wmc-cache-loading' : '';
 42: 
 43: 		return "<{$wrap} class='wmc-cache-pid {$loading}' data-wmc_product_id='{$product->get_id()}'>" . $price . "</{$wrap}>";
 44: 	}
 45: 
 46: 	/**
 47: 	 * Clear cache browser
 48: 	 */
 49: 	public function clear_browser_cache() {
 50: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_cache' ) ) {
 51: 			return;
 52: 		}
 53: 		if ( isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) {
 54: 			header( "Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate" );
 55: 			header( "Expires: Mon, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT" );
 56: 			header( "Content-Type: application/xml; charset=utf-8" );
 57: 		}
 58: 	}
 59: 
 60: 	public function get_products_price() {
 61: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_cache' ) ) {
 62: 			return;
 63: 		}
 64: 		do_action( 'wmc_get_products_price_ajax_handle_before' );
 65: 		$pids             = ! empty( $_POST['pids'] ) ? wc_clean( $_POST['pids'] ) : [];
 66: 		$shortcodes       = ! empty( $_POST['shortcodes'] ) ? wc_clean( $_POST['shortcodes'] ) : array();
 67: 		$result           = array(
 68: 			'shortcodes' => array()
 69: 		);
 70: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 71: 		if ( ! empty( $pids ) ) {
 72: 			foreach ( $pids as $pid ) {
 73: 				$product = wc_get_product( $pid );
 74: 				if ( $product ) {
 75: 					$result['prices'][ $pid ] = $product->get_price_html();
 76: 				}
 77: 			}
 78: 		}
 79: 
 80: 		$result['current_currency'] = $current_currency;
 81: 		$result['current_country']  = strtolower( $this->settings->get_country_data( $current_currency )['code'] );
 82: 		$shortcodes_list            = $this->settings->get_list_shortcodes();
 83: 		if ( count( $shortcodes ) ) {
 84: 			foreach ( $shortcodes as $shortcode ) {
 85: 				if ( isset( $shortcodes_list[ $shortcode['layout'] ] ) ) {
 86: 					$flag_size     = isset( $shortcode['flag_size'] ) ? $shortcode['flag_size'] : '';
 87: 					$dropdown_icon = isset( $shortcode['dropdown_icon'] ) ? $shortcode['dropdown_icon'] : '';
 88: 					$custom_format = isset( $shortcode['custom_format'] ) ? $shortcode['custom_format'] : '';
 89: 					if ( $flag_size ) {
 90: 						$flag_size = "flag_size='{$flag_size}'";
 91: 					}
 92: 					$result['shortcodes'][] = do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency_{$shortcode['layout']} {$flag_size} dropdown_icon='{$dropdown_icon}' custom_format='{$custom_format}']" );
 93: 				} else {
 94: 					$result['shortcodes'][] = do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency]" );
 95: 				}
 96: 			}
 97: 		}
 98: 
 99: 		if ( ! empty( $_POST['exchange'] ) ) {
100: 			$exchange_sc  = [];
101: 			$exchange_arr = wc_clean( $_POST['exchange'] );
102: 			foreach ( $exchange_arr as $ex ) {
103: 				$ex_sc_product_id = isset( $ex['product_id'] ) ? esc_html( $ex['product_id'] ) : '';
104: 				$ex_sc_keep_format = isset( $ex['keep_format'] ) ? esc_html( $ex['keep_format'] ) : '';
105: 				$ex_sc_price = isset( $ex['price'] ) ? esc_html( $ex['price'] ) : '';
106: 				$ex_sc_original_price = isset( $ex['original_price'] ) ? esc_html( $ex['original_price'] ) : '';
107: 				$ex_sc_currency = isset( $ex['currency'] ) ? esc_html( $ex['currency'] ) : '';
108: 				$exchange_sc[] = array_merge( $ex, [ 'shortcode' => do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency_exchange product_id='{$ex_sc_product_id}' keep_format='{$ex_sc_keep_format}' price='{$ex_sc_price}' original_price='{$ex_sc_original_price}' currency='{$ex_sc_currency}']" ) ] );
109: 			}
110: 			$result['exchange'] = $exchange_sc;
111: 		}
112: 		do_action( 'wmc_get_products_price_ajax_handle_after' );
113: 		wp_send_json_success( apply_filters( 'wmc_get_products_price_ajax_handle_response', $result ) );
114: 	}
115: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/cart.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Cart
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Cart {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			/*Fix round function with case default decimals = 0 and other currency decimal > 0*/
17: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_calculated_total', array( $this, 'woocommerce_calculated_total' ), 10, 2 );
18: 		}
19: 	}
20: 
21: 	/**
22: 	 * @param $total
23: 	 * @param $cart WC_Cart
24: 	 *
25: 	 * @return string
26: 	 */
27: 	public function woocommerce_calculated_total( $total, $cart ) {
28: 		$list_currencies  = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
29: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
30: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
31: 		if ( $list_currencies[ $default_currency ]['decimals'] > 0 ) {
32: 			return $total;
33: 		}
34: 
35: 		if ( $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['decimals'] ) {
36: 			$new_total = $cart->get_cart_contents_total() + $cart->get_fee_total() + $cart->get_shipping_total() + $cart->get_total_tax();
37: 			if ( $new_total > $total ) {
38: 				$total = number_format( $new_total, $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['decimals'], wc_get_price_decimal_separator(), '' );
39: 			}
40: 		}
41: 
42: 		return $total;
43: 	}
44: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/checkout.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Checkout
  8:  */
  9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Checkout {
 10: 	public $settings;
 11: 	public $rate;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_checkout_update_order_review', array(
 17: 				$this,
 18: 				'woocommerce_checkout_update_order_review'
 19: 			), 99 );
 20: 
 21: 			//Set order currency correctly
 22: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_paypal_args', array( $this, 'woocommerce_paypal_args' ), 10, 2 );
 23: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_twoco_args', array( $this, 'woocommerce_twoco_args' ) );
 24: 		}
 25: 	}
 26: 
 27: 	/**
 28: 	 * Change currency to default and reload page if the payment method is the new PayPal gateway
 29: 	 *
 30: 	 * @param $data
 31: 	 */
 32: 	public function woocommerce_checkout_update_order_review( $data ) {
 33: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_checkout' ) ) {
 34: 			return;
 35: 		}
 36: 		$payment_method   = isset( $_POST['payment_method'] ) ? wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_POST['payment_method'] ) ) : '';
 37: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 38: 		if ( $payment_method === 'ppcp-gateway' ) {
 39: 			$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 40: 			if ( ! $this->settings->get_enable_multi_payment() && ( $current_currency !== $default_currency || $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_current_currency_old' ) !== $default_currency ) ) {
 41: 				$this->settings->set_current_currency( $default_currency, true );
 42: 				$this->reload_after_update_order_review( true );
 43: 			}
 44: 		} elseif ( ! $this->settings->get_enable_multi_payment() ) {
 45: 			$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 46: 			if ( $current_currency !== $default_currency ) {
 47: 				$this->settings->set_current_currency( $default_currency, false );
 48: 			}
 49: 		}
 50: 	}
 51: 
 52: 	/**
 53: 	 * @param bool $reload
 54: 	 * @param bool $update_checkout
 55: 	 */
 56: 	public function reload_after_update_order_review( $reload = false, $update_checkout = false ) {
 57: 		WC()->cart->calculate_shipping();
 58: 		WC()->cart->calculate_totals();
 59: 		// Get order review fragment
 60: 		ob_start();
 61: 		woocommerce_order_review();
 62: 		$woocommerce_order_review = ob_get_clean();
 63: 
 64: 		// Get checkout payment fragment
 65: 		ob_start();
 66: 		woocommerce_checkout_payment();
 67: 		$woocommerce_checkout_payment = ob_get_clean();
 68: 		$args                         = array(
 69: 			'result'              => 'success',
 70: 			'messages'            => '',
 71: 			'reload'              => $reload,
 72: 			'wmc_update_checkout' => $update_checkout,
 73: 			'fragments'           => apply_filters(
 74: 				'woocommerce_update_order_review_fragments', array(
 75: 					'.woocommerce-checkout-review-order-table' => $woocommerce_order_review,
 76: 					'.woocommerce-checkout-payment'            => $woocommerce_checkout_payment,
 77: 				)
 78: 			),
 79: 		);
 80: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'checkout-for-woocommerce/checkout-for-woocommerce.php' ) ) {
 81: 			$_cfw__settings = get_option( '_cfw__settings' );
 82: 			if ( isset( $_cfw__settings['enable'] ) && $_cfw__settings['enable'] === 'yes' ) {
 83: 				$args['redirect'] = wc_get_checkout_url();
 84: 			}
 85: 		}
 86: 
 87: 		unset( WC()->session->refresh_totals, WC()->session->reload_checkout );
 88: 		wp_send_json( $args );
 89: 	}
 90: 
 91: 	/**
 92: 	 * PayPal args
 93: 	 *
 94: 	 * @param $payment_args
 95: 	 * @param $order WC_Order
 96: 	 *
 97: 	 * @return mixed
 98: 	 */
 99: 	public function woocommerce_paypal_args( $payment_args, $order ) {
100: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_checkout' ) ) {
101: 			return $payment_args;
102: 		}
103: 		if ( ! empty( $_GET['pay_for_order'] ) ) {
104: 			$payment_args['currency_code'] = $order->get_currency();
105: 		}
106: 
107: 		return $payment_args;
108: 	}
109: 
110: 	/**
111: 	 * WooCommerce 2Checkout Payment Gateway
112: 	 *
113: 	 * @param $payment_args
114: 	 *
115: 	 * @return mixed
116: 	 */
117: 	public function woocommerce_twoco_args( $payment_args ) {
118: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_checkout' ) ) {
119: 			return $payment_args;
120: 		}
121: 		if ( ! empty( $_GET['pay_for_order'] ) ) {
122: 			$order_id = isset( $payment_args['merchant_order_id'] ) ? $payment_args['merchant_order_id'] : '';
123: 			if ( $order_id ) {
124: 				$order = wc_get_order( $order_id );
125: 				if ( $order ) {
126: 					$payment_args['currency_code'] = $order->get_currency();
127: 				}
128: 			}
129: 		}
130: 
131: 		return $payment_args;
132: 	}
133: }

================

 6: /**
 7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Coupon
 8:  */
 9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Coupon {
10: 	protected $settings;
11: 	public function __construct() {
12: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
13: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
14: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_coupon_get_amount', array( $this, 'woocommerce_coupon_get_amount' ), 10, 2 );
15: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_coupon_get_minimum_amount', array(
16: 				$this,
17: 				'woocommerce_coupon_get_minimum_amount'
18: 			) );
19: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_coupon_get_maximum_amount', array(
20: 				$this,
21: 				'woocommerce_coupon_get_maximum_amount'
22: 			) );
23: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_boost_sales_coupon_amount_price', array(
24: 				$this,
25: 				'woocommerce_boost_sales_coupon_amount_price'
26: 			) );
27: 		}
28: 	}
29: 
30: 	/**
31: 	 * Apply with percent
32: 	 *
33: 	 * @param $data
34: 	 *
35: 	 * @return mixed
36: 	 */
37: 	public function woocommerce_coupon_get_amount( $data, $obj ) {
38: 		if ( $obj->is_type( array( 'percent', 'recurring_percent', 'sign_up_fee_percent' ) ) ) {
39: 			return $data;
40: 		}
41: 
42: 		return wmc_get_price( $data );
43: 	}
44: 
45: 
46: 	public function woocommerce_boost_sales_coupon_amount_price( $data ) {
47: 		return wmc_get_price( $data );
48: 	}
49: 
50: 	/**
51: 	 * @param $data
52: 	 *
53: 	 * @return mixed
54: 	 */
55: 	public function woocommerce_coupon_get_minimum_amount( $data ) {
56: 
57: 		return wmc_get_price( $data, false, false, true );
58: 	}
59: 
60: 	public function woocommerce_coupon_get_maximum_amount( $data ) {
61: 		return wmc_get_price( $data, false, false, true );
62: 	}
63: }

================

  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Design
  8:  */
  9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Design {
 10: 	protected $settings;
 11: 
 12: 	public function __construct() {
 13: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 14: 		add_action( 'wp_footer', array( $this, 'show_action' ) );
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'front_end_script' ) );
 17: 			add_filter( 'body_class', array( $this, 'body_class' ) );
 18: 		}
 19: 	}
 20: 
 21: 	public function body_class( $classes ) {
 22: 		if ( is_array( $classes ) ) {
 23: 			$classes[] = 'woocommerce-multi-currency-' . $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 24: 		}
 25: 
 26: 		return $classes;
 27: 	}
 28: 
 29: 	/**
 30: 	 * Public
 31: 	 */
 32: 	public function front_end_script() {
 33: 		if ( WP_DEBUG ) {
 34: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'woo-multi-currency', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'woo-multi-currency.css', array(), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 35: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'wmc-flags', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'flags-64.min.css', [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 36: 			if ( is_rtl() ) {
 37: 				wp_enqueue_style( 'woo-multi-currency-rtl', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'woo-multi-currency-rtl.css', array(), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 38: 			}
 39: 		} else {
 40: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'woo-multi-currency', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'woo-multi-currency.min.css', array(), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 41: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'wmc-flags', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'flags-64.min.css', [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 42: 			if ( is_rtl() ) {
 43: 				wp_enqueue_style( 'woo-multi-currency-rtl', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'woo-multi-currency-rtl.min.css', array(), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 44: 			}
 45: 		}
 46: 
 47: 		/*Custom CSS*/
 48: 		$text_color                = $this->settings->get_text_color();
 49: 		$background_color          = $this->settings->get_background_color();
 50: 		$main_color                = $this->settings->get_main_color();
 51: 		$shortcode_bg_color        = $this->settings->get_param( 'shortcode_bg_color' );
 52: 		$shortcode_color           = $this->settings->get_param( 'shortcode_color' );
 53: 		$shortcode_active_bg_color = $this->settings->get_param( 'shortcode_active_bg_color' );
 54: 		$shortcode_active_color    = $this->settings->get_param( 'shortcode_active_color' );
 55: 		$links                     = $this->settings->get_links();
 56: 		$currency_qty              = count( $links ) - 1;
 57: 
 58: 		$custom = '.woo-multi-currency .wmc-list-currencies .wmc-currency.wmc-active,.woo-multi-currency .wmc-list-currencies .wmc-currency:hover {background: ' . $main_color . ' !important;}
 59: 		.woo-multi-currency .wmc-list-currencies .wmc-currency,.woo-multi-currency .wmc-title, .woo-multi-currency.wmc-price-switcher a {background: ' . $background_color . ' !important;}
 60: 		.woo-multi-currency .wmc-title, .woo-multi-currency .wmc-list-currencies .wmc-currency span,.woo-multi-currency .wmc-list-currencies .wmc-currency a,.woo-multi-currency.wmc-price-switcher a {color: ' . $text_color . ' !important;}';
 61:
