 63: 		$custom .= ".woo-multi-currency.wmc-shortcode .wmc-currency.wmc-active,.woo-multi-currency.wmc-shortcode .wmc-current-currency{background-color:{$shortcode_active_bg_color};color:{$shortcode_active_color}}";
 64: 		$custom .= ".woo-multi-currency.wmc-shortcode.vertical-currency-symbols-circle:not(.wmc-currency-trigger-click) .wmc-currency-wrapper:hover .wmc-sub-currency,.woo-multi-currency.wmc-shortcode.vertical-currency-symbols-circle.wmc-currency-trigger-click .wmc-sub-currency{animation: height_slide {$currency_qty}00ms;}";
 65: 		$custom .= "@keyframes height_slide {0% {height: 0;} 100% {height: {$currency_qty}00%;} }";
 66: 
 67: 		$custom .= $this->settings->get_custom_css();
 68: 		wp_add_inline_style( 'woo-multi-currency', $custom );
 69: 		/*Multi currency JS*/
 70: 		if ( WP_DEBUG ) {
 71: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woo-multi-currency', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'woo-multi-currency.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
 72: 		} else {
 73: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woo-multi-currency', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'woo-multi-currency.min.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
 74: 		}
 75: 
 76: 		wp_localize_script( 'woo-multi-currency', 'wooMultiCurrencyParams', array(
 77: 			'enableCacheCompatible' => apply_filters( 'wmc_enable_cache_compatible_frontend', $this->settings->get_param( 'cache_compatible' ) ),
 78: 			'ajaxUrl'               => admin_url( 'admin-ajax.php' ),
 79: 			'extra_params'          => apply_filters( 'wmc_frontend_extra_params', array() ),
 80: 			'current_currency'      => $this->settings->get_current_currency(),
 81: 			'woo_subscription'      => is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-subscriptions/woocommerce-subscriptions.php' ),
 82: 		) );
 83: 	}
 84: 
 85: 	/**
 86: 	 * Show Currency converter
 87: 	 */
 88: 	public function show_action() {
 89: 		if ( ! $this->enable() ) {
 90: 			return;
 91: 		}
 92: 		$logic_value = $this->settings->get_conditional_tags();
 93: 		if ( $logic_value ) {
 94: 			if ( stristr( $logic_value, "return" ) === false ) {
 95: 				$logic_value = "return (" . $logic_value . ");";
 96: 			}
 97: 			try {
 98: 				if ( ! eval( $logic_value ) ) {// phpcs:ignore Generic.PHP.ForbiddenFunctions.Found
 99: 					return;
100: 				}
101: 			} catch ( Error $e ) {
102: 				trigger_error( esc_html( $e->getMessage() ), E_USER_WARNING );
103: 
104: 				return;
105: 			} catch ( Exception $e ) {
106: 				trigger_error( esc_html( $e->getMessage() ), E_USER_WARNING );
107: 
108: 				return;
109: 			}
110: 		}
111: 		$enable_checkout = $this->settings->get_enable_multi_payment();
112: 		if ( ! $enable_checkout && is_checkout() ) {
113: 			return;
114: 		}
115: 		$currency_selected = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
116: 		$title             = $this->settings->get_design_title();
117: 		$enable_collapse   = $this->settings->enable_collapse();
118: 		$class             = array();
119: 		/*Position left or right*/
120: 		if ( ! $this->settings->get_design_position() ) {
121: 			$class[] = 'wmc-left';
122: 		} else {
123: 			$class[] = 'wmc-right';
124: 		}
125: 		$class[] = 'style-1';
126: 		switch ( $this->settings->get_sidebar_style() ) {
127: 			case 1:
128: 				$class[] = 'wmc-currency-symbol';
129: 				break;
130: 			case 2:
131: 				$class[] = 'wmc-currency-flag';
132: 				break;
133: 			case 3:
134: 				$class[] = 'wmc-currency-flag wmc-currency-code';
135: 				break;
136: 			case 4:
137: 				$class[] = 'wmc-currency-flag wmc-currency-symbol';
138: 				break;
139: 		}
140: 		if ( $enable_collapse ) {
141: 			$class[] = 'wmc-collapse';
142: 		}
143: 		?>
144:         <div class="woo-multi-currency <?php echo esc_attr( implode( ' ', $class ) ); ?> wmc-bottom wmc-sidebar">
145:             <div class="wmc-list-currencies">
146: 				<?php if ( $title ) { ?>
147:                     <div class="wmc-title">
148: 						<?php echo esc_html( $title ) ?>
149:                     </div>
150: 				<?php }
151: 				$links         = $this->settings->get_links();
152: 				$currency_name = get_woocommerce_currencies();
153: 				foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
154: 					$selected = '';
155: 					if ( $currency_selected == $k ) {
156: 						$selected = 'wmc-active';
157: 					}
158: 					?>
159:                     <div class="wmc-currency <?php echo esc_attr( $selected ) ?>"
160:                          data-currency="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>">
161: 						<?php
162: 						switch ( $this->settings->get_sidebar_style() ) {
163: 							case 1:
164: 								$symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k );
165: 								break;
166: 							case 2:
167: 							case 3:
168: 							case 4:
169: 								$country = $this->settings->get_country_data( $k );
170: 								$symbol  = '<i class="vi-flag-64 flag-' . strtolower( $country['code'] ) . '"></i>';
171: 								break;
172: 							default:
173: 								$symbol = esc_html( $k );
174: 						}
175: 						switch ( $this->settings->get_sidebar_style() ) {
176: 							case 3:
177: 								$currency_code = $k;
178: 								break;
179: 							case 4:
180: 								$currency_code = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k );
181: 								break;
182: 							default:
183: 								$currency_code = $currency_name[ $k ];
184: 
185: 						}
186: 						?>
187:                         <span class="wmc-currency-symbol"><?php echo wp_kses_post( $symbol ); ?></span>
188: 						<?php
189: 						if ( $selected ) {
190: 							?>
191:                             <span class="wmc-active-title"><?php echo esc_html( $currency_code ); ?></span>
192: 							<?php
193: 						} else {
194: 							?>
195:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
196:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>"><?php echo esc_html( $currency_code ); ?></a>
197: 							<?php
198: 						}
199: 						?>
200:                     </div>
201: 					<?php
202: 				}
203: 				?>
204:                 <div class="wmc-sidebar-open"></div>
205:             </div>
206:         </div>
207: 		<?php
208: 	}
209: 
210: 	/**
211: 	 * Check design enable
212: 	 * @return bool
213: 	 *
214: 	 */
215: 	protected function enable() {
216: 		$enable = $this->settings->get_enable_design();
217: 		if ( ! $enable ) {
218: 			return false;
219: 		}
220: 		if ( $this->settings->is_checkout() ) {
221: 			if ( is_checkout() ) {
222: 				return false;
223: 			}
224: 		}
225: 		if ( $this->settings->is_cart() ) {
226: 			if ( is_cart() ) {
227: 				return false;
228: 			}
229: 		}
230: 
231: 		return true;
232: 	}
233: 
234: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/filter-price.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Filter_Price
  8:  */
  9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Filter_Price {
 10: 	protected $settings;
 11: 	public $min_price;
 12: 	public $max_price;
 13: 	public $step;
 14: 	public $filter_min_price;
 15: 	public $filter_max_price;
 16: 
 17: 	function __construct() {
 18: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 19: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 20: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_price_filter_results', array( $this, 'woocommerce_price_filter_results' ), 10, 3 );
 21: 
 22: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_query_meta_query', array(
 23: 				$this,
 24: 				'woocommerce_product_query_meta_query'
 25: 			) );
 26: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_step', array(
 27: 				$this,
 28: 				'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_step'
 29: 			) );
 30: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_price_filter_sql', array(
 31: 				$this,
 32: 				'woocommerce_price_filter_sql'
 33: 			) );
 34: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_min_amount', array(
 35: 				$this,
 36: 				'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_min_amount'
 37: 			) );
 38: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_max_amount', array(
 39: 				$this,
 40: 				'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_max_amount'
 41: 			) );
 42: 
 43: 			add_filter( 'posts_clauses', array( $this, 'reset_price' ), 9, 2 );
 44: 			add_filter( 'posts_clauses', array( $this, 'return_price' ), 11, 2 );
 45: 			add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'wp_enqueue_scripts' ) );
 46: 		}
 47: 	}
 48: 
 49: 	public function wp_enqueue_scripts() {
 50: 		if ( is_shop() || is_post_type_archive( 'product' ) ) {
 51: 			$src_min = WP_DEBUG ? '' : '.min';
 52: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woocommerce-multi-currency-filter-price', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'filter-price' . $src_min . '.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
 53: 		}
 54: 	}
 55: 
 56: 	public function woocommerce_price_filter_sql( $sql ) {
 57: 		global $wpdb;
 58: 		if ( $this->step !== null ) {
 59: 			$prices    = $wpdb->get_row( $sql );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching, WordPress.DB.PreparedSQL.NotPrepared
 60: 			$min_price = $prices->min_price;
 61: 			$max_price = $prices->max_price;
 62: 
 63: 			// Check to see if we should add taxes to the prices if store are excl tax but display incl.
 64: 			$tax_display_mode = get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_display_shop' );
 65: 
 66: 			if ( wc_tax_enabled() && ! wc_prices_include_tax() && 'incl' === $tax_display_mode ) {
 67: 				$tax_class = apply_filters( 'woocommerce_price_filter_widget_tax_class', '' ); // Uses standard tax class.
 68: 				$tax_rates = WC_Tax::get_rates( $tax_class );
 69: 
 70: 				if ( $tax_rates ) {
 71: 					$min_price += WC_Tax::get_tax_total( WC_Tax::calc_exclusive_tax( $min_price, $tax_rates ) );
 72: 					$max_price += WC_Tax::get_tax_total( WC_Tax::calc_exclusive_tax( $max_price, $tax_rates ) );
 73: 				}
 74: 			}
 75: 
 76: 			$this->filter_min_price = floor( wmc_get_price( $min_price ) / $this->step ) * $this->step;
 77: 			$this->filter_max_price = ceil( wmc_get_price( $max_price ) / $this->step ) * $this->step;
 78: 		}
 79: 
 80: 		return $sql;
 81: 	}
 82: 
 83: 	public function woocommerce_price_filter_widget_step( $step ) {
 84: 		$new_step = wmc_get_price( $step );
 85: 		if ( $new_step > 1 ) {
 86: 			$this->step = $new_step;
 87: 			$step       = $new_step;
 88: 		} else {
 89: 			$this->step = $step;
 90: 		}
 91: 
 92: 		return $step;
 93: 	}
 94: 
 95: 	/**
 96: 	 * @param $min_price
 97: 	 *
 98: 	 * @return float|int
 99: 	 */
100: 	public function woocommerce_price_filter_widget_min_amount( $min_price ) {
101: 		if ( $this->filter_min_price !== null ) {
102: 			$min_price              = $this->filter_min_price;
103: 			$this->filter_min_price = null;
104: 		} else {
105: 			$min_price = floor( wmc_get_price( $min_price ) );
106: 		}
107: 
108: 		return $min_price;
109: 	}
110: 
111: 	public function woocommerce_price_filter_widget_max_amount( $max_price ) {
112: 		if ( $this->filter_max_price !== null ) {
113: 			$max_price              = $this->filter_max_price;
114: 			$this->filter_max_price = null;
115: 		} else {
116: 			$max_price = ceil( wmc_get_price( $max_price ) );
117: 			if ( $this->step !== null ) {
118: 				$this->step = null;
119: 			}
120: 		}
121: 
122: 		return $max_price;
123: 	}
124: 
125: 	/**
126: 	 * @param $query
127: 	 *
128: 	 * @return mixed
129: 	 */
130: 	public function woocommerce_product_query_meta_query( $query ) {
131: 		$current_currency    = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
132: 		$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
133: 
134: 		if ( isset( $query['price_filter'] ) ) {
135: 			if ( isset( $query['price_filter']['value'][0] ) ) {
136: 				$query['price_filter']['value'][0] = intval( $query['price_filter']['value'][0] / $selected_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] );
137: 			}
138: 			if ( isset( $query['price_filter']['value'][1] ) ) {
139: 				$query['price_filter']['value'][1] = intval( $query['price_filter']['value'][1] / $selected_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] );
140: 			}
141: 		}
142: 
143: 
144: 		return $query;
145: 	}
146: 
147: 	/**
148: 	 * @param $args
149: 	 * @param $wp_query WP_Query
150: 	 *
151: 	 * @return mixed
152: 	 */
153: 	public function reset_price( $args, $wp_query ) {
154: 		if ( isset( $_GET['wmc_filter_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc_filter_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_filter_nonce' ) ) {
155: 			return $args;
156: 		}
157: 
158: 		if ( ! $wp_query->is_main_query() || ( ! isset( $_GET['max_price'] ) && ! isset( $_GET['min_price'] ) ) ) {
159: 			return $args;
160: 		}
161: 		$this->min_price  = floatval( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['min_price'] ) ) );
162: 		$this->max_price  = floatval( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_GET['max_price'] ) ) );
163: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
164: 		$rate             = wmc_get_price( 1, $current_currency ) ? wmc_get_price( 1, $current_currency ) : '';
165: 
166: 		if ( $rate ) {
167: 			$_GET['min_price'] = $this->min_price / $rate;
168: 			$_GET['max_price'] = $this->max_price / $rate;
169: 		}
170: 
171: 		return $args;
172: 	}
173: 
174: 	/**
175: 	 * @param $args
176: 	 * @param $wp_query WP_Query
177: 	 *
178: 	 * @return mixed
179: 	 */
180: 	public function return_price( $args, $wp_query ) {
181: 		if ( isset( $_GET['wmc_filter_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc_filter_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_filter_nonce' ) ) {
182: 			return $args;
183: 		}
184: 
185: 		if ( ! $wp_query->is_main_query() || ( ! isset( $_GET['max_price'] ) && ! isset( $_GET['min_price'] ) ) ) {
186: 			return $args;
187: 		}
188: 
189: 		$_GET['min_price'] = $this->min_price;
190: 		$_GET['max_price'] = $this->max_price;
191: 
192: 		return $args;
193: 	}
194: 
195: 	/**
196: 	 * Override filter price
197: 	 *
198: 	 * @param $data_query
199: 	 * @param $min_class
200: 	 * @param $max_class
201: 	 *
202: 	 * @return array|null|object
203: 	 */
204: 	public function woocommerce_price_filter_results( $data_query, $min_class, $max_class ) {
205: 		global $wpdb;
206: 		$fix_value        = 0;
207: 		$options          = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
208: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
209: 		if ( isset( $options[ $current_currency ]['rate'] ) ) {
210: 			if ( $options[ $current_currency ]['rate'] != 1 ) {
211: 				$fix_value = 1;
212: 			}
213: 		}
214: 		if ( $options[ $current_currency ]['rate'] ) {
215: 			$min_class = $min_class / $options[ $current_currency ]['rate'] - $fix_value;
216: 			$max_class = $max_class / $options[ $current_currency ]['rate'] + $fix_value;
217: 		} else {
218: 			$min_class = 0;
219: 			$max_class = 0;
220: 		}
221: 
222: 
223: 		if ( wc_tax_enabled() && 'incl' === get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_display_shop' ) && ! wc_prices_include_tax() ) {
224: 			$data_query = $wpdb->get_results(// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching
225: 				$wpdb->prepare(
226: 					"SELECT DISTINCT ID, post_parent, post_type FROM {$wpdb->posts}
227: 						INNER JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm1 ON ID = pm1.post_id
228: 						INNER JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm2 ON ID = pm2.post_id
229: 						WHERE post_type IN ( 'product', 'product_variation' )
230: 						AND post_status = 'publish'
231: 						AND pm1.meta_key IN ('" . implode( "','", array_map( 'esc_sql', apply_filters( 'woocommerce_price_filter_meta_keys', array( '_price' ) ) ) ) . "')" .// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.PreparedSQL.NotPrepared
232: 						" AND pm1.meta_value BETWEEN %f AND %f
233: 						AND pm2.meta_key = '_tax_class'
234: 						AND pm2.meta_value = %s
235: 					", $min_class, $max_class, sanitize_title( $tax_class )
236: 				), OBJECT_K
237: 			);
238: 		} else {
239: 			$data_query = $wpdb->get_results(// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching
240: 				$wpdb->prepare(
241: 					"SELECT DISTINCT ID, post_parent, post_type FROM {$wpdb->posts}
242: 					INNER JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm1 ON ID = pm1.post_id
243: 					WHERE post_type IN ( 'product', 'product_variation' )
244: 					AND post_status = 'publish'
245: 					AND pm1.meta_key IN ('" . implode( "','", array_map( 'esc_sql', apply_filters( 'woocommerce_price_filter_meta_keys', array( '_price' ) ) ) ) . "')" .// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.PreparedSQL.NotPrepared
246: 					" AND pm1.meta_value BETWEEN %d AND %d
247: 				", $min_class, $max_class
248: 				), OBJECT_K
249: 			);
250: 		}
251: 
252: 		return $data_query;
253: 	}
254: }

  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  4: 	exit;
  5: }

  7: /**
  8:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Location
  9:  */
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Location {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			/*Check change currency. Can not code in init function because Widget price can not get symbol.*/
 17: 			$list_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 18: 
 19: 			if ( ! isset( $_GET['wmc_location_nonce'] ) || wp_verify_nonce( wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc_location_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_location_nonce' ) ) {
 20: 				if ( isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) {
 21: 					$target_currency = str_replace( '/', '', sanitize_text_field( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) );
 22: 					if ( ! empty( $list_currencies[ $target_currency ] ) ) {
 23: 						if ( $list_currencies[ $target_currency ]['hide'] !== '1' ) {
 24: 							$this->settings->set_current_currency( $target_currency );
 25: 						}
 26: 					}
 27: 				}
 28: 			}
 29: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'init' ), 1 );
 30: 		}
 31: 	}
 32: 
 33: 	public function init() {
 34: 		if ( is_admin() && ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
 35: 			return;
 36: 		}
 37: 		if ( isset( $_GET['wmc_location_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( wc_clean( wp_unslash( $_GET['wmc_location_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_location_nonce' ) ) {
 38: 			return;
 39: 		}
 40: 		$action = isset( $_GET['action'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( $_GET['action'] ) : '';
 41: 		if ( $action === 'wc_facebook_background_product_sync' ) {
 42: 			return;
 43: 		}
 44: 		$auto_detect = $this->settings->get_auto_detect();
 45: 		$currencies  = $this->settings->get_currencies();
 46: 		switch ( $auto_detect ) {
 47: 			case 1:
 48: 				/*Auto select currency*/
 49: 				if ( $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_current_currency' ) ) {
 50: 					$return = true;
 51: 					switch ( $this->settings->get_geo_api() ) {
 52: 						case 1:
 53: //							$wmc_ip_add = $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_add' );
 54: //							if ( $wmc_ip_add !== $this->get_ip() ) {
 55: //								$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_ip_add', '', time() - 3600 );
 56: //								$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_ip_info', '', time() - 3600 );
 57: //								$return = false;
 58: //							}
 59: 							break;
 60: 						case 2:
 61: 							/*Update wmc_ip_info cookie if country is different from one saved in $_SERVER to handle page cache issue*/
 62: 							/*This helps auto-detect currency work with Kinsta cache but it will override that customers manually switch to*/
 63: 							if ( $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ) {
 64: 								$ip_info = json_decode( base64_decode( $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ), true );
 65: 								if ( ! empty( $ip_info['country'] ) ) {
 66: 									$server_detect = self::get_country_code_from_headers();
 67: 									if ( $server_detect && $ip_info['country'] !== $server_detect ) {
 68: 										$ip_info['country'] = $server_detect;
 69: 										$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_ip_info', base64_encode( wp_json_encode( $ip_info ) ), time() + 86400 );
 70: 										$return = false;
 71: 									}
 72: 								}
 73: 							}
 74: 							break;
 75: 						default:
 76: 					}
 77: 
 78: 					if ( $return ) {
 79: 						return;
 80: 					}
 81: 				}
 82: 				/*Do not run if a request is rest api or cron*/
 83: 				if ( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::is_request_to_rest_api() || ! empty( $_REQUEST['doing_wp_cron'] ) ) {
 84: 					return;
 85: 				}
 86: 				$detect_ip_currency = $this->detect_ip_currency();
 87: //					echo '<pre>'.print_r($detect_ip_currency,true).'</pre>';
 88: 				if ( $this->settings->get_enable_currency_by_country() && isset( $detect_ip_currency['country_code'] ) && $detect_ip_currency['country_code'] ) {
 89: 					$currency_detected = '';
 90: 					foreach ( $currencies as $currency ) {
 91: 						$data = $this->settings->get_currency_by_countries( $currency );
 92: 						if ( in_array( $detect_ip_currency['country_code'], $data ) ) {
 93: 							$currency_detected = $currency;
 94: 							break;
 95: 						}
 96: 					}
 97: 					if ( $currency_detected ) {
 98: 						$this->settings->set_current_currency( $currency_detected );
 99: 					} else {
100: 						$this->settings->set_current_currency( $detect_ip_currency['currency_code'] );
101: 					}
102: 				} elseif ( isset( $detect_ip_currency['currency_code'] ) && in_array( $detect_ip_currency['currency_code'], $currencies ) ) {
103: 					$this->settings->set_current_currency( $detect_ip_currency['currency_code'] );
104: 				} else {
105: 					$this->settings->set_fallback_currency();
106: 				}
107: 				break;
108: 
109: 			case 2:
110: 				/*Create approximately*/
111: //				if ( $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_currency_rate' ) ) {
112: 				if ( $ip_info = $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ) {
113: 					$ip_info         = json_decode( base64_decode( $ip_info ) );
114: 					$currencies_list = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
115: 					$db_rate         = isset( $currencies_list[ $ip_info->currency_code ]['rate'] ) ? $currencies_list[ $ip_info->currency_code ]['rate'] : '';
116: 					$cookie_rate     = $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_currency_rate' );
117: 					if ( $db_rate == $cookie_rate ) {
118: 						return;
119: 					}
120: 				}
121: 
122: 				$detect_ip_currency = $this->detect_ip_currency();
123: 				if ( isset( $detect_ip_currency['currency_code'] ) ) {
124: 					$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_currency_rate', $detect_ip_currency['currency_rate'], time() + 86400 );
125: 					$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_currency_symbol', $detect_ip_currency['currency_symbol'], time() + 86400 );
126: 				}
127: 				break;
128: 			default:
129: 
130: 		}
131: 	}
132: 
133: 	/**
134: 	 * @return array|bool
135: 	 */
136: 	protected function detect_ip_currency() {
137: 		if ( $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ) {
138: 			$geoplugin_arg = json_decode( base64_decode( $this->settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ), true );
139: 		} else {
140: 			switch ( $this->settings->get_geo_api() ) {
141: 				case 1:
142: 					$ip_add = $this->get_ip();
143: 					$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_ip_add', $ip_add, time() + 86400 );
144: 					if ( ! class_exists( 'geoPlugin' ) ) {
145: 						require_once WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_INCLUDES . 'geoplugin.class.php';
146: 					}
147: 					$geo_plugin = new geoPlugin();
148: 					$geoplugin  = $geo_plugin->fetch( "http://www.geoplugin.net/php.gp?ip={$ip_add}&base_currency=" . $this->settings->get_default_currency() );
149: 
150: 					if ( $geoplugin ) {
151: 						$geoplugin = unserialize( $geoplugin );
152: 					}
153: 
154: 					$geoplugin_arg = array(
155: 						'country'       => isset( $geoplugin['geoplugin_countryCode'] ) ? $geoplugin['geoplugin_countryCode'] : 'US',
156: 						'currency_code' => isset( $geoplugin['geoplugin_currencyCode'] ) ? $geoplugin['geoplugin_currencyCode'] : 'USD',
157: 					);
158: 					if ( ! empty( $geoplugin['geoplugin_currencyConverter'] ) ) {
159: 						$geoplugin_arg['currency_rate'] = $geoplugin['geoplugin_currencyConverter'];
160: 					}
161: 					break;
162: 				case 2:
163: 					$country_code  = self::get_country_code_from_headers();
164: 					$geoplugin_arg = array(
165: 						'country'       => $country_code,
166: 						'currency_code' => $this->settings->get_currency_code( $country_code )
167: 					);
168: 					break;
169: 				default:
170: 					$ip            = new WC_Geolocation();
171: 					$geo_ip        = $ip->geolocate_ip();
172: 					$country_code  = isset( $geo_ip['country'] ) ? $geo_ip['country'] : '';
173: 					$geoplugin_arg = array(
174: 						'country'       => $country_code,
175: 						'currency_code' => $this->settings->get_currency_code( $country_code )
176: 					);
177: 			}
178: 
179: 			if ( $geoplugin_arg['country'] ) {
180: 				$this->settings->setcookie( 'wmc_ip_info', base64_encode( wp_json_encode( $geoplugin_arg ) ), time() + 86400 );
181: 			} else {
182: 				return array();
183: 			}
184: 		}
185: 
186: 		$auto_detect = $this->settings->get_auto_detect();
187: 		if ( $auto_detect == 1 ) {
188: 			/*Auto select currency*/
189: 			if ( is_array( $geoplugin_arg ) && isset( $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'] ) ) {
190: 				$currencies = $this->settings->get_currencies();
191: 				if ( ! in_array( $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'], $currencies ) ) {
192: 					$geoplugin_arg['currency_code'] = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
193: 				}
194: 
195: 				return array(
196: 					'currency_code' => $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'],
197: 					'country_code'  => $geoplugin_arg['country']
198: 				);
199: 			} else {
200: 				return array();
201: 			}
202: 		} elseif ( $auto_detect == 2 ) {
203: 			/*Approximately price*/
204: 			if ( is_array( $geoplugin_arg ) && isset( $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'] ) ) {
205: 				$currency_code = $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'];
206: 				$country_code  = $geoplugin_arg['country'];
207: 				$symbol        = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'] );
208: 			} else {
209: 				return array();
210: 			}
211: 			$currencies        = $this->settings->get_currencies();
212: 			$main_currency     = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
213: 			$list_currencies   = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
214: 			$currency_detected = '';
215: 			if ( $this->settings->get_enable_currency_by_country() ) {
216: 				foreach ( $currencies as $currency ) {
217: 					$data = $this->settings->get_currency_by_countries( $currency );
218: 					if ( in_array( $country_code, $data ) ) {
219: 						$currency_detected = $currency;
220: 						break;
221: 					}
222: 				}
223: 			}
224: 
225: 			if ( $currency_detected ) {
226: 				if ( $currency_detected !== $this->settings->get_current_currency() ) {
227: 					return array(
228: 						'currency_code'   => $currency_detected,
229: 						'currency_rate'   => $list_currencies[ $currency_detected ]['rate'],
230: 						'currency_symbol' => get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $currency_detected )
231: 					);
232: 				} else {
233: 					return array();
234: 				}
235: 
236: 			} else if ( in_array( $currency_code, $currencies ) ) {
237: 				return array(
238: 					'currency_code'   => $currency_code,
239: 					'currency_rate'   => $list_currencies[ $currency_code ]['rate'],
240: 					'currency_symbol' => get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $currency_code )
241: 				);
242: 			} else {
243: 				$exchange_rate = $this->settings->get_exchange( $main_currency, $currency_code );
244: 				if ( is_array( $exchange_rate ) && isset( $exchange_rate[ $currency_code ] ) ) {
245: 					return array(
246: 						'currency_code'   => $currency_code,
247: 						'currency_rate'   => $exchange_rate[ $currency_code ],
248: 						'currency_symbol' => $symbol
249: 					);
250: 				} else {
251: 					return array();
252: 				}
253: 			}
254: 
255: 		} else {
256: 			return array();
257: 		}
258: 	}
259: 
260: 	/**
261: 	 * Return IP
262: 	 * @return string
263: 	 */
264: 	protected function get_ip() {
265: 		if ( defined( 'WOO_MULTI_CURRENCY_CUSTOM_IP' ) ) {
266: 			if ( isset( $_SERVER[ WOO_MULTI_CURRENCY_CUSTOM_IP ] ) ) {
267: 				return sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_SERVER[ WOO_MULTI_CURRENCY_CUSTOM_IP ] ) );
268: 			}
269: 		}
270: 		if ( isset( $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] ) ) {
271: 			$ipaddress = sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] ) );
272: 		} else if ( isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'] ) ) {
273: 			$ipaddress = sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'] ) );
274: 		} else if ( isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'] ) ) {
275: 			$ipaddress = self::validate_server_ip( $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'] );
276: 		} else if ( isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED'] ) ) {
277: 			$ipaddress = self::validate_server_ip( $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED'] );
278: 		} else if ( isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_FORWARDED_FOR'] ) ) {
279: 			$ipaddress = self::validate_server_ip( $_SERVER['HTTP_FORWARDED_FOR'] );
280: 		} else if ( isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_FORWARDED'] ) ) {
281: 			$ipaddress = self::validate_server_ip( $_SERVER['HTTP_FORWARDED'] );
282: 		} else {
283: 			$ipaddress = 'UNKNOWN';
284: 		}
285: 
286: 		return $ipaddress;
287: 	}
288: 
289: 	/**
290: 	 * @param $ip
291: 	 *
292: 	 * @return string
293: 	 */
294: 	private static function validate_server_ip( $ip ) {
295: 		return (string) rest_is_ip_address( trim( current( preg_split( '/,/', sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $ip ) ) ) ) ) );
296: 	}
297: 
298: 	private static function get_country_code_from_headers() {
299: 		$country_code = '';
300: 
301: 		$headers = array(
302: 			'HTTP_GEOIP_COUNTRY_CODE',
303: 			'GEOIP_COUNTRY_CODE',
304: 			'HTTP_CF_IPCOUNTRY',
305: 			'MM_COUNTRY_CODE',
306: 			'HTTP_X_COUNTRY_CODE',
307: 		);
308: 
309: 		foreach ( $headers as $header ) {
310: 			if ( ! empty( $_SERVER[ $header ] ) ) {
311: 				$country_code = strtoupper( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_SERVER[ $header ] ) ) );
312: 				break;
313: 			}
314: 		}
315: 
316: 		return $country_code;
317: 	}
318: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/mini-cart.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 3: 	exit;
 4: }
 5: 
 6: /**
 7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Mini_Cart
 8:  */
 9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Mini_Cart {
10: 	protected $settings;
11: 	function __construct() {
12: 
13: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
14: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
15: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_before_mini_cart', array( $this, 'woocommerce_before_mini_cart' ), 99 );
16: 			add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'remove_session' ) );
17: 		}
18: 	}
19: 
20: 	public function remove_session() {
21: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_minicart' ) ) {
22: 			return;
23: 		}
24: 		$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_currencies();
25: 		if ( isset( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) && in_array( sanitize_text_field( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ), $selected_currencies ) ) {
26: 			$src_min = WP_DEBUG ? '' : '.min';
27: 			wp_enqueue_script( 'woo-multi-currency-cart', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_JS . 'woo-multi-currency-cart' . $src_min . '.js', array( 'jquery' ), WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION, false );
28: 		}
29: 
30: 	}
31: 
32: 	/**
33: 	 * Recalculator for mini cart
34: 	 */
35: 	public function woocommerce_before_mini_cart() {
36: 		@WC()->cart->calculate_totals();
37: 	}
38: 
39: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/price.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  4: 	exit;
  5: }
  6: 
  7: use Automattic\Jetpack\Constants;
  8: 
  9: /**
 10:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Price
 11:  */
 12: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Price {
 13: 	protected static $settings;
 14: 	protected $price;
 15: 
 16: 	public function __construct() {
 17: 		self::$settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 18: 		if ( self::$settings->get_enable() ) {
 19: 			/*Simple product*/
 20: 			add_filter(
 21: 				'woocommerce_product_get_regular_price', array(
 22: 				$this,
 23: 				'woocommerce_product_get_regular_price'
 24: 			), 99, 2 );
 25: 			add_filter(
 26: 				'woocommerce_product_get_sale_price', array(
 27: 				$this,
 28: 				'woocommerce_product_get_sale_price'
 29: 			), 99, 2
 30: 			);
 31: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'woocommerce_product_get_price' ), 99, 2 );
 32: 			//
 33: 			/*Variable price*/
 34: 			add_filter(
 35: 				'woocommerce_product_variation_get_price', array(
 36: 				$this,
 37: 				'woocommerce_product_variation_get_price'
 38: 			), 99, 2
 39: 			);
 40: 			add_filter(
 41: 				'woocommerce_product_variation_get_regular_price', array(
 42: 				$this,
 43: 				'woocommerce_product_variation_get_regular_price'
 44: 			), 99, 2
 45: 			);
 46: 			add_filter(
 47: 				'woocommerce_product_variation_get_sale_price', array(
 48: 				$this,
 49: 				'woocommerce_product_variation_get_sale_price'
 50: 			), 99, 2
 51: 			);
 52: 
 53: 			/*Variable Parent min max price*/
 54: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_variation_prices', array( $this, 'get_woocommerce_variation_prices' ), 99, 3 );
 55: 
 56: 			/*Pay with Multi Currencies*/
 57: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'init' ), 99 );
 58: 
 59: 			/*Approximately*/
 60: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_price_html', array( $this, 'add_approximately_price' ), 20, 2 );
 61: 			if ( self::$settings->get_price_switcher() ) {
 62: 				add_action( 'woocommerce_single_product_summary', array( $this, 'add_price_switcher' ),
 63: 					(int) self::$settings->get_params( 'price_switcher_position' ), 2 );
 64: 			}
 65: 
 66: 			if ( is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-bookings/woocommerce-bookings.php' ) ) {
 67: 				/*Fix wrong sale price added when changing currency for WooCommerce Bookings products*/
 68: 				add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_price_html', array( $this, 'woocommerce_get_price_html' ), 20, 2 );
 69: 			}
 70: 			/*Yith dynamic pricing and discount*/
 71: 			add_action( 'ywdpd_before_calculate_discounts', array( $this, 'remove_filters' ), 1 );
 72: 			add_action( 'ywdpd_after_calculate_discounts', array( $this, 'add_filters' ), 1 );
 73: 		}
 74: 	}
 75: 
 76: 	public function remove_filters() {
 77: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'woocommerce_product_get_price' ), 99 );
 78: 	}
 79: 
 80: 	public function add_filters() {
 81: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'woocommerce_product_get_price' ), 99, 2 );
 82: 	}
 83: 
 84: 	/**
 85: 	 * @param $price_html
 86: 	 * @param $product WC_Product_Booking
 87: 	 *
 88: 	 * @return string
 89: 	 */
 90: 	public function woocommerce_get_price_html( $price_html, $product ) {
 91: 		if ( $product && is_a( $product, 'WC_Product_Booking' ) && self::$settings->get_current_currency() !== self::$settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 92: 			$base_price = WC_Bookings_Cost_Calculation::calculated_base_cost( $product );
 93: 			if ( 'incl' === get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_display_shop' ) ) {
 94: 				if ( function_exists( 'wc_get_price_excluding_tax' ) ) {
 95: 					$display_price = wc_get_price_including_tax( $product, array(
 96: 						'qty'   => 1,
 97: 						'price' => $base_price,
 98: 					) );
 99: 				} else {
100: 					$display_price = $product->get_price_including_tax( 1, $base_price );
101: 				}
102: 			} else {
103: 				if ( function_exists( 'wc_get_price_excluding_tax' ) ) {
104: 					$display_price = wc_get_price_excluding_tax( $product, array(
105: 						'qty'   => 1,
106: 						'price' => $base_price,
107: 					) );
108: 				} else {
109: 					$display_price = $product->get_price_excluding_tax( 1, $base_price );
110: 				}
111: 			}
112: 			remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'woocommerce_product_get_price' ), 99 );
113: 			$display_price_suffix_comp  = wc_price( apply_filters( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', $display_price, $product ) ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
114: 			$original_price_suffix_comp = wc_price( $display_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
115: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'woocommerce_product_get_price' ), 99, 2 );
116: 			$original_price_suffix = wc_price( $display_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
117: 			$display_price         = apply_filters( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', $display_price, $product );
118: 			$display_price_suffix  = wc_price( $display_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
119: 
120: 			if ( $original_price_suffix_comp !== $display_price_suffix_comp ) {
121: 				$price_html = "<del>{$original_price_suffix}</del><ins>{$display_price_suffix}</ins>";
122: 			} elseif ( $display_price ) {
123: 				if ( $product->has_additional_costs() || $product->get_display_cost() ) {
124: 					/* translators: 1: display price */
125: 					$price_html = sprintf( esc_html__( 'From: %s', 'woocommerce-bookings' ), wc_price( $display_price ) ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
126: 				} else {
127: 					$price_html = wc_price( $display_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
128: 				}
129: 			} elseif ( ! $product->has_additional_costs() ) {
130: 				$price_html = esc_html__( 'Free', 'woocommerce-bookings' );
131: 			} else {
132: 				$price_html = '';
133: 			}
134: 		}
135: 
136: 		return $price_html;
137: 	}
138: 
139: 	/**
140: 	 *
141: 	 */
142: 	public function add_price_switcher() {
143: 		if ( is_product() ) {
144: 			echo do_shortcode( '[woo_multi_currency_product_price_switcher]' );
145: 		}
146: 	}
147: 
148: 	/**
149: 	 * Get Product variation price
150: 	 *
151: 	 * @param $product
152: 	 *
153: 	 * @return int|string
154: 	 */
155: 	public static function get_variation_max_price( $product, $currency_code = false, $raw = false ) {
156: 		$variation_ids = $product->get_visible_children();
157: 		$price_max     = 0;
158: 		foreach ( $variation_ids as $variation_id ) {
159: 			$variation = wc_get_product( $variation_id );
160: 
161: 			if ( $variation ) {
162: 				$price = 0;
163: 				if ( ! $currency_code ) {
164: 					$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
165: 				} elseif ( ! $raw ) {
166: 					$currenct_currency = $currency_code;
167: 				}
168: 				if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && ! $raw ) {
169: 					$product_id    = $variation_id;
170: 					$product_price = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::static_json_price_meta( $variation->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
171: 					$sale_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::static_json_price_meta( $variation->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
172: 					if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) && ! $product->is_on_sale() && $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
173: 						$price = $product_price[ $currenct_currency ];
174: 					} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) && $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
175: 						$price = $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ];
176: 					}
177: 				}
178: 
179: 				if ( ! $price ) {
180: 					$price = $variation->get_price( 'edit' );
181: 					if ( ! $raw ) {
182: 						$price = wmc_get_price( $price, $currency_code );
183: 					}
184: 				}
185: 				if ( $price > $price_max ) {
186: 					$price_max = $price;
187: 				}
188: 			}
189: 		}
190: 
191: 
192: 		return $price_max;
193: 	}
194: 
195: 	/**
196: 	 * @param $product WC_Product|WC_Product_Variable
197: 	 * @param bool $currency_code
198: 	 * @param bool $raw
199: 	 *
200: 	 * @return bool|float|int|mixed|string
201: 	 */
202: 	public static function get_variation_min_price( $product, $currency_code = false, $raw = false ) {
203: 		$variation_ids     = $product->get_visible_children();
204: 		$price_min         = false;
205: 		$check_fixed_price = self::$settings->check_fixed_price();
206: 		foreach ( $variation_ids as $variation_id ) {
207: 			$variation = wc_get_product( $variation_id );
208: 			if ( $variation ) {
209: 				$price = 0;
210: 				if ( ! $currency_code ) {
211: 					$current_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
212: 				} elseif ( ! $raw ) {
213: 					$current_currency = $currency_code;
214: 				}
215: 				if ( $check_fixed_price && ! $raw ) {
216: 					$product_id    = $variation_id;
217: 					$product_price = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::static_json_price_meta( $variation->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
218: 					$sale_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::static_json_price_meta( $variation->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
219: 					if ( isset( $product_price[ $current_currency ] ) && ! $product->is_on_sale( 'edit' ) && $product_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
220: 						$price = $product_price[ $current_currency ];
221: 					} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] ) && $sale_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
222: 						$price = $sale_price[ $current_currency ];
223: 					}
224: 				}
225: 
226: 				if ( ! $price ) {
227: 					$price = $variation->get_price( 'edit' );
228: 					if ( ! $raw ) {
229: 						$price = wmc_get_price( $price, $currency_code );
230: 					}
231: 				}
232: 				if ( $price_min === false ) {
233: 					$price_min = $price;
234: 				}
235: 				if ( $price < $price_min ) {
236: 					$price_min = $price;
237: 				}
238: 			}
239: 		}
240: 
241: 		return $price_min;
242: 	}
243: 
244: 	/**
245: 	 * @param $html_price
246: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
247: 	 *
248: 	 * @return string
249: 	 */
250: 	public function add_approximately_price( $html_price, $product ) {
251: 
252: 		if ( is_admin() && ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
253: 			return $html_price;
254: 		}
255: 		if ( self::$settings->get_auto_detect() == 2 ) {
256: 			if ( '' === $product->get_price() || ! $product->is_in_stock() ) {
257: 				return $html_price;
258: 			}
259: 			if ( ! self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_currency_rate' ) || ! self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_currency_symbol' ) || ! self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ) {
260: 				return $html_price;
261: 			}
262: 			$geoplugin_arg = json_decode( base64_decode( self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_ip_info' ) ), true );
263: 
264: 			$detect_currency_code = isset( $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'] ) ? $geoplugin_arg['currency_code'] : '';
265: 			if ( $detect_currency_code == self::$settings->get_current_currency() ) {
266: 				return $html_price;
267: 			}
268: 			$list_currencies    = self::$settings->get_list_currencies();
269: 			$default_currency   = self::$settings->get_default_currency();
270: 			$decimal_separator  = wc_get_price_decimal_separator();
271: 			$thousand_separator = wc_get_price_thousand_separator();
272: 			if ( $detect_currency_code && isset( $list_currencies[ $detect_currency_code ] ) ) {
273: 				$decimals    = $list_currencies[ $detect_currency_code ]['decimals'];
274: 				$current_pos = $list_currencies[ $detect_currency_code ]['pos'];
275: 			} else {
276: 				$decimals    = $list_currencies[ $default_currency ]['decimals'];
277: 				$current_pos = $list_currencies[ $default_currency ]['pos'];
278: 			}
279: 			$rate   = self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_currency_rate' );
280: 			$symbol = self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_currency_symbol' );
281: 			switch ( $current_pos ) {
282: 				case 'left' :
283: 					$format = '%1$s%2$s';
284: 					break;
285: 				case 'right' :
286: 					$format = '%2$s%1$s';
287: 					break;
288: 				case 'left_space' :
289: 					$format = '%1$s&nbsp;%2$s';
290: 					break;
291: 				case 'right_space' :
292: 					$format = '%2$s&nbsp;%1$s';
293: 					break;
294: 			}
295: 
296: 
297: 			$price = number_format( wc_get_price_to_display( $product, array(
298: 					'qty'   => 1,
299: 					'price' => $product->get_price( 'edit' )
300: 				) ) * $rate, $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
301: 			$pos   = strpos( $symbol, '#PRICE#' );
302: 			if ( $pos === false ) {
303: 				$formatted_price = sprintf( $format, $symbol, $price );
304: 			} else {
305: 				$formatted_price = str_replace( '#PRICE#', $price, $symbol );
306: 			}
307: 			$max_price = '';
308: 			if ( $product->get_type() == 'variable' ) {
309: 				$price_max = self::get_variation_max_price( $product, false, true );
310: 				if ( $price_max != $product->get_price( 'edit' ) ) {
311: 					$price_max = number_format( wc_get_price_to_display( $product, array(
312: 							'qty'   => 1,
313: 							'price' => $price_max
314: 						) ) * $rate, $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
315: 					if ( $pos === false ) {
316: 						$max_price = ' - ' . sprintf( $format, $symbol, $price_max );
317: 					} else {
318: 						$max_price = ' - ' . str_replace( '#PRICE#', $price_max, $symbol );
319: 					}
320: 				}
321: 			}
322: 			$html_price .= '<span class="wmc-approximately">' . esc_html__( 'Approximately', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ': ' . $formatted_price . $max_price . '</span>';
323: 
324: 		}
325: 
326: 		return $html_price;
327: 	}
328: 
329: 	/**
330: 	 * Check on checkout page
331: 	 */
332: 	public function init() {
333: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_price' ) ) {
334: 			return;
335: 		}
336: 
337: 		if ( is_admin() && ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
338: 			return;
339: 		}
340: 		/*Fix UX Builder of Flatsome*/
341: 		if ( isset( $_GET['uxb_iframe'] ) ) {
342: 			return;
343: 		}
344: 
345: 		if ( defined( 'WP_CLI' ) && WP_CLI ) {
346: 			return;
347: 		}
348: 		if ( ! ( wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $_POST['action'] ) && $_POST['action'] == 'wmc_get_products_price' || ! wp_doing_ajax() ) ) {
349: 			return;
350: 		}
351: 		$allow_multi      = self::$settings->get_enable_multi_payment();
352: 		$current_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
353: 		$old_currency     = self::$settings->getcookie( 'wmc_current_currency_old' );
354: 		if ( ! $allow_multi ) {
355: 			if ( $this->is_checkout() ) {
356: 				self::$settings->set_current_currency( self::$settings->get_default_currency(), false );
357: 			} elseif ( $old_currency && $old_currency != $current_currency ) {
358: 				self::$settings->set_current_currency( $old_currency, false );
359: 			}
360: 		}
361: 	}
362: 
363: 	public function is_checkout() {
364: 		if ( class_exists( 'Polylang' ) && function_exists( 'is_checkout' ) ) {
365: 			return is_checkout();
366: 		} else {
367: 			return $this->has_shortcode( $this->get_post_from_url(), 'woocommerce_checkout' ) || strpos( $this->get_current_url(), wc_get_checkout_url() ) !== false || Constants::is_defined( 'WOOCOMMERCE_CHECKOUT' ) || apply_filters( 'woocommerce_is_checkout', false );
368: 		}
369: 	}
370: 
371: 	public function get_post_from_url() {
372: 		$current_url = $this->get_current_url();
373: 		if ( class_exists( 'SitePress' ) ) {
374: 			global $sitepress;
375: 			remove_filter( 'url_to_postid', array( $sitepress, 'url_to_postid' ) );
376: 			$id = url_to_postid( $current_url );
377: 			add_filter( 'url_to_postid', array( $sitepress, 'url_to_postid' ) );
378: 		} else {
379: 			$id = url_to_postid( $current_url );
380: 		}
381: 
382: 		$post = get_post( $id );
383: 
384: 		return $post;
385: 	}
386: 
387: 	public function has_shortcode( $post, $tag ) {
388: 		return is_a( $post, 'WP_Post' ) && has_shortcode( $post->post_content, $tag );
389: 	}
390: 
391: 	public function get_current_url() {
392: 		global $wp;
393: 		$current_url = site_url( add_query_arg( array(), $wp->request ) );
394: 
395: 		$redirect_url = isset( $_SERVER['REDIRECT_URI'] ) ? $_SERVER['REDIRECT_URI'] : '';
396: 		$redirect_url = ! empty( $_SERVER['REDIRECT_URL'] ) ? $_SERVER['REDIRECT_URL'] : $redirect_url;
397: 		$redirect_url = ! empty( $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] ) ? $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] : $redirect_url;
398: 
399: 		return $current_url . $redirect_url;
400: 	}
401: 
402: 	/**Variable Parent min max price
403: 	 *
404: 	 * @param $price_arr
405: 	 * @param $product
406: 	 * @param $for_display
407: 	 *
408: 	 * @return array
409: 	 */
410: 	public function get_woocommerce_variation_prices( $price_arr, $product, $for_display ) {
411: 		$temp_arr = $price_arr;
412: 		if ( is_array( $price_arr ) && ! empty( $price_arr ) ) {
413: 			$fixed_price = self::$settings->check_fixed_price();
414: 
415: 			foreach ( $price_arr as $price_type => $values ) {
416: 				foreach ( $values as $key => $value ) {
417: 					if ( $fixed_price ) {
418: 						$wc_variation_product = wc_get_product( $key );
419: 						$current_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
420: 						if ( $temp_arr['regular_price'][ $key ] != $temp_arr['price'][ $key ] ) {
421: 							if ( $price_type == 'regular_price' ) {
422: 								$regular_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $wc_variation_product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
423: 
424: 								if ( isset( $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ] ) && $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
425: 									$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = $for_display ? $this->tax_handle( $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ], $product ) : $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ];
426: 								} else {
427: 									$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = wmc_get_price( $value );
428: 								}
429: 							}
430: 
431: 							if ( $price_type == 'price' || $price_type == 'sale_price' ) {
432: 								$sale_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $wc_variation_product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
433: 
434: 								if ( isset( $sale_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ] ) && $sale_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
435: 									$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = $for_display ? $this->tax_handle( $sale_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ], $product ) : $sale_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ];
436: 								} elseif ( $temp_arr['regular_price'][ $key ] != $temp_arr['price'][ $key ] ) {
437: 									$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = wmc_get_price( $value );
438: 								} else {
439: 									$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = wmc_get_price( $value );
440: 								}
441: 							}
442: 						} else {
443: 							$regular_price_wmcp = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $wc_variation_product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
444: 							if ( isset( $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ] ) && $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
445: 								$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = $for_display ? $this->tax_handle( $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ], $product ) : $regular_price_wmcp[ $current_currency ];
446: 							} else {
447: 								$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = wmc_get_price( $value );
448: 							}
449: 						}
450: 
451: 					} else {
452: 						$price_arr[ $price_type ][ $key ] = wmc_get_price( $value );
453: 					}
454: 				}
455: 			}
456: 		}
457: 
458: 
459: 		return $price_arr;
460: 	}
461: 
462: 	/**
463: 	 * @param $price
464: 	 * @param $product
465: 	 *
466: 	 * @return float|string
467: 	 */
468: 	public function tax_handle( $price, $product ) {
469: 		if ( ! $price ) {
470: 			return $price;
471: 		}
472: 
473: 		$data = array( 'qty' => 1, 'price' => $price, );
474: 
475: 		return 'incl' === get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_display_shop' ) ? wc_get_price_including_tax( $product, $data ) : wc_get_price_excluding_tax( $product, $data );
476: 	}
477: 
478: 	/**Sale price with product variable
479: 	 *
480: 	 * @param $price
481: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
482: 	 *
483: 	 * @return mixed
484: 	 */
485: 	public function woocommerce_product_variation_get_sale_price( $price, $product ) {
486: 		if ( ! $price ) {
487: 			return $price;
488: 		}
489: 		$product_id = $product->get_id();
490: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ] ) ) {
491: 			return $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ];
492: 		}
493: 		$changes = $product->get_changes();
494: 
495: 		if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && ( is_array( $changes ) ) && count( $changes ) < 1 ) {
496: 
497: 			$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
498: 			$product_id        = $product->get_id();
499: 			$product_price     = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
500: 			if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) ) {
501: 				if ( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
502: 					return $this->set_cache( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
503: 				}
504: 			}
505: 		}
506: 
507: 		return $this->set_cache( wmc_get_price( $price ), $product_id, $price );
508: 		//Do nothing to remove prices hash to alway get live price.
509: 	}
510: 
511: 	/**Regular price with product variable
512: 	 *
513: 	 * @param $price
514: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
515: 	 *
516: 	 * @return mixed
517: 	 */
518: 	public function woocommerce_product_variation_get_regular_price( $price, $product ) {
519: 		if ( ! $price ) {
520: 			return $price;
521: 		}
522: 		$product_id = $product->get_id();
523: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ] ) ) {
524: 			return $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ];
525: 		}
526: 		$changes = $product->get_changes();
527: 
528: 		if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && ( is_array( $changes ) ) && count( $changes ) < 1 ) {
529: 
530: 			$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
531: 			$product_id        = $product->get_id();
532: 			$product_price     = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
533: 			if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) ) {
534: 				if ( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
535: 					return $this->set_cache( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
536: 
537: 				}
538: 			}
539: 		}
540: 
541: 		return $this->set_cache( wmc_get_price( $price ), $product_id, $price );
542: 		//Do nothing to remove prices hash to alway get live price.
543: 	}

545: 
546: 	/**Sale product variable price
547: 	 *
548: 	 * @param $price
549: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
550: 	 *
551: 	 * @return mixed
552: 	 */
553: 	public function woocommerce_product_variation_get_price( $price, $product ) {
554: 		if ( ! $price ) {
555: 			return $price;
556: 		}
557: 		$product_id = $product->get_id();
558: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ] ) ) {
559: 			return $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ];
560: 		}
561: 		$changes = $product->get_changes();
562: 
563: 		if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && ( is_array( $changes ) ) && count( $changes ) < 1 ) {
564: 
565: 			$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
566: 			$product_id        = $product->get_id();
567: 			$product_price     = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
568: 			$sale_price        = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
569: 			if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) && ! $product->is_on_sale() ) {
570: 				if ( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
571: 					return $this->set_cache( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
572: 				}
573: 			} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) ) {
574: 				if ( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
575: 					return $this->set_cache( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
576: 
577: 				}
578: 			}
579: 		}
580: 
581: 		return $this->set_cache( wmc_get_price( $price ), $product_id, $price );
582: 	}
583: 
584: 	/**
585: 	 * @param $price
586: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
587: 	 *
588: 	 * @return mixed
589: 	 */
590: 	public function woocommerce_product_get_price( $price, $product ) {
591: 		if ( ! $price ) {
592: 			return $price;
593: 		}
594: 		$product_id = $product->get_id();
595: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ] ) ) {
596: 			return $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ];
597: 		}
598: 		$changes = $product->get_changes();
599: 		$no_fixed_changes = is_array( $changes ) ? count( $changes ) < 1 : false;
600: 		$sale_price_changes = false;
601: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'advanced-dynamic-pricing-for-woocommerce/advanced-dynamic-pricing-for-woocommerce.php' ) ) {
602: 			if ( is_array( $changes ) && array_key_exists( 'adpCustomInitialPrice', $changes ) && count( $changes ) < 2 ) {
603: 				$no_fixed_changes = true;
604: 			}
605: 		}
606: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'checkout-upsell-and-order-bumps/checkout-upsell-and-order-bumps.php' ) ) {
607: 			if ( is_array( $changes ) && array_key_exists( 'regular_price', $changes ) && array_key_exists( 'price', $changes ) && count( $changes ) == 2 ) {
608: 				$no_fixed_changes = true;
609: 				$sale_price_changes = true;
610: 			}
611: 		}
612: 		if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && $no_fixed_changes ) {
613: 			$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
614: 			$product_id        = $product->get_id();
615: 			$product_price     = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
616: 			$sale_price        = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
617: 			if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) && ! self::is_on_sale( $product ) ) {
618: 				if ( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
619: 					if ( $sale_price_changes && $changes['price'] != $changes['regular_price'] && ! empty( $changes['price'] ) && (float) $changes['regular_price'] == (float) $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) {
620: 						return $this->set_cache( $changes['price'], $product_id, $price );
621: 					}
622: 					return $this->set_cache( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
623: 
624: 				}
625: 			} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) ) {
626: 				if ( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
627: 					if ( $sale_price_changes && $changes['price'] != $changes['regular_price'] && ! empty( $changes['price'] ) && (float) $changes['regular_price'] == (float) $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) {
628: 						return $this->set_cache( $changes['price'], $product_id, $price );
629: 					}
630: 					return $this->set_cache( $sale_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
631: 
632: 				}
633: 			}
634: 		}
635: 
636: 		return $this->set_cache( wmc_get_price( $price ), $product_id, $price );
637: 	}
638: 
639: 	/**
640: 	 * @param $price
641: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
642: 	 *
643: 	 * @return mixed
644: 	 */
645: 	public function woocommerce_product_get_sale_price( $price, $product ) {
646: 		if ( ! $price ) {
647: 			return $price;
648: 		}
649: 		$product_id = $product->get_id();
650: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ] ) ) {
651: 			return $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ];
652: 		}
653: 		$changes = $product->get_changes();
654: 
655: 		if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && ( is_array( $changes ) ) && count( $changes ) < 1 ) {
656: 
657: 			$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
658: 			$product_id        = $product->get_id();
659: 			$product_price     = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
660: 			if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) ) {
661: 				if ( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
662: 					return $this->set_cache( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
663: 
664: 				}
665: 			}
666: 		}
667: 
668: 		return $this->set_cache( wmc_get_price( $price ), $product_id, $price );
669: 	}
670: 
671: 	/**
672: 	 * @param $price
673: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
674: 	 *
675: 	 * @return mixed
676: 	 */
677: 	public function woocommerce_product_get_regular_price( $price, $product ) {
678: 		if ( ! $price ) {
679: 			return $price;
680: 		}
681: 		$product_id = $product->get_id();
682: 		if ( ! wp_doing_ajax() && isset( $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ] ) ) {
683: 			return $this->price[ $product_id ][ $price ];
684: 		}
685: 		$changes = $product->get_changes();
686: 
687: 		if ( self::$settings->check_fixed_price() && ( is_array( $changes ) ) && ( count( $changes ) < 1 ||
688: 		                                                                           ( count( $changes ) == 1 && isset( $changes['description'] ) ) ) ) {
689: 
690: 			$currenct_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
691: 			$product_id        = $product->get_id();
692: 			$product_price     = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
693: 			if ( isset( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] ) ) {
694: 				if ( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ] > 0 ) {
695: 
696: 					return $this->set_cache( $product_price[ $currenct_currency ], $product_id, $price );
697: 				}
698: 			}
699: 		}
700: 
701: 		return $this->set_cache( wmc_get_price( $price ), $product_id, $price );
702: 	}
703: 
704: 	/**Set price to global. It will help more speedy.
705: 	 *
706: 	 * @param $price
707: 	 * @param $id
708: 	 * @param $key
709: 	 *
710: 	 * @return mixed
711: 	 */
712: 	protected function set_cache( $price, $id, $key ) {
713: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_price' ) ) {
714: 			return $price;
715: 		}
716: 
717: 		$ajax = isset( $_GET['wc-ajax'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( $_GET['wc-ajax'] ) : '';
718: 		if ( $ajax === 'ppc-create-order' ) {
719: 			/**
720: 			 * Fix bug with WooCommerce PayPal Payments
721: 			 *
722: 			 * 'HUF', 'JPY' and 'TWD' do not support decimals, the rest must have 2 decimals
723: 			 */
724: 			$current_currency = self::$settings->get_current_currency();
725: 			$args             = array( 'decimals' => 2 );
726: 			if ( in_array( $current_currency, array( 'HUF', 'JPY', 'TWD' ) ) ) {
727: 				$args['decimals'] = 0;
728: 			}
729: 			$price = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::convert_price_to_float( $price, $args );
730: 		}
731: 		if ( $price && $id && $key ) {
732: 			/*Default decimal is "."*/
733: 			$this->price[ $id ][ $key ] = str_replace( ',', '.', $price );
734: 
735: 			return $this->price[ $id ][ $key ];
736: 		} else {
737: 			return $price;
738: 		}
739: 	}
740: 
741: 	/**Fix error 500 with Subscriptions for WooCommerce plugin from WebToffee if using $product->is_on_sale('edit') for variable_subscription product
742: 	 *
743: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
744: 	 *
745: 	 * @return bool
746: 	 */
747: 	public static function is_on_sale( $product ) {
748: 		$context = 'edit';
749: 		if ( '' !== (string) $product->get_sale_price( $context ) && $product->get_regular_price( $context ) > $product->get_sale_price( $context ) ) {
750: 			$on_sale = true;
751: 
752: 			if ( $product->get_date_on_sale_from( $context ) && $product->get_date_on_sale_from( $context )->getTimestamp() > time() ) {
753: 				$on_sale = false;
754: 			}
755: 
756: 			if ( $product->get_date_on_sale_to( $context ) && $product->get_date_on_sale_to( $context )->getTimestamp() < time() ) {
757: 				$on_sale = false;
758: 			}
759: 		} else {
760: 			$on_sale = false;
761: 		}
762: 
763: 		return $on_sale;
764: 	}
765: 
766: 	function format_json_price_meta( $price_meta ) {
767: 
768: 		return is_string( $price_meta ) ? json_decode( $price_meta, true ) : $price_meta;
769: 	}
770: 
771: 	public static function static_json_price_meta( $price_meta ) {
772: 
773: 		return is_string( $price_meta ) ? json_decode( $price_meta, true ) : $price_meta;
774: 	}
775: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/shipping.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Shipping
  8:  */
  9: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Shipping {
 10: 	protected $settings;
 11: 	protected $cache = array();
 12: 
 13: 	function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			global $wpdb;
 17: 			$raw_methods_sql = "SELECT method_id, method_order, instance_id, is_enabled FROM {$wpdb->prefix}woocommerce_shipping_zone_methods WHERE method_id = 'betrs_shipping' AND is_enabled = 1 order by instance_id ASC;";
 18: 			$raw_methods     = $wpdb->get_results( $raw_methods_sql );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.DirectQuery, WordPress.DB.DirectDatabaseQuery.NoCaching, WordPress.DB.PreparedSQL.NotPrepared
 19: 			if ( count( $raw_methods ) ) {
 20: 				foreach ( $raw_methods as $method ) {
 21: 					add_filter( 'option_betrs_shipping_options-' . intval( $method->instance_id ), array(
 22: 						$this,
 23: 						'table_rate_shipping'
 24: 					) );
 25: 				}
 26: 			}
 27: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_package_rates', array( $this, 'woocommerce_package_rates' ), 10, 2 );
 28: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_shipping_free_shipping_instance_option', array(
 29: 				$this,
 30: 				'woocommerce_shipping_free_shipping_instance_option'
 31: 			), 10, 3 );
 32: 		}
 33: 	}
 34: 
 35: 	/**
 36: 	 * Handle min_amount of Free shipping method
 37: 	 *
 38: 	 * If enable fixed price and the value is not empty, use it. Otherwise, convert the min_amount of the default currency
 39: 	 *
 40: 	 * @param $value
 41: 	 * @param $key
 42: 	 * @param $instance
 43: 	 *
 44: 	 * @return float|int|mixed
 45: 	 */
 46: 	public function woocommerce_shipping_free_shipping_instance_option( $value, $key, $instance ) {
 47: 		if ( ! is_admin() || wp_doing_ajax() ) {
 48: 			if ( $key === 'min_amount' ) {
 49: 				$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 50: 				$currency         = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 51: 				if ( $currency !== $default_currency ) {
 52: 					$value = wmc_get_price( $instance->instance_settings["min_amount"] );
 53: 				}
 54: 			}
 55: 		}
 56: 
 57: 		return $value;
 58: 	}
 59: 
 60: 	/**
 61: 	 * Table rate shipping
 62: 	 *
 63: 	 * @param $options
 64: 	 *
 65: 	 * @return mixed
 66: 	 */
 67: 	public function table_rate_shipping( $options ) {
 68: 		$new_options = $options;
 69: 		if ( ! empty( $new_options ) ) {
 70: 			// step through each table rate row
 71: 			foreach ( $new_options['settings'] as $o_key => $option ) {
 72: 				foreach ( $option['rows'] as $r_key => $row ) {
 73: 					$costs = $row['costs'];
 74: 					if ( is_array( $costs ) ) {
 75: 						foreach ( $costs as $k => $cost ) {
 76: 							switch ( $cost['cost_type'] ) {
 77: 								case '%':
 78: 									break;
 79: 								default:
 80: 									$options['settings'][ $o_key ]['rows'][ $r_key ]['costs'][ $k ]['cost_value'] = wmc_get_price( $cost['cost_value'] );
 81: 							}
 82: 						}
 83: 					}
 84: 				}
 85: 			}
 86: 		}
 87: 
 88: 		return $options;
 89: 	}
 90: 
 91: 	/**
 92: 	 * Convert shipping cost
 93: 	 *
 94: 	 * @param $methods
 95: 	 *
 96: 	 * @return mixed
 97: 	 */
 98: 	public function woocommerce_package_rates( $methods, $package ) {
 99: 		$currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
100: 		if ( $currency === $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
101: 			return $methods;
102: 		}
103: 		if ( count( array_filter( $methods ) ) ) {
104: 			foreach ( $methods as $k => $method ) {
105: 				if ( in_array( $method->method_id, apply_filters( 'wmc_excluded_shipping_methods_from_converting',
106: 					array(
107: 						'aramex',
108: 						'free_shipping',
109: 						'wf_shipping_ups',
110: 						'betrs_shipping',
111: 						'printful_shipping',
112: 						'easyship',
113: 						'printful_shipping_PRINTFUL_SLOW',
114: 						'printful_shipping_STANDARD',
115: 						'printful_shipping_PRINTFUL_MEDIUM',
116: 						'myfatoorah_shipping',
117: 						'checkout_envia_shipping',
118: 						'envia_shipping',
119: 						'fan_courier',
120: 					) ) ) ) {
121: 					continue;
122: 				}
123: 				if ( $method->method_id === 'flat_rate' ) {
124: 					$shipping = new WC_Shipping_Flat_Rate( $method->instance_id );
125: 					// Calculate the costs.
126: 					$cost         = $shipping->get_option( 'cost' );
127: 					$has_costs    = false; // True when a cost is set. False if all costs are blank strings.
128: 					$rate['cost'] = 0;
129: 					if ( '' !== $cost ) {
130: 						$has_costs    = true;
131: 						$rate['cost'] = $this->evaluate_cost(
132: 							$cost,
133: 							$method,
134: 							array(
135: 							'qty'  => $shipping->get_package_item_qty( $package ),
136: 							'cost' => wmc_revert_price( $package['contents_cost'] ),
137: 							)
138: 						);//, $shipping
139: 					}
140: 
141: 					// Add shipping class costs.
142: 					$shipping_classes = WC()->shipping()->get_shipping_classes();
143: 					if ( ! empty( $shipping_classes ) ) {
144: 						$found_shipping_classes = $shipping->find_shipping_classes( $package );
145: 						$highest_class_cost     = 0;
146: 
147: 						foreach ( $found_shipping_classes as $shipping_class => $products ) {
148: 							// Also handles BW compatibility when slugs were used instead of ids.
149: 							$shipping_class_term = get_term_by( 'slug', $shipping_class, 'product_shipping_class' );
150: 							$class_cost_string   = $shipping_class_term && $shipping_class_term->term_id ? $shipping->get_option( 'class_cost_' . $shipping_class_term->term_id, $shipping->get_option( 'class_cost_' . $shipping_class, '' ) ) : $shipping->get_option( 'no_class_cost', '' );
151: 							if ( '' === $class_cost_string ) {
152: 								continue;
153: 							}
154: 							$has_costs  = true;
155: 							$class_cost = $this->evaluate_cost(
156: 								$class_cost_string,
157: 								$method,
158: 								array(
159: 								'qty'  => array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $products, 'quantity' ) ),
160: 								'cost' => wmc_revert_price( array_sum( wp_list_pluck( $products, 'line_total' ) ) ),
161: 								)
162: 							);
163: 
164: 							if ( 'class' === $shipping->type ) {
165: 								$rate['cost'] += $class_cost;
166: 							} else {
167: 								$highest_class_cost = $class_cost > $highest_class_cost ? $class_cost : $highest_class_cost;
168: 							}
169: 						}
170: 
171: 						if ( 'order' === $shipping->type && $highest_class_cost ) {
172: 							$rate['cost'] += $highest_class_cost;
173: 						}
174: 					}
175: 
176: 					if ( $has_costs ) {
177: 						$cost = wmc_get_price( $rate['cost'] );
178: 						$method->set_cost( $cost );
179: 						if ( count( $method->get_taxes() ) ) {
180: 							$new_tax = array();
181: 							foreach ( $method->get_taxes() as $tax_k => $tax ) {
182: 								$new_tax[ $tax_k ] = wmc_get_price( $tax, false, true );
183: 							}
184: 							$method->set_taxes( $new_tax );
185: 						}
186: 					}
187: 				} else {
188: 					if ( isset( $this->cache[ $k ] ) && $this->cache[ $k ] && $k ) {
189: 						$method->set_cost( $this->cache[ $k ] );
190: 					} else {
191: 						$cost = wmc_get_price( $method->cost );
192: 						$method->set_cost( $cost );
193: 						if ( count( $method->get_taxes() ) ) {
194: 							$new_tax = array();
195: 							foreach ( $method->get_taxes() as $tax_k => $tax ) {
196: 								$new_tax[ $tax_k ] = wmc_get_price( $tax, false, true );
197: 							}
198: 							$method->set_taxes( $new_tax );
199: 						}
200: 					}
201: 				}
202: 			}
203: 		}
204: 
205: 		return $methods;
206: 	}
207: 
208: 	protected function evaluate_cost( $sum, $method, $args = array() ) {
209: 		include_once WC()->plugin_path() . '/includes/libraries/class-wc-eval-math.php';
210: 
211: 		// Allow 3rd parties to process shipping cost arguments.
212: 		$args           = apply_filters( 'woocommerce_evaluate_shipping_cost_args', $args, $sum, $method );
213: 		$locale         = localeconv();
214: 		$decimals       = array(
215: 			wc_get_price_decimal_separator(),
216: 			$locale['decimal_point'],
217: 			$locale['mon_decimal_point'],
218: 			','
219: 		);
220: 		$this->fee_cost = $args['cost'];
221: 		// Expand shortcodes.
222: 		add_shortcode( 'fee', array( $this, 'fee' ) );
223: 		$sum = do_shortcode(
224: 			str_replace(
225: 				array(
226: 					'[qty]',
227: 					'[cost]',
228: 				),
229: 				array(
230: 					$args['qty'],
231: 					$args['cost'],
232: 				),
233: 				$sum
234: 			)
235: 		);
236: 		remove_shortcode( 'fee', array( $this, 'fee' ) );
237: 		// Remove whitespace from string.
238: 		$sum = preg_replace( '/\s+/', '', $sum );
239: 
240: 		// Remove locale from string.
241: 		$sum = str_replace( $decimals, '.', $sum );
242: 
243: 		// Trim invalid start/end characters.
244: 		$sum = rtrim( ltrim( $sum, "\t\n\r\0\x0B+*/" ), "\t\n\r\0\x0B+-*/" );
245: 
246: 		// Do the math.
247: 		return $sum ? WC_Eval_Math::evaluate( $sum ) : 0;
248: 	}
249: 
250: 	/**
251: 	 * Work out fee (shortcode).
252: 	 *
253: 	 * @param array $atts Attributes.
254: 	 *
255: 	 * @return string
256: 	 */
257: 	public function fee( $atts ) {
258: 		$atts = shortcode_atts(
259: 			array(
260: 				'percent' => '',
261: 				'min_fee' => '',
262: 				'max_fee' => '',
263: 			), $atts, 'fee'
264: 		);
265: 
266: 		$calculated_fee = 0;
267: 
268: 		if ( $atts['percent'] ) {
269: 			$calculated_fee = $this->fee_cost * ( floatval( $atts['percent'] ) / 100 );
270: 		}
271: 
272: 		if ( $atts['min_fee'] && $calculated_fee < $atts['min_fee'] ) {
273: 			$calculated_fee = $atts['min_fee'];
274: 		}
275: 
276: 		if ( $atts['max_fee'] && $calculated_fee > $atts['max_fee'] ) {
277: 			$calculated_fee = $atts['max_fee'];
278: 		}
279: 
280: 		return $calculated_fee;
281: 	}
282: }

================
