 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Shortcode {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 	protected $price_args;
 13: 	protected $current_url;
 14: 
 15: 	public function __construct() {
 16: 		$this->settings   = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 17: 		$this->price_args = array();
 18: 		add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'shortcode_init' ) );
 19: 		add_filter( 'wmc_shortcode', array( $this, 'replace_shortcode' ), 10, 2 );
 20: 
 21: 		if ( ! isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) || wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_shortcode' ) ) {
 22: 			$this->current_url = ! empty( $_POST['wmc_current_url'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( $_POST['wmc_current_url'] ) : remove_query_arg( 'wmc-currency' );
 23: 		}
 24: 	}
 25: 
 26: 	public static function get_shortcode_id() {
 27: 		global $wmc_shortcode_id;
 28: 		if ( $wmc_shortcode_id === null ) {
 29: 			$wmc_shortcode_id = 1;
 30: 		} else {
 31: 			$wmc_shortcode_id ++;
 32: 		}
 33: 
 34: 		return "woocommerce-multi-currency-{$wmc_shortcode_id}";
 35: 	}
 36: 
 37: 	public function shortcode_init() {
 38: 		$items = $this->settings->get_list_shortcodes();
 39: 		foreach ( $items as $k => $item ) {
 40: 			if ( $k ) {
 41: 				add_shortcode( 'woo_multi_currency_' . $k, array( $this, 'shortcode_' . $k ) );
 42: 			}
 43: 		}
 44: 		add_shortcode( 'woo_multi_currency', array( $this, 'shortcode_woo_multi_currency' ) );
 45: 		add_shortcode( 'woo_multi_currency_exchange', array( $this, 'woo_multi_currency_exchange' ) );
 46: 		add_shortcode( 'woo_multi_currency_rates', array( $this, 'woo_multi_currency_rates' ) );
 47: 		add_shortcode( 'woo_multi_currency_product_price_switcher', array( $this, 'product_price_switcher' ) );
 48: 	}
 49: 
 50: 	public function product_price_switcher( $atts ) {
 51: 		$args = shortcode_atts( array(
 52: 			'product_id' => '',
 53: 		), $atts );
 54: 		global $post;
 55: 		$product_id = ! empty( $args['product_id'] ) ? absint( $args['product_id'] ) : '';
 56: 		if ( ! $product_id ) {
 57: 			if ( is_object( $post ) && $post->ID && $post->post_type == 'product' && $post->post_status == 'publish' ) {
 58: 				$product_id = $post->ID;
 59: 			}
 60: 		}
 61: 		$price_switcher = '';
 62: 		if ( $product_id ) {
 63: 			$product          = wc_get_product( $product_id );
 64: 			$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
 65: 			$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 66: 			$country          = $this->settings->get_country_data( $current_currency );
 67: 			$list_currencies  = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 68: 			$class            = array( 'wmc-price-switcher' );
 69: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'wmc-flags', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'flags-64.min.css', [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 70: 			ob_start();
 71: 			?>
 72:             <div class="woo-multi-currency <?php echo esc_attr( implode( ' ', $class ) ) ?>"
 73:                  id="<?php echo esc_attr( self::get_shortcode_id() ) ?>"
 74:                  title="<?php esc_attr_e( 'Please select your currency', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ?>">
 75:                 <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper">
 76:                         <span class="wmc-current-currency">
 77:                           <i style="transform: scale(0.8);"
 78:                              class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "></i>
 79:                         </span>
 80:                     <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
 81: 						<?php
 82: 						foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
 83: 							$sub_class = array( 'wmc-currency' );
 84: 							if ( $k === $current_currency ) {
 85: 								$sub_class[] = 'wmc-sub-currency-current';
 86: 							}
 87: 							$country = $this->settings->get_country_data( $k );
 88: 							?>
 89:                             <div class="<?php echo esc_attr( implode( ' ', $sub_class ) ) ?>"
 90:                                  data-currency="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>">
 91:                                 <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
 92:                                         title="<?php echo esc_attr( $country['name'] ) ?>"
 93:                                         href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>"
 94:                                         class="wmc-currency-redirect" data-currency="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>">
 95:                                     <i style="transform: scale(0.8);"
 96:                                        class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "></i>
 97: 									<?php
 98: 									switch ( $this->settings->get_price_switcher() ) {
 99: 										case 2:
100: 											echo '<span class="wmc-price-switcher-code">' . esc_html( $k ) . '</span>';
101: 											break;
102: 										case 3:
103: 											$decimals           = (int) $list_currencies[ $k ]['decimals'];
104: 											$decimal_separator  = wc_get_price_decimal_separator();
105: 											$thousand_separator = wc_get_price_thousand_separator();
106: 											$symbol             = $list_currencies[ $k ]['custom'];
107: 											$symbol             = $symbol ? $symbol : get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k );
108: 											$format             = self::get_price_format( $list_currencies[ $k ]['pos'] );
109: 											$price              = 0;
110: 											$max_price          = '';
111: 											$custom_symbol      = strpos( $symbol, '#PRICE#' );
112: 											if ( $product->get_type() === 'variable' ) {
113: 												$price     = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Price::get_variation_min_price( $product, $k );
114: 												$price_max = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Price::get_variation_max_price( $product, $k );
115: 												if ( $price_max > $price ) {
116: 													$price_max = number_format( wc_get_price_to_display( $product, array(
117: 														'qty'   => 1,
118: 														'price' => $price_max
119: 													) ), $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
120: 													if ( $custom_symbol === false ) {
121: 														$max_price = ' - ' . sprintf( $format, $symbol, $price_max );
122: 													} else {
123: 														$max_price = ' - ' . str_replace( '#PRICE#', $price_max, $symbol );
124: 													}
125: 												}
126: 											} else {
127: 												if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
128: 													$product_id    = $product->get_id();
129: 													$product_price = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
130: 													$sale_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( self::format_json_price_meta( $product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ) ) );
131: 													if ( isset( $product_price[ $k ] ) && ! $product->is_on_sale( 'edit' ) && $product_price[ $k ] > 0 ) {
132: 														$price = $product_price[ $k ];
133: 													} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $k ] ) && $sale_price[ $k ] > 0 ) {
134: 														$price = $sale_price[ $k ];
135: 													}
136: 												}
137: 											}
138: 											if ( ! $price && $product->get_price( 'edit' ) ) {
139: 												$price = $product->get_price( 'edit' );
140: 												$price = number_format( wmc_get_price( wc_get_price_to_display( $product, array(
141: 													'qty'   => 1,
142: 													'price' => $price
143: 												) ), $k ), $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
144: 											} else {
145: 												$price = number_format( wc_get_price_to_display( $product, array(
146: 													'qty'   => 1,
147: 													'price' => $price
148: 												) ), $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
149: 											}
150: 
151: 											if ( $custom_symbol === false ) {
152: 												$formatted_price = sprintf( $format, $symbol, $price );
153: 											} else {
154: 												$formatted_price = str_replace( '#PRICE#', $price, $symbol );
155: 											}
156: 											echo '<span class="wmc-price-switcher-price">' . wp_kses_post( $formatted_price ) . wp_kses_post( $max_price ) . '</span>';
157: 									}
158: 									?>
159:                                 </a>
160:                             </div>
161: 							<?php
162: 						}
163: 						?>
164:                     </div>
165:                 </div>
166:             </div>
167: 			<?php
168: 			$price_switcher = ob_get_clean();
169: 		}
170: 
171: 		return $price_switcher;
172: 	}

174: 	/**
175: 	 * Shortcode Currency selector
176: 	 */
177: 	public function shortcode_woo_multi_currency() {
178: 		$args = array( 'settings' => WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins(), 'shortcode' => 'default' );
179: 		ob_start();
180: 		wmc_get_template( 'woo-multi-currency-selector.php', $args );
181: 
182: 		return ob_get_clean();
183: 	}

185: 	/**
186: 	 * Replace shortcode
187: 	 *
188: 	 * @param $shortcode
189: 	 * @param $data
190: 	 *
191: 	 * @return string
192: 	 */
193: 	public function replace_shortcode( $shortcode, $data ) {
194: 		$layout    = isset( $data['layout'] ) ? $data['layout'] : '';
195: 		$flag_size = isset( $data['flag_size'] ) ? $data['flag_size'] : '';
196: 		$attr      = '';
197: 		if ( $flag_size ) {
198: 			$attr = 'flag_size =1';
199: 		}
200: 		if ( $layout ) {
201: 			$shortcode = '[woo_multi_currency_' . $layout . ' ' . $attr . ']';
202: 		}
203: 
204: 		return $shortcode;
205: 	}
206: 
207: 	/**
208: 	 * Shortcode show list currency rates
209: 	 *
210: 	 * @param      $atts
211: 	 * @param null $content
212: 	 *
213: 	 * @return float|int|string
214: 	 */
215: 	public function woo_multi_currency_rates( $atts, $content = null ) {
216: 		extract(
217: 			shortcode_atts(
218: 				array(
219: 					'currencies' => '',
220: 				), $atts
221: 			)
222: 		);
223: 		if ( $currencies ) {
224: 			$currencies = array_map( 'strtoupper', array_map( 'trim', array_filter( explode( ',', $currencies ) ) ) );
225: 		} else {
226: 			$currencies = array();
227: 		}
228: 		$list_currencies  = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
229: 		$currency_default = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
230: 		ob_start(); ?>
231:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode wmc-list-currency-rates">
232: 			<?php
233: 			if ( count( $currencies ) ) {
234: 				foreach ( $currencies as $currency ) {
235: 					if ( array_key_exists( $currency, $list_currencies ) ) {
236: 						if ( $currency == $currency_default ) {
237: 							continue;
238: 						} ?>
239:                         <div class="wmc-currency-rate">
240: 							<?php echo esc_html( $currency_default . '/' . $currency ) ?> = <?php
241: 
242: 							echo esc_html( $list_currencies[ $currency ]['rate'] );
243: 							?>
244:                         </div>
245: 					<?php }
246: 				}
247: 			} else {
248: 				foreach ( $list_currencies as $key => $currency ) {
249: 					if ( $key == $currency_default ) {
250: 						continue;
251: 					} ?>
252:                     <div class="wmc-currency-rate">
253: 						<?php echo esc_html( $currency_default . '/' . $key ) ?> = <?php
254: 						echo esc_html( $currency['rate'] );
255: 						?>
256:                     </div>
257: 				<?php }
258: 			} ?>
259:         </div>
260: 		<?php
261: 		return ob_get_clean();
262: 	}
263: 
264: 	/**
265: 	 * Shortcode exchange
266: 	 *
267: 	 * @param      $atts
268: 	 * @param null $content
269: 	 *
270: 	 * @return float|int|string
271: 	 */
272: 	public function woo_multi_currency_exchange( $atts ) {
273: 		global $product;
274: 		extract(
275: 			shortcode_atts(
276: 				array(
277: 					'price'          => '',
278: 					'original_price' => '',
279: 					'currency'       => '',
280: 					'product_id'     => '',
281: 					'keep_format'    => 1,
282: 				), $atts
283: 			)
284: 		);
285: 		if ( $product_id ) {
286: 			$product_obj = wc_get_product( $product_id );
287: 		} elseif ( ! $price ) {
288: 			$product_obj = $product;
289: 		}
290: 		if ( isset( $product_obj ) && is_a( $product_obj, 'WC_Product' ) ) {
291: 			if ( $keep_format && ! $currency || $currency === $this->settings->get_current_currency() ) {
292: 				$price = $product_obj->get_price_html();
293: 
294: 				return $price;
295: 			} else {
296: 				$price = $product_obj->get_price( 'edit' );
297: 				if ( $product_obj->is_on_sale() ) {
298: 					$original_price = $product_obj->get_regular_price( 'edit' );
299: 				}
300: 			}
301: 		}
302: 		if ( $price ) {
303: 			$product_id = esc_attr( $product_id );
304: 			$keep_format = esc_attr( $keep_format );
305: 			$price = esc_attr( $price );
306: 			$original_price = esc_attr( $original_price );
307: 			$currency = esc_attr( $currency );
308: 			$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
309: 			if ( $currency && isset( $selected_currencies[ $currency ] ) && is_array( $selected_currencies[ $currency ] ) ) {
310: 				$data   = $selected_currencies[ $currency ];
311: 				$format = self::get_price_format( $data['pos'] );
312: 				$args   = array(
313: 					'currency'     => $currency,
314: 					'price_format' => $format
315: 				);
316: 				if ( $data['decimals'] ) {
317: 					$args['decimals'] = $data['decimals'];
318: 				}
319: 
320: 				if ( $original_price && $original_price > $price ) {
321: 					$this->price_args = $args;
322: 					add_filter( 'wc_price_args', array(
323: 						$this,
324: 						'change_price_format_by_specific_currency'
325: 					), PHP_INT_MAX );
326: 					$price_html = wc_format_sale_price( wmc_get_price( $original_price, $currency ), wmc_get_price( $price, $currency ) );
327: 					remove_filter( 'wc_price_args', array(
328: 						$this,
329: 						'change_price_format_by_specific_currency'
330: 					), PHP_INT_MAX );
331: 					$this->price_args = array();
332: 
333: 					return "<span class='wmc-cache-value' data-product_id='{$product_id}' data-keep_format='{$keep_format}' data-price='{$price}' data-original_price='{$original_price}' data-currency='{$currency}' >" . $price_html . '</span>';
334: 				} else {
335: 					return "<span class='wmc-cache-value' data-product_id='{$product_id}' data-keep_format='{$keep_format}' data-price='{$price}' data-original_price='{$original_price}' data-currency='{$currency}' >" . wc_price( wmc_get_price( $price, $currency ), $args ) . '</span>';
336: 				}
337: 
338: 			} else {
339: 				if ( $original_price && $original_price > $price ) {
340: 					return "<span class='wmc-cache-value' data-product_id='{$product_id}' data-keep_format='{$keep_format}' data-price='{$price}' data-original_price='{$original_price}' data-currency='{$currency}' >" . wc_format_sale_price( wmc_get_price( $original_price ), wmc_get_price( $price ) ) . '</span>';
341: 				} else {
342: 					return "<span class='wmc-cache-value' data-product_id='{$product_id}' data-keep_format='{$keep_format}' data-price='{$price}' data-original_price='{$original_price}' data-currency='{$currency}' >" . wc_price( wmc_get_price( $price ) ) . '</span>';
343: 				}
344: 			}
345: 		} else {
346: 			return '';
347: 		}
348: 	}
349: 
350: 	public function change_price_format_by_specific_currency( $args ) {
351: 		if ( count( $this->price_args ) ) {
352: 			$args = wp_parse_args(
353: 				$this->price_args,
354: 				$args );
355: 		}
356: 
357: 		return $args;
358: 	}
359: 
360: 	public function shortcode_plain_vertical_2( $atts, $content = null ) {
361: 		$args = array( 'settings' => WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins(), 'shortcode' => 'listbox_code' );
362: 		ob_start();
363: 		wmc_get_template( 'woo-multi-currency-selector.php', $args );
364: 
365: 		return ob_get_clean();
366: 	}
367: 
368: 	/**
369: 	 * Shortcode plain horizontal
370: 	 * @return string
371: 	 */
372: 	public function shortcode_plain_horizontal( $atts, $content = null ) {
373: 
374: 		extract(
375: 			shortcode_atts(
376: 				array(
377: 					'title' => ''
378: 				), $atts
379: 			)
380: 		);
381: 		ob_start();
382: 		if ( $title ) {
383: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
384: 		}
385: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
386: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
387: 		?>
388:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-horizontal" data-layout="plain_horizontal">
389:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
390: 			<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
391: 				if ( $current_currency ) {
392: 					if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
393: 						$class = "wmc-active";
394: 					} else {
395: 						$class = '';
396: 					}
397: 				}
398: 
399: 				/*End override*/
400: 				?>
401:                 <div class="wmc-currency <?php echo esc_attr( $class ) ?>">
402: 
403:                     <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
404:                             href="<?php echo $class ? '#' : esc_url( $link ) ?>">
405: 
406: 						<?php echo esc_html( $k ) ?>
407:                     </a>
408:                 </div>
409: 			<?php } ?>
410:         </div>
411: 		<?php
412: 
413: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
414: 
415: 		return $html;
416: 	}
417: 
418: 	/**
419: 	 * Plain vertical
420: 	 *
421: 	 * @param      $atts
422: 	 * @param null $content
423: 	 *
424: 	 * @return string
425: 	 */
426: 	public function shortcode_plain_vertical( $atts, $content = null ) {
427: 
428: 		extract(
429: 			shortcode_atts(
430: 				array(
431: 					'title' => '',
432: 				), $atts
433: 			)
434: 		);
435: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
436: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
437: 		ob_start();
438: 		if ( $title ) {
439: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
440: 		}
441: 		?>
442:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-vertical" data-layout="plain_vertical">
443:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
444:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper" onclick="">
445: 				<span class="wmc-current-currency">
446: 					<?php echo esc_html( $current_currency ) ?>
447:                     <span class="wmc-current-currency-arrow"></span>
448: 				</span>
449: 		        <?php if ( ! empty( $links ) ) { ?>
450:                 <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
451: 					<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
452: 						if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
453: 							continue;
454: 						}
455: 						?>
456:                         <div class="wmc-currency">
457: 
458:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
459:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>">
460: 
461: 								<?php echo esc_html( $k ) ?></a>
462:                         </div>
463: 					<?php } ?>
464:                 </div>
465: 		        <?php } ?>
466:             </div>
467:         </div>
468: 		<?php
469: 
470: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
471: 
472: 		return $html;
473: 	}
474: 
475: 	/**
476: 	 * List Flag Horizontal
477: 	 *
478: 	 * @param      $atts
479: 	 * @param null $content
480: 	 *
481: 	 * @return string
482: 	 */
483: 	public function shortcode_layout3( $atts, $content = null ) {
484: 		$this->enqueue_flag_css();
485: 		extract(
486: 			shortcode_atts(
487: 				array(
488: 					'title'     => '',
489: 					'flag_size' => 0.5
490: 				), $atts
491: 			)
492: 		);
493: 
494: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
495: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
496: 		ob_start();
497: 		if ( $title ) {
498: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
499: 		}
500: 		$class = '';
501: 		?>
502:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-horizontal layout3 <?php echo esc_attr( $class ) ?>"
503:              data-layout="layout3">
504:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
505: 			<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
506: 				if ( $current_currency ) {
507: 					if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
508: 						$class = "wmc-active";
509: 					} else {
510: 						$class = '';
511: 					}
512: 				}
513: 				/*End override*/
514: 				$country = $this->settings->get_country_data( $k );
515: 				?>
516:                 <div class="wmc-currency <?php echo esc_attr( $class ) ?>">
517: 
518:                     <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
519:                             title="<?php echo esc_attr( $country['name'] ) ?>"
520:                             href="<?php echo $class ? '#' : esc_url( $link ) ?>">
521:                         <i style="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->fix_style( $flag_size ) ) ?>"
522:                            class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "></i>
523:                     </a>
524:                 </div>
525: 			<?php } ?>
526:         </div>
527: 		<?php
528: 
529: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
530: 
531: 		return $html;
532: 	}
533: 
534: 	public function enqueue_flag_css() {
535: 		if ( WP_DEBUG ) {
536: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'wmc-flags', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'flags-64.css', [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
537: 		} else {
538: 			wp_enqueue_style( 'wmc-flags', WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_CSS . 'flags-64.min.css', [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
539: 		}
540: 	}
541: 
542: 	public function fix_style( $flag_size ) {
543: 		$margin_width = ( 60 - 60 * $flag_size ) / 2;
544: 		$margin_heigh = ( 40 - 40 * $flag_size ) / 2;
545: 		$style        = "transform: scale({$flag_size}); margin: -{$margin_heigh}px -{$margin_width}px";
546: 
547: 		return $style;
548: 	}
549: 
550: 	/**
551: 	 * List Flags vertical
552: 	 *
553: 	 * @param      $atts
554: 	 * @param null $content
555: 	 *
556: 	 * @return string
557: 	 */
558: 	public function shortcode_layout4( $atts, $content = null ) {
559: 		$this->enqueue_flag_css();
560: 		extract(
561: 			shortcode_atts(
562: 				array(
563: 					'title'     => '',
564: 					'flag_size' => 0.5
565: 				), $atts
566: 			)
567: 		);
568: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
569: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
570: 		$country          = $this->settings->get_country_data( $current_currency );
571: 		ob_start();
572: 		if ( $title ) {
573: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
574: 		}
575: 		$class = '';
576: 		?>
577:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-vertical layout4 <?php echo esc_attr( $class ) ?>"
578:              data-layout="layout4" data-flag_size="<?php echo esc_attr( $flag_size ) ?>">
579:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
580:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper" onclick="">
581: 				<span class="wmc-current-currency">
582: 				  <i style="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->fix_style( $flag_size ) ) ?>"
583:                      data-flag_size="<?php echo esc_attr( $flag_size ) ?>"
584:                      class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "> </i>
585:                     <span class="wmc-current-currency-arrow"></span>
586: 				</span>
587: 		        <?php if ( ! empty( $links ) ) { ?>
588:                 <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
589: 					<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
590: 						if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
591: 							continue;
592: 						}
593: 						/*End override*/
594: 						$country = $this->settings->get_country_data( $k );
595: 						?>
596:                         <div class="wmc-currency">
597: 
598:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
599:                                     title="<?php echo esc_attr( $country['name'] ) ?>"
600:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>">
601: 
602:                                 <i style="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->fix_style( $flag_size ) ) ?>"
603:                                    alt="<?php echo esc_attr( $country['name'] ) ?>"
604:                                    class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "> </i>
605:                             </a>
606:                         </div>
607: 					<?php } ?>
608:                 </div>
609: 		        <?php } ?>
610:             </div>
611:         </div>
612: 		<?php
613: 
614: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
615: 
616: 		return $html;
617: 	}

619: 	/**
620: 	 * List Flags + Currency code
621: 	 *
622: 	 * @param      $atts
623: 	 * @param null $content
624: 	 *
625: 	 * @return string
626: 	 */
627: 	public function shortcode_layout5( $atts, $content = null ) {
628: 		$this->enqueue_flag_css();
629: 		extract(
630: 			shortcode_atts(
631: 				array(
632: 					'title'     => '',
633: 					'flag_size' => 0.5
634: 				), $atts
635: 			)
636: 		);
637: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
638: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
639: 		$country          = $this->settings->get_country_data( $current_currency );
640: 		ob_start();
641: 		if ( $title ) {
642: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
643: 		}
644: 		$class = '';
645: 		?>
646:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-vertical layout5 <?php echo esc_attr( $class ) ?>"
647:              data-layout="layout5">
648:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
649:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper" onclick="">
650: 				<span class="wmc-current-currency" style="line-height: <?php echo esc_attr( $flag_size * 40 ) ?>px">
651:                        <i style="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->fix_style( $flag_size ) ) ?>"
652:                           class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "> </i>
653:                       <span>
654:                         <?php echo esc_html( $current_currency ) ?>
655:                     </span>
656:                     <span class="wmc-current-currency-arrow"></span>
657: 				</span>
658: 		        <?php if ( ! empty( $links ) ) { ?>
659:                 <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
660: 					<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
661: 						if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
662: 							continue;
663: 						}
664: 
665: 						/*End override*/
666: 						$country = $this->settings->get_country_data( $k );
667: 
668: 						?>
669:                         <div class="wmc-currency">
670: 
671:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
672:                                     title="<?php echo esc_attr( $country['name'] ) ?>"
673:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>">
674:                                 <i style="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->fix_style( $flag_size ) ) ?>"
675:                                    class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) ?> "> </i>
676:                                 <span>
677: 									<?php echo esc_html( $k ) ?>
678: 								</span>
679:                             </a>
680:                         </div>
681: 					<?php } ?>
682:                 </div>
683: 		        <?php } ?>
684:             </div>
685:         </div>
686: 		<?php
687: 
688: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
689: 
690: 		return $html;
691: 	}

693: 	/**
694: 	 * Shortcode pain horizontal currencies
695: 	 * @return string
696: 	 */
697: 	public function shortcode_layout6( $atts, $content = null ) {
698: 
699: 		extract(
700: 			shortcode_atts(
701: 				array(
702: 					'title' => '',
703: 				), $atts
704: 			)
705: 		);
706: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
707: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
708: 		ob_start();
709: 		if ( $title ) {
710: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
711: 		}
712: 		?>
713:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-horizontal layout6" data-layout="layout6">
714:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
715: 			<?php
716: 			foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
717: 				if ( $current_currency ) {
718: 					if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
719: 						$class = "wmc-active";
720: 					} else {
721: 						$class = '';
722: 					}
723: 				}
724: 				?>
725:                 <div class="wmc-currency <?php echo esc_attr( $class ) ?>">
726: 
727:                     <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
728:                             href="<?php echo $class ? '#' : esc_url( $link ) ?>">
729: 
730: 						<?php echo wp_kses_post( get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k ) ) ?></a>
731:                 </div>
732: 			<?php } ?>
733:         </div>
734: 		<?php
735: 
736: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
737: 
738: 		return $html;
739: 	}

741: 	/**
742: 	 * Pain vertical currency symbols
743: 	 *
744: 	 * @param      $atts
745: 	 * @param null $content
746: 	 *
747: 	 * @return string
748: 	 */
749: 	public function shortcode_layout7( $atts, $content = null ) {
750: 
751: 		extract(
752: 			shortcode_atts(
753: 				array(
754: 					'title' => '',
755: 				), $atts
756: 			)
757: 		);
758: 		ob_start();
759: 		if ( $title ) {
760: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
761: 		}
762: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
763: 		$symbol           = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $current_currency );
764: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
765: 		?>
766:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-vertical vertical-currency-symbols" data-layout="layout7">
767:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
768:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper" onclick="">
769: 				<span class="wmc-current-currency">
770: 					<?php echo wp_kses_post( $symbol ) ?>
771:                     <span class="wmc-current-currency-arrow"></span>
772: 				</span>
773: 		        <?php if ( ! empty( $links ) ) { ?>
774:                 <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
775: 					<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
776: 
777: 						if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
778: 							continue;
779: 						}
780: 						?>
781:                         <div class="wmc-currency">
782: 
783:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
784:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>">
785: 
786: 								<?php echo esc_attr( get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k ) ); ?></a>
787:                         </div>
788: 					<?php } ?>
789:                 </div>
790: 		        <?php } ?>
791:             </div>
792:         </div>
793: 		<?php
794: 
795: 		$html = ob_get_clean();
796: 
797: 		return $html;
798: 	}
799: 
800: 	public function shortcode_layout8( $atts, $content = null ) {
801: 		ob_start();
802: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
803: 		$symbol           = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $current_currency );
804: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
805: 		$fix_class        = ctype_alpha( substr( $symbol, 0, 2 ) ) && strlen( $symbol ) >= 3 ? 'wmc-fix-font' : '';
806: 		?>
807:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode vertical-currency-symbols-circle" data-layout="layout8">
808:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
809:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper" onclick="">
810: 				<span class="wmc-current-currency <?php echo esc_attr( $fix_class ) ?>">
811: 					<?php echo wp_kses_post( $symbol ) ?>
812: 				</span>
813: 
814: 		        <?php if ( ! empty( $links ) ) { ?>
815:                 <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
816: 					<?php foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
817: 						if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
818: 							continue;
819: 						}
820: 						?>
821:                         <div class="wmc-currency">
822: 							<?php
823: 							$symbol    = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k );
824: 							$fix_class = ctype_alpha( substr( $symbol, 0, 2 ) ) && strlen( $symbol ) >= 3 ? 'wmc-fix-font' : '';
825: 							?>
826:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
827:                                     class="<?php echo esc_attr( $fix_class ) ?>"
828:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>"><?php echo wp_kses_post( $symbol ) ?></a>
829:                         </div>
830: 					<?php } ?>
831:                 </div>
832: 		        <?php } ?>
833:             </div>
834:         </div>
835: 		<?php
836: 
837: 		return ob_get_clean();
838: 	}
839: 
840: 	public function shortcode_layout9( $atts, $content = null ) {
841: 		$current_currency     = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
842: 		$links                = $this->settings->get_links();
843: 		$current_currency_pos = array_search( $current_currency, array_keys( $links ), true );
844: 		$left_arr             = array_slice( $links, 0, $current_currency_pos );
845: 		$right_arr            = array_slice( $links, $current_currency_pos );
846: 		ob_start();
847: 		?>
848:         <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode layout9 " data-layout="layout9">
849:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_url( $this->current_url ) ?>">
850:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper">
851: 				<?php
852: 				if ( is_array( $left_arr ) && count( $left_arr ) ) {
853: 					$i = 0;
854: 					foreach ( $left_arr as $code => $link ) {
855: 						$symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $code );
856: 						?>
857:                         <div class="wmc-currency wmc-left" style="z-index: <?php echo esc_attr( $i ++ ) ?>">
858:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
859:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>"><?php echo wp_kses_post( $symbol ) ?></a>
860:                         </div>
861: 						<?php
862: 					}
863: 				}
864: 
865: 				if ( is_array( $right_arr ) && $i = count( $right_arr ) ) {
866: 					foreach ( $right_arr as $code => $link ) {
867: 						$active           = $current_currency == $code ? 'wmc-active' : '';
868: 						$z_index          = $current_currency == $code ? 999 : $i --;
869: 						$align            = $current_currency == $code ? 'wmc-current-currency' : 'wmc-right';
870: 						$symbol           = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $code );
871: 						$current_currency = $current_currency == $code && $current_currency != $symbol ? $current_currency : '';
872: 						?>
873:                         <div class="wmc-currency <?php echo esc_attr( $align ) . ' ' . esc_attr( $active ) ?>"
874:                              style="z-index: <?php echo esc_attr( $z_index ) ?>">
875:                             <a <?php echo esc_attr( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_rel_nofollow() ); ?>
876:                                     href="<?php echo esc_url( $link ) ?>"><?php echo wp_kses_post( "{$current_currency} {$symbol}" ) ?></a>
877:                         </div>
878: 						<?php
879: 					}
880: 				}
881: 				?>
882:             </div>
883:         </div>
884: 		<?php
885: 
886: 		return ob_get_clean();
887: 	}
888: 
889: 	public function shortcode_layout10( $atts, $content = null ) {
890: 		$this->enqueue_flag_css();
891: 
892: 		extract(
893: 			shortcode_atts(
894: 				array(
895: 					'title'     => '',
896: 					'flag_size' => 0.4,
897: 					'symbol'    => '',
898: 				), $atts
899: 			)
900: 		);
901: 
902: 		$links            = $this->settings->get_links();
903: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
904: 		ob_start();
905: 		if ( $title ) {
906: 			echo '<h3>' . esc_html( $title ) . '</h3>';
907: 		}
908: 		$data_flag_size = $flag_size;
909: 		$line_height    = ( $flag_size * 40 ) . 'px';
910: 
911: 		$countries = get_woocommerce_currencies();
912: 		$flag_size = $this->fix_style( $flag_size );
913: 		?>
914:         <div id="<?php echo esc_attr( self::get_shortcode_id() ) ?>"
915:              class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode plain-vertical layout10"
916:              data-layout="layout10" data-flag_size="<?php echo esc_attr( $data_flag_size ) ?>">
917:             <input type="hidden" class="wmc-current-url" value="<?php echo esc_attr( $this->current_url ) ?>">
918:             <div class="wmc-currency-wrapper">
919: 				<span class="wmc-current-currency" style="line-height: <?php echo esc_attr( $line_height ) ?>">
920:                     <?php
921:                     $country_data = $this->settings->get_country_data( $current_currency );
922:                     $country_code = strtolower( $country_data['code'] );
923:                     $symbol       = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $current_currency );
924:                     ?>
925:                     <span>
926:                         <i style="<?php echo esc_attr( $flag_size ) ?>"
927:                            class="vi-flag-64 flag-<?php echo esc_attr( $country_code ) ?>"> </i>
928:                         <span class="wmc-text wmc-text-<?php echo esc_attr( $current_currency ) ?>"><span
929:                                     class="wmc-text-currency-text">(<?php echo esc_html( $current_currency ) ?>) </span><?php echo wp_kses_post( $symbol ) ?></span>
930:                     </span>
931:                     <span class="wmc-current-currency-arrow"></span>
932:                 </span>
933:                 <?php if ( ! empty( $links ) ) { ?>
934:                 <div class="wmc-sub-currency">
935: 					<?php
936: 					foreach ( $links as $k => $link ) {
937: 						$sub_class = array( 'wmc-currency' );
938: 						if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
939: 							continue;
940: 						}
941: 						$country = $this->settings->get_country_data( $k );
942: 						?>
943:                         <div class="<?php echo esc_attr( implode( ' ', $sub_class ) ) ?>"
944:                              data-currency="<?php echo esc_attr( $k ) ?>">
945: 							<?php
946: 							$html   = '';
947: 							$symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $k );
948: 							$html   .= sprintf( "<a rel='nofollow' class='wmc-currency-redirect' href='%1s' style='line-height:%2s' data-currency='%3s' data-currency_symbol='%4s'>", esc_url( $link ), esc_attr( $line_height ), esc_attr( $k ), esc_attr( $symbol ) );
949: 							$html   .= sprintf( "<i style='%1s' class='vi-flag-64 flag-%2s'></i>", esc_attr( $flag_size ), esc_attr( strtolower( $country['code'] ) ) );
950: 							$html   .= sprintf( "<span class='wmc-sub-currency-name'>%1s</span>", esc_html( $countries[ $k ] ) );
951: 							$html   .= sprintf( "<span class='wmc-sub-currency-symbol'>(%1s)</span>", esc_html( $symbol ) );
952: 							$html   .= '</a>';
953: 							echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $html );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
954: 							?>
955:                         </div>
956: 						<?php
957: 					}
958: 					?>
959:                 </div>
960:                 <?php } ?>
961:             </div>
962:         </div>
963: 		<?php
964: 
965: 		return ob_get_clean();
966: 	}
967: 
968: 	private static function get_price_format( $pos ) {
969: 		switch ( $pos ) {
970: 			case 'left' :
971: 				$format = '%1$s%2$s';
972: 				break;
973: 			case 'right' :
974: 				$format = '%2$s%1$s';
975: 				break;
976: 			case 'left_space' :
977: 				$format = '%1$s&nbsp;%2$s';
978: 				break;
979: 			case 'right_space' :
980: 			default:
981: 				$format = '%2$s&nbsp;%1$s';
982: 				break;
983: 		}
984: 
985: 		return $format;
986: 	}
987: 
988: 	function format_json_price_meta( $price_meta ) {
989: 
990: 		return is_string( $price_meta ) ? json_decode( $price_meta, true ) : $price_meta;
991: 	}
992: 
993: }

================
File: code_3/frontend/symbol.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Symbol
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Symbol {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			/*Add order information*/
 17: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_thankyou_order_id', array( $this, 'add_order_currency_info' ), 9 );
 18: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_new_order', array( $this, 'add_order_currency_info' ) );
 19: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_currency', array( $this, 'woocommerce_currency' ), 99 );
 20: 			/**
 21: 			 * Format price
 22: 			 */
 23: 			add_filter( 'wc_get_price_decimals', array( $this, 'set_decimals' ) );
 24: 			/**
 25: 			 * Symbol position
 26: 			 */
 27: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_price_format', array( $this, 'price_format' ) );
 28: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_currency_symbol', array( $this, 'custom_currency_symbol' ), 11, 2 );
 29: 
 30: 			/*Custom Symbol*/
 31: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'init' ), 1 );
 32: 		}
 33: 	}
 34: 
 35: 	/**
 36: 	 *
 37: 	 */
 38: 	public function init() {
 39: 		if ( version_compare( WC_VERSION, '5.0', '<' ) ) {
 40: 			add_filter( 'wc_price', array( $this, 'custom_price' ), 10, 3 );
 41: 		} else {
 42: 			add_filter( 'wc_price', array( $this, 'custom_price_5' ), 10, 5 );
 43: 		}
 44: 	}
 45: 
 46: 	/**
 47: 	 * @param $return
 48: 	 * @param $price
 49: 	 * @param $args
 50: 	 *
 51: 	 * @return mixed
 52: 	 */
 53: 	public function custom_price( $return, $price, $args ) {
 54: 		extract(
 55: 			wp_parse_args(
 56: 				$args, array(
 57: 					'ex_tax_label'       => false,
 58: 					'currency'           => '',
 59: 					'decimal_separator'  => wc_get_price_decimal_separator(),
 60: 					'thousand_separator' => wc_get_price_thousand_separator(),
 61: 					'decimals'           => wc_get_price_decimals(),
 62: 					'price_format'       => get_woocommerce_price_format(),
 63: 				)
 64: 			)
 65: 		);
 66: 
 67: 		$unformatted_price = $price;
 68: 		$negative          = $price < 0;
 69: 
 70: 		$currency_symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $currency );
 71: 		$pos             = strpos( $currency_symbol, '#PRICE#' );
 72: 		if ( $pos === false ) {
 73: 			$formatted_price = ( $negative ? '-' : '' ) . sprintf( $price_format, '<span class="woocommerce-Price-currencySymbol">' . $currency_symbol . '</span>', $price );
 74: 		} else {
 75: 			$formatted_price = str_replace( '#PRICE#', $price, $currency_symbol );
 76: 
 77: 		}
 78: 
 79: 		$return = '<span class="woocommerce-Price-amount amount">' . $formatted_price . '</span>';
 80: 
 81: 		if ( $ex_tax_label && wc_tax_enabled() ) {
 82: 			$return .= ' <small class="woocommerce-Price-taxLabel tax_label">' . WC()->countries->ex_tax_or_vat() . '</small>';
 83: 		}
 84: 
 85: 		/**
 86: 		 * Filters the string of price markup.
 87: 		 *
 88: 		 * @param string $return Price HTML markup.
 89: 		 * @param string $price Formatted price.
 90: 		 * @param array $args Pass on the args.
 91: 		 * @param float $unformatted_price Price as float to allow plugins custom formatting. Since 3.2.0.
 92: 		 */
 93: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_wc_price', $return, $price, $args, $unformatted_price );
 94: 	}
 95: 
 96: 	/**
 97: 	 * @param $return
 98: 	 * @param $price
 99: 	 * @param $args
100: 	 * @param $unformatted_price
101: 	 * @param $original_prices
102: 	 *
103: 	 * @return mixed|void
104: 	 */
105: 	public function custom_price_5( $return, $price, $args, $unformatted_price, $original_prices ) {
106: 		extract(
107: 			wp_parse_args(
108: 				$args, array(
109: 					'ex_tax_label'       => false,
110: 					'currency'           => '',
111: 					'decimal_separator'  => wc_get_price_decimal_separator(),
112: 					'thousand_separator' => wc_get_price_thousand_separator(),
113: 					'decimals'           => wc_get_price_decimals(),
114: 					'price_format'       => get_woocommerce_price_format(),
115: 				)
116: 			)
117: 		);
118: 		$negative        = $original_prices < 0;
119: 		$currency_symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $currency );
120: 		$pos             = strpos( $currency_symbol, '#PRICE#' );
121: 		if ( $pos === false ) {
122: 			$formatted_price = ( $negative ? '- ' : '' ) . sprintf( $price_format, '<span class="woocommerce-Price-currencySymbol">' . $currency_symbol . '</span>', $price );
123: 		} else {
124: 			$formatted_price = str_replace( '#PRICE#', $price, $currency_symbol );
125: 
126: 		}
127: 
128: 		$return = '<span class="woocommerce-Price-amount amount">' . $formatted_price . '</span>';
129: 
130: 		if ( $ex_tax_label && wc_tax_enabled() ) {
131: 			$return .= ' <small class="woocommerce-Price-taxLabel tax_label">' . WC()->countries->ex_tax_or_vat() . '</small>';
132: 		}
133: 
134: 		/**
135: 		 * Filters the string of price markup.
136: 		 *
137: 		 * @param string $return Price HTML markup.
138: 		 * @param string $price Formatted price.
139: 		 * @param array $args Pass on the args.
140: 		 * @param float $unformatted_price Price as float to allow plugins custom formatting. Since 3.2.0.
141: 		 * @param float $original_prices Since WC 5.0.
142: 		 */
143: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_wc_price', $return, $price, $args, $unformatted_price, $original_prices );
144: 	}
145: 
146: 	/**
147: 	 * Custom current symbol
148: 	 *
149: 	 * @param $currency_symbol
150: 	 * @param $currency
151: 	 *
152: 	 * @return mixed
153: 	 */
154: 	public function custom_currency_symbol( $currency_symbol, $currency ) {
155: 		if ( is_admin() && ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
156: 			return $currency_symbol;
157: 		}
158: 		$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
159: 		if ( is_account_page() ) {
160: 			return $currency_symbol;
161: 		} elseif ( isset( $selected_currencies[ $currency ] ) && isset( $selected_currencies[ $currency ]['custom'] ) && $selected_currencies[ $currency ]['custom'] != '' ) {
162: 
163: 			$currency_symbol = $selected_currencies[ $currency ]['custom'];
164: 
165: 		}
166: 
167: 		return $currency_symbol;
168: 	}
169: 
170: 	/**
171: 	 * @param $data
172: 	 *
173: 	 * @return mixed|string|void
174: 	 */
175: 	public function woocommerce_currency( $data ) {
176: 
177: 		if ( is_admin() && ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
178: 			return $data;
179: 		}
180: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() ) {
181: 			$data = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
182: 		}
183: 
184: 		return $data;
185: 	}
186: 
187: 	/**
188: 	 * Insert information about order after checkout
189: 	 *
190: 	 * @param $order_id
191: 	 *
192: 	 * @return mixed
193: 	 */
194: 	public function add_order_currency_info( $order_id ) {
195: 		$wc_order = wc_get_product( $order_id );
196: 		if ( $wc_order && ! $wc_order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true ) ) {
197: 			$wmc_order_info = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
198: 
199: 			$wmc_order_info[ $this->settings->get_default_currency() ]['is_main'] = 1;
200: 			$wc_order->update_meta_data('wmc_order_info', $wmc_order_info );
201: 			$wc_order->save_meta_data();
202: 		}
203: 
204: 		return $order_id;
205: 	}
206: 
207: 	/**
208: 	 * @param $format
209: 	 *
210: 	 * @return string
211: 	 */
212: 	public function price_format( $format ) {
213: 		$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
214: 		$currencies          = $this->settings->get_currencies();
215: 		if ( is_order_received_page() ) {
216: 			global $wp;
217: 			$order_id = $wp->query_vars['order-received'];
218: 			$order    = wc_get_order( $order_id );
219: 			if ( is_object( $order ) ) {
220: 				$currency    = $order->get_currency();
221: 				$current_pos = $selected_currencies[ $currency ]['pos'];
222: 			} else {
223: 				return $format;
224: 			}
225: 
226: 		} elseif ( in_array( $this->settings->get_current_currency(), $currencies ) ) {
227: 			$current_pos = $selected_currencies[ $this->settings->get_current_currency() ]['pos'];
228: 		} else {
229: 			return $format;
230: 		}
231: 
232: 		switch ( $current_pos ) {
233: 			case 'left' :
234: 				$format = '%1$s%2$s';
235: 				break;
236: 			case 'right' :
237: 				$format = '%2$s%1$s';
238: 				break;
239: 			case 'left_space' :
240: 				$format = '%1$s&nbsp;%2$s';
241: 				break;
242: 			case 'right_space' :
243: 				$format = '%2$s&nbsp;%1$s';
244: 				break;
245: 		}
246: 
247: 		return $format;
248: 	}
249: 
250: 	/**
251: 	 * @param $decimal
252: 	 *
253: 	 * @return int
254: 	 */
255: 	public function set_decimals( $decimal ) {
256: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_symbol' ) ) {
257: 			return (int) $decimal;
258: 		}
259: 
260: 		global $pagenow;
261: 		if ( $pagenow === 'admin-ajax.php' && isset( $_REQUEST['action'] ) && $_REQUEST['action'] === 'generate_wpo_wcpdf' && isset( $_REQUEST['order_ids'] ) && $_REQUEST['order_ids'] ) {
262: 			$order_id       = intval( $_REQUEST['order_ids'] );
263: //			$wc_order       = wc_get_product( $order_id );
264: //			if ( $wc_order && is_object( $wc_order ) ) {
265: //				$order_currency = $wc_order->get_meta( '_order_currency', true );
266: //				$order_info     = $wc_order->get_meta( 'wmc_order_info', true );
267: //			} else {
268: 				$order_currency = get_post_meta( $order_id, '_order_currency', true );
269: 				$order_info     = get_post_meta( $order_id, 'wmc_order_info', true );
270: //			}
271: 			if ( isset( $order_info[ $order_currency ]['decimals'] ) ) {
272: 				return $order_info[ $order_currency ]['decimals'];
273: 			}
274: 		}
275: 		$selected_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
276: 		$current_currency    = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
277: 		$decimal             = isset( $selected_currencies[ $current_currency ]['decimals'] ) ? $selected_currencies[ $current_currency ]['decimals'] : 0;
278: 		$decimal             = apply_filters( 'wmc_set_decimals', $decimal, $current_currency );
279: 
280: 		return (int) $decimal;
281: 	}
282: }

================
File: code_3/includes/elementor/elementor.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 3: 	exit;
 4: } // Exit if accessed directly
 5: if ( ! is_plugin_active( 'elementor/elementor.php' ) ) {
 6: 	return;
 7: }
 8: // The Widget_Base class is not available immediately after plugins are loaded, so
 9: // we delay the class' use until Elementor widgets are registered
10: add_action( 'elementor/widgets/widgets_registered', function () {
11: 	require_once( 'widget.php' );
12: 
13: 	$drop_down_widget = new WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_Elementor_Widget();
14: 
15: // Let Elementor know about our widget
16: 	if ( version_compare( ELEMENTOR_VERSION, '3.5.0', '>=' )){
17: 		Elementor\Plugin::instance()->widgets_manager->register( $drop_down_widget );
18: 	}else {
19: 		Elementor\Plugin::instance()->widgets_manager->register_widget_type( $drop_down_widget );
20: 	}
21: } );

================
File: code_3/includes/elementor/widget.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: use Elementor\Repeater;
  4: use Elementor\Widget_Base;
  5: 
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: } // Exit if accessed directly
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_Elementor_Widget extends Widget_Base {
 11: 
 12: 	public static $slug = 'wmc-multi-currency-elementor-widget';
 13: 
 14: 	public function __construct( $data = [], $args = null ) {
 15: 		parent::__construct( $data, $args );
 16: 		add_action( 'elementor/editor/before_enqueue_styles', array( $this, 'enqueue' ) );
 17: 	}
 18: 
 19: 	public function enqueue() {
 20: 		wp_register_style( 'wmc-elementor-style', false, [], WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION );
 21: 		wp_enqueue_style( 'wmc-elementor-style' );
 22: 		$css = ".wmc-multi-currency-icon{
 23: 				display:block;height:28px;background-image: url('" . WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_IMAGES . "icon_elementor.svg');
 24: 				background-position: center; background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size: contain;}";
 25: 		wp_add_inline_style( 'wmc-elementor-style', $css );
 26: 	}
 27: 
 28: 	public function get_name() {
 29: 		return 'woocommerce-multi-currency';
 30: 	}
 31: 
 32: 	public function get_title() {
 33: 		return esc_html__( 'Multi Currency', 'woo-multi-currency' );
 34: 	}
 35: 
 36: 	public function get_icon() {
 37: 		return "wmc-multi-currency-icon";
 38: 	}
 39: 
 40: 	public function get_categories() {
 41: 		return [ 'woocommerce-elements' ];
 42: 	}
 43: 
 44: 	protected function register_controls() {
 45: 		$this->start_controls_section(
 46: 			'general',
 47: 			[
 48: 				'label' => esc_html__( 'General', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 49: 				'tab'   => \Elementor\Controls_Manager::TAB_CONTENT,
 50: 			]
 51: 		);
 52: 
 53: 		$this->add_control(
 54: 			'layout',
 55: 			[
 56: 				'label'       => esc_html__( 'Select switcher layout', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 57: 				'type'        => \Elementor\Controls_Manager::SELECT,
 58: 				'label_block' => true,
 59: 				'options'     => [
 60: 					''                 => esc_html__( 'Default', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 61: 					'plain_horizontal' => esc_html__( 'Plain Horizontal', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 62: 					'plain_vertical'   => esc_html__( 'Plain Vertical', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 63: 					'plain_vertical_2' => esc_html__( 'Listbox currency code', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 64: 					'layout3'          => esc_html__( 'List Flag Horizontal', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 65: 					'layout4'          => esc_html__( 'List Flag Vertical', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 66: 					'layout5'          => esc_html__( 'List Flag + Currency Code', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 67: 					'layout6'          => esc_html__( 'Horizontal Currency Symbols', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 68: 					'layout9'          => esc_html__( 'Horizontal Currency Slide', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 69: 					'layout7'          => esc_html__( 'Vertical Currency Symbols', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 70: 					'layout8'          => esc_html__( 'Vertical Currency Symbols (circle)', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 71: 				],
 72: 			]
 73: 		);
 74: 
 75: 		$this->add_control(
 76: 			'flag_size',
 77: 			[
 78: 				'label'     => esc_html__( 'Flag size', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 79: 				'type'      => \Elementor\Controls_Manager::NUMBER,
 80: 				'min'       => 0,
 81: 				'max'       => 1,
 82: 				'step'      => 0.1,
 83: 				'default'   => 0.6,
 84: 				'condition' => [
 85: 					'layout' => [ 'layout3', 'layout4', 'layout5', ]
 86: 				]
 87: 			]
 88: 		);
 89: 
 90: 		$this->end_controls_section();
 91: 	}
 92: 
 93: 	protected function render() {
 94: 		$settings  = $this->get_settings_for_display();
 95: 		$layout    = $settings['layout'] ? '_' . $settings['layout'] : '';
 96: 		$flag_size = $settings['flag_size'] ? 'flag_size=' . $settings['flag_size'] : '';
 97: 		echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency{$layout} $flag_size]" ) );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
 98: 	}
 99: 
100: 	public function render_plain_content() {
101: 		$settings  = $this->get_settings_for_display();
102: 		$layout    = $settings['layout'] ? '_' . $settings['layout'] : '';
103: 		$flag_size = $settings['flag_size'] ? 'flag_size=' . $settings['flag_size'] : '';
104: 		$shortcode = "[woo_multi_currency{$layout} $flag_size]";
105: 		echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( $shortcode );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
106: 	}
107: }

================
File: code_3/includes/data.php
================
   1: <?php
   2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
   3: 	exit;
   4: }
   5: 
   6: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data {
   7: 	protected static $instance = null;
   8: 	protected static $allow_html = null;
   9: 	private $params;
  10: 
  11: 	/**
  12: 	 * WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data constructor.
  13: 	 * Init setting
  14: 	 */
  15: 	public function __construct() {
  16: 		global $wmc_settings;
  17: 
  18: 		if ( ! $wmc_settings ) {
  19: 			$wmc_settings                      = get_option( 'woo_multi_currency_params', array() );
  20: 			$wmc_settings['currency_core']     = get_option( 'woocommerce_currency' );
  21: 			$wmc_settings['decimals_core']     = get_option( 'woocommerce_price_num_decimals' );
  22: 			$wmc_settings['currency_pos_core'] = get_option( 'woocommerce_currency_pos' );
  23: 		}
  24: 		$this->params = $wmc_settings;
  25: 		$args         = array(
  26: 			'enable'             => 0,
  27: 			'enable_fixed_price' => 0,
  28: 			'currency_default'   => $wmc_settings['currency_core'],
  29: 			'cache_compatible'   => 0,
  30: 
  31: 			'currency'                   => array( $wmc_settings['currency_core'] ),
  32: 			'currency_rate'              => array( 1 ),
  33: 			'currency_rate_fee'          => array( 0 ),
  34: 			'currency_hidden'            => array( 0 ),
  35: 			'currency_decimals'          => array( $wmc_settings['decimals_core'] ),
  36: 			'currency_custom'            => array( '' ),
  37: 			'currency_pos'               => array( $wmc_settings['currency_pos_core'] ),
  38: 			'auto_detect'                => 0,
  39: 			'enable_currency_by_country' => 0,
  40: 
  41: 			/*Checkout*/
  42: 			'enable_multi_payment'       => 0,
  43: 			'enable_cart_page'           => 0,
  44: 
  45: 			/*Design*/
  46: 			'enable_design'              => 0,
  47: 			'title'                      => '',
  48: 			'design_position'            => 0,
  49: 			'enable_collapse'            => 0,
  50: 			'text_color'                 => '#fff',
  51: 			'background_color'           => '#212121',
  52: 			'main_color'                 => '#f78080',
  53: 			'flag_custom'                => '',
  54: 			'sidebar_style'              => 0,
  55: 
  56: 			//Product price switcher
  57: 			'price_switcher'          => 0,
  58: 			'price_switcher_position' => 0,
  59: 
  60: 			//Shortcode
  61: 			'shortcode_bg_color'         => '#ffffff',
  62: 			'shortcode_active_bg_color'  => '#ffffff',
  63: 			'shortcode_color'            => '#212121',
  64: 			'shortcode_active_color'     => '#212121',
  65: 			'shortcode_border_color'     => 0,
  66: 
  67: 			/*Auto update*/
  68: 			'is_checkout'                => 0,
  69: 			'is_cart'                    => 0,
  70: 			'conditional_tags'           => '',
  71: 			'custom_css'                 => '',
  72: 			'rate_decimals'              => 5,
  73: 			'checkout_currency'          => $wmc_settings['currency_core'],
  74: 			'checkout_currency_args'     => array(),
  75: 			'geo_api'                    => 0,
  76: 			'rel_nofollow'               => 0,
  77: 			'bot_currency'               => 'default_currency',
  78: 		);
  79: 		$this->params = apply_filters( 'wmc_settings_args', wp_parse_args( $this->params, $args ) );
  80: 	}
  81: 
  82: 	public static function get_ins() {
  83: 		// If the single instance hasn't been set, set it now.
  84: 		if ( null == self::$instance ) {
  85: 			self::$instance = new self;
  86: 		}
  87: 
  88: 		return self::$instance;
  89: 	}
  90: 
  91: 	/**
  92: 	 * Get option Price switcher
  93: 	 * @return mixed
  94: 	 */
  95: 	public function get_price_switcher() {
  96: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_price_switcher', $this->params['price_switcher'] );
  97: 	}
  98: 
  99: 	/**
 100: 	 * Enable collapse
 101: 	 * @return mixed
 102: 	 */
 103: 	public function enable_collapse() {
 104: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_enable_collapse', $this->params['enable_collapse'] );
 105: 	}
 106: 
 107: 	/**
 108: 	 * Get sidebar style
 109: 	 * @return mixed
 110: 	 */
 111: 	public function get_sidebar_style() {
 112: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_sidebar_style', $this->params['sidebar_style'] );
 113: 	}
 114: 
 115: 
 116: 	/**
 117: 	 * Check Geo APi
 118: 	 * @return mixed
 119: 	 */
 120: 	public function get_geo_api() {
 121: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_geo_api', $this->params['geo_api'] );
 122: 	}
 123: 
 124: 	/**
 125: 	 * Check Conditional tag
 126: 	 * @return mixed
 127: 	 */
 128: 	public function get_conditional_tags() {
 129: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_conditional_tags', $this->params['conditional_tags'] );
 130: 	}
 131: 
 132: 	/**
 133: 	 * Check  hidden on cart page
 134: 	 * @return mixed
 135: 	 */
 136: 	public function is_cart() {
 137: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_is_cart', $this->params['is_cart'] );
 138: 	}
 139: 
 140: 	/**
 141: 	 * Check  hidden on checkout page
 142: 	 * @return mixed
 143: 	 */
 144: 	public function is_checkout() {
 145: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_is_checkout', $this->params['is_checkout'] );
 146: 	}
 147: 
 148: 	/**
 149: 	 * Get custom CSS
 150: 	 * @return mixed
 151: 	 */
 152: 	public function get_custom_css() {
 153: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_custom_css', $this->params['custom_css'] );
 154: 	}
 155: 
 156: 
 157: 	/**237 countries.

 525: 			'XPF' => 'WF',
 526: 			'NIO' => 'NI',
 527: 			'NGN' => 'NG',
 528: 			'OMR' => 'OM',
 529: 			'PKR' => 'PK',
 530: 			'PAB' => 'PA',
 531: 			'PGK' => 'PG',
 532: 			'PYG' => 'PY',
 533: 			'PEN' => 'PE',
 534: 			'PHP' => 'PH',
 535: 			'PLN' => 'PL',
 536: 			'QAR' => 'QA',
 537: 			'RON' => 'RO',
 538: 			'RUB' => 'RU',
 539: 			'RWF' => 'RW',
 540: 			'SHP' => 'SH',
 541: 			'WST' => 'WS',
 542: 			'STD' => 'ST',
 543: 			'SAR' => 'SA',
 544: 			'RSD' => 'RS',
 545: 			'SCR' => 'SC',
 546: 			'SLL' => 'SL',
 547: 			'SGD' => 'SG',
 548: 			'SBD' => 'SB',
 549: 			'SOS' => 'SO',
 550: 			'ZAR' => 'ZA',
 551: 			'SSP' => 'SS',
 552: 			'LKR' => 'LK',
 553: 			'SDG' => 'SD',
 554: 			'SRD' => 'SR',
 555: 			'SZL' => 'SZ',
 556: 			'SEK' => 'SE',
 557: 			'SYP' => 'SY',
 558: 			'TWD' => 'TW',
 559: 			'TJS' => 'TJ',
 560: 			'TZS' => 'TZ',
 561: 			'THB' => 'TH',
 562: 			'TOP' => 'TO',
 563: 			'TTD' => 'TT',
 564: 			'TND' => 'TN',
 565: 			'TRY' => 'TR',
 566: 			'TMT' => 'TM',
 567: 			'UGX' => 'UG',
 568: 			'UAH' => 'UA',
 569: 			'AED' => 'AE',
 570: 			'UYU' => 'UY',
 571: 			'UZS' => 'UZ',
 572: 			'VUV' => 'VU',
 573: 			'VEF' => 'VE',
 574: 			'VND' => 'VN',
 575: 			'YER' => 'YE',
 576: 			'ZMW' => 'ZM',
 577: 			'ZWD' => 'ZW',
 578: 			'BTC' => 'XBT',
 579: 			'ETH' => 'ETH',
 580: 			'MOP' => 'MO',
 581: 			'ZWL' => 'ZW',
 582: 		);
 583: 		$country_names = WC()->countries->countries;
 584: 		$data          = array();
 585: 
 586: 		/*Custom Flag*/
 587: 		$custom_flags = $this->get_flag_custom();
 588: 		if ( is_array( $custom_flags ) && count( array_filter( $custom_flags ) ) ) {
 589: 			$countries = array_merge( $countries, $custom_flags );
 590: 		}
 591: 
 592: 		if ( isset( $countries[ $currency_code ] ) && $currency_code ) {
 593: 			$data['code'] = $countries[ $currency_code ];
 594: 			switch ( $currency_code ) {
 595: 				case 'EUR':
 596: 					$data['name'] = esc_attr__( 'European Union', 'woo-multi-currency' );
 597: 					break;
 598: 				default:
 599: 					$data['name'] = isset( $country_names[ $countries[ $currency_code ] ] ) ? $country_names[ $countries[ $currency_code ] ] : 'Unknown';
 600: 			}
 601: 
 602: 		} else {
 603: 			$data['code'] = '_unknown';
 604: 			$data['name'] = 'Unknown';
 605: 		}
 606: 
 607: 		return $data;
 608: 	}
 609: 
 610: 	/**
 611: 	 * Custom flag
 612: 	 * @return mixed
 613: 	 */
 614: 	public function get_flag_custom() {
 615: 		$value      = array();
 616: 		$data_codes = $this->params['flag_custom'];
 617: 		if ( $data_codes ) {
 618: 			$args = array_filter( explode( "\n", $data_codes ) );
 619: 			if ( count( $args ) ) {
 620: 				foreach ( $args as $arg ) {
 621: 					$code = array_filter( explode( ",", strtoupper( $arg ) ) );
 622: 					if ( count( $code ) == 2 ) {
 623: 						$code              = array_map( 'trim', $code );
 624: 						$value[ $code[0] ] = $code[1];
 625: 					}
 626: 				}
 627: 			}
 628: 		} else {
 629: 			return array();
 630: 		}
 631: 
 632: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_flag_custom', $value );
 633: 	}
 634: 
 635: 	/**
 636: 	 * Get Links to redirect
 637: 	 * @return array
 638: 	 */
 639: 	public function get_links() {
 640: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_data' ) ) {
 641: 			return array();
 642: 		}
 643: 
 644: 		$links               = array();
 645: 		$selected_currencies = $this->get_list_currencies();
 646: 		$current_currency    = $this->get_current_currency();
 647: 		$url                 = ! empty( $_POST['wmc_current_url'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( $_POST['wmc_current_url'] ) : false;
 648: 		if ( count( $selected_currencies ) ) {
 649: 			foreach ( $selected_currencies as $k => $currency ) {
 650: 				if ( $currency['hide'] ) {
 651: 					continue;
 652: 				}
 653: 				/*Remove unsupported currencies from widget and currency bar on checkout and cart page*/
 654: //				if ( ( is_checkout() ) ) {
 655: //					continue;
 656: //				}
 657: 				/*Override min price and max price*/
 658: 				$arg = array( 'wmc-currency' => $k );
 659: 				if ( $current_currency == $k ) {
 660: 					if ( isset( $_GET['min_price'] ) ) {
 661: 						$arg['min_price'] = floatval( sanitize_text_field( $_GET['min_price'] ) );
 662: 					}
 663: 					if ( isset( $_GET['max_price'] ) ) {
 664: 						$arg['max_price'] = floatval( sanitize_text_field( $_GET['max_price'] ) );
 665: 					}
 666: 				} else {
 667: 					if ( isset( $_GET['min_price'] ) ) {
 668: 						$arg['min_price'] = ( floatval( sanitize_text_field( $_GET['min_price'] ) ) / $selected_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] ) * $currency['rate'];
 669: 					}
 670: 					if ( isset( $_GET['max_price'] ) ) {
 671: 						$arg['max_price'] = ( floatval( sanitize_text_field( $_GET['max_price'] ) ) / $selected_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] ) * $currency['rate'];
 672: 					}
 673: 				}
 674: 				$link        = apply_filters( 'wmc_get_link', add_query_arg( $arg, $url ), $k, $currency );
 675: 				$links[ $k ] = $link;
 676: 			}
 677: 
 678: 		}
 679: 
 680: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_links', $links );
 681: 	}
 682: 
 683: 	/**
 684: 	 * Get list currencies
 685: 	 * @return mixed
 686: 	 */
 687: 	public function get_list_currencies() {
 688: 		$data = array();
 689: 		if ( count( $this->params['currency'] ) ) {
 690: 			foreach ( $this->params['currency'] as $k => $currency ) {
 691: 				if ( ! isset( $this->params['currency_rate_fee'][ $k ] ) ) {
 692: 					$this->params['currency_rate_fee'][ $k ] = 0;
 693: 				}
 694: 				$data[ $currency ]['rate']     = ! $this->params['currency_rate_fee'][ $k ] ? $this->params['currency_rate'][ $k ] : floatval( $this->params['currency_rate'][ $k ] ) + floatval( $this->params['currency_rate_fee'][ $k ] );
 695: 				$data[ $currency ]['pos']      = $this->params['currency_pos'][ $k ];
 696: 				$data[ $currency ]['decimals'] = $this->params['currency_decimals'][ $k ];
 697: 				$data[ $currency ]['custom']   = $this->params['currency_custom'][ $k ];
 698: 				$data[ $currency ]['hide']     = isset( $this->params['currency_hidden'][ $k ] ) ? $this->params['currency_hidden'][ $k ] : 0;
 699: 			}
 700: 		}
 701: 
 702: 
 703: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_list_currencies', $data );
 704: 	}
 705: 
 706: 	/**
 707: 	 * Get current currency
 708: 	 * @return mixed
 709: 	 */
 710: 	public function get_current_currency() {
 711: 
 712: 		/*Check currency*/
 713: 		$selected_currencies = $this->get_currencies();
 714: 		$current_currency    = $this->getcookie( 'wmc_current_currency' );
 715: 		if ( ! $current_currency || ! in_array( $current_currency, $selected_currencies ) ) {
 716: 			$current_currency = get_option( 'woocommerce_currency' );
 717: 		}
 718: 
 719: 		return $current_currency;
 720: 	}
 721: 
 722: 	public function get_currencies() {
 723: 
 724: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_currencies', $this->params['currency'] );
 725: 
 726: 	}
 727: 
 728: 	/**
 729: 	 * Get Cookie or Session
 730: 	 *
 731: 	 * @param $name
 732: 	 *
 733: 	 * @return bool
 734: 	 */
 735: 	public function getcookie( $name ) {
 736: 
 737: 		return isset( $_COOKIE[ $name ] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_COOKIE[ $name ] ) ) : false;
 738: 	}
 739: 
 740: 	/**
 741: 	 * List shortcodes on widget or content
 742: 	 * @return mixed
 743: 	 */
 744: 	public function get_list_shortcodes() {
 745: 		return apply_filters(
 746: 			'wmc_get_list_shortcodes', array(
 747: 				''                 => esc_html__( 'Default', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 748: 				'plain_horizontal' => esc_html__( 'Plain Horizontal', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 749: 				'plain_vertical'   => esc_html__( 'Plain Vertical', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 750: 				'plain_vertical_2' => esc_html__( 'Listbox currency code', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 751: 				'layout3'          => esc_html__( 'List Flag Horizontal', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 752: 				'layout4'          => esc_html__( 'List Flag Vertical', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 753: 				'layout5'          => esc_html__( 'List Flag + Currency Code', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 754: 				'layout6'          => esc_html__( 'Horizontal Currency Symbols', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 755: 				'layout9'          => esc_html__( 'Horizontal Currency Slide', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 756: 				'layout7'          => esc_html__( 'Vertical Currency Symbols', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 757: 				'layout8'          => esc_html__( 'Vertical Currency Symbols (circle)', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 758: 				'layout10'         => esc_html__( 'Flag + Country + Currency + Symbol', 'woo-multi-currency' ),
 759: 			)
 760: 		);
 761: 	}
 762: 
 763: 	/**
 764: 	 * Check fixed price
 765: 	 * @return mixed
 766: 	 */
 767: 	public function check_fixed_price() {
 768: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_check_fixed_price', $this->params['enable_fixed_price'] );
 769: 	}

 785: 	}

 787: 	/**
 788: 	 * Check design enable
 789: 	 * @return mixed
 790: 	 */
 791: 	public function get_enable_design() {
 792: 		if ( $this->params['enable_design'] && $this->params['enable'] ) {
 793: 			return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_enable_design', $this->params['enable_design'] );
 794: 		} else {
 795: 			return false;
 796: 		}
 797: 	}
 798: 
 799: 	/**
 800: 	 * Get design position
 801: 	 * @return mixed
 802: 	 */
 803: 	public function get_design_position() {

 805: 	}
 806:

 808: 	 * Get text color on design
 809: 	 * @return mixed
 810: 	 */
 811: 	public function get_text_color() {
 812: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_text_color', $this->params['text_color'] );
 813: 	}
 814: 
 815: 	/**
 816: 	 * Get backround color of design
 817: 	 * @return mixed
 818: 	 */
 819: 	public function get_background_color() {
 820: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_background_color', $this->params['background_color'] );
 821: 	}
 822: 
 823: 	/**
 824: 	 * @param string $orginal_price
 825: 	 * @param string $other_price
 826: 	 *
 827: 	 * @return array
 828: 	 */
 829: 	public function get_exchange( $orginal_price = '', $other_price = '' ) {
 830: 		$rates = array();
 831: 
 832: 		$data_rates = $this->get_default_exchange( $orginal_price, $other_price );
 833: 
 834: 		if ( ! isset( $rates[ $orginal_price ] ) ) {
 835: 			$rates[ $orginal_price ] = 1;
 836: 		}
 837: 		if ( ( is_array( $data_rates ) || $data_rates instanceof Countable ) && count( $rates ) ) {
 838: 			foreach ( $data_rates as $k => $rate ) {
 839: 				$rates[ $k ] = $rate == 1 ? 1 : number_format( round( $rate, $this->get_rate_decimals() ), $this->get_rate_decimals(), '.', '' );
 840: 			}
 841: 		}
 842: 
 843: 		return $rates;
 844: 	}
 845: 
 846: 	/**
 847: 	 * @param $orginal_price
 848: 	 * @param $other_price
 849: 	 *
 850: 	 * @return array|bool
 851: 	 */
 852: 	private function get_default_exchange( $orginal_price, $other_price ) {
 853: 		global $wp_version;
 854: 		$rates = array();
 855: 
 856: 		if ( $orginal_price && $other_price ) {
 857: 			$url = 'https://api.villatheme.com/wp-json/exchange/v1';
 858: 
 859: 			$request = wp_remote_post(
 860: 				$url, array(
 861: 					'user-agent' => 'WordPress/' . $wp_version . '; ' . get_site_url(),
 862: 					'timeout'    => 10,
 863: 					'body'       => array(
 864: 						'from' => $orginal_price,
 865: 						'to'   => $other_price
 866: 					)
 867: 				)
 868: 			);
 869: 			if ( ! is_wp_error( $request ) || wp_remote_retrieve_response_code( $request ) === 200 ) {
 870: 				$rates = json_decode( trim( $request['body'] ), true );
 871: 
 872: 			}
 873: 		} else {
 874: 			return false;
 875: 		}
 876: 
 877: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_exchange', $rates );
 878: 
 879: 	}
 880: 
 881: 	/**
 882: 	 * Get custom CSS
 883: 	 * @return mixed
 884: 	 */
 885: 	public function get_rate_decimals() {
 886: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_rate_decimals', $this->params['rate_decimals'] );
 887: 	}

1046: 	/**Set currency in Cookie
1047: 	 *
1048: 	 * @param $currency_code
1049: 	 * @param bool $checkout
1050: 	 */
1051: 	public function set_current_currency( $currency_code, $checkout = true ) {
1052: 		if ( $currency_code ) {
1053: 			$this->setcookie( 'wmc_current_currency', $currency_code, time() + 60 * 60 * 24, '/' );
1054: 		}
1055: 		if ( ! $this->get_enable_multi_payment() && $checkout ) {
1056: 			$this->setcookie( 'wmc_current_currency_old', $currency_code, time() + 60 * 60 * 24, '/' );
1057: 		}
1058: 	}
1059: 
1060: 	/**
1061: 	 * Set Cookie or Session
1062: 	 *
1063: 	 * @param        $name
1064: 	 * @param        $value
1065: 	 * @param int $time
1066: 	 * @param string $path
1067: 	 */
1068: 	public function setcookie( $name, $value, $time = 86400, $path = '/' ) {
1069: 		@setcookie( $name, $value, $time, $path );
1070: 		$_COOKIE[ $name ] = $value;
1071: 	}

1082: 	/**Get currency by country with WPML.org
1083: 	 *
1084: 	 * @param $language_slug
1085: 	 *
1086: 	 * @return array|mixed
1087: 	 */
1088: 	public function get_wpml_currency_by_language( $language_slug ) {
1089: 
1090: 		if ( $language_slug ) {
1091: 			if ( isset( $this->params[ $language_slug . '_wpml_by_language' ] ) ) {
1092: 				$currency_code = $this->params[ $language_slug . '_wpml_by_language' ];
1093: 			} else {
1094: 				return array();
1095: 			}
1096: 
1097: 			return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_currency_wpml_by_language' . $language_slug, $currency_code );
1098: 		} else {
1099: 			return array();
1100: 		}
1101: 	}
1102:

1104: 	 *

1106: 	 *
1107: 	 * @return array|mixed
1108: 	 */

1110:

1112: 			if ( isset( $this->params[ $language_slug . '_by_language' ] ) ) {
1113: 				$currency_code = $this->params[ $language_slug . '_by_language' ];
1114: 			} else {
1115: 				return array();
1116: 			}
1117: 
1118: 			return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_currency_by_language_' . $language_slug, $currency_code );
1119: 		} else {
1120: 			return array();
1121: 		}
1122: 	}

1129: 	 */

1135: 			} else {
1136: 				return array();

1141: 			return array();
1142: 		}

1145: 	/**Get payments available by currency code.
1146: 	 *
1147: 	 * @param $currency_code
1148: 	 *
1149: 	 * @return array|mixed
1150: 	 */
1151: 	public function get_payments_by_currency( $currency_code ) {
1152:

1154: 			if ( isset( $this->params[ 'currency_payment_method_' . $currency_code ] ) ) {
1155: 				$payments = $this->params[ 'currency_payment_method_' . $currency_code ];
1156: 			} else {
1157: 				return array();
1158: 			}
1159: 
1160: 			return apply_filters( 'wmc_get_payments_by_currency_' . $currency_code, $payments );
1161: 		} else {
1162: 			return array();
1163: 		}
1164: 	}
