356: 								return false;
357: 							}
358: 							return true;
359: 						},
360: 						allowDeterminate  : function () {
361: 							if (module.is.determinate() && !module.should.forceCallbacks()) {
362: 								module.debug('Should not allow determinate, checkbox is already determinate');
363: 								return false;
364: 							}
365: 							if (settings.beforeDeterminate.apply(input) === false) {
366: 								module.debug('Should not allow determinate, beforeDeterminate cancelled');
367: 								return false;
368: 							}
369: 							return true;
370: 						},
371: 						forceCallbacks    : function () {
372: 							return (module.is.initialLoad() && settings.fireOnInit);
373: 						},
374: 						ignoreCallbacks   : function () {
375: 							return (initialLoad && !settings.fireOnInit);
376: 						}
377: 					},
378: 
379: 					can: {
380: 						change : function () {
381: 							return !( $module.hasClass(className.disabled) || $module.hasClass(className.readOnly) || $input.prop('disabled') || $input.prop('readonly') );
382: 						},
383: 						uncheck: function () {
384: 							return (typeof settings.uncheckable === 'boolean')
385: 								? settings.uncheckable
386: 								: !module.is.radio()
387: 								;
388: 						}
389: 					},
390: 
391: 					set: {
392: 						initialLoad  : function () {
393: 							initialLoad = true;
394: 						},
395: 						checked      : function () {
396: 							module.verbose('Setting class to checked');
397: 							$module
398: 								.removeClass(className.indeterminate)
399: 								.addClass(className.checked)
400: 							;
401: 							if (module.is.radio()) {
402: 								module.uncheckOthers();
403: 							}
404: 							if (!module.is.indeterminate() && module.is.checked()) {
405: 								module.debug('Input is already checked, skipping input property change');
406: 								return;
407: 							}
408: 							module.verbose('Setting state to checked', input);
409: 							$input
410: 								.prop('indeterminate', false)
411: 								.prop('checked', true)
412: 							;
413: 							module.trigger.change();
414: 						},
415: 						unchecked    : function () {
416: 							module.verbose('Removing checked class');
417: 							$module
418: 								.removeClass(className.indeterminate)
419: 								.removeClass(className.checked)
420: 							;
421: 							if (!module.is.indeterminate() && module.is.unchecked()) {
422: 								module.debug('Input is already unchecked');
423: 								return;
424: 							}
425: 							module.debug('Setting state to unchecked');
426: 							$input
427: 								.prop('indeterminate', false)
428: 								.prop('checked', false)
429: 							;
430: 							module.trigger.change();
431: 						},
432: 						indeterminate: function () {
433: 							module.verbose('Setting class to indeterminate');
434: 							$module
435: 								.addClass(className.indeterminate)
436: 							;
437: 							if (module.is.indeterminate()) {
438: 								module.debug('Input is already indeterminate, skipping input property change');
439: 								return;
440: 							}
441: 							module.debug('Setting state to indeterminate');
442: 							$input
443: 								.prop('indeterminate', true)
444: 							;
445: 							module.trigger.change();
446: 						},
447: 						determinate  : function () {
448: 							module.verbose('Removing indeterminate class');
449: 							$module
450: 								.removeClass(className.indeterminate)
451: 							;
452: 							if (module.is.determinate()) {
453: 								module.debug('Input is already determinate, skipping input property change');
454: 								return;
455: 							}
456: 							module.debug('Setting state to determinate');
457: 							$input
458: 								.prop('indeterminate', false)
459: 							;
460: 						},
461: 						disabled     : function () {
462: 							module.verbose('Setting class to disabled');
463: 							$module
464: 								.addClass(className.disabled)
465: 							;
466: 							if (module.is.disabled()) {
467: 								module.debug('Input is already disabled, skipping input property change');
468: 								return;
469: 							}
470: 							module.debug('Setting state to disabled');
471: 							$input
472: 								.prop('disabled', 'disabled')
473: 							;
474: 							module.trigger.change();
475: 						},
476: 						enabled      : function () {
477: 							module.verbose('Removing disabled class');
478: 							$module.removeClass(className.disabled);
479: 							if (module.is.enabled()) {
480: 								module.debug('Input is already enabled, skipping input property change');
481: 								return;
482: 							}
483: 							module.debug('Setting state to enabled');
484: 							$input
485: 								.prop('disabled', false)
486: 							;
487: 							module.trigger.change();
488: 						},
489: 						tabbable     : function () {
490: 							module.verbose('Adding tabindex to checkbox');
491: 							if ($input.attr('tabindex') === undefined) {
492: 								$input.attr('tabindex', 0);
493: 							}
494: 						}
495: 					},
496: 
497: 					remove: {
498: 						initialLoad: function () {
499: 							initialLoad = false;
500: 						}
501: 					},
502: 
503: 					trigger: {
504: 						change: function () {
505: 							var
506: 								events = document.createEvent('HTMLEvents'),
507: 								inputElement = $input[0]
508: 								;
509: 							if (inputElement) {
510: 								module.verbose('Triggering native change event');
511: 								events.initEvent('change', true, false);
512: 								inputElement.dispatchEvent(events);
513: 							}
514: 						}
515: 					},
516: 
517: 
518: 					create: {
519: 						label: function () {
520: 							if ($input.prevAll(selector.label).length > 0) {
521: 								$input.prev(selector.label).detach().insertAfter($input);
522: 								module.debug('Moving existing label', $label);
523: 							}
524: 							else if (!module.has.label()) {
525: 								$label = $('<label>').insertAfter($input);
526: 								module.debug('Creating label', $label);
527: 							}
528: 						}
529: 					},
530: 
531: 					has: {
532: 						label: function () {
533: 							return ($label.length > 0);
534: 						}
535: 					},
536: 
537: 					bind: {
538: 						events: function () {
539: 							module.verbose('Attaching checkbox events');
540: 							$module
541: 								.on('click' + eventNamespace, module.event.click)
542: 								.on('keydown' + eventNamespace, selector.input, module.event.keydown)
543: 								.on('keyup' + eventNamespace, selector.input, module.event.keyup)
544: 							;
545: 						}
546: 					},
547: 
548: 					unbind: {
549: 						events: function () {
550: 							module.debug('Removing events');
551: 							$module
552: 								.off(eventNamespace)
553: 							;
554: 						}
555: 					},
556: 
557: 					uncheckOthers: function () {
558: 						var
559: 							$radios = module.get.otherRadios()
560: 							;
561: 						module.debug('Unchecking other radios', $radios);
562: 						$radios.removeClass(className.checked);
563: 					},
564: 
565: 					toggle     : function () {
566: 						if (!module.can.change()) {
567: 							if (!module.is.radio()) {
568: 								module.debug('Checkbox is read-only or disabled, ignoring toggle');
569: 							}
570: 							return;
571: 						}
572: 						if (module.is.indeterminate() || module.is.unchecked()) {
573: 							module.debug('Currently unchecked');
574: 							module.check();
575: 						}
576: 						else if (module.is.checked() && module.can.uncheck()) {
577: 							module.debug('Currently checked');
578: 							module.uncheck();
579: 						}
580: 					},
581: 					setting    : function (name, value) {
582: 						module.debug('Changing setting', name, value);
583: 						if ($.isPlainObject(name)) {
584: 							$.extend(true, settings, name);
585: 						}
586: 						else if (value !== undefined) {
587: 							settings[name] = value;
588: 						}
589: 						else {
590: 							return settings[name];
591: 						}
592: 					},
593: 					internal   : function (name, value) {
594: 						if ($.isPlainObject(name)) {
595: 							$.extend(true, module, name);
596: 						}
597: 						else if (value !== undefined) {
598: 							module[name] = value;
599: 						}
600: 						else {
601: 							return module[name];
602: 						}
603: 					},
604: 					debug      : function () {
605: 						if (settings.debug) {
606: 							if (settings.performance) {
607: 								module.performance.log(arguments);
608: 							}
609: 							else {
610: 								module.debug = Function.prototype.bind.call(console.info, console, settings.name + ':');
611: 								module.debug.apply(console, arguments);
612: 							}
613: 						}
614: 					},
615: 					verbose    : function () {
616: 						if (settings.verbose && settings.debug) {
617: 							if (settings.performance) {
618: 								module.performance.log(arguments);
619: 							}
620: 							else {
621: 								module.verbose = Function.prototype.bind.call(console.info, console, settings.name + ':');
622: 								module.verbose.apply(console, arguments);
623: 							}
624: 						}
625: 					},
626: 					error      : function () {
627: 						module.error = Function.prototype.bind.call(console.error, console, settings.name + ':');
628: 						module.error.apply(console, arguments);
629: 					},
630: 					performance: {
631: 						log    : function (message) {
632: 							var
633: 								currentTime,
634: 								executionTime,
635: 								previousTime
636: 								;
637: 							if (settings.performance) {
638: 								currentTime = new Date().getTime();
639: 								previousTime = time || currentTime;
640: 								executionTime = currentTime - previousTime;
641: 								time = currentTime;
642: 								performance.push({
643: 									'Name'          : message[0],
644: 									'Arguments'     : [].slice.call(message, 1) || '',
645: 									'Element'       : element,
646: 									'Execution Time': executionTime
647: 								});
648: 							}
649: 							clearTimeout(module.performance.timer);
650: 							module.performance.timer = setTimeout(module.performance.display, 500);
651: 						},
652: 						display: function () {
653: 							var
654: 								title = settings.name + ':',
655: 								totalTime = 0
656: 								;
657: 							time = false;
658: 							clearTimeout(module.performance.timer);
659: 							$.each(performance, function (index, data) {
660: 								totalTime += data['Execution Time'];
661: 							});
662: 							title += ' ' + totalTime + 'ms';
663: 							if (moduleSelector) {
664: 								title += ' \'' + moduleSelector + '\'';
665: 							}
666: 							if ((console.group !== undefined || console.table !== undefined) && performance.length > 0) {
667: 								console.groupCollapsed(title);
668: 								if (console.table) {
669: 									console.table(performance);
670: 								}
671: 								else {
672: 									$.each(performance, function (index, data) {
673: 										console.log(data['Name'] + ': ' + data['Execution Time'] + 'ms');
674: 									});
675: 								}
676: 								console.groupEnd();
677: 							}
678: 							performance = [];
679: 						}
680: 					},
681: 					invoke     : function (query, passedArguments, context) {
682: 						var
683: 							object = instance,
684: 							maxDepth,
685: 							found,
686: 							response
687: 							;
688: 						passedArguments = passedArguments || queryArguments;
689: 						context = element || context;
690: 						if (typeof query == 'string' && object !== undefined) {
691: 							query = query.split(/[\. ]/);
692: 							maxDepth = query.length - 1;
693: 							$.each(query, function (depth, value) {
694: 								var camelCaseValue = (depth != maxDepth)
695: 										? value + query[depth + 1].charAt(0).toUpperCase() + query[depth + 1].slice(1)
696: 										: query
697: 									;
698: 								if ($.isPlainObject(object[camelCaseValue]) && (depth != maxDepth)) {
699: 									object = object[camelCaseValue];
700: 								}
701: 								else if (object[camelCaseValue] !== undefined) {
702: 									found = object[camelCaseValue];
703: 									return false;
704: 								}
705: 								else if ($.isPlainObject(object[value]) && (depth != maxDepth)) {
706: 									object = object[value];
707: 								}
708: 								else if (object[value] !== undefined) {
709: 									found = object[value];
710: 									return false;
711: 								}
712: 								else {
713: 									module.error(error.method, query);
714: 									return false;
715: 								}
716: 							});
717: 						}
718: 						if ($.isFunction(found)) {
719: 							response = found.apply(context, passedArguments);
720: 						}
721: 						else if (found !== undefined) {
722: 							response = found;
723: 						}
724: 						if ($.isArray(returnedValue)) {
725: 							returnedValue.push(response);
726: 						}
727: 						else if (returnedValue !== undefined) {
728: 							returnedValue = [returnedValue, response];
729: 						}
730: 						else if (response !== undefined) {
731: 							returnedValue = response;
732: 						}
733: 						return found;
734: 					}
735: 				};
736: 
737: 				if (methodInvoked) {
738: 					if (instance === undefined) {
739: 						module.initialize();
740: 					}
741: 					module.invoke(query);
742: 				}
743: 				else {
744: 					if (instance !== undefined) {
745: 						instance.invoke('destroy');
746: 					}
747: 					module.initialize();
748: 				}
749: 			})
750: 		;
751: 
752: 		return (returnedValue !== undefined)
753: 			? returnedValue
754: 			: this
755: 			;
756: 	};
757: 
758: 	$.fn.checkbox.settings = {
759: 
760: 		name     : 'Checkbox',
761: 		namespace: 'checkbox',
762: 
763: 		debug      : false,
764: 		verbose    : true,
765: 		performance: true,
766: 
767: 		// delegated event context
768: 		uncheckable: 'auto',
769: 		fireOnInit : false,
770: 
771: 		onChange: function () {
772: 		},
773: 
774: 		beforeChecked      : function () {
775: 		},
776: 		beforeUnchecked    : function () {
777: 		},
778: 		beforeDeterminate  : function () {
779: 		},
780: 		beforeIndeterminate: function () {
781: 		},
782: 
783: 		onChecked  : function () {
784: 		},
785: 		onUnchecked: function () {
786: 		},
787: 
788: 		onDeterminate  : function () {
789: 		},
790: 		onIndeterminate: function () {
791: 		},
792: 
793: 		onEnable : function () {
794: 		},
795: 		onDisable: function () {
796: 		},
797: 
798: 		className: {
799: 			checked      : 'checked',
800: 			indeterminate: 'indeterminate',
801: 			disabled     : 'disabled',
802: 			hidden       : 'hidden',
803: 			radio        : 'radio',
804: 			readOnly     : 'read-only'
805: 		},
806: 
807: 		error: {
808: 			method: 'The method you called is not defined'
809: 		},
810: 
811: 		selector: {
812: 			checkbox: '.vi-ui.checkbox',
813: 			label   : 'label, .box',
814: 			input   : 'input[type="checkbox"], input[type="radio"]',
815: 			link    : 'a[href]'
816: 		}
817: 
818: 	};
819: 
820: })(jQuery, window, document);

================
File: code_3/js/dropdown.js
================
   1: /*!
   2:  * # Semantic ui 2.1.7 - Dropdown
   3:  * http://github.com/semantic-org/semantic-ui/
   4:  *
   5:  *
   6:  * Copyright 2015 Contributors
   7:  * Released under the MIT license
   8:  * http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
   9:  *
  10:  */
  11: 
  12: ;(function ( $, window, document, undefined ) {
  13: 
  14: "use strict";
  15: 
  16: $.fn.dropdown = function(parameters) {
  17:   var
  18:     $allModules    = $(this),
  19:     $document      = $(document),
  20: 
  21:     moduleSelector = $allModules.selector || '',
  22: 
  23:     hasTouch       = ('ontouchstart' in document.documentElement),
  24:     time           = new Date().getTime(),
  25:     performance    = [],
  26: 
  27:     query          = arguments[0],
  28:     methodInvoked  = (typeof query == 'string'),
  29:     queryArguments = [].slice.call(arguments, 1),
  30:     returnedValue
  31:   ;
  32: 
  33:   $allModules
  34:     .each(function(elementIndex) {
  35:       var
  36:         settings          = ( $.isPlainObject(parameters) )
  37:           ? $.extend(true, {}, $.fn.dropdown.settings, parameters)
  38:           : $.extend({}, $.fn.dropdown.settings),
  39: 
  40:         className       = settings.className,
  41:         message         = settings.message,
  42:         fields          = settings.fields,
  43:         keys            = settings.keys,
  44:         metadata        = settings.metadata,
  45:         namespace       = settings.namespace,
  46:         regExp          = settings.regExp,
  47:         selector        = settings.selector,
  48:         error           = settings.error,
  49:         templates       = settings.templates,
  50: 
  51:         eventNamespace  = '.' + namespace,
  52:         moduleNamespace = 'module-' + namespace,
  53: 
  54:         $module         = $(this),
  55:         $context        = $(settings.context),
  56:         $text           = $module.find(selector.text),
  57:         $search         = $module.find(selector.search),
  58:         $input          = $module.find(selector.input),
  59:         $icon           = $module.find(selector.icon),
  60: 
  61:         $combo = ($module.prev().find(selector.text).length > 0)
  62:           ? $module.prev().find(selector.text)
  63:           : $module.prev(),
  64: 
  65:         $menu           = $module.children(selector.menu),
  66:         $item           = $menu.find(selector.item),
  67: 
  68:         activated       = false,
  69:         itemActivated   = false,
  70:         internalChange  = false,
  71:         element         = this,
  72:         instance        = $module.data(moduleNamespace),
  73: 
  74:         initialLoad,
  75:         pageLostFocus,
  76:         elementNamespace,
  77:         id,
  78:         selectObserver,
  79:         menuObserver,
  80:         module
  81:       ;
  82: 
  83:       module = {
  84: 
  85:         initialize: function() {
  86:           module.debug('Initializing dropdown', settings);
  87: 
  88:           if( module.is.alreadySetup() ) {
  89:             module.setup.reference();
  90:           }
  91:           else {
  92:             module.setup.layout();
  93:             module.refreshData();
  94: 
  95:             module.save.defaults();
  96:             module.restore.selected();
  97: 
  98:             module.create.id();
  99:             module.bind.events();
 100: 
 101:             module.observeChanges();
 102:             module.instantiate();
 103:           }
 104: 
 105:         },
 106: 
 107:         instantiate: function() {
 108:           module.verbose('Storing instance of dropdown', module);
 109:           instance = module;
 110:           $module
 111:             .data(moduleNamespace, module)
 112:           ;
 113:         },
 114: 
 115:         destroy: function() {
 116:           module.verbose('Destroying previous dropdown', $module);
 117:           module.remove.tabbable();
 118:           $module
 119:             .off(eventNamespace)
 120:             .removeData(moduleNamespace)
 121:           ;
 122:           $menu
 123:             .off(eventNamespace)
 124:           ;
 125:           $document
 126:             .off(elementNamespace)
 127:           ;
 128:           if(selectObserver) {
 129:             selectObserver.disconnect();
 130:           }
 131:           if(menuObserver) {
 132:             menuObserver.disconnect();
 133:           }
 134:         },
 135: 
 136:         observeChanges: function() {
 137:           if('MutationObserver' in window) {
 138:             selectObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
 139:               module.debug('<select> modified, recreating menu');
 140:               module.setup.select();
 141:             });
 142:             menuObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
 143:               module.debug('Menu modified, updating selector cache');
 144:               module.refresh();
 145:             });
 146:             if(module.has.input()) {
 147:               selectObserver.observe($input[0], {
 148:                 childList : true,
 149:                 subtree   : true
 150:               });
 151:             }
 152:             if(module.has.menu()) {
 153:               menuObserver.observe($menu[0], {
 154:                 childList : true,
 155:                 subtree   : true
 156:               });
 157:             }
 158:             module.debug('Setting up mutation observer', selectObserver, menuObserver);
 159:           }
 160:         },
 161: 
 162:         create: {
 163:           id: function() {
 164:             id = (Math.random().toString(16) + '000000000').substr(2, 8);
 165:             elementNamespace = '.' + id;
 166:             module.verbose('Creating unique id for element', id);
 167:           },
 168:           userChoice: function(values) {
 169:             var
 170:               $userChoices,
 171:               $userChoice,
 172:               isUserValue,
 173:               html
 174:             ;
 175:             values = values || module.get.userValues();
 176:             if(!values) {
 177:               return false;
 178:             }
 179:             values = $.isArray(values)
 180:               ? values
 181:               : [values]
 182:             ;
 183:             $.each(values, function(index, value) {
 184:               if(module.get.item(value) === false) {
 185:                 html         = settings.templates.addition( module.add.variables(message.addResult, value) );
 186:                 $userChoice  = $('<div />')
 187:                   .html(html)
 188:                   .attr('data-' + metadata.value, value)
 189:                   .attr('data-' + metadata.text, value)
 190:                   .addClass(className.addition)
 191:                   .addClass(className.item)
 192:                 ;
 193:                 $userChoices = ($userChoices === undefined)
 194:                   ? $userChoice
 195:                   : $userChoices.add($userChoice)
 196:                 ;
 197:                 module.verbose('Creating user choices for value', value, $userChoice);
 198:               }
 199:             });
 200:             return $userChoices;
 201:           },
 202:           userLabels: function(value) {
 203:             var
 204:               userValues = module.get.userValues()
 205:             ;
 206:             if(userValues) {
 207:               module.debug('Adding user labels', userValues);
 208:               $.each(userValues, function(index, value) {
 209:                 module.verbose('Adding custom user value');
 210:                 module.add.label(value, value);
 211:               });
 212:             }
 213:           },
 214:           menu: function() {
 215:             $menu = $('<div />')
 216:               .addClass(className.menu)
 217:               .appendTo($module)
 218:             ;
 219:           }
 220:         },
 221: 
 222:         search: function(query) {
 223:           query = (query !== undefined)
 224:             ? query
 225:             : module.get.query()
 226:           ;
 227:           module.verbose('Searching for query', query);
 228:           module.filter(query);
 229:         },
 230: 
 231:         select: {
 232:           firstUnfiltered: function() {
 233:             module.verbose('Selecting first non-filtered element');
 234:             module.remove.selectedItem();
 235:             $item
 236:               .not(selector.unselectable)
 237:                 .eq(0)
 238:                 .addClass(className.selected)
 239:             ;
 240:           },
 241:           nextAvailable: function($selected) {
 242:             $selected = $selected.eq(0);
 243:             var
 244:               $nextAvailable = $selected.nextAll(selector.item).not(selector.unselectable).eq(0),
 245:               $prevAvailable = $selected.prevAll(selector.item).not(selector.unselectable).eq(0),
 246:               hasNext        = ($nextAvailable.length > 0)
 247:             ;
 248:             if(hasNext) {
 249:               module.verbose('Moving selection to', $nextAvailable);
 250:               $nextAvailable.addClass(className.selected);
 251:             }
 252:             else {
 253:               module.verbose('Moving selection to', $prevAvailable);
 254:               $prevAvailable.addClass(className.selected);
 255:             }
 256:           }
 257:         },
 258: 
 259:         setup: {
 260:           api: function() {
 261:             var
 262:               apiSettings = {
 263:                 debug : settings.debug,
 264:                 on    : false
 265:               }
 266:             ;
 267:             module.verbose('First request, initializing API');
 268:             $module
 269:               .api(apiSettings)
 270:             ;
 271:           },
 272:           layout: function() {
 273:             if( $module.is('select') ) {
 274:               module.setup.select();
 275:               module.setup.returnedObject();
 276:             }
 277:             if( !module.has.menu() ) {
 278:               module.create.menu();
 279:             }
 280:             if( module.is.search() && !module.has.search() ) {
 281:               module.verbose('Adding search input');
 282:               $search = $('<input />')
 283:                 .addClass(className.search)
 284:                 .prop('autocomplete', 'off')
 285:                 .insertBefore($text)
 286:               ;
 287:             }
 288:             if(settings.allowTab) {
 289:               module.set.tabbable();
 290:             }
 291:           },
 292:           select: function() {
 293:             var
 294:               selectValues  = module.get.selectValues()
 295:             ;
 296:             module.debug('Dropdown initialized on a select', selectValues);
 297:             if( $module.is('select') ) {
 298:               $input = $module;
 299:             }
 300:             // see if select is placed correctly already
 301:             if($input.parent(selector.dropdown).length > 0) {
 302:               module.debug('ui dropdown already exists. Creating dropdown menu only');
 303:               $module = $input.closest(selector.dropdown);
 304:               if( !module.has.menu() ) {
 305:                 module.create.menu();
 306:               }
 307:               $menu = $module.children(selector.menu);
 308:               module.setup.menu(selectValues);
 309:             }
 310:             else {
 311:               module.debug('Creating entire dropdown from select');
 312:               $module = $('<div />')
 313:                 .attr('class', $input.attr('class') )
 314:                 .addClass(className.selection)
 315:                 .addClass(className.dropdown)
 316:                 .html( templates.dropdown(selectValues) )
 317:                 .insertBefore($input)
 318:               ;
 319:               if($input.hasClass(className.multiple) && $input.prop('multiple') === false) {
 320:                 module.error(error.missingMultiple);
 321:                 $input.prop('multiple', true);
 322:               }
 323:               if($input.is('[multiple]')) {
 324:                 module.set.multiple();
 325:               }
 326:               if ($input.prop('disabled')) {
 327:                 module.debug('Disabling dropdown')
 328:                 $module.addClass(className.disabled)
 329:               }
 330:               $input
 331:                 .removeAttr('class')
 332:                 .detach()
 333:                 .prependTo($module)
 334:               ;
 335:             }
 336:             module.refresh();
 337:           },
 338:           menu: function(values) {
 339:             $menu.html( templates.menu(values, fields));
 340:             $item = $menu.find(selector.item);
 341:           },
 342:           reference: function() {
 343:             module.debug('Dropdown behavior was called on select, replacing with closest dropdown');
 344:             // replace module reference
 345:             $module = $module.parent(selector.dropdown);
 346:             module.refresh();
 347:             module.setup.returnedObject();
 348:             // invoke method in context of current instance
 349:             if(methodInvoked) {
 350:               instance = module;
 351:               module.invoke(query);
 352:             }
 353:           },
 354:           returnedObject: function() {
 355:             var
 356:               $firstModules = $allModules.slice(0, elementIndex),
 357:               $lastModules = $allModules.slice(elementIndex + 1)
 358:             ;
 359:             // adjust all modules to use correct reference
 360:             $allModules = $firstModules.add($module).add($lastModules);
 361:           }
 362:         },
 363: 
 364:         refresh: function() {
 365:           module.refreshSelectors();
 366:           module.refreshData();
 367:         },
 368: 
 369:         refreshSelectors: function() {
 370:           module.verbose('Refreshing selector cache');
 371:           $text   = $module.find(selector.text);
 372:           $search = $module.find(selector.search);
 373:           $input  = $module.find(selector.input);
 374:           $icon   = $module.find(selector.icon);
 375:           $combo  = ($module.prev().find(selector.text).length > 0)
 376:             ? $module.prev().find(selector.text)
 377:             : $module.prev()
 378:           ;
 379:           $menu    = $module.children(selector.menu);
 380:           $item    = $menu.find(selector.item);
 381:         },
 382: 
 383:         refreshData: function() {
 384:           module.verbose('Refreshing cached metadata');
 385:           $item
 386:             .removeData(metadata.text)
 387:             .removeData(metadata.value)
 388:           ;
 389:           $module
 390:             .removeData(metadata.defaultText)
 391:             .removeData(metadata.defaultValue)
 392:             .removeData(metadata.placeholderText)
 393:           ;
 394:         },
 395: 
 396:         toggle: function() {
 397:           module.verbose('Toggling menu visibility');
 398:           if( !module.is.active() ) {
 399:             module.show();
 400:           }
 401:           else {
 402:             module.hide();
 403:           }
 404:         },
 405: 
 406:         show: function(callback) {
 407:           callback = $.isFunction(callback)
 408:             ? callback
 409:             : function(){}
 410:           ;
 411:           if( module.can.show() && !module.is.active() ) {
 412:             module.debug('Showing dropdown');
 413:             if(module.is.multiple() && !module.has.search() && module.is.allFiltered()) {
 414:               return true;
 415:             }
 416:             if(module.has.message() && !(module.has.maxSelections() || module.has.allResultsFiltered()) ) {
 417:               module.remove.message();
 418:             }
 419:             if(settings.onShow.call(element) !== false) {
 420:               module.animate.show(function() {
 421:                 if( module.can.click() ) {
 422:                   module.bind.intent();
 423:                 }
 424:                 module.set.visible();
 425:                 callback.call(element);
 426:               });
 427:             }
 428:           }
 429:         },
 430: 
 431:         hide: function(callback) {
 432:           callback = $.isFunction(callback)
 433:             ? callback
 434:             : function(){}
 435:           ;
 436:           if( module.is.active() ) {
 437:             module.debug('Hiding dropdown');
 438:             if(settings.onHide.call(element) !== false) {
 439:               module.animate.hide(function() {
 440:                 module.remove.visible();
 441:                 callback.call(element);
 442:               });
 443:             }
 444:           }
 445:         },
 446: 
 447:         hideOthers: function() {
 448:           module.verbose('Finding other dropdowns to hide');
 449:           $allModules
 450:             .not($module)
 451:               .has(selector.menu + '.' + className.visible)
 452:                 .dropdown('hide')
 453:           ;
 454:         },
 455: 
 456:         hideMenu: function() {
 457:           module.verbose('Hiding menu  instantaneously');
 458:           module.remove.active();
 459:           module.remove.visible();
 460:           $menu.transition('hide');
 461:         },
 462: 
 463:         hideSubMenus: function() {
 464:           var
 465:             $subMenus = $menu.children(selector.item).find(selector.menu)
 466:           ;
 467:           module.verbose('Hiding sub menus', $subMenus);
 468:           $subMenus.transition('hide');
 469:         },
 470: 
 471:         bind: {
 472:           events: function() {
 473:             if(hasTouch) {
 474:               module.bind.touchEvents();
 475:             }
 476:             module.bind.keyboardEvents();
 477:             module.bind.inputEvents();
 478:             module.bind.mouseEvents();
 479:           },
 480:           touchEvents: function() {
 481:             module.debug('Touch device detected binding additional touch events');
 482:             if( module.is.searchSelection() ) {
 483:               // do nothing special yet
 484:             }
 485:             else if( module.is.single() ) {
 486:               $module
 487:                 .on('touchstart' + eventNamespace, module.event.test.toggle)
 488:               ;
 489:             }
 490:             $menu
 491:               .on('touchstart' + eventNamespace, selector.item, module.event.item.mouseenter)
 492:             ;
 493:           },
 494:           keyboardEvents: function() {
 495:             module.verbose('Binding keyboard events');
 496:             $module
 497:               .on('keydown' + eventNamespace, module.event.keydown)
 498:             ;
 499:             if( module.has.search() ) {
 500:               $module
 501:                 .on(module.get.inputEvent() + eventNamespace, selector.search, module.event.input)
 502:               ;
 503:             }
 504:             if( module.is.multiple() ) {
 505:               $document
 506:                 .on('keydown' + elementNamespace, module.event.document.keydown)
 507:               ;
 508:             }
 509:           },
 510:           inputEvents: function() {
 511:             module.verbose('Binding input change events');
 512:             $module
 513:               .on('change' + eventNamespace, selector.input, module.event.change)
 514:             ;
 515:           },
 516:           mouseEvents: function() {
 517:             module.verbose('Binding mouse events');
 518:             if(module.is.multiple()) {
 519:               $module
 520:                 .on('click'   + eventNamespace, selector.label,  module.event.label.click)
 521:                 .on('click'   + eventNamespace, selector.remove, module.event.remove.click)
 522:               ;
 523:             }
 524:             if( module.is.searchSelection() ) {
 525:               $module
 526:                 .on('mousedown' + eventNamespace, selector.menu,   module.event.menu.mousedown)
 527:                 .on('mouseup'   + eventNamespace, selector.menu,   module.event.menu.mouseup)
 528:                 .on('click'     + eventNamespace, selector.icon,   module.event.icon.click)
 529:                 .on('click'     + eventNamespace, selector.search, module.show)
 530:                 .on('focus'     + eventNamespace, selector.search, module.event.search.focus)
 531:                 .on('blur'      + eventNamespace, selector.search, module.event.search.blur)
 532:                 .on('click'     + eventNamespace, selector.text,   module.event.text.focus)
 533:               ;
 534:               if(module.is.multiple()) {
 535:                 $module
 536:                   .on('click' + eventNamespace, module.event.click)
 537:                 ;
 538:               }
 539:             }
 540:             else {
 541:               if(settings.on == 'click') {
 542:                 $module
 543:                   .on('click' + eventNamespace, selector.icon, module.event.icon.click)
 544:                   .on('click' + eventNamespace, module.event.test.toggle)
 545:                 ;
 546:               }
 547:               else if(settings.on == 'hover') {
 548:                 $module
 549:                   .on('mouseenter' + eventNamespace, module.delay.show)
 550:                   .on('mouseleave' + eventNamespace, module.delay.hide)
 551:                 ;
 552:               }
 553:               else {
 554:                 $module
 555:                   .on(settings.on + eventNamespace, module.toggle)
 556:                 ;
 557:               }
 558:               $module
 559:                 .on('mousedown' + eventNamespace, module.event.mousedown)
 560:                 .on('mouseup'   + eventNamespace, module.event.mouseup)
 561:                 .on('focus'     + eventNamespace, module.event.focus)
 562:                 .on('blur'      + eventNamespace, module.event.blur)
 563:               ;
 564:             }
 565:             $menu
 566:               .on('mouseenter' + eventNamespace, selector.item, module.event.item.mouseenter)
 567:               .on('mouseleave' + eventNamespace, selector.item, module.event.item.mouseleave)
 568:               .on('click'      + eventNamespace, selector.item, module.event.item.click)
 569:             ;
 570:           },
 571:           intent: function() {
 572:             module.verbose('Binding hide intent event to document');
 573:             if(hasTouch) {
 574:               $document
 575:                 .on('touchstart' + elementNamespace, module.event.test.touch)
 576:                 .on('touchmove'  + elementNamespace, module.event.test.touch)
 577:               ;
 578:             }
 579:             $document
 580:               .on('click' + elementNamespace, module.event.test.hide)
 581:             ;
 582:           }
 583:         },
 584: 
 585:         unbind: {
 586:           intent: function() {
 587:             module.verbose('Removing hide intent event from document');
 588:             if(hasTouch) {
 589:               $document
 590:                 .off('touchstart' + elementNamespace)
 591:                 .off('touchmove' + elementNamespace)
 592:               ;
 593:             }
 594:             $document
 595:               .off('click' + elementNamespace)
 596:             ;
 597:           }
 598:         },
 599: 
 600:         filter: function(query) {
 601:           var
 602:             searchTerm = (query !== undefined)
 603:               ? query
 604:               : module.get.query(),
 605:             afterFiltered = function() {
 606:               if(module.is.multiple()) {
 607:                 module.filterActive();
 608:               }
 609:               module.select.firstUnfiltered();
 610:               if( module.has.allResultsFiltered() ) {
 611:                 if( settings.onNoResults.call(element, searchTerm) ) {
 612:                   if(!settings.allowAdditions) {
 613:                     module.verbose('All items filtered, showing message', searchTerm);
 614:                     module.add.message(message.noResults);
 615:                   }
 616:                 }
 617:                 else {
 618:                   module.verbose('All items filtered, hiding dropdown', searchTerm);
 619:                   module.hideMenu();
 620:                 }
 621:               }
 622:               else {
 623:                 module.remove.message();
 624:               }
 625:               if(settings.allowAdditions) {
 626:                 module.add.userSuggestion(query);
 627:               }
 628:               if(module.is.searchSelection() && module.can.show() && module.is.focusedOnSearch() ) {
 629:                 module.show();
 630:               }
 631:             }
 632:           ;
 633:           if(settings.useLabels && module.has.maxSelections()) {
 634:             return;
 635:           }
 636:           if(settings.apiSettings) {
 637:             if( module.can.useAPI() ) {
 638:               module.queryRemote(searchTerm, function() {
 639:                 afterFiltered();
 640:               });
 641:             }
 642:             else {
 643:               module.error(error.noAPI);
 644:             }
 645:           }
 646:           else {
 647:             module.filterItems(searchTerm);
 648:             afterFiltered();
 649:           }
 650:         },
 651: 
 652:         queryRemote: function(query, callback) {
 653:           var
 654:             apiSettings = {
 655:               errorDuration        : false,
 656:               throttle             : settings.throttle,
 657:               urlData              : {
 658:                 query: query
 659:               },
 660:               onError: function() {
 661:                 module.add.message(message.serverError);
 662:                 callback();
 663:               },
 664:               onFailure: function() {
 665:                 module.add.message(message.serverError);
 666:                 callback();
 667:               },
 668:               onSuccess : function(response) {
 669:                 module.remove.message();
 670:                 module.setup.menu({
 671:                   values: response[fields.remoteValues]
 672:                 });
 673:                 callback();
 674:               }
 675:             }
 676:           ;
 677:           if( !$module.api('get request') ) {
 678:             module.setup.api();
 679:           }
 680:           apiSettings = $.extend(true, {}, apiSettings, settings.apiSettings);
 681:           $module
 682:             .api('setting', apiSettings)
 683:             .api('query')
 684:           ;
 685:         },
 686: 
 687:         filterItems: function(query) {
 688:           var
 689:             searchTerm = (query !== undefined)
 690:               ? query
 691:               : module.get.query(),
 692:             results          =  null,
 693:             escapedTerm      = module.escape.regExp(searchTerm),
 694:             beginsWithRegExp = new RegExp('^' + escapedTerm, 'igm')
 695:           ;
 696:           // avoid loop if we're matching nothing
 697:           if( module.has.query() ) {
 698:             results = [];
 699: 
 700:             module.verbose('Searching for matching values', searchTerm);
 701:             $item
 702:               .each(function(){
 703:                 var
 704:                   $choice = $(this),
 705:                   text,
 706:                   value
 707:                 ;
 708:                 if(settings.match == 'both' || settings.match == 'text') {
 709:                   text = String(module.get.choiceText($choice, false));
 710:                   if(text.search(beginsWithRegExp) !== -1) {
 711:                     results.push(this);
 712:                     return true;
 713:                   }
 714:                   else if(settings.fullTextSearch && module.fuzzySearch(searchTerm, text)) {
 715:                     results.push(this);
 716:                     return true;
 717:                   }
 718:                 }
 719:                 if(settings.match == 'both' || settings.match == 'value') {
 720:                   value = String(module.get.choiceValue($choice, text));
 721: 
 722:                   if(value.search(beginsWithRegExp) !== -1) {
 723:                     results.push(this);
 724:                     return true;
 725:                   }
 726:                   else if(settings.fullTextSearch && module.fuzzySearch(searchTerm, value)) {
 727:                     results.push(this);
 728:                     return true;
 729:                   }
 730:                 }
 731:               })
 732:             ;
 733:           }
 734:           module.debug('Showing only matched items', searchTerm);
 735:           module.remove.filteredItem();
 736:           if(results) {
 737:             $item
 738:               .not(results)
 739:               .addClass(className.filtered)
 740:             ;
 741:           }
 742:         },
 743: 
 744:         fuzzySearch: function(query, term) {
 745:           var
 746:             termLength  = term.length,
 747:             queryLength = query.length
 748:           ;
 749:           query = query.toLowerCase();
 750:           term  = term.toLowerCase();
 751:           if(queryLength > termLength) {
 752:             return false;
 753:           }
 754:           if(queryLength === termLength) {
 755:             return (query === term);
 756:           }
 757:           search: for (var characterIndex = 0, nextCharacterIndex = 0; characterIndex < queryLength; characterIndex++) {
 758:             var
 759:               queryCharacter = query.charCodeAt(characterIndex)
 760:             ;
 761:             while(nextCharacterIndex < termLength) {
 762:               if(term.charCodeAt(nextCharacterIndex++) === queryCharacter) {
 763:                 continue search;
 764:               }
 765:             }
 766:             return false;
 767:           }
 768:           return true;
 769:         },
 770: 
 771:         filterActive: function() {
 772:           if(settings.useLabels) {
 773:             $item.filter('.' + className.active)
 774:               .addClass(className.filtered)
 775:             ;
 776:           }
 777:         },
 778: 
 779:         focusSearch: function() {
 780:           if( module.is.search() && !module.is.focusedOnSearch() ) {
 781:             $search[0].focus();
 782:           }
 783:         },
 784: 
 785:         forceSelection: function() {
 786:           var
 787:             $currentlySelected = $item.not(className.filtered).filter('.' + className.selected).eq(0),
 788:             $activeItem        = $item.not(className.filtered).filter('.' + className.active).eq(0),
 789:             $selectedItem      = ($currentlySelected.length > 0)
 790:               ? $currentlySelected
 791:               : $activeItem,
 792:             hasSelected = ($selectedItem.size() > 0)
 793:           ;
 794:           if( module.has.query() ) {
 795:             if(hasSelected) {
 796:               module.debug('Forcing partial selection to selected item', $selectedItem);
 797:               module.event.item.click.call($selectedItem);
 798:               return;
 799:             }
 800:             else {
 801:               module.remove.searchTerm();
 802:             }
 803:           }
 804:           module.hide();
 805:         },
 806: 
 807:         event: {
 808:           change: function() {
 809:             if(!internalChange) {
 810:               module.debug('Input changed, updating selection');
 811:               module.set.selected();
 812:             }
 813:           },
 814:           focus: function() {
 815:             if(settings.showOnFocus && !activated && module.is.hidden() && !pageLostFocus) {
 816:               module.show();
 817:             }
 818:           },
 819:           click: function(event) {
 820:             var
 821:               $target = $(event.target)
 822:             ;
 823:             // focus search
 824:             if($target.is($module) && !module.is.focusedOnSearch()) {
 825:               module.focusSearch();
 826:             }
 827:           },
 828:           blur: function(event) {
 829:             pageLostFocus = (document.activeElement === this);
 830:             if(!activated && !pageLostFocus) {
 831:               module.remove.activeLabel();
 832:               module.hide();
 833:             }
 834:           },
 835:           // prevents focus callback from occurring on mousedown
 836:           mousedown: function() {
 837:             activated = true;
 838:           },
 839:           mouseup: function() {
 840:             activated = false;
 841:           },
 842:           search: {
 843:             focus: function() {
 844:               activated = true;
 845:               if(module.is.multiple()) {
 846:                 module.remove.activeLabel();
 847:               }
 848:               if(settings.showOnFocus) {
 849:                 module.search();
 850:                 module.show();
 851:               }
 852:             },
 853:             blur: function(event) {
 854:               pageLostFocus = (document.activeElement === this);
 855:               if(!itemActivated && !pageLostFocus) {
 856:                 if(module.is.multiple()) {
 857:                   module.remove.activeLabel();
 858:                   module.hide();
 859:                 }
 860:                 else if(settings.forceSelection) {
 861:                   module.forceSelection();
 862:                 }
 863:                 else {
 864:                   module.hide();
 865:                 }
 866:               }
 867:               else if(pageLostFocus) {
 868:                 if(settings.forceSelection) {
 869:                   module.forceSelection();
 870:                 }
 871:               }
 872:             }
 873:           },
 874:           icon: {
 875:             click: function(event) {
 876:               module.toggle();
 877:               event.stopPropagation();
 878:             }
 879:           },
 880:           text: {
 881:             focus: function(event) {
 882:               activated = true;
 883:               module.focusSearch();
 884:             }
 885:           },
 886:           input: function(event) {
 887:             if(module.is.multiple() || module.is.searchSelection()) {
 888:               module.set.filtered();
 889:             }
 890:             clearTimeout(module.timer);
 891:             module.timer = setTimeout(module.search, settings.delay.search);
 892:           },
 893:           label: {
 894:             click: function(event) {
 895:               var
 896:                 $label        = $(this),
 897:                 $labels       = $module.find(selector.label),
 898:                 $activeLabels = $labels.filter('.' + className.active),
 899:                 $nextActive   = $label.nextAll('.' + className.active),
 900:                 $prevActive   = $label.prevAll('.' + className.active),
 901:                 $range = ($nextActive.length > 0)
 902:                   ? $label.nextUntil($nextActive).add($activeLabels).add($label)
 903:                   : $label.prevUntil($prevActive).add($activeLabels).add($label)
 904:               ;
 905:               if(event.shiftKey) {
 906:                 $activeLabels.removeClass(className.active);
 907:                 $range.addClass(className.active);
 908:               }
 909:               else if(event.ctrlKey) {
 910:                 $label.toggleClass(className.active);
 911:               }
 912:               else {
 913:                 $activeLabels.removeClass(className.active);
 914:                 $label.addClass(className.active);
 915:               }
 916:               settings.onLabelSelect.apply(this, $labels.filter('.' + className.active));
 917:             }
 918:           },
 919:           remove: {
 920:             click: function() {
 921:               var
 922:                 $label = $(this).parent()
 923:               ;
 924:               if( $label.hasClass(className.active) ) {
 925:                 // remove all selected labels
 926:                 module.remove.activeLabels();
 927:               }
 928:               else {
 929:                 // remove this label only
 930:                 module.remove.activeLabels( $label );
 931:               }
 932:             }
 933:           },
 934:           test: {
 935:             toggle: function(event) {
 936:               var
 937:                 toggleBehavior = (module.is.multiple())
 938:                   ? module.show
 939:                   : module.toggle
 940:               ;
 941:               if( module.determine.eventOnElement(event, toggleBehavior) ) {
 942:                 event.preventDefault();
 943:               }
 944:             },
 945:             touch: function(event) {
 946:               module.determine.eventOnElement(event, function() {
 947:                 if(event.type == 'touchstart') {
 948:                   module.timer = setTimeout(function() {
 949:                     module.hide();
 950:                   }, settings.delay.touch);
 951:                 }
 952:                 else if(event.type == 'touchmove') {
 953:                   clearTimeout(module.timer);
 954:                 }
 955:               });
 956:               event.stopPropagation();
 957:             },
 958:             hide: function(event) {
 959:               module.determine.eventInModule(event, module.hide);
 960:             }
 961:           },
 962:           menu: {
 963:             mousedown: function() {
 964:               itemActivated = true;
 965:             },
 966:             mouseup: function() {
 967:               itemActivated = false;
 968:             }
 969:           },
 970:           item: {
 971:             mouseenter: function(event) {
 972:               var
 973:                 $subMenu    = $(this).children(selector.menu),
 974:                 $otherMenus = $(this).siblings(selector.item).children(selector.menu)
 975:               ;
 976:               if( $subMenu.length > 0 ) {
 977:                 clearTimeout(module.itemTimer);
 978:                 module.itemTimer = setTimeout(function() {
 979:                   module.verbose('Showing sub-menu', $subMenu);
 980:                   $.each($otherMenus, function() {
 981:                     module.animate.hide(false, $(this));
 982:                   });
 983:                   module.animate.show(false,  $subMenu);
 984:                 }, settings.delay.show);
 985:                 event.preventDefault();
 986:               }
 987:             },
 988:             mouseleave: function(event) {
 989:               var
 990:                 $subMenu = $(this).children(selector.menu)
 991:               ;
 992:               if($subMenu.length > 0) {
 993:                 clearTimeout(module.itemTimer);
 994:                 module.itemTimer = setTimeout(function() {
 995:                   module.verbose('Hiding sub-menu', $subMenu);
 996:                   module.animate.hide(false,  $subMenu);
 997:                 }, settings.delay.hide);
 998:               }
 999:             },
1000:             touchend: function() {
1001:             },
1002:             click: function (event) {
1003:               var
1004:                 $choice        = $(this),
1005:                 $target        = (event)
1006:                   ? $(event.target)
1007:                   : $(''),
1008:                 $subMenu       = $choice.find(selector.menu),
1009:                 text           = module.get.choiceText($choice),
1010:                 value          = module.get.choiceValue($choice, text),
1011:                 hasSubMenu     = ($subMenu.length > 0),
1012:                 isBubbledEvent = ($subMenu.find($target).length > 0)
1013:               ;
1014:               if(!isBubbledEvent && (!hasSubMenu || settings.allowCategorySelection)) {
1015:                 if(!settings.useLabels) {
1016:                   module.remove.filteredItem();
1017:                   module.remove.searchTerm();
1018:                   module.set.scrollPosition($choice);
1019:                 }
1020:                 module.determine.selectAction.call(this, text, value);
1021:               }
1022:             }
1023:           },
1024: 
1025:           document: {
1026:             // label selection should occur even when element has no focus
1027:             keydown: function(event) {
1028:               var
1029:                 pressedKey    = event.which,
1030:                 isShortcutKey = module.is.inObject(pressedKey, keys)
1031:               ;
1032:               if(isShortcutKey) {
1033:                 var
1034:                   $label            = $module.find(selector.label),
1035:                   $activeLabel      = $label.filter('.' + className.active),
1036:                   activeValue       = $activeLabel.data(metadata.value),
1037:                   labelIndex        = $label.index($activeLabel),
1038:                   labelCount        = $label.length,
1039:                   hasActiveLabel    = ($activeLabel.length > 0),
1040:                   hasMultipleActive = ($activeLabel.length > 1),
1041:                   isFirstLabel      = (labelIndex === 0),
1042:                   isLastLabel       = (labelIndex + 1 == labelCount),
1043:                   isSearch          = module.is.searchSelection(),
1044:                   isFocusedOnSearch = module.is.focusedOnSearch(),
1045:                   isFocused         = module.is.focused(),
1046:                   caretAtStart      = (isFocusedOnSearch && module.get.caretPosition() === 0),
1047:                   $nextLabel
1048:                 ;
1049:                 if(isSearch && !hasActiveLabel && !isFocusedOnSearch) {
1050:                   return;
1051:                 }
1052: 
1053:                 if(pressedKey == keys.leftArrow) {
1054:                   // activate previous label
1055:                   if((isFocused || caretAtStart) && !hasActiveLabel) {
1056:                     module.verbose('Selecting previous label');
1057:                     $label.last().addClass(className.active);
1058:                   }
1059:                   else if(hasActiveLabel) {
1060:                     if(!event.shiftKey) {
1061:                       module.verbose('Selecting previous label');
1062:                       $label.removeClass(className.active);
1063:                     }
1064:                     else {
1065:                       module.verbose('Adding previous label to selection');
1066:                     }
1067:                     if(isFirstLabel && !hasMultipleActive) {
1068:                       $activeLabel.addClass(className.active);
1069:                     }
1070:                     else {
1071:                       $activeLabel.prev(selector.siblingLabel)
1072:                         .addClass(className.active)
1073:                         .end()
1074:                       ;
1075:                     }
1076:                     event.preventDefault();
1077:                   }
1078:                 }
1079:                 else if(pressedKey == keys.rightArrow) {
1080:                   // activate first label
1081:                   if(isFocused && !hasActiveLabel) {
1082:                     $label.first().addClass(className.active);
1083:                   }
1084:                   // activate next label
1085:                   if(hasActiveLabel) {
1086:                     if(!event.shiftKey) {
1087:                       module.verbose('Selecting next label');
1088:                       $label.removeClass(className.active);
1089:                     }
1090:                     else {
1091:                       module.verbose('Adding next label to selection');
1092:                     }
1093:                     if(isLastLabel) {
1094:                       if(isSearch) {
1095:                         if(!isFocusedOnSearch) {
1096:                           module.focusSearch();
1097:                         }
1098:                         else {
1099:                           $label.removeClass(className.active);
1100:                         }
1101:                       }
1102:                       else if(hasMultipleActive) {
1103:                         $activeLabel.next(selector.siblingLabel).addClass(className.active);
1104:                       }
1105:                       else {
1106:                         $activeLabel.addClass(className.active);
1107:                       }
1108:                     }
1109:                     else {
1110:                       $activeLabel.next(selector.siblingLabel).addClass(className.active);
1111:                     }
1112:                     event.preventDefault();
1113:                   }
1114:                 }
1115:                 else if(pressedKey == keys.deleteKey || pressedKey == keys.backspace) {
1116:                   if(hasActiveLabel) {
1117:                     module.verbose('Removing active labels');
1118:                     if(isLastLabel) {
1119:                       if(isSearch && !isFocusedOnSearch) {
1120:                         module.focusSearch();
1121:                       }
1122:                     }
1123:                     $activeLabel.last().next(selector.siblingLabel).addClass(className.active);
1124:                     module.remove.activeLabels($activeLabel);
1125:                     event.preventDefault();
1126:                   }
1127:                   else if(caretAtStart && !hasActiveLabel && pressedKey == keys.backspace) {
1128:                     module.verbose('Removing last label on input backspace');
1129:                     $activeLabel = $label.last().addClass(className.active);
1130:                     module.remove.activeLabels($activeLabel);
1131:                   }
1132:                 }
1133:                 else {
1134:                   $activeLabel.removeClass(className.active);
1135:                 }
1136:               }
1137:             }
1138:           },
1139: 
1140:           keydown: function(event) {
1141:             var
1142:               pressedKey    = event.which,
1143:               isShortcutKey = module.is.inObject(pressedKey, keys)
1144:             ;
1145:             if(isShortcutKey) {
1146:               var
1147:                 $currentlySelected = $item.not(selector.unselectable).filter('.' + className.selected).eq(0),
1148:                 $activeItem        = $menu.children('.' + className.active).eq(0),
1149:                 $selectedItem      = ($currentlySelected.length > 0)
1150:                   ? $currentlySelected
1151:                   : $activeItem,
1152:                 $visibleItems = ($selectedItem.length > 0)
1153:                   ? $selectedItem.siblings(':not(.' + className.filtered +')').andSelf()
1154:                   : $menu.children(':not(.' + className.filtered +')'),
1155:                 $subMenu             = $selectedItem.children(selector.menu),
1156:                 $parentMenu          = $selectedItem.closest(selector.menu),
1157:                 inVisibleMenu        = ($parentMenu.hasClass(className.visible) || $parentMenu.hasClass(className.animating) || $parentMenu.parent(selector.menu).length > 0),
1158:                 hasSubMenu           = ($subMenu.length> 0),
1159:                 hasSelectedItem      = ($selectedItem.length > 0),
1160:                 selectedIsSelectable = ($selectedItem.not(selector.unselectable).length > 0),
1161:                 delimiterPressed     = (pressedKey == keys.delimiter && settings.allowAdditions && module.is.multiple()),
1162:                 $nextItem,
1163:                 isSubMenuitem,
1164:                 newIndex
1165:               ;
1166:               // visible menu keyboard shortcuts
1167:               if( module.is.visible() ) {
1168: 
1169:                 // enter (select or open sub-menu)
1170:                 if(pressedKey == keys.enter || delimiterPressed) {
1171:                   if(pressedKey == keys.enter && hasSelectedItem && hasSubMenu && !settings.allowCategorySelection) {
1172:                     module.verbose('Pressed enter on unselectable category, opening sub menu');
1173:                     pressedKey = keys.rightArrow;
1174:                   }
1175:                   else if(selectedIsSelectable) {
1176:                     module.verbose('Selecting item from keyboard shortcut', $selectedItem);
1177:                     module.event.item.click.call($selectedItem, event);
1178:                     if(module.is.searchSelection()) {
1179:                       module.remove.searchTerm();
1180:                     }
1181:                   }
1182:                   event.preventDefault();
1183:                 }
1184: 
1185:                 // left arrow (hide sub-menu)
1186:                 if(pressedKey == keys.leftArrow) {
1187: 
1188:                   isSubMenuitem = ($parentMenu[0] !== $menu[0]);
1189: 
1190:                   if(isSubMenuitem) {
1191:                     module.verbose('Left key pressed, closing sub-menu');
1192:                     module.animate.hide(false,  $parentMenu);
1193:                     $selectedItem
1194:                       .removeClass(className.selected)
1195:                     ;
1196:                     $parentMenu
1197:                       .closest(selector.item)
1198:                         .addClass(className.selected)
1199:                     ;
1200:                     event.preventDefault();
1201:                   }
1202:                 }
1203: 
1204:                 // right arrow (show sub-menu)
1205:                 if(pressedKey == keys.rightArrow) {
1206:                   if(hasSubMenu) {
1207:                     module.verbose('Right key pressed, opening sub-menu');
1208:                     module.animate.show(false,  $subMenu);
1209:                     $selectedItem
1210:                       .removeClass(className.selected)
1211:                     ;
1212:                     $subMenu
1213:                       .find(selector.item).eq(0)
1214:                         .addClass(className.selected)
1215:                     ;
1216:                     event.preventDefault();
1217:                   }
1218:                 }
1219: 
1220:                 // up arrow (traverse menu up)
1221:                 if(pressedKey == keys.upArrow) {
1222:                   $nextItem = (hasSelectedItem && inVisibleMenu)
1223:                     ? $selectedItem.prevAll(selector.item + ':not(' + selector.unselectable + ')').eq(0)
1224:                     : $item.eq(0)
1225:                   ;
1226:                   if($visibleItems.index( $nextItem ) < 0) {
1227:                     module.verbose('Up key pressed but reached top of current menu');
1228:                     event.preventDefault();
1229:                     return;
1230:                   }
1231:                   else {
1232:                     module.verbose('Up key pressed, changing active item');
1233:                     $selectedItem
1234:                       .removeClass(className.selected)
1235:                     ;
1236:                     $nextItem
1237:                       .addClass(className.selected)
1238:                     ;
1239:                     module.set.scrollPosition($nextItem);
1240:                   }
1241:                   event.preventDefault();
1242:                 }
1243: 
1244:                 // down arrow (traverse menu down)
1245:                 if(pressedKey == keys.downArrow) {
1246:                   $nextItem = (hasSelectedItem && inVisibleMenu)
1247:                     ? $nextItem = $selectedItem.nextAll(selector.item + ':not(' + selector.unselectable + ')').eq(0)
1248:                     : $item.eq(0)
1249:                   ;
1250:                   if($nextItem.length === 0) {
1251:                     module.verbose('Down key pressed but reached bottom of current menu');
1252:                     event.preventDefault();
1253:                     return;
1254:                   }
1255:                   else {
1256:                     module.verbose('Down key pressed, changing active item');
1257:                     $item
1258:                       .removeClass(className.selected)
1259:                     ;
1260:                     $nextItem
1261:                       .addClass(className.selected)
1262:                     ;
1263:                     module.set.scrollPosition($nextItem);
1264:                   }
1265:                   event.preventDefault();
1266:                 }
1267: 
1268:                 // page down (show next page)
1269:                 if(pressedKey == keys.pageUp) {
1270:                   module.scrollPage('up');
1271:                   event.preventDefault();
1272:                 }
1273:                 if(pressedKey == keys.pageDown) {
1274:                   module.scrollPage('down');
1275:                   event.preventDefault();
1276:                 }
1277: 
1278:                 // escape (close menu)
1279:                 if(pressedKey == keys.escape) {
1280:                   module.verbose('Escape key pressed, closing dropdown');
1281:                   module.hide();
1282:                 }
1283: 
1284:               }
1285:               else {
1286:                 // delimiter key
1287:                 if(delimiterPressed) {
1288:                   event.preventDefault();
1289:                 }
1290:                 // down arrow (open menu)
1291:                 if(pressedKey == keys.downArrow) {
1292:                   module.verbose('Down key pressed, showing dropdown');
1293:                   module.show();
1294:                   event.preventDefault();
1295:                 }
1296:               }
1297:             }
1298:             else {
1299:               if( module.is.selection() && !module.is.search() ) {
1300:                 module.set.selectedLetter( String.fromCharCode(pressedKey) );
1301:               }
1302:             }
1303:           }
1304:         },
1305: 
1306:         trigger: {
1307:           change: function() {
1308:             var
1309:               events       = document.createEvent('HTMLEvents'),
1310:               inputElement = $input[0]
1311:             ;
1312:             if(inputElement) {
1313:               module.verbose('Triggering native change event');
1314:               events.initEvent('change', true, false);
1315:               inputElement.dispatchEvent(events);
1316:             }
1317:           }
1318:         },
1319: 
1320:         determine: {
1321:           selectAction: function(text, value) {
1322:             module.verbose('Determining action', settings.action);
1323:             if( $.isFunction( module.action[settings.action] ) ) {
1324:               module.verbose('Triggering preset action', settings.action, text, value);
1325:               module.action[ settings.action ].call(this, text, value);
1326:             }
1327:             else if( $.isFunction(settings.action) ) {
1328:               module.verbose('Triggering user action', settings.action, text, value);
1329:               settings.action.call(this, text, value);
1330:             }
1331:             else {
1332:               module.error(error.action, settings.action);
1333:             }
1334:           },
1335:           eventInModule: function(event, callback) {
1336:             var
1337:               $target    = $(event.target),
1338:               inDocument = ($target.closest(document.documentElement).length > 0),
1339:               inModule   = ($target.closest($module).length > 0)
1340:             ;
1341:             callback = $.isFunction(callback)
1342:               ? callback
1343:               : function(){}
1344:             ;
1345:             if(inDocument && !inModule) {
1346:               module.verbose('Triggering event', callback);
1347:               callback();
1348:               return true;
1349:             }
1350:             else {
1351:               module.verbose('Event occurred in dropdown, canceling callback');
1352:               return false;
1353:             }
1354:           },
1355:           eventOnElement: function(event, callback) {
1356:             var
1357:               $target    = $(event.target),
1358:               $label     = $target.closest(selector.siblingLabel),
1359:               notOnLabel = ($module.find($label).length === 0),
1360:               notInMenu  = ($target.closest($menu).length === 0)
1361:             ;
1362:             callback = $.isFunction(callback)
1363:               ? callback
1364:               : function(){}
1365:             ;
1366:             if(notOnLabel && notInMenu) {
1367:               module.verbose('Triggering event', callback);
1368:               callback();
1369:               return true;
1370:             }
1371:             else {
1372:               module.verbose('Event occurred in dropdown menu, canceling callback');
1373:               return false;
1374:             }
1375:           }
1376:         },
1377: 
1378:         action: {
1379: 
1380:           nothing: function() {},
1381: 
1382:           activate: function(text, value) {
1383:             value = (value !== undefined)
1384:               ? value
1385:               : text
1386:             ;
1387:             if( module.can.activate( $(this) ) ) {
1388:               module.set.selected(value, $(this));
1389:               if(module.is.multiple() && !module.is.allFiltered()) {
1390:                 return;
1391:               }
1392:               else {
1393:                 module.hideAndClear();
1394:               }
1395:             }
1396:           },
1397: 
1398:           select: function(text, value) {
1399:             // mimics action.activate but does not select text
1400:             module.action.activate.call(this);
1401:           },
1402: 
1403:           combo: function(text, value) {
1404:             value = (value !== undefined)
1405:               ? value
1406:               : text
1407:             ;
1408:             module.set.selected(value, $(this));
1409:             module.hideAndClear();
1410:           },
1411: 
1412:           hide: function(text, value) {
1413:             module.set.value(value);
1414:             module.hideAndClear();
1415:           }
1416: 
1417:         },
1418: 
1419:         get: {
1420:           id: function() {
1421:             return id;
1422:           },
1423:           defaultText: function() {
1424:             return $module.data(metadata.defaultText);
1425:           },
1426:           defaultValue: function() {
1427:             return $module.data(metadata.defaultValue);
1428:           },
1429:           placeholderText: function() {
1430:             return $module.data(metadata.placeholderText) || '';
1431:           },
1432:           text: function() {
1433:             return $text.text();
1434:           },
1435:           query: function() {
1436:             return $.trim($search.val());
1437:           },
1438:           searchWidth: function(characterCount) {
1439:             return (characterCount * settings.glyphWidth) + 'em';
1440:           },
1441:           selectionCount: function() {
1442:             var
1443:               values = module.get.values(),
1444:               count
1445:             ;
1446:             count = ( module.is.multiple() )
1447:               ? $.isArray(values)
1448:                 ? values.length
1449:                 : 0
1450:               : (module.get.value() !== '')
1451:                 ? 1
1452:                 : 0
1453:             ;
1454:             return count;
1455:           },
1456:           transition: function($subMenu) {
1457:             return (settings.transition == 'auto')
1458:               ? module.is.upward($subMenu)
1459:                 ? 'slide up'
1460:                 : 'slide down'
1461:               : settings.transition
1462:             ;
1463:           },
1464:           userValues: function() {
1465:             var
1466:               values = module.get.values()
1467:             ;
1468:             if(!values) {
1469:               return false;
1470:             }
1471:             values = $.isArray(values)
1472:               ? values
1473:               : [values]
1474:             ;
1475:             return $.grep(values, function(value) {
1476:               return (module.get.item(value) === false);
1477:             });
1478:           },
1479:           uniqueArray: function(array) {
1480:             return $.grep(array, function (value, index) {
1481:                 return $.inArray(value, array) === index;
1482:             });
1483:           },
1484:           caretPosition: function() {
1485:             var
1486:               input = $search.get(0),
1487:               range,
1488:               rangeLength
1489:             ;
1490:             if('selectionStart' in input) {
1491:               return input.selectionStart;
1492:             }
1493:             else if (document.selection) {
1494:               input.focus();
1495:               range       = document.selection.createRange();
1496:               rangeLength = range.text.length;
1497:               range.moveStart('character', -input.value.length);
1498:               return range.text.length - rangeLength;
1499:             }
1500:           },
1501:           value: function() {
1502:             var
1503:               value = ($input.length > 0)
1504:                 ? $input.val()
1505:                 : $module.data(metadata.value)
1506:             ;
1507:             // prevents placeholder element from being selected when multiple
1508:             if($.isArray(value) && value.length === 1 && value[0] === '') {
1509:               return '';
1510:             }
1511:             return value;
1512:           },
1513:           values: function() {
1514:             var
1515:               value = module.get.value()
1516:             ;
1517:             if(value === '') {
1518:               return '';
1519:             }
1520:             return ( !module.has.selectInput() && module.is.multiple() )
1521:               ? (typeof value == 'string') // delimited string
1522:                 ? value.split(settings.delimiter)
1523:                 : ''
1524:               : value
1525:             ;
1526:           },
1527:           remoteValues: function() {
1528:             var
1529:               values = module.get.values(),
1530:               remoteValues = false
1531:             ;
1532:             if(values) {
1533:               if(typeof values == 'string') {
1534:                 values = [values];
1535:               }
1536:               remoteValues = {};
1537:               $.each(values, function(index, value) {
1538:                 var
1539:                   name = module.read.remoteData(value)
1540:                 ;
1541:                 module.verbose('Restoring value from session data', name, value);
1542:                 remoteValues[value] = (name)
1543:                   ? name
1544:                   : value
1545:                 ;
1546:               });
1547:             }
1548:             return remoteValues;
1549:           },
1550:           choiceText: function($choice, preserveHTML) {
1551:             preserveHTML = (preserveHTML !== undefined)
1552:               ? preserveHTML
1553:               : settings.preserveHTML
1554:             ;
1555:             if($choice) {
1556:               if($choice.find(selector.menu).length > 0) {
1557:                 module.verbose('Retreiving text of element with sub-menu');
1558:                 $choice = $choice.clone();
1559:                 $choice.find(selector.menu).remove();
1560:                 $choice.find(selector.menuicon).remove();
1561:               }
1562:               return ($choice.data(metadata.text) !== undefined)
1563:                 ? $choice.data(metadata.text)
1564:                 : (preserveHTML)
1565:                   ? $.trim($choice.html())
1566:                   : $.trim($choice.text())
1567:               ;
1568:             }
1569:           },
1570:           choiceValue: function($choice, choiceText) {
