1571:             choiceText = choiceText || module.get.choiceText($choice);
1572:             if(!$choice) {
1573:               return false;
1574:             }
1575:             return ($choice.data(metadata.value) !== undefined)
1576:               ? String( $choice.data(metadata.value) )
1577:               : (typeof choiceText === 'string')
1578:                 ? $.trim(choiceText.toLowerCase())
1579:                 : String(choiceText)
1580:             ;
1581:           },
1582:           inputEvent: function() {
1583:             var
1584:               input = $search[0]
1585:             ;
1586:             if(input) {
1587:               return (input.oninput !== undefined)
1588:                 ? 'input'
1589:                 : (input.onpropertychange !== undefined)
1590:                   ? 'propertychange'
1591:                   : 'keyup'
1592:               ;
1593:             }
1594:             return false;
1595:           },
1596:           selectValues: function() {
1597:             var
1598:               select = {}
1599:             ;
1600:             select.values = [];
1601:             $module
1602:               .find('option')
1603:                 .each(function() {
1604:                   var
1605:                     $option  = $(this),
1606:                     name     = $option.html(),
1607:                     disabled = $option.attr('disabled'),
1608:                     value    = ( $option.attr('value') !== undefined )
1609:                       ? $option.attr('value')
1610:                       : name
1611:                   ;
1612:                   if(settings.placeholder === 'auto' && value === '') {
1613:                     select.placeholder = name;
1614:                   }
1615:                   else {
1616:                     select.values.push({
1617:                       name     : name,
1618:                       value    : value,
1619:                       disabled : disabled
1620:                     });
1621:                   }
1622:                 })
1623:             ;
1624:             if(settings.placeholder && settings.placeholder !== 'auto') {
1625:               module.debug('Setting placeholder value to', settings.placeholder);
1626:               select.placeholder = settings.placeholder;
1627:             }
1628:             if(settings.sortSelect) {
1629:               select.values.sort(function(a, b) {
1630:                 return (a.name > b.name)
1631:                   ? 1
1632:                   : -1
1633:                 ;
1634:               });
1635:               module.debug('Retrieved and sorted values from select', select);
1636:             }
1637:             else {
1638:               module.debug('Retreived values from select', select);
1639:             }
1640:             return select;
1641:           },
1642:           activeItem: function() {
1643:             return $item.filter('.'  + className.active);
1644:           },
1645:           selectedItem: function() {
1646:             var
1647:               $selectedItem = $item.not(selector.unselectable).filter('.'  + className.selected)
1648:             ;
1649:             return ($selectedItem.length > 0)
1650:               ? $selectedItem
1651:               : $item.eq(0)
1652:             ;
1653:           },
1654:           itemWithAdditions: function(value) {
1655:             var
1656:               $items       = module.get.item(value),
1657:               $userItems   = module.create.userChoice(value),
1658:               hasUserItems = ($userItems && $userItems.length > 0)
1659:             ;
1660:             if(hasUserItems) {
1661:               $items = ($items.length > 0)
1662:                 ? $items.add($userItems)
1663:                 : $userItems
1664:               ;
1665:             }
1666:             return $items;
1667:           },
1668:           item: function(value, strict) {
1669:             var
1670:               $selectedItem = false,
1671:               shouldSearch,
1672:               isMultiple
1673:             ;
1674:             value = (value !== undefined)
1675:               ? value
1676:               : ( module.get.values() !== undefined)
1677:                 ? module.get.values()
1678:                 : module.get.text()
1679:             ;
1680:             shouldSearch = (isMultiple)
1681:               ? (value.length > 0)
1682:               : (value !== undefined && value !== null)
1683:             ;
1684:             isMultiple = (module.is.multiple() && $.isArray(value));
1685:             strict     = (value === '' || value === 0)
1686:               ? true
1687:               : strict || false
1688:             ;
1689:             if(shouldSearch) {
1690:               $item
1691:                 .each(function() {
1692:                   var
1693:                     $choice       = $(this),
1694:                     optionText    = module.get.choiceText($choice),
1695:                     optionValue   = module.get.choiceValue($choice, optionText)
1696:                   ;
1697:                   // safe early exit
1698:                   if(optionValue === null || optionValue === undefined) {
1699:                     return;
1700:                   }
1701:                   if(isMultiple) {
1702:                     if($.inArray( String(optionValue), value) !== -1 || $.inArray(optionText, value) !== -1) {
1703:                       $selectedItem = ($selectedItem)
1704:                         ? $selectedItem.add($choice)
1705:                         : $choice
1706:                       ;
1707:                     }
1708:                   }
1709:                   else if(strict) {
1710:                     module.verbose('Ambiguous dropdown value using strict type check', $choice, value);
1711:                     if( optionValue === value || optionText === value) {
1712:                       $selectedItem = $choice;
1713:                       return true;
1714:                     }
1715:                   }
1716:                   else {
1717:                     if( String(optionValue) == String(value) || optionText == value) {
1718:                       module.verbose('Found select item by value', optionValue, value);
1719:                       $selectedItem = $choice;
1720:                       return true;
1721:                     }
1722:                   }
1723:                 })
1724:               ;
1725:             }
1726:             return $selectedItem;
1727:           }
1728:         },
1729: 
1730:         check: {
1731:           maxSelections: function(selectionCount) {
1732:             if(settings.maxSelections) {
1733:               selectionCount = (selectionCount !== undefined)
1734:                 ? selectionCount
1735:                 : module.get.selectionCount()
1736:               ;
1737:               if(selectionCount >= settings.maxSelections) {
1738:                 module.debug('Maximum selection count reached');
1739:                 if(settings.useLabels) {
1740:                   $item.addClass(className.filtered);
1741:                   module.add.message(message.maxSelections);
1742:                 }
1743:                 return true;
1744:               }
1745:               else {
1746:                 module.verbose('No longer at maximum selection count');
1747:                 module.remove.message();
1748:                 module.remove.filteredItem();
1749:                 if(module.is.searchSelection()) {
1750:                   module.filterItems();
1751:                 }
1752:                 return false;
1753:               }
1754:             }
1755:             return true;
1756:           }
1757:         },
1758: 
1759:         restore: {
1760:           defaults: function() {
1761:             module.clear();
1762:             module.restore.defaultText();
1763:             module.restore.defaultValue();
1764:           },
1765:           defaultText: function() {
1766:             var
1767:               defaultText     = module.get.defaultText(),
1768:               placeholderText = module.get.placeholderText
1769:             ;
1770:             if(defaultText === placeholderText) {
1771:               module.debug('Restoring default placeholder text', defaultText);
1772:               module.set.placeholderText(defaultText);
1773:             }
1774:             else {
1775:               module.debug('Restoring default text', defaultText);
1776:               module.set.text(defaultText);
1777:             }
1778:           },
1779:           defaultValue: function() {
1780:             var
1781:               defaultValue = module.get.defaultValue()
1782:             ;
1783:             if(defaultValue !== undefined) {
1784:               module.debug('Restoring default value', defaultValue);
1785:               if(defaultValue !== '') {
1786:                 module.set.value(defaultValue);
1787:                 module.set.selected();
1788:               }
1789:               else {
1790:                 module.remove.activeItem();
1791:                 module.remove.selectedItem();
1792:               }
1793:             }
1794:           },
1795:           labels: function() {
1796:             if(settings.allowAdditions) {
1797:               if(!settings.useLabels) {
1798:                 module.error(error.labels);
1799:                 settings.useLabels = true;
1800:               }
1801:               module.debug('Restoring selected values');
1802:               module.create.userLabels();
1803:             }
1804:             module.check.maxSelections();
1805:           },
1806:           selected: function() {
1807:             module.restore.values();
1808:             if(module.is.multiple()) {
1809:               module.debug('Restoring previously selected values and labels');
1810:               module.restore.labels();
1811:             }
1812:             else {
1813:               module.debug('Restoring previously selected values');
1814:             }
1815:           },
1816:           values: function() {
1817:             // prevents callbacks from occuring on initial load
1818:             module.set.initialLoad();
1819:             if(settings.apiSettings) {
1820:               if(settings.saveRemoteData) {
1821:                 module.restore.remoteValues();
1822:               }
1823:               else {
1824:                 module.clearValue();
1825:               }
1826:             }
1827:             else {
1828:               module.set.selected();
1829:             }
1830:             module.remove.initialLoad();
1831:           },
1832:           remoteValues: function() {
1833:             var
1834:               values = module.get.remoteValues()
1835:             ;
1836:             module.debug('Recreating selected from session data', values);
1837:             if(values) {
1838:               if( module.is.single() ) {
1839:                 $.each(values, function(value, name) {
1840:                   module.set.text(name);
1841:                 });
1842:               }
1843:               else {
1844:                 $.each(values, function(value, name) {
1845:                   module.add.label(value, name);
1846:                 });
1847:               }
1848:             }
1849:           }
1850:         },
1851: 
1852:         read: {
1853:           remoteData: function(value) {
1854:             var
1855:               name
1856:             ;
1857:             if(window.Storage === undefined) {
1858:               module.error(error.noStorage);
1859:               return;
1860:             }
1861:             name = sessionStorage.getItem(value);
1862:             return (name !== undefined)
1863:               ? name
1864:               : false
1865:             ;
1866:           }
1867:         },
1868: 
1869:         save: {
1870:           defaults: function() {
1871:             module.save.defaultText();
1872:             module.save.placeholderText();
1873:             module.save.defaultValue();
1874:           },
1875:           defaultValue: function() {
1876:             var
1877:               value = module.get.value()
1878:             ;
1879:             module.verbose('Saving default value as', value);
1880:             $module.data(metadata.defaultValue, value);
1881:           },
1882:           defaultText: function() {
1883:             var
1884:               text = module.get.text()
1885:             ;
1886:             module.verbose('Saving default text as', text);
1887:             $module.data(metadata.defaultText, text);
1888:           },
1889:           placeholderText: function() {
1890:             var
1891:               text
1892:             ;
1893:             if(settings.placeholder !== false && $text.hasClass(className.placeholder)) {
1894:               text = module.get.text();
1895:               module.verbose('Saving placeholder text as', text);
1896:               $module.data(metadata.placeholderText, text);
1897:             }
1898:           },
1899:           remoteData: function(name, value) {
1900:             if(window.Storage === undefined) {
1901:               module.error(error.noStorage);
1902:               return;
1903:             }
1904:             module.verbose('Saving remote data to session storage', value, name);
1905:             sessionStorage.setItem(value, name);
1906:           }
1907:         },
1908: 
1909:         clear: function() {
1910:           if(module.is.multiple()) {
1911:             module.remove.labels();
1912:           }
1913:           else {
1914:             module.remove.activeItem();
1915:             module.remove.selectedItem();
1916:           }
1917:           module.set.placeholderText();
1918:           module.clearValue();
1919:         },
1920: 
1921:         clearValue: function() {
1922:           module.set.value('');
1923:         },
1924: 
1925:         scrollPage: function(direction, $selectedItem) {
1926:           var
1927:             $currentItem  = $selectedItem || module.get.selectedItem(),
1928:             $menu         = $currentItem.closest(selector.menu),
1929:             menuHeight    = $menu.outerHeight(),
1930:             currentScroll = $menu.scrollTop(),
1931:             itemHeight    = $item.eq(0).outerHeight(),
1932:             itemsPerPage  = Math.floor(menuHeight / itemHeight),
1933:             maxScroll     = $menu.prop('scrollHeight'),
1934:             newScroll     = (direction == 'up')
1935:               ? currentScroll - (itemHeight * itemsPerPage)
1936:               : currentScroll + (itemHeight * itemsPerPage),
1937:             $selectableItem = $item.not(selector.unselectable),
1938:             isWithinRange,
1939:             $nextSelectedItem,
1940:             elementIndex
1941:           ;
1942:           elementIndex      = (direction == 'up')
1943:             ? $selectableItem.index($currentItem) - itemsPerPage
1944:             : $selectableItem.index($currentItem) + itemsPerPage
1945:           ;
1946:           isWithinRange = (direction == 'up')
1947:             ? (elementIndex >= 0)
1948:             : (elementIndex < $selectableItem.length)
1949:           ;
1950:           $nextSelectedItem = (isWithinRange)
1951:             ? $selectableItem.eq(elementIndex)
1952:             : (direction == 'up')
1953:               ? $selectableItem.first()
1954:               : $selectableItem.last()
1955:           ;
1956:           if($nextSelectedItem.length > 0) {
1957:             module.debug('Scrolling page', direction, $nextSelectedItem);
1958:             $currentItem
1959:               .removeClass(className.selected)
1960:             ;
1961:             $nextSelectedItem
1962:               .addClass(className.selected)
1963:             ;
1964:             $menu
1965:               .scrollTop(newScroll)
1966:             ;
1967:           }
1968:         },
1969: 
1970:         set: {
1971:           filtered: function() {
1972:             var
1973:               isMultiple       = module.is.multiple(),
1974:               isSearch         = module.is.searchSelection(),
1975:               isSearchMultiple = (isMultiple && isSearch),
1976:               searchValue      = (isSearch)
1977:                 ? module.get.query()
1978:                 : '',
1979:               hasSearchValue   = (typeof searchValue === 'string' && searchValue.length > 0),
1980:               searchWidth      = module.get.searchWidth(searchValue.length),
1981:               valueIsSet       = searchValue !== ''
1982:             ;
1983:             if(isMultiple && hasSearchValue) {
1984:               module.verbose('Adjusting input width', searchWidth, settings.glyphWidth);
1985:               $search.css('width', searchWidth);
1986:             }
1987:             if(hasSearchValue || (isSearchMultiple && valueIsSet)) {
1988:               module.verbose('Hiding placeholder text');
1989:               $text.addClass(className.filtered);
1990:             }
1991:             else if(!isMultiple || (isSearchMultiple && !valueIsSet)) {
1992:               module.verbose('Showing placeholder text');
1993:               $text.removeClass(className.filtered);
1994:             }
1995:           },
1996:           loading: function() {
1997:             $module.addClass(className.loading);
1998:           },
1999:           placeholderText: function(text) {
2000:             text = text || module.get.placeholderText();
2001:             module.debug('Setting placeholder text', text);
2002:             module.set.text(text);
2003:             $text.addClass(className.placeholder);
2004:           },
2005:           tabbable: function() {
2006:             if( module.has.search() ) {
2007:               module.debug('Added tabindex to searchable dropdown');
2008:               $search
2009:                 .val('')
2010:                 .attr('tabindex', 0)
2011:               ;
2012:               $menu
2013:                 .attr('tabindex', -1)
2014:               ;
2015:             }
2016:             else {
2017:               module.debug('Added tabindex to dropdown');
2018:               if( $module.attr('tabindex') === undefined) {
2019:                 $module
2020:                   .attr('tabindex', 0)
2021:                 ;
2022:                 $menu
2023:                   .attr('tabindex', -1)
2024:                 ;
2025:               }
2026:             }
2027:           },
2028:           initialLoad: function() {
2029:             module.verbose('Setting initial load');
2030:             initialLoad = true;
2031:           },
2032:           activeItem: function($item) {
2033:             if( settings.allowAdditions && $item.filter(selector.addition).length > 0 ) {
2034:               $item.addClass(className.filtered);
2035:             }
2036:             else {
2037:               $item.addClass(className.active);
2038:             }
2039:           },
2040:           scrollPosition: function($item, forceScroll) {
2041:             var
2042:               edgeTolerance = 5,
2043:               $menu,
2044:               hasActive,
2045:               offset,
2046:               itemHeight,
2047:               itemOffset,
2048:               menuOffset,
2049:               menuScroll,
2050:               menuHeight,
2051:               abovePage,
2052:               belowPage
2053:             ;
2054: 
2055:             $item       = $item || module.get.selectedItem();
2056:             $menu       = $item.closest(selector.menu);
2057:             hasActive   = ($item && $item.length > 0);
2058:             forceScroll = (forceScroll !== undefined)
2059:               ? forceScroll
2060:               : false
2061:             ;
2062:             if($item && $menu.length > 0 && hasActive) {
2063:               itemOffset = $item.position().top;
2064: 
2065:               $menu.addClass(className.loading);
2066:               menuScroll = $menu.scrollTop();
2067:               menuOffset = $menu.offset().top;
2068:               itemOffset = $item.offset().top;
2069:               offset     = menuScroll - menuOffset + itemOffset;
2070:               if(!forceScroll) {
2071:                 menuHeight = $menu.height();
2072:                 belowPage  = menuScroll + menuHeight < (offset + edgeTolerance);
2073:                 abovePage  = ((offset - edgeTolerance) < menuScroll);
2074:               }
2075:               module.debug('Scrolling to active item', offset);
2076:               if(forceScroll || abovePage || belowPage) {
2077:                 $menu.scrollTop(offset);
2078:               }
2079:               $menu.removeClass(className.loading);
2080:             }
2081:           },
2082:           text: function(text) {
2083:             if(settings.action !== 'select') {
2084:               if(settings.action == 'combo') {
2085:                 module.debug('Changing combo button text', text, $combo);
2086:                 if(settings.preserveHTML) {
2087:                   $combo.html(text);
2088:                 }
2089:                 else {
2090:                   $combo.text(text);
2091:                 }
2092:               }
2093:               else {
2094:                 if(text !== module.get.placeholderText()) {
2095:                   $text.removeClass(className.placeholder);
2096:                 }
2097:                 module.debug('Changing text', text, $text);
2098:                 $text
2099:                   .removeClass(className.filtered)
2100:                 ;
2101:                 if(settings.preserveHTML) {
2102:                   $text.html(text);
2103:                 }
2104:                 else {
2105:                   $text.text(text);
2106:                 }
2107:               }
2108:             }
2109:           },
2110:           selectedLetter: function(letter) {
2111:             var
2112:               $selectedItem         = $item.filter('.' + className.selected),
2113:               alreadySelectedLetter = $selectedItem.length > 0 && module.has.firstLetter($selectedItem, letter),
2114:               $nextValue            = false,
2115:               $nextItem
2116:             ;
2117:             // check next of same letter
2118:             if(alreadySelectedLetter) {
2119:               $nextItem = $selectedItem.nextAll($item).eq(0);
2120:               if( module.has.firstLetter($nextItem, letter) ) {
2121:                 $nextValue  = $nextItem;
2122:               }
2123:             }
2124:             // check all values
2125:             if(!$nextValue) {
2126:               $item
2127:                 .each(function(){
2128:                   if(module.has.firstLetter($(this), letter)) {
2129:                     $nextValue = $(this);
2130:                     return false;
2131:                   }
2132:                 })
2133:               ;
2134:             }
2135:             // set next value
2136:             if($nextValue) {
2137:               module.verbose('Scrolling to next value with letter', letter);
2138:               module.set.scrollPosition($nextValue);
2139:               $selectedItem.removeClass(className.selected);
2140:               $nextValue.addClass(className.selected);
2141:             }
2142:           },
2143:           direction: function($menu) {
2144:             if(settings.direction == 'auto') {
2145:               if(module.is.onScreen($menu)) {
2146:                 module.remove.upward($menu);
2147:               }
2148:               else {
2149:                 module.set.upward($menu);
2150:               }
2151:             }
2152:             else if(settings.direction == 'upward') {
2153:               module.set.upward($menu);
2154:             }
2155:           },
2156:           upward: function($menu) {
2157:             var $element = $menu || $module;
2158:             $element.addClass(className.upward);
2159:           },
2160:           value: function(value, text, $selected) {
2161:             var
2162:               hasInput     = ($input.length > 0),
2163:               isAddition   = !module.has.value(value),
2164:               currentValue = module.get.values(),
2165:               stringValue  = (value !== undefined)
2166:                 ? String(value)
2167:                 : value,
2168:               newValue
2169:             ;
2170:             if(hasInput) {
2171:               if(stringValue == currentValue) {
2172:                 module.verbose('Skipping value update already same value', value, currentValue);
2173:                 if(!module.is.initialLoad()) {
2174:                   return;
2175:                 }
2176:               }
2177: 
2178:               if( module.is.single() && module.has.selectInput() && module.can.extendSelect() ) {
2179:                 module.debug('Adding user option', value);
2180:                 module.add.optionValue(value);
2181:               }
2182:               module.debug('Updating input value', value, currentValue);
2183:               internalChange = true;
2184:               $input
2185:                 .val(value)
2186:               ;
2187:               if(settings.fireOnInit === false && module.is.initialLoad()) {
2188:                 module.debug('Input native change event ignored on initial load');
2189:               }
2190:               else {
2191:                 module.trigger.change();
2192:               }
2193:               internalChange = false;
2194:             }
2195:             else {
2196:               module.verbose('Storing value in metadata', value, $input);
2197:               if(value !== currentValue) {
2198:                 $module.data(metadata.value, stringValue);
2199:               }
2200:             }
2201:             if(settings.fireOnInit === false && module.is.initialLoad()) {
2202:               module.verbose('No callback on initial load', settings.onChange);
2203:             }
2204:             else {
2205:               settings.onChange.call(element, value, text, $selected);
2206:             }
2207:           },
2208:           active: function() {
2209:             $module
2210:               .addClass(className.active)
2211:             ;
2212:           },
2213:           multiple: function() {
2214:             $module.addClass(className.multiple);
2215:           },
2216:           visible: function() {
2217:             $module.addClass(className.visible);
2218:           },
2219:           exactly: function(value, $selectedItem) {
2220:             module.debug('Setting selected to exact values');
2221:             module.clear();
2222:             module.set.selected(value, $selectedItem);
2223:           },
2224:           selected: function(value, $selectedItem) {
2225:             var
2226:               isMultiple = module.is.multiple(),
2227:               $userSelectedItem
2228:             ;
2229:             $selectedItem = (settings.allowAdditions)
2230:               ? $selectedItem || module.get.itemWithAdditions(value)
2231:               : $selectedItem || module.get.item(value)
2232:             ;
2233:             if(!$selectedItem) {
2234:               return;
2235:             }
2236:             module.debug('Setting selected menu item to', $selectedItem);
2237:             if(module.is.single()) {
2238:               module.remove.activeItem();
2239:               module.remove.selectedItem();
2240:             }
2241:             else if(settings.useLabels) {
2242:               module.remove.selectedItem();
2243:             }
2244:             // select each item
2245:             $selectedItem
2246:               .each(function() {
2247:                 var
2248:                   $selected      = $(this),
2249:                   selectedText   = module.get.choiceText($selected),
2250:                   selectedValue  = module.get.choiceValue($selected, selectedText),
2251: 
2252:                   isFiltered     = $selected.hasClass(className.filtered),
2253:                   isActive       = $selected.hasClass(className.active),
2254:                   isUserValue    = $selected.hasClass(className.addition),
2255:                   shouldAnimate  = (isMultiple && $selectedItem.length == 1)
2256:                 ;
2257:                 if(isMultiple) {
2258:                   if(!isActive || isUserValue) {
2259:                     if(settings.apiSettings && settings.saveRemoteData) {
2260:                       module.save.remoteData(selectedText, selectedValue);
2261:                     }
2262:                     if(settings.useLabels) {
2263:                       module.add.value(selectedValue, selectedText, $selected);
2264:                       module.add.label(selectedValue, selectedText, shouldAnimate);
2265:                       module.set.activeItem($selected);
2266:                       module.filterActive();
2267:                       module.select.nextAvailable($selectedItem);
2268:                     }
2269:                     else {
2270:                       module.add.value(selectedValue, selectedText, $selected);
2271:                       module.set.text(module.add.variables(message.count));
2272:                       module.set.activeItem($selected);
2273:                     }
2274:                   }
2275:                   else if(!isFiltered) {
2276:                     module.debug('Selected active value, removing label');
2277:                     module.remove.selected(selectedValue);
2278:                   }
2279:                 }
2280:                 else {
2281:                   if(settings.apiSettings && settings.saveRemoteData) {
2282:                     module.save.remoteData(selectedText, selectedValue);
2283:                   }
2284:                   module.set.text(selectedText);
2285:                   module.set.value(selectedValue, selectedText, $selected);
2286:                   $selected
2287:                     .addClass(className.active)
2288:                     .addClass(className.selected)
2289:                   ;
2290:                 }
2291:               })
2292:             ;
2293:           }
2294:         },
2295: 
2296:         add: {
2297:           label: function(value, text, shouldAnimate) {
2298:             var
2299:               $next  = module.is.searchSelection()
2300:                 ? $search
2301:                 : $text,
2302:               $label
2303:             ;
2304:             $label =  $('<a />')
2305:               .addClass(className.label)
2306:               .attr('data-value', value)
2307:               .html(templates.label(value, text))
2308:             ;
2309:             $label = settings.onLabelCreate.call($label, value, text);
2310: 
2311:             if(module.has.label(value)) {
2312:               module.debug('Label already exists, skipping', value);
2313:               return;
2314:             }
2315:             if(settings.label.variation) {
2316:               $label.addClass(settings.label.variation);
2317:             }
2318:             if(shouldAnimate === true) {
2319:               module.debug('Animating in label', $label);
2320:               $label
2321:                 .addClass(className.hidden)
2322:                 .insertBefore($next)
2323:                 .transition(settings.label.transition, settings.label.duration)
2324:               ;
2325:             }
2326:             else {
2327:               module.debug('Adding selection label', $label);
2328:               $label
2329:                 .insertBefore($next)
2330:               ;
2331:             }
2332:           },
2333:           message: function(message) {
2334:             var
2335:               $message = $menu.children(selector.message),
2336:               html     = settings.templates.message(module.add.variables(message))
2337:             ;
2338:             if($message.length > 0) {
2339:               $message
2340:                 .html(html)
2341:               ;
2342:             }
2343:             else {
2344:               $message = $('<div/>')
2345:                 .html(html)
2346:                 .addClass(className.message)
2347:                 .appendTo($menu)
2348:               ;
2349:             }
2350:           },
2351:           optionValue: function(value) {
2352:             var
2353:               $option   = $input.find('option[value="' + value + '"]'),
2354:               hasOption = ($option.length > 0)
2355:             ;
2356:             if(hasOption) {
2357:               return;
2358:             }
2359:             // temporarily disconnect observer
2360:             if(selectObserver) {
2361:               selectObserver.disconnect();
2362:               module.verbose('Temporarily disconnecting mutation observer', value);
2363:             }
2364:             if( module.is.single() ) {
2365:               module.verbose('Removing previous user addition');
2366:               $input.find('option.' + className.addition).remove();
2367:             }
2368:             $('<option/>')
2369:               .prop('value', value)
2370:               .addClass(className.addition)
2371:               .html(value)
2372:               .appendTo($input)
2373:             ;
2374:             module.verbose('Adding user addition as an <option>', value);
2375:             if(selectObserver) {
2376:               selectObserver.observe($input[0], {
2377:                 childList : true,
2378:                 subtree   : true
2379:               });
2380:             }
2381:           },
2382:           userSuggestion: function(value) {
2383:             var
2384:               $addition         = $menu.children(selector.addition),
2385:               $existingItem     = module.get.item(value),
2386:               alreadyHasValue   = $existingItem && $existingItem.not(selector.addition).length,
2387:               hasUserSuggestion = $addition.length > 0,
2388:               html
2389:             ;
2390:             if(settings.useLabels && module.has.maxSelections()) {
2391:               return;
2392:             }
2393:             if(value === '' || alreadyHasValue) {
2394:               $addition.remove();
2395:               return;
2396:             }
2397:             $item
2398:               .removeClass(className.selected)
2399:             ;
2400:             if(hasUserSuggestion) {
2401:               html = settings.templates.addition( module.add.variables(message.addResult, value) );
2402:               $addition
2403:                 .html(html)
2404:                 .attr('data-' + metadata.value, value)
2405:                 .attr('data-' + metadata.text, value)
2406:                 .removeClass(className.filtered)
2407:                 .addClass(className.selected)
2408:               ;
2409:               module.verbose('Replacing user suggestion with new value', $addition);
2410:             }
2411:             else {
2412:               $addition = module.create.userChoice(value);
2413:               $addition
2414:                 .prependTo($menu)
2415:                 .addClass(className.selected)
2416:               ;
2417:               module.verbose('Adding item choice to menu corresponding with user choice addition', $addition);
2418:             }
2419:           },
2420:           variables: function(message, term) {
2421:             var
2422:               hasCount    = (message.search('{count}') !== -1),
2423:               hasMaxCount = (message.search('{maxCount}') !== -1),
2424:               hasTerm     = (message.search('{term}') !== -1),
2425:               values,
2426:               count,
2427:               query
2428:             ;
2429:             module.verbose('Adding templated variables to message', message);
2430:             if(hasCount) {
2431:               count  = module.get.selectionCount();
2432:               message = message.replace('{count}', count);
2433:             }
2434:             if(hasMaxCount) {
2435:               count  = module.get.selectionCount();
2436:               message = message.replace('{maxCount}', settings.maxSelections);
2437:             }
2438:             if(hasTerm) {
2439:               query   = term || module.get.query();
2440:               message = message.replace('{term}', query);
2441:             }
2442:             return message;
2443:           },
2444:           value: function(addedValue, addedText, $selectedItem) {
2445:             var
2446:               currentValue = module.get.values(),
2447:               newValue
2448:             ;
2449:             if(addedValue === '') {
2450:               module.debug('Cannot select blank values from multiselect');
2451:               return;
2452:             }
2453:             // extend current array
2454:             if($.isArray(currentValue)) {
2455:               newValue = currentValue.concat([addedValue]);
2456:               newValue = module.get.uniqueArray(newValue);
2457:             }
2458:             else {
2459:               newValue = [addedValue];
2460:             }
2461:             // add values
2462:             if( module.has.selectInput() ) {
2463:               if(module.can.extendSelect()) {
2464:                 module.debug('Adding value to select', addedValue, newValue, $input);
2465:                 module.add.optionValue(addedValue);
2466:               }
2467:             }
2468:             else {
2469:               newValue = newValue.join(settings.delimiter);
2470:               module.debug('Setting hidden input to delimited value', newValue, $input);
2471:             }
2472: 
2473:             if(settings.fireOnInit === false && module.is.initialLoad()) {
2474:               module.verbose('Skipping onadd callback on initial load', settings.onAdd);
2475:             }
2476:             else {
2477:               settings.onAdd.call(element, addedValue, addedText, $selectedItem);
2478:             }
2479:             module.set.value(newValue, addedValue, addedText, $selectedItem);
2480:             module.check.maxSelections();
2481:           }
2482:         },
2483: 
2484:         remove: {
2485:           active: function() {
2486:             $module.removeClass(className.active);
2487:           },
2488:           activeLabel: function() {
2489:             $module.find(selector.label).removeClass(className.active);
2490:           },
2491:           loading: function() {
2492:             $module.removeClass(className.loading);
2493:           },
2494:           initialLoad: function() {
2495:             initialLoad = false;
2496:           },
2497:           upward: function($menu) {
2498:             var $element = $menu || $module;
2499:             $element.removeClass(className.upward);
2500:           },
2501:           visible: function() {
2502:             $module.removeClass(className.visible);
2503:           },
2504:           activeItem: function() {
2505:             $item.removeClass(className.active);
2506:           },
2507:           filteredItem: function() {
2508:             if(settings.useLabels && module.has.maxSelections() ) {
2509:               return;
2510:             }
2511:             if(settings.useLabels && module.is.multiple()) {
2512:               $item.not('.' + className.active).removeClass(className.filtered);
2513:             }
2514:             else {
2515:               $item.removeClass(className.filtered);
2516:             }
2517:           },
2518:           optionValue: function(value) {
2519:             var
2520:               $option   = $input.find('option[value="' + value + '"]'),
2521:               hasOption = ($option.length > 0)
2522:             ;
2523:             if(!hasOption || !$option.hasClass(className.addition)) {
2524:               return;
2525:             }
2526:             // temporarily disconnect observer
2527:             if(selectObserver) {
2528:               selectObserver.disconnect();
2529:               module.verbose('Temporarily disconnecting mutation observer', value);
2530:             }
2531:             $option.remove();
2532:             module.verbose('Removing user addition as an <option>', value);
2533:             if(selectObserver) {
2534:               selectObserver.observe($input[0], {
2535:                 childList : true,
2536:                 subtree   : true
2537:               });
2538:             }
2539:           },
2540:           message: function() {
2541:             $menu.children(selector.message).remove();
2542:           },
2543:           searchTerm: function() {
2544:             module.verbose('Cleared search term');
2545:             $search.val('');
2546:             module.set.filtered();
2547:           },
2548:           selected: function(value, $selectedItem) {
2549:             $selectedItem = (settings.allowAdditions)
2550:               ? $selectedItem || module.get.itemWithAdditions(value)
2551:               : $selectedItem || module.get.item(value)
2552:             ;
2553: 
2554:             if(!$selectedItem) {
2555:               return false;
2556:             }
2557: 
2558:             $selectedItem
2559:               .each(function() {
2560:                 var
2561:                   $selected     = $(this),
2562:                   selectedText  = module.get.choiceText($selected),
2563:                   selectedValue = module.get.choiceValue($selected, selectedText)
2564:                 ;
2565:                 if(module.is.multiple()) {
2566:                   if(settings.useLabels) {
2567:                     module.remove.value(selectedValue, selectedText, $selected);
2568:                     module.remove.label(selectedValue);
2569:                   }
2570:                   else {
2571:                     module.remove.value(selectedValue, selectedText, $selected);
2572:                     if(module.get.selectionCount() === 0) {
2573:                       module.set.placeholderText();
2574:                     }
2575:                     else {
2576:                       module.set.text(module.add.variables(message.count));
2577:                     }
2578:                   }
2579:                 }
2580:                 else {
2581:                   module.remove.value(selectedValue, selectedText, $selected);
2582:                 }
2583:                 $selected
2584:                   .removeClass(className.filtered)
2585:                   .removeClass(className.active)
2586:                 ;
2587:                 if(settings.useLabels) {
2588:                   $selected.removeClass(className.selected);
2589:                 }
2590:               })
2591:             ;
2592:           },
2593:           selectedItem: function() {
2594:             $item.removeClass(className.selected);
2595:           },
2596:           value: function(removedValue, removedText, $removedItem) {
2597:             var
2598:               values = module.get.values(),
2599:               newValue
2600:             ;
2601:             if( module.has.selectInput() ) {
2602:               module.verbose('Input is <select> removing selected option', removedValue);
2603:               newValue = module.remove.arrayValue(removedValue, values);
2604:               module.remove.optionValue(removedValue);
2605:             }
2606:             else {
2607:               module.verbose('Removing from delimited values', removedValue);
2608:               newValue = module.remove.arrayValue(removedValue, values);
2609:               newValue = newValue.join(settings.delimiter);
2610:             }
2611:             if(settings.fireOnInit === false && module.is.initialLoad()) {
2612:               module.verbose('No callback on initial load', settings.onRemove);
2613:             }
2614:             else {
2615:               settings.onRemove.call(element, removedValue, removedText, $removedItem);
2616:             }
2617:             module.set.value(newValue, removedText, $removedItem);
2618:             module.check.maxSelections();
2619:           },
2620:           arrayValue: function(removedValue, values) {
2621:             if( !$.isArray(values) ) {
2622:               values = [values];
2623:             }
2624:             values = $.grep(values, function(value){
2625:               return (removedValue != value);
2626:             });
2627:             module.verbose('Removed value from delimited string', removedValue, values);
2628:             return values;
2629:           },
2630:           label: function(value, shouldAnimate) {
2631:             var
2632:               $labels       = $module.find(selector.label),
2633:               $removedLabel = $labels.filter('[data-value="' + value +'"]')
2634:             ;
2635:             module.verbose('Removing label', $removedLabel);
2636:             $removedLabel.remove();
2637:           },
2638:           activeLabels: function($activeLabels) {
2639:             $activeLabels = $activeLabels || $module.find(selector.label).filter('.' + className.active);
2640:             module.verbose('Removing active label selections', $activeLabels);
2641:             module.remove.labels($activeLabels);
2642:           },
2643:           labels: function($labels) {
2644:             $labels = $labels || $module.find(selector.label);
2645:             module.verbose('Removing labels', $labels);
2646:             $labels
2647:               .each(function(){
2648:                 var
2649:                   $label      = $(this),
2650:                   value       = $label.data(metadata.value),
2651:                   stringValue = (value !== undefined)
2652:                     ? String(value)
2653:                     : value,
2654:                   isUserValue = module.is.userValue(stringValue)
2655:                 ;
2656:                 if(settings.onLabelRemove.call($label, value) === false) {
2657:                   module.debug('Label remove callback cancelled removal');
2658:                   return;
2659:                 }
2660:                 if(isUserValue) {
2661:                   module.remove.value(stringValue);
2662:                   module.remove.label(stringValue);
2663:                 }
2664:                 else {
2665:                   // selected will also remove label
2666:                   module.remove.selected(stringValue);
2667:                 }
2668:               })
2669:             ;
2670:           },
2671:           tabbable: function() {
2672:             if( module.has.search() ) {
2673:               module.debug('Searchable dropdown initialized');
2674:               $search
2675:                 .removeAttr('tabindex')
2676:               ;
2677:               $menu
2678:                 .removeAttr('tabindex')
2679:               ;
2680:             }
2681:             else {
2682:               module.debug('Simple selection dropdown initialized');
2683:               $module
2684:                 .removeAttr('tabindex')
2685:               ;
2686:               $menu
2687:                 .removeAttr('tabindex')
2688:               ;
2689:             }
2690:           }
2691:         },
2692: 
2693:         has: {
2694:           search: function() {
2695:             return ($search.length > 0);
2696:           },
2697:           selectInput: function() {
2698:             return ( $input.is('select') );
2699:           },
2700:           firstLetter: function($item, letter) {
2701:             var
2702:               text,
2703:               firstLetter
2704:             ;
2705:             if(!$item || $item.length === 0 || typeof letter !== 'string') {
2706:               return false;
2707:             }
2708:             text        = module.get.choiceText($item, false);
2709:             letter      = letter.toLowerCase();
2710:             firstLetter = String(text).charAt(0).toLowerCase();
2711:             return (letter == firstLetter);
2712:           },
2713:           input: function() {
2714:             return ($input.length > 0);
2715:           },
2716:           items: function() {
2717:             return ($item.length > 0);
2718:           },
2719:           menu: function() {
2720:             return ($menu.length > 0);
2721:           },
2722:           message: function() {
2723:             return ($menu.children(selector.message).length !== 0);
2724:           },
2725:           label: function(value) {
2726:             var
2727:               $labels = $module.find(selector.label)
2728:             ;
2729:             return ($labels.filter('[data-value="' + value +'"]').length > 0);
2730:           },
2731:           maxSelections: function() {
2732:             return (settings.maxSelections && module.get.selectionCount() >= settings.maxSelections);
2733:           },
2734:           allResultsFiltered: function() {
2735:             return ($item.filter(selector.unselectable).length === $item.length);
2736:           },
2737:           query: function() {
2738:             return (module.get.query() !== '');
2739:           },
2740:           value: function(value) {
2741:             var
2742:               values   = module.get.values(),
2743:               hasValue = $.isArray(values)
2744:                ? values && ($.inArray(value, values) !== -1)
2745:                : (values == value)
2746:             ;
2747:             return (hasValue)
2748:               ? true
2749:               : false
2750:             ;
2751:           }
2752:         },
2753: 
2754:         is: {
2755:           active: function() {
2756:             return $module.hasClass(className.active);
2757:           },
2758:           alreadySetup: function() {
2759:             return ($module.is('select') && $module.parent(selector.dropdown).length > 0  && $module.prev().length === 0);
2760:           },
2761:           animating: function($subMenu) {
2762:             return ($subMenu)
2763:               ? $subMenu.transition && $subMenu.transition('is animating')
2764:               : $menu.transition    && $menu.transition('is animating')
2765:             ;
2766:           },
2767:           disabled: function() {
2768:             return $module.hasClass(className.disabled);
2769:           },
2770:           focused: function() {
2771:             return (document.activeElement === $module[0]);
2772:           },
2773:           focusedOnSearch: function() {
2774:             return (document.activeElement === $search[0]);
2775:           },
2776:           allFiltered: function() {
2777:             return( (module.is.multiple() || module.has.search()) && !module.has.message() && module.has.allResultsFiltered() );
2778:           },
2779:           hidden: function($subMenu) {
2780:             return !module.is.visible($subMenu);
2781:           },
2782:           initialLoad: function() {
2783:             return initialLoad;
2784:           },
2785:           onScreen: function($subMenu) {
2786:             var
2787:               $currentMenu   = $subMenu || $menu,
2788:               canOpenDownward = true,
2789:               onScreen = {},
2790:               calculations
2791:             ;
2792:             $currentMenu.addClass(className.loading);
2793:             calculations = {
2794:               context: {
2795:                 scrollTop : $context.scrollTop(),
2796:                 height    : $context.outerHeight()
2797:               },
2798:               menu : {
2799:                 offset: $currentMenu.offset(),
2800:                 height: $currentMenu.outerHeight()
2801:               }
2802:             };
2803:             onScreen = {
2804:               above : (calculations.context.scrollTop) <= calculations.menu.offset.top - calculations.menu.height,
2805:               below : (calculations.context.scrollTop + calculations.context.height) >= calculations.menu.offset.top + calculations.menu.height
2806:             };
2807:             if(onScreen.below) {
2808:               module.verbose('Dropdown can fit in context downward', onScreen);
2809:               canOpenDownward = true;
2810:             }
2811:             else if(!onScreen.below && !onScreen.above) {
2812:               module.verbose('Dropdown cannot fit in either direction, favoring downward', onScreen);
2813:               canOpenDownward = true;
2814:             }
2815:             else {
2816:               module.verbose('Dropdown cannot fit below, opening upward', onScreen);
2817:               canOpenDownward = false;
2818:             }
2819:             $currentMenu.removeClass(className.loading);
2820:             return canOpenDownward;
2821:           },
2822:           inObject: function(needle, object) {
2823:             var
2824:               found = false
2825:             ;
2826:             $.each(object, function(index, property) {
2827:               if(property == needle) {
2828:                 found = true;
2829:                 return true;
2830:               }
2831:             });
2832:             return found;
2833:           },
2834:           multiple: function() {
2835:             return $module.hasClass(className.multiple);
2836:           },
2837:           single: function() {
2838:             return !module.is.multiple();
2839:           },
2840:           selectMutation: function(mutations) {
2841:             var
2842:               selectChanged = false
2843:             ;
2844:             $.each(mutations, function(index, mutation) {
2845:               if(mutation.target && $(mutation.target).is('select')) {
2846:                 selectChanged = true;
2847:                 return true;
2848:               }
2849:             });
2850:             return selectChanged;
2851:           },
2852:           search: function() {
2853:             return $module.hasClass(className.search);
2854:           },
2855:           searchSelection: function() {
2856:             return ( module.has.search() && $search.parent(selector.dropdown).length === 1 );
2857:           },
2858:           selection: function() {
2859:             return $module.hasClass(className.selection);
2860:           },
2861:           userValue: function(value) {
2862:             return ($.inArray(value, module.get.userValues()) !== -1);
2863:           },
2864:           upward: function($menu) {
2865:             var $element = $menu || $module;
2866:             return $element.hasClass(className.upward);
2867:           },
2868:           visible: function($subMenu) {
2869:             return ($subMenu)
2870:               ? $subMenu.hasClass(className.visible)
2871:               : $menu.hasClass(className.visible)
2872:             ;
2873:           }
2874:         },
2875: 
2876:         can: {
2877:           activate: function($item) {
2878:             if(settings.useLabels) {
2879:               return true;
2880:             }
2881:             if(!module.has.maxSelections()) {
2882:               return true;
2883:             }
2884:             if(module.has.maxSelections() && $item.hasClass(className.active)) {
2885:               return true;
2886:             }
2887:             return false;
2888:           },
2889:           click: function() {
2890:             return (hasTouch || settings.on == 'click');
2891:           },
2892:           extendSelect: function() {
2893:             return settings.allowAdditions || settings.apiSettings;
2894:           },
2895:           show: function() {
2896:             return !module.is.disabled() && (module.has.items() || module.has.message());
2897:           },
2898:           useAPI: function() {
2899:             return $.fn.api !== undefined;
2900:           }
2901:         },
2902: 
2903:         animate: {
2904:           show: function(callback, $subMenu) {
2905:             var
2906:               $currentMenu = $subMenu || $menu,
2907:               start = ($subMenu)
2908:                 ? function() {}
2909:                 : function() {
2910:                   module.hideSubMenus();
2911:                   module.hideOthers();
2912:                   module.set.active();
2913:                 },
2914:               transition
2915:             ;
2916:             callback = $.isFunction(callback)
2917:               ? callback
2918:               : function(){}
2919:             ;
2920:             module.verbose('Doing menu show animation', $currentMenu);
2921:             module.set.direction($subMenu);
2922:             transition = module.get.transition($subMenu);
2923:             if( module.is.selection() ) {
2924:               module.set.scrollPosition(module.get.selectedItem(), true);
2925:             }
2926:             if( module.is.hidden($currentMenu) || module.is.animating($currentMenu) ) {
2927:               if(transition == 'none') {
2928:                 start();
2929:                 $currentMenu.transition('show');
2930:                 callback.call(element);
2931:               }
2932:               else if($.fn.transition !== undefined && $module.transition('is supported')) {
2933:                 $currentMenu
2934:                   .transition({
2935:                     animation  : transition + ' in',
2936:                     debug      : settings.debug,
2937:                     verbose    : settings.verbose,
2938:                     duration   : settings.duration,
2939:                     queue      : true,
2940:                     onStart    : start,
2941:                     onComplete : function() {
2942:                       callback.call(element);
2943:                     }
2944:                   })
2945:                 ;
2946:               }
2947:               else {
2948:                 module.error(error.noTransition, transition);
2949:               }
2950:             }
2951:           },
2952:           hide: function(callback, $subMenu) {
2953:             var
2954:               $currentMenu = $subMenu || $menu,
2955:               duration = ($subMenu)
2956:                 ? (settings.duration * 0.9)
2957:                 : settings.duration,
2958:               start = ($subMenu)
2959:                 ? function() {}
2960:                 : function() {
2961:                   if( module.can.click() ) {
2962:                     module.unbind.intent();
2963:                   }
2964:                   module.remove.active();
2965:                 },
2966:               transition = module.get.transition($subMenu)
2967:             ;
2968:             callback = $.isFunction(callback)
2969:               ? callback
2970:               : function(){}
2971:             ;
2972:             if( module.is.visible($currentMenu) || module.is.animating($currentMenu) ) {
2973:               module.verbose('Doing menu hide animation', $currentMenu);
2974: 
2975:               if(transition == 'none') {
2976:                 start();
2977:                 $currentMenu.transition('hide');
2978:                 callback.call(element);
2979:               }
2980:               else if($.fn.transition !== undefined && $module.transition('is supported')) {
2981:                 $currentMenu
2982:                   .transition({
2983:                     animation  : transition + ' out',
2984:                     duration   : settings.duration,
2985:                     debug      : settings.debug,
2986:                     verbose    : settings.verbose,
2987:                     queue      : true,
2988:                     onStart    : start,
2989:                     onComplete : function() {
2990:                       if(settings.direction == 'auto') {
2991:                         module.remove.upward($subMenu);
2992:                       }
2993:                       callback.call(element);
2994:                     }
2995:                   })
2996:                 ;
2997:               }
2998:               else {
2999:                 module.error(error.transition);
3000:               }
3001:             }
3002:           }
3003:         },
3004: 
3005:         hideAndClear: function() {
3006:           module.remove.searchTerm();
3007:           if( module.has.maxSelections() ) {
3008:             return;
3009:           }
3010:           if(module.has.search()) {
3011:             module.hide(function() {
3012:               module.remove.filteredItem();
3013:             });
3014:           }
3015:           else {
3016:             module.hide();
3017:           }
3018:         },
3019: 
3020:         delay: {
3021:           show: function() {
3022:             module.verbose('Delaying show event to ensure user intent');
3023:             clearTimeout(module.timer);
3024:             module.timer = setTimeout(module.show, settings.delay.show);
3025:           },
3026:           hide: function() {
3027:             module.verbose('Delaying hide event to ensure user intent');
3028:             clearTimeout(module.timer);
3029:             module.timer = setTimeout(module.hide, settings.delay.hide);
3030:           }
3031:         },
3032: 
3033:         escape: {
3034:           regExp: function(text) {
3035:             text =  String(text);
3036:             return text.replace(regExp.escape, '\\$&');
3037:           }
3038:         },
3039: 
3040:         setting: function(name, value) {
3041:           module.debug('Changing setting', name, value);
3042:           if( $.isPlainObject(name) ) {
3043:             $.extend(true, settings, name);
3044:           }
3045:           else if(value !== undefined) {
3046:             settings[name] = value;
3047:           }
3048:           else {
3049:             return settings[name];
3050:           }
3051:         },
3052:         internal: function(name, value) {
3053:           if( $.isPlainObject(name) ) {
3054:             $.extend(true, module, name);
3055:           }
3056:           else if(value !== undefined) {
3057:             module[name] = value;
3058:           }
3059:           else {
3060:             return module[name];
3061:           }
3062:         },
3063:         debug: function() {
3064:           if(settings.debug) {
3065:             if(settings.performance) {
3066:               module.performance.log(arguments);
3067:             }
3068:             else {
3069:               module.debug = Function.prototype.bind.call(console.info, console, settings.name + ':');
3070:               module.debug.apply(console, arguments);
3071:             }
3072:           }
3073:         },
3074:         verbose: function() {
3075:           if(settings.verbose && settings.debug) {
3076:             if(settings.performance) {
3077:               module.performance.log(arguments);
3078:             }
3079:             else {
3080:               module.verbose = Function.prototype.bind.call(console.info, console, settings.name + ':');
3081:               module.verbose.apply(console, arguments);
3082:             }
3083:           }
3084:         },
3085:         error: function() {
3086:           module.error = Function.prototype.bind.call(console.error, console, settings.name + ':');
3087:           module.error.apply(console, arguments);
3088:         },
3089:         performance: {
3090:           log: function(message) {
3091:             var
3092:               currentTime,
3093:               executionTime,
3094:               previousTime
3095:             ;
3096:             if(settings.performance) {
3097:               currentTime   = new Date().getTime();
3098:               previousTime  = time || currentTime;
3099:               executionTime = currentTime - previousTime;
3100:               time          = currentTime;
3101:               performance.push({
3102:                 'Name'           : message[0],
3103:                 'Arguments'      : [].slice.call(message, 1) || '',
3104:                 'Element'        : element,
3105:                 'Execution Time' : executionTime
3106:               });
3107:             }
3108:             clearTimeout(module.performance.timer);
3109:             module.performance.timer = setTimeout(module.performance.display, 500);
3110:           },
3111:           display: function() {
3112:             var
3113:               title = settings.name + ':',
3114:               totalTime = 0
3115:             ;
3116:             time = false;
3117:             clearTimeout(module.performance.timer);
3118:             $.each(performance, function(index, data) {
3119:               totalTime += data['Execution Time'];
3120:             });
3121:             title += ' ' + totalTime + 'ms';
3122:             if(moduleSelector) {
3123:               title += ' \'' + moduleSelector + '\'';
3124:             }
3125:             if( (console.group !== undefined || console.table !== undefined) && performance.length > 0) {
3126:               console.groupCollapsed(title);
3127:               if(console.table) {
3128:                 console.table(performance);
3129:               }
3130:               else {
3131:                 $.each(performance, function(index, data) {
3132:                   console.log(data['Name'] + ': ' + data['Execution Time']+'ms');
3133:                 });
3134:               }
3135:               console.groupEnd();
3136:             }
3137:             performance = [];
3138:           }
3139:         },
3140:         invoke: function(query, passedArguments, context) {
3141:           var
3142:             object = instance,
3143:             maxDepth,
3144:             found,
3145:             response
3146:           ;
3147:           passedArguments = passedArguments || queryArguments;
3148:           context         = element         || context;
3149:           if(typeof query == 'string' && object !== undefined) {
3150:             query    = query.split(/[\. ]/);
3151:             maxDepth = query.length - 1;
3152:             $.each(query, function(depth, value) {
3153:               var camelCaseValue = (depth != maxDepth)
3154:                 ? value + query[depth + 1].charAt(0).toUpperCase() + query[depth + 1].slice(1)
3155:                 : query
3156:               ;
3157:               if( $.isPlainObject( object[camelCaseValue] ) && (depth != maxDepth) ) {
3158:                 object = object[camelCaseValue];
3159:               }
3160:               else if( object[camelCaseValue] !== undefined ) {
3161:                 found = object[camelCaseValue];
3162:                 return false;
3163:               }
3164:               else if( $.isPlainObject( object[value] ) && (depth != maxDepth) ) {
3165:                 object = object[value];
3166:               }
3167:               else if( object[value] !== undefined ) {
3168:                 found = object[value];
3169:                 return false;
3170:               }
3171:               else {
3172:                 module.error(error.method, query);
3173:                 return false;
3174:               }
3175:             });
3176:           }
3177:           if ( $.isFunction( found ) ) {
3178:             response = found.apply(context, passedArguments);
3179:           }
3180:           else if(found !== undefined) {
3181:             response = found;
3182:           }
3183:           if($.isArray(returnedValue)) {
3184:             returnedValue.push(response);
3185:           }
3186:           else if(returnedValue !== undefined) {
3187:             returnedValue = [returnedValue, response];
3188:           }
3189:           else if(response !== undefined) {
3190:             returnedValue = response;
3191:           }
3192:           return found;
3193:         }
3194:       };
3195: 
3196:       if(methodInvoked) {
3197:         if(instance === undefined) {
3198:           module.initialize();
3199:         }
3200:         module.invoke(query);
3201:       }
3202:       else {
3203:         if(instance !== undefined) {
3204:           instance.invoke('destroy');
3205:         }
3206:         module.initialize();
3207:       }
3208:     })
3209:   ;
3210:   return (returnedValue !== undefined)
3211:     ? returnedValue
3212:     : $allModules
3213:   ;
3214: };
3215: 
3216: $.fn.dropdown.settings = {
3217: 
3218:   debug                  : false,
3219:   verbose                : false,
3220:   performance            : true,
3221: 
3222:   on                     : 'click',    // what event should show menu action on item selection
3223:   action                 : 'activate', // action on item selection (nothing, activate, select, combo, hide, function(){})
3224: 
3225: 
3226:   apiSettings            : false,
3227:   saveRemoteData         : true,      // Whether remote name/value pairs should be stored in sessionStorage to allow remote data to be restored on page refresh
3228:   throttle               : 200,       // How long to wait after last user input to search remotely
3229: 
3230:   context                : window,      // Context to use when determining if on screen
3231:   direction              : 'auto',     // Whether dropdown should always open in one direction
3232:   keepOnScreen           : true,       // Whether dropdown should check whether it is on screen before showing
3233: 
3234:   match                  : 'both',     // what to match against with search selection (both, text, or label)
3235:   fullTextSearch         : false,      // search anywhere in value
3236: 
3237:   placeholder            : 'auto',     // whether to convert blank <select> values to placeholder text
3238:   preserveHTML           : true,       // preserve html when selecting value
3239:   sortSelect             : false,      // sort selection on init
3240: 
3241:   forceSelection         : true,       // force a choice on blur with search selection
3242:   allowAdditions         : false,      // whether multiple select should allow user added values
3243: 
3244:   maxSelections          : false,      // When set to a number limits the number of selections to this count
3245:   useLabels              : true,       // whether multiple select should filter currently active selections from choices
3246:   delimiter              : ',',        // when multiselect uses normal <input> the values will be delimited with this character
3247: 
3248:   showOnFocus            : true,       // show menu on focus
3249:   allowTab               : true,       // add tabindex to element
3250:   allowCategorySelection : false,      // allow elements with sub-menus to be selected
3251: 
3252:   fireOnInit             : false,      // Whether callbacks should fire when initializing dropdown values
3253: 
3254:   transition             : 'auto',     // auto transition will slide down or up based on direction
3255:   duration               : 200,        // duration of transition
3256: 
3257:   glyphWidth             : 1.0714,     // widest glyph width in em (W is 1.0714 em) used to calculate multiselect input width
3258: 
3259:   // label settings on multi-select
3260:   label: {
3261:     transition : 'scale',
3262:     duration   : 200,
3263:     variation  : false
3264:   },
3265: 
3266:   // delay before event
3267:   delay : {
3268:     hide   : 300,
3269:     show   : 200,
3270:     search : 20,
3271:     touch  : 50
3272:   },
3273: 
3274:   /* Callbacks */
3275:   onChange      : function(value, text, $selected){},
3276:   onAdd         : function(value, text, $selected){},
3277:   onRemove      : function(value, text, $selected){},
3278: 
3279:   onLabelSelect : function($selectedLabels){},
3280:   onLabelCreate : function(value, text) { return $(this); },
3281:   onLabelRemove : function(value) { return true; },
3282:   onNoResults   : function(searchTerm) { return true; },
3283:   onShow        : function(){},
3284:   onHide        : function(){},
3285: 
3286:   /* Component */
3287:   name           : 'Dropdown',
3288:   namespace      : 'dropdown',
3289: 
3290:   message: {
3291:     addResult     : 'Add <b>{term}</b>',
3292:     count         : '{count} selected',
3293:     maxSelections : 'Max {maxCount} selections',
3294:     noResults     : 'No results found.',
3295:     serverError   : 'There was an error contacting the server'
3296:   },
3297: 
3298:   error : {
3299:     action          : 'You called a dropdown action that was not defined',
3300:     alreadySetup    : 'Once a select has been initialized behaviors must be called on the created ui dropdown',
3301:     labels          : 'Allowing user additions currently requires the use of labels.',
3302:     missingMultiple : '<select> requires multiple property to be set to correctly preserve multiple values',
3303:     method          : 'The method you called is not defined.',
3304:     noAPI           : 'The API module is required to load resources remotely',
3305:     noStorage       : 'Saving remote data requires session storage',
3306:     noTransition    : 'This module requires ui transitions <https://github.com/Semantic-Org/ui-Transition>'
3307:   },
3308: 
3309:   regExp : {
3310:     escape   : /[-[\]{}()*+?.,\\^$|#\s]/g,
3311:   },
3312: 
3313:   metadata : {
3314:     defaultText     : 'defaultText',
3315:     defaultValue    : 'defaultValue',
3316:     placeholderText : 'placeholder',
3317:     text            : 'text',
3318:     value           : 'value'
3319:   },
3320: 
3321:   // property names for remote query
3322:   fields: {
3323:     remoteValues : 'results', // grouping for api results
3324:     values       : 'values', // grouping for all dropdown values
3325:     name         : 'name',   // displayed dropdown text
3326:     value        : 'value'   // actual dropdown value
3327:   },
3328: 
3329:   keys : {
3330:     backspace  : 8,
3331:     delimiter  : 188, // comma
3332:     deleteKey  : 46,
3333:     enter      : 13,
3334:     escape     : 27,
3335:     pageUp     : 33,
3336:     pageDown   : 34,
3337:     leftArrow  : 37,
3338:     upArrow    : 38,
3339:     rightArrow : 39,
3340:     downArrow  : 40
3341:   },
3342: 
3343:   selector : {
3344:     addition     : '.addition',
3345:     dropdown     : '.ui.dropdown',
3346:     icon         : '> .dropdown.icon',
3347:     input        : '> input[type="hidden"], > select',
3348:     item         : '.item',
3349:     label        : '> .label',
3350:     remove       : '> .label > .delete.icon',
3351:     siblingLabel : '.label',
3352:     menu         : '.menu',
3353:     message      : '.message',
3354:     menuicon     : '.dropdown.icon',
3355:     search       : 'input.search, .menu > .search > input',
3356:     text         : '> .text:not(.icon)',
3357:     unselectable : '.disabled, .filtered'
3358:   },
3359: 
3360:   className : {
3361:     active      : 'active',
3362:     addition    : 'addition',
3363:     animating   : 'animating',
3364:     disabled    : 'disabled',
3365:     dropdown    : 'vi-ui dropdown',
3366:     filtered    : 'filtered',
3367:     hidden      : 'hidden transition',
3368:     item        : 'item',
3369:     label       : 'vi-ui label',
3370:     loading     : 'loading',
3371:     menu        : 'menu',
3372:     message     : 'message',
3373:     multiple    : 'multiple',
3374:     placeholder : 'default',
3375:     search      : 'search',
3376:     selected    : 'selected',
3377:     selection   : 'selection',
3378:     upward      : 'upward',
3379:     visible     : 'visible'
3380:   }
3381: 
3382: };
3383: 
3384: /* Templates */
3385: $.fn.dropdown.settings.templates = {
3386: 
3387:   // generates dropdown from select values
3388:   dropdown: function(select) {
3389:     var
3390:       placeholder = select.placeholder || false,
3391:       values      = select.values || {},
3392:       html        = ''
3393:     ;
3394:     html +=  '<i class="dropdown icon"></i>';
3395:     if(select.placeholder) {
3396:       html += '<div class="default text">' + placeholder + '</div>';
3397:     }
3398:     else {
3399:       html += '<div class="text"></div>';
3400:     }
3401:     html += '<div class="menu">';
3402:     $.each(select.values, function(index, option) {
3403:       html += (option.disabled)
3404:         ? '<div class="disabled item" data-value="' + option.value + '">' + option.name + '</div>'
3405:         : '<div class="item" data-value="' + option.value + '">' + option.name + '</div>'
3406:       ;
3407:     });
3408:     html += '</div>';
3409:     return html;
3410:   },
3411: 
3412:   // generates just menu from select
3413:   menu: function(response, fields) {
3414:     var
3415:       values = response[fields.values] || {},
3416:       html   = ''
3417:     ;
3418:     $.each(values, function(index, option) {
3419:       html += '<div class="item" data-value="' + option[fields.value] + '">' + option[fields.name] + '</div>';
3420:     });
3421:     return html;
3422:   },
3423: 
3424:   // generates label for multiselect
3425:   label: function(value, text) {
3426:     return text + '<i class="delete icon"></i>';
3427:   },
3428: 
3429: 
3430:   // generates messages like "No results"
3431:   message: function(message) {
3432:     return message;
3433:   },
3434: 
3435:   // generates user addition to selection menu
3436:   addition: function(choice) {
3437:     return choice;
3438:   }
3439: 
3440: };
3441: 
3442: })( jQuery, window, document );

================
File: code_3/js/filter-price.js
================
 1: jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
 2:     'use strict';
 3:     /*Fix custom symbol of price range in WooCommerce price filter widget*/
 4:     $(document.body).on('price_slider_updated', function (event, min, max) {
 5:         if (woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_symbol.indexOf('#PRICE#') > -1) {
 6:             $('.price_slider_amount span.from').html(accounting.formatMoney(min, {
 7:                 symbol: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_symbol.replace('#PRICE#', ''),
 8:                 decimal: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_decimal_sep,
 9:                 thousand: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_thousand_sep,
10:                 precision: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_num_decimals,
11:                 format: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format
12:             }));
13: 
14:             $('.price_slider_amount span.to').html(accounting.formatMoney(max, {
15:                 symbol: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_symbol.replace('#PRICE#', ''),
16:                 decimal: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_decimal_sep,
17:                 thousand: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_thousand_sep,
18:                 precision: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_num_decimals,
19:                 format: woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format
20:             }));
21:         }
22:     })
23: });

================
File: code_3/js/filter-price.min.js
================
1: jQuery(document).ready(function($){"use strict";$(document.body).on("price_slider_updated",function(event,min,max){if(woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_symbol.indexOf("#PRICE#")>-1){$(".price_slider_amount span.from").html(accounting.formatMoney(min,{symbol:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_symbol.replace("#PRICE#",""),decimal:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_decimal_sep,thousand:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_thousand_sep,precision:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_num_decimals,format:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format}));$(".price_slider_amount span.to").html(accounting.formatMoney(max,{symbol:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_symbol.replace("#PRICE#",""),decimal:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_decimal_sep,thousand:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_thousand_sep,precision:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format_num_decimals,format:woocommerce_price_slider_params.currency_format}))}})});
