================
File: code_3/plugins/advanced_free_shipping.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_F_Plugin_Advanced_Free_Shipping
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Advanced_Free_Shipping {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 
15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
17: 			add_filter( 'wp-conditions\condition', array( $this, 'advanced_free_shipping' ) );
18: 		}
19: 	}
20: 
21: 	/**
22: 	 * WooCommerce Advanced Free Shipping
23: 	 *
24: 	 * @param $data
25: 	 *
26: 	 * @return mixed
27: 	 */
28: 
29: 	public function advanced_free_shipping( $data ) {
30: 
31: 		if ( isset( $data['value'] ) && ( $data['condition'] == 'subtotal' || $data['condition'] == 'coupon' || $data['condition'] == 'tax' || $data['condition'] == 'subtotal_ex_tax' ) ) {
32: 			$data['value'] = wmc_get_price( $data['value'] );
33: 		}
34: 
35: 		return $data;
36: 	}
37: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/advanced_product_fields_for_woocommerce_pro.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: use SW_WAPF_PRO\Includes\Classes\Cart;
  4: 
  5: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Advanced_Product_Fields_For_Woocommerce_Pro {
  6: 	protected $settings;
  7: 
  8: 	public function __construct() {
  9: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'advanced-product-fields-for-woocommerce-pro/advanced-product-fields-for-woocommerce-pro.php' ) ) {
 10: 			$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 11: 			$v = wapf_get_setting( 'version' );
 12: 			if ( version_compare( $v, '1.9.10', '<' ) ) {
 13: 				add_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', array( $this, 'recalculate_pricing' ), 9 );
 14: 			}
 15: 
 16: 			add_filter( 'wapf/pricing/addon', array( $this, 'convert_product_price' ), 10, 2 );
 17: //
 18: //			add_filter( 'wapf/html/pricing_hint/amount', array( $this, 'convert_pricing_hint' ), 10, 3 );
 19: //
 20: //			add_filter( 'wapf/html/product_totals/data', array( $this, 'add_raw_price' ), 10, 2 );
 21: //
 22: 			add_filter( 'wapf/pricing/cart_item_base', array( $this, 'convert_back' ), 10, 3 );
 23: //
 24: //			add_action( 'wp_footer', array( $this, 'add_footer_script' ), 100 );
 25: //
 26: //			add_filter( 'wapf/pricing/mini_cart_item_price', array( $this, 'change_mini_cart_item_price' ), 10, 3 );
 27: 		}
 28: 	}
 29: 
 30: 	public function change_mini_cart_item_price( $price, $cart_item, $cart_item_key ) {
 31: 		if ( ! empty( $cart_item['wapf_item_price'] ) && wp_doing_ajax() ) {
 32: 			if ( ! $this->is_default_currency() ) {
 33: 				$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
 34: 			}
 35: 		}
 36: 
 37: 		return $price;
 38: 	}
 39: 
 40: 	public function convert_back( $price ) {
 41: 		if ( ! $this->is_default_currency() ) {
 42: 			return wmc_revert_price( $price );
 43: 		}
 44: 
 45: 		return $price;
 46: 	}
 47: 
 48: 	public function add_raw_price( $data, $product ) {
 49: 		if ( $this->is_default_currency() ) {
 50: 			$data['wmc-price'] = $data['product-price'];
 51: 		} else {
 52: 			$data['wmc-price'] = wmc_revert_price( $data['product-price'] );
 53: 		}
 54: 
 55: 		return $data;
 56: 	}
 57: 
 58: 	public function add_footer_script() {
 59: 		if ( $this->is_default_currency() ) {
 60: 			return;
 61: 		}
 62: 		?>
 63:         <script>
 64:             var wapf_wmc_rate = <?php echo esc_html( $this->get_current_currency_rate() ); ?>;
 65: 
 66:             jQuery(document).on('wapf/pricing', function (e, productTotal, optionsTotal, total, $parent) {
 67:                 var rawBase = jQuery('.wapf-product-totals').data('wmc-price') * WAPF.Util.selectedQuantity($parent);
 68:                 jQuery('.wapf-product-total').html(WAPF.Util.formatMoney(rawBase * wapf_wmc_rate, window.wapf_config.display_options));
 69:                 jQuery('.wapf-options-total').html(WAPF.Util.formatMoney(optionsTotal * wapf_wmc_rate, window.wapf_config.display_options));
 70:                 jQuery('.wapf-grand-total').html(WAPF.Util.formatMoney((optionsTotal + rawBase) * wapf_wmc_rate, window.wapf_config.display_options));
 71:             });
 72: 
 73:             WAPF.Filter.add('wapf/fx/hint', function (price) {
 74:                 return price * wapf_wmc_rate;
 75:             });
 76:         </script>
 77: 		<?php
 78: 	}
 79: 
 80: 	public function convert_pricing_hint( $amount, $product, $type ) {
 81: 		if ( ! $this->is_default_currency() && ! $this->product_has_fixed_price( $product ) ) {
 82: 			return wmc_get_price( $amount );
 83: 		}
 84: 
 85: 		return $amount;
 86: 	}
 87: 
 88: 	public function convert_product_price( $price, $product ) {
 89: 
 90: 		if ( ! $this->is_default_currency() ) {
 91: 			return wmc_get_price( $price );
 92: 		}
 93: 
 94: 		return $price;
 95: 	}
 96: 
 97: 
 98: 	public function convert_addon_price( $amount, $product, $type, $for_page ) {
 99: 
100: 		return $this->convert_back( $amount );
101: 	}
102: 
103: 	public function recalculate_pricing( $cart_obj ) {
104: 		foreach ( $cart_obj->get_cart() as $key => $item ) {
105: 			$cart_item = WC()->cart->cart_contents[ $key ];
106: 			if ( empty( $cart_item['wapf'] ) ) {
107: 				continue;
108: 			}
109: 
110: 			$pricing = Cart::calculate_cart_item_options_total( $cart_item );
111: 
112: 			if ( $pricing !== false ) {
113: 				$pricing['base']                                     = wmc_revert_price( $pricing['base'] );
114: 				WC()->cart->cart_contents[ $key ]['wapf_item_price'] = $pricing;
115: 			}
116: 		}
117: 	}
118: 
119: 
120: 	private function is_default_currency() {
121: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
122: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
123: 
124: 		return $current_currency === $default_currency;
125: 	}
126: 
127: 	private function product_has_fixed_price( $product ) {
128: 		if ( ! $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
129: 			return false;
130: 		}
131: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
132: 		$product_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_regular_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
133: 		$sale_price       = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_sale_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
134: 		if ( isset( $product_price[ $current_currency ] ) && ! WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Frontend_Price::is_on_sale( $product ) ) {
135: 			if ( $product_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
136: 				return true;
137: 			}
138: 		} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] ) ) {
139: 			if ( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
140: 				return true;
141: 			}
142: 		}
143: 
144: 		return false;
145: 	}
146: 
147: 	private function get_current_currency_rate() {
148: 		$wmc_currencies   = $this->settings->get_currencies();
149: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
150: 
151: 		return floatval( $wmc_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] );
152: 	}
153: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/bookly.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Bookly
 5:  * Author: Bookly
 6:  */
 7: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 8: 	exit;
 9: }
10: use Bookly\Lib as BooklyLib;
11: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Bookly {
12: 	protected $settings;
13: 
14: 	public function __construct() {
15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
16: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'bookly-responsive-appointment-booking-tool/main.php' ) ) {
17: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_cart_item_price', array( $this, 'woocommerce_cart_item_price' ), 20, 3 );
18: 		}
19: 	}
20: 
21: 	public function woocommerce_cart_item_price( $product_price, $wc_item, $cart_item_key ) {
22: 		if ( isset ( $wc_item['bookly'] ) ) {
23: 			$userData = new BooklyLib\UserBookingData( null );
24: 			$userData->fillData( $wc_item['bookly'] );
25: 			$userData->cart->setItemsData( $wc_item['bookly']['items'] );
26: 			$cart_info = $userData->cart->getInfo();
27: 			if ( 'excl' === get_option( 'woocommerce_tax_display_cart' ) && BooklyLib\Config::taxesActive() ) {
28: 				$product_price = wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cart_info->getPayNow() - $cart_info->getPayTax() ) );
29: 			} else {
30: 				$product_price = wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cart_info->getPayNow() ) );
31: 			}
32: 		}
33: 
34: 		return $product_price;
35: 	}
36: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/catna.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Catna
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Catna {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		/*Name your price*/
 16: 		add_action( 'vicatna_nyp_admin_product_after_name_your_price', array(
 17: 			$this,
 18: 			'vicatna_nyp_admin_product_after_name_your_price'
 19: 		) );
 20: 		$product_type = apply_filters( 'vicatna_applicanle_product_type', [ 'simple' ] );
 21: 		foreach ( $product_type as $type ) {
 22: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_process_product_meta_' . $type, array(
 23: 				$this,
 24: 				'vicatna_woocommerce_process_product_meta_simple'
 25: 			) );
 26: 		}
 27: 		add_filter( 'vicatna_woocommerce_get_price', array( $this, 'vicatna_woocommerce_get_price' ), 10, 2 );
 28: 		add_filter( 'vicatna_nyp_check_get_price_min', array( $this, 'vicatna_nyp_check_get_price_min' ), 10, 3 );
 29: 		add_filter( 'vicatna_nyp_check_get_price_max', array( $this, 'vicatna_nyp_check_get_price_max' ), 10, 3 );
 30: 		/*Smart offer*/
 31: 		add_filter( 'vicatna_so_check_get_price_min', array( $this, 'vicatna_so_check_get_price_min' ) );
 32: 	}
 33: 
 34: 	/**
 35: 	 * @param $price_min
 36: 	 *
 37: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
 38: 	 */
 39: 	public function vicatna_so_check_get_price_min( $price_min ) {
 40: 		return wmc_get_price( $price_min );
 41: 	}
 42: 
 43: 	/**
 44: 	 * @param $post_id
 45: 	 */
 46: 	public function vicatna_woocommerce_process_product_meta_simple( $post_id ) {
 47: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_catna' ) ) {
 48: 			return;
 49: 		}
 50: 
 51: 		$type = isset( $_POST['vicatna_type'] ) ? wc_clean( $_POST['vicatna_type'] ) : '';
 52: 		if ( $type === '' ) {
 53: 			return;
 54: 		}
 55: 		$currencies       = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 56: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 57: 		$wc_product       = wc_get_product( $post_id );
 58: 		foreach ( $currencies as $currency => $currency_data ) {
 59: 			if ( $default_currency !== $currency ) {
 60: 				$key_min = '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_min_' . $currency;
 61: 				$key_max = '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_max_' . $currency;
 62: 				$wc_product->update_meta_data( $key_min, isset( $_POST[ $key_min ] ) ? wc_clean( $_POST[ $key_min ] ) : '' );
 63: 				$wc_product->update_meta_data( $key_max, isset( $_POST[ $key_max ] ) ? wc_clean( $_POST[ $key_max ] ) : '' );
 64: 				$wc_product->save_meta_data();
 65: 			}
 66: 		}
 67: 	}
 68: 
 69: 	/**
 70: 	 * Fixed price fields for min price/max price of name your price
 71: 	 */
 72: 	public function vicatna_nyp_admin_product_after_name_your_price() {
 73: 		global $thepostid;
 74: 		if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
 75: 			$currencies       = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 76: 			$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 77: 			foreach ( $currencies as $currency => $currency_data ) {
 78: 				if ( $default_currency !== $currency ) {
 79: 					woocommerce_wp_text_input(
 80: 						array(
 81: 							'id'                => '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_min_' . $currency,
 82: //							'name'        => '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_min_' . $currency,
 83: 							'custom_attributes' => array( 'data-name' => '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_min_' . $currency ),
 84: 							'value'             => get_post_meta( $thepostid, '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_min_' . $currency, true ),
 85: 							'desc_tip'          => true,
 86: 							'description'       => esc_html__( 'Minimum acceptable price', 'catna-woocommerce-name-your-price-and-offers' ),
 87: 							'label'             => esc_html__( 'Minimum price', 'catna-woocommerce-name-your-price-and-offers' ) . ' (' . $currency . ')',
 88: 							'data_type'         => 'price',
 89: 						)
 90: 					);
 91: 					woocommerce_wp_text_input(
 92: 						array(
 93: 							'id'                => '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_max_' . $currency,
 94: //							'name'        => '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_max_' . $currency,
 95: 							'custom_attributes' => array( 'data-name' => '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_max_' . $currency ),
 96: 							'value'             => get_post_meta( $thepostid, '_wmc_vicatna_nyp_max_' . $currency, true ),
 97: 							'placeholder'       => esc_html__( 'Leave blank to not limit that', 'catna-woocommerce-name-your-price-and-offers' ),
 98: 							'label'             => esc_html__( 'Maximum price', 'catna-woocommerce-name-your-price-and-offers' ) . ' (' . $currency . ')',
 99: 							'data_type'         => 'price',
100: 						)
101: 					);
102: 				}
103: 			}
104: 		}
105: 	}
106: 
107: 	/**
108: 	 * Handle min price
109: 	 *
110: 	 * @param $price
111: 	 * @param $rule
112: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
113: 	 *
114: 	 * @return string
115: 	 */
116: 	public function vicatna_nyp_check_get_price_min( $price, $rule, $product ) {
117: 		$fixed_price = $this->get_fixed_price( $product->get_id() );
118: 		if ( $fixed_price !== '' ) {
119: 			$price = wc_format_decimal( floatval( $fixed_price ), wc_get_price_decimals() );
120: 		} elseif ( $price ) {
121: 			$price = wc_format_decimal( wmc_get_price( $price ), wc_get_price_decimals() );
122: 		}
123: 
124: 		return $price ? wc_format_decimal( $price, wc_get_price_decimals() ) : $price;
125: 	}
126: 
127: 	/**
128: 	 * Handle max price
129: 	 *
130: 	 * @param $price
131: 	 * @param $rule
132: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
133: 	 *
134: 	 * @return string
135: 	 */
136: 	public function vicatna_nyp_check_get_price_max( $price, $rule, $product ) {
137: 		$fixed_price = $this->get_fixed_price( $product->get_id(), false );
138: 		if ( $fixed_price !== '' ) {
139: 			$price = wc_format_decimal( floatval( $fixed_price ), wc_get_price_decimals() );
140: 		} elseif ( $price ) {
141: 			$price = wc_format_decimal( wmc_get_price( $price ), wc_get_price_decimals() );
142: 		}
143: 
144: 		return $price;
145: 	}
146: 
147: 	/**
148: 	 * Get fixed min/max price
149: 	 *
150: 	 * @param $product_id
151: 	 * @param bool $is_min
152: 	 *
153: 	 * @return mixed|string
154: 	 */
155: 	public function get_fixed_price( $product_id, $is_min = true ) {
156: 		$price = '';
157: 		if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
158: 			$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
159: 			$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
160: 			$wc_product = wc_get_product( $product_id );
161: 			if ( $current_currency !== $default_currency ) {
162: 				$catna_settings = $wc_product->get_meta('vicatna_settings', true );
163: 				if ( $catna_settings['type'] === '0' ) {
164: 					$price = $wc_product->get_meta('_wmc_vicatna_nyp_' . ( $is_min ? 'min' : 'max' ) . '_' . $current_currency, true );
165: 				}
166: 			}
167: 		}
168: 
169: 		return $price;
170: 	}
171: 
172: 	/**
173: 	 * Convert price in cart
174: 	 *
175: 	 * @param $price
176: 	 * @param $product
177: 	 *
178: 	 * @return bool|float|int|mixed|string|void
179: 	 */
180: 	public function vicatna_woocommerce_get_price( $price, $product ) {
181: 		$data = array();
182: 		if ( ! empty( $product->vicatna_nyp ) ) {
183: 			$data = $product->vicatna_nyp;
184: 		} elseif ( ! empty( $product->vicatna_so ) ) {
185: 			$data = $product->vicatna_so;
186: 		}
187: 		if ( count( $data ) ) {
188: 			$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
189: 			$currency         = isset( $data['currency'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( $data['currency'] ) : '';
190: 			$currencies       = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
191: 			$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
192: 			if ( $currency && $currency !== $current_currency && ! empty( $currencies[ $currency ] ) ) {
193: 				$price = wmc_revert_price( $price, $currency );
194: 				if ( $current_currency !== $default_currency ) {
195: 					$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
196: 				}
197: 			}
198: 		}
199: 
200: 		return $price;
201: 	}
202: }

File: code_3/plugins/change_price_3rd_plugin.php

  6: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Change_Price_3rd_Plugin {
  7: 	protected $settings;
  8: 
  9: 	public function __construct() {
 10: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 11: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 12: //			add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_addons_option_price_raw', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
 13: 			add_filter( 'wmc_change_3rd_plugin_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
 14: 			add_filter( 'wmc_change_raw_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
 15:

 17: 			add_filter( 'wcml_shipping_price_amount', array( $this, 'change_price' ), 10 );

 25: 			add_filter( 'redq_dropoff_locations', array( $this, 'redq_change_price' ) );

 65: 	function app_wc_price_html( $html, $variation ) {
 66: 		if ( function_exists('BASE') && $service_id = BASE()->find_service_for_page( $variation->get_id() ) ) {
 67: 			if ( function_exists('wpb_get_service') && $service = wpb_get_service( $service_id ) ) {
 68: 				if ( ! empty( $service->price ) ) {
 69: 					$price = wmc_get_price( $service->price );
 70: 					return wc_price( $price );
 71: 					// Do whatever you like with this price and generate your own $html
 72: 				}
 73: 			}
 74: 		}
 75: 
 76: 		return $html;
 77: 	}
 78: 
 79: 	public function app_woocommerce_price( $price_raw, $slot ) {
 80: 		return $price_raw ? wmc_get_price( $price_raw ) : $price_raw;
 81: 	}
 82: 
 83: 	public function app_confirmation_total_amount( $price_raw, $slot ) {
 84: 		return $price_raw ? wmc_get_price( $price_raw ) : $price_raw;
 85: 	}
 86: 
 87: 	/**
 88: 	 * @param $raw_data
 89: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
 90: 	 * @param $cart_item_key
 91: 	 *
 92: 	 * @return mixed
 93: 	 */
 94: 	public function wfob_product_raw_data( $raw_data, $product, $cart_item_key ) {
 95: 		if ( '' == $cart_item_key ) {
 96: 			$raw_data['regular_price'] = $product->get_regular_price();
 97: 			$raw_data['price']         = $product->get_price();
 98: 		}
 99: 
100: 		return $raw_data;
101: 	}
102: 
103: 	/**
104: 	 * @param $value
105: 	 *
106: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
107: 	 */
108: 	public function flexible_shipping_value_in_currency( $value ) {
109: 		if ( $value && $value !== INF ) {
110: 			$value = wmc_get_price( $value );
111: 		}
112: 
113: 		return $value;
114: 	}
115: 
116: 
117: 	public function bopobb_get_original_price( $price ) {
118: 		if ( ! empty( $price['product_price'] ) ) {
119: 			$price['product_price'] = wmc_revert_price( $price['product_price'] );
120: 		}
121: 
122: 		return $price;
123: 	}
124: 
125: 	public function rnb_plugin_condition( $condition, $price, $product ) {
126: 		if ( is_a( $product, 'WC_Product_Redq_Rental' ) ) {
127: 			$condition = false;
128: 		}
129: 
130: 		return $condition;
131: 	}
132: 
133: 	public function change_price( $price_raw ) {
134: 		return $price_raw ? wmc_get_price( $price_raw ) : $price_raw;
135: 	}
136: 
137: 	/**
138: 	 * @param $price
139: 	 *
140: 	 * @return string
141: 	 */
142: 	public function number_format( $price ) {
143: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
144: 		$currencies_list  = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
145: 
146: 		return number_format( $price, $currencies_list[ $current_currency ]['decimals'] );
147: 	}
148: 
149: 	/**
150: 	 * @param $price
151: 	 *
152: 	 * @return bool|float|int|string
153: 	 */
154: 	public function revert_price( $price ) {
155: 		return wmc_revert_price( $price );
156: 	}
157: 
158: 	/**
159: 	 * @param $data
160: 	 *
161: 	 * @return mixed
162: 	 */
163: 	public function redq_person_change_price( $data ) {
164: 		$new_data = $data;
165: 		if ( is_array( $data ) && count( $data ) ) {
166: 			foreach ( $data as $key => $value ) {
167: 				$new_data[ $key ] = $this->redq_change_price( $value );
168: 			}
169: 		}
170: 
171: 		return $new_data;
172: 	}
173: 
174: 	/**
175: 	 * @param $data
176: 	 *
177: 	 * @return mixed
178: 	 */
179: 	public function redq_change_price( $data ) {
180: 		$new_data = $data;
181: 
182: 		if ( is_array( $data ) && count( $data ) ) {
183: 			foreach ( $data as $el_key => $element ) {
184: 				if ( is_array( $element ) && count( $element ) ) {
185: 					foreach ( $element as $key => $value ) {
186: 						if ( substr( $key, - 4 ) == 'cost' && is_numeric( $value ) ) {
187: 							$new_data[ $el_key ][ $key ] = $this->change_price( $value );
188: 						}
189: 					}
190: 				}
191: 			}
192: 		}
193: 
194: 		return $new_data;
195: 	}
196: 
197: 	/**
198: 	 * @param $subtotal
199: 	 * @param $order_id
200: 	 *
201: 	 * @return float|int|string
202: 	 */
203: 	public function woo_vou_reverse_price( $subtotal, $order_id ) {
204: 		$order          = wc_get_order( $order_id );
205: 		$wmc_order_info = $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
206: 		$order_currency = $order->get_currency();
207: 		$rate           = ! empty( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] ) ? $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] : '';
208: 		$decimals       = ! empty( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['decimals'] ) ? $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['decimals'] : '';
209: 
210: 		$subtotal = $rate ? $subtotal / $rate : $subtotal;
211: 		$subtotal = $decimals ? number_format( $subtotal, $decimals ) : $subtotal;
212: 
213: 		return $subtotal;
214: 	}
215: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/ctx-feed-pro.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_CTX_Feed_Pro {
 4: 	public function __construct() {
 5: 		add_action( 'woo_feed_before_product_loop', function ( $productIds, $feedConfig ) {
 6: 			$data             = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 7: 			$default_currency = $data->get_default_currency();
 8: 
 9: 			if ( defined( 'WOO_FEED_PRO_FILE' ) ) {
10: 				if ( $default_currency != $feedConfig['feedCurrency'] ) {
11: 					$data->set_current_currency( $feedConfig['feedCurrency'] );
12: 				} else {
13: 					$data->set_current_currency( $default_currency );
14: 				}
15: 			} else {
16: 				$feed_currency = $data->get_param( 'bot_currency' );
17: 				if ( $feed_currency !== 'default_currency' ) {
18: 					$data->set_current_currency( $feed_currency );
19: 				} else {
20: 					$data->set_current_currency( $default_currency );
21: 
22: 				}
23: 			}
24: 
25: 		}, 10, 2 );
26: 
27: 		add_action( 'woo_feed_after_product_loop', function ( $productIds, $feedConfig ) {
28: 			$data          = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
29: 			$currency_code = $data->get_default_currency();
30: 
31: 			$data->set_current_currency( $currency_code );
32: 		}, 10, 2 );
33: 
34: 		add_filter( 'woo_feed_filter_product_link', function ( $link, $product, $config ) {
35: 			$data             = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
36: 			$default_currency = $data->get_default_currency();
37: 
38: 			if ( defined( 'WOO_FEED_PRO_FILE' ) ) {
39: 				$link = add_query_arg( [ 'wmc-currency' => $config->get_feed_currency() ], $link );
40: 			} else {
41: 				$feed_currency = $data->get_param( 'bot_currency' );
42: 				if ( $feed_currency !== 'default_currency' ) {
43: 					$link = add_query_arg( [ 'wmc-currency' => $feed_currency ], $link );
44: 				} else {
45: 					$link = add_query_arg( [ 'wmc-currency' => $default_currency ], $link );
46: 				}
47: 			}
48: 
49: 			return $link;
50: 		}, 10, 3 );
51: 	}
52: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/extra_product_options.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Extra_Product_Options
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Extra_Product_Options {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		if ( ! is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-extra-product-options-pro/woocommerce-extra-product-options-pro.php' ) ) {
15: 			return;
16: 		}
17: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
18: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
19: 			add_filter( 'thwepo_extra_option_display_price', array(
20: 				$this,
21: 				'thwepo_extra_option_display_price'
22: 			), 10, 4 );
23: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_add_cart_item_data', array( $this, 'woocommerce_add_cart_item_data' ), 20, 4 );
24: 			add_filter( 'thwepo_product_price', array( $this, 'thwepo_product_price' ), 10, 3 );
25: 			add_filter( 'thwepo_product_field_price', array( $this, 'thwepo_product_field_price' ), 10, 5 );
26: 		}
27: 	}
28: 
29: 	/**
30: 	 * @param $price
31: 	 * @param $price_type
32: 	 * @param $name
33: 	 * @param $price_info
34: 	 * @param $index
35: 	 *
36: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
37: 	 */
38: 	public function thwepo_product_field_price( $price, $price_type, $name, $price_info, $index ) {
39: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_plugin' ) ) {
40: 			return $price;
41: 		}
42: 		if ( $price && wp_doing_ajax() ) {
43: 			$action = isset( $_POST['action'] ) ? sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_POST['action'] ) ) : '';
44: 			if ( $action === 'thwepo_calculate_extra_cost' ) {
45: 				if ( $price_type === 'normal' ) {
46: 					$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
47: 				}
48: 			}
49: 		}
50: 
51: 		return $price;
52: 	}
53: 
54: 	/**
55: 	 * @param $price
56: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
57: 	 * @param $is_default
58: 	 *
59: 	 * @return mixed
60: 	 */
61: 	public function thwepo_product_price( $price, $product, $is_default ) {
62: 		if ( $product ) {
63: 			$price = $is_default ? $product->get_price_html() : $product->get_price();
64: 		}
65: 
66: 		return $price;
67: 	}
68: 
69: 	public function woocommerce_add_cart_item_data( $cart_item_data, $product_id, $variation_id, $quantity ) {
70: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
71: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
72: 		if ( is_array( $cart_item_data['thwepo_options'] ) && count( $cart_item_data['thwepo_options'] ) ) {
73: 			foreach ( $cart_item_data['thwepo_options'] as $key => $value ) {
74: 				if ( $value['price_type'] == 'custom' ) {
75: 					if ( $current_currency != $default_currency ) {
76: 						$cart_item_data['thwepo_options'][ $key ]['value'] *= 1 / wmc_get_price( 1, $current_currency );
77: 					}
78: 				}
79: 			}
80: 		}
81: 
82: 		return $cart_item_data;
83: 	}
84: 
85: 
86: 	public function thwepo_extra_option_display_price( $return, $price, $unformatted_price, $field, $args = array() ) {
87: 		return wc_price( wmc_get_price( $price ) );
88: 	}
89: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/google_index.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: /**
  3:  * Created by PhpStorm.
  4:  * User: Villatheme-Thanh
  5:  * Date: 30-09-19
  6:  * Time: 8:18 AM
  7:  */
  8: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  9: 	exit;
 10: }
 11: 
 12: //$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']='/google.com';
 13: 
 14: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Google_Index {
 15: 	protected $settings;
 16: 	protected $woosea_currency;
 17: 
 18: 	public function __construct() {
 19: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 20: 
 21: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 22: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'set_currency_for_bot' ), 999 );
 23: 
 24: 			/* Google Listings and Ads */
 25: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_gla_product_attribute_values', [ $this, 'modify_gg_product_attributes' ], 10, 3 );
 26: //			add_filter( 'woocommerce_gla_product_attribute_value_price', [ $this, 'convert_currency_regular_price' ], 10, 3 );
 27: 
 28: 			/*WooCommerce Google Product Feed - Ademti Software Ltd*/
 29: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_gpf_feed_item', [ $this, 'add_currency_arg_to_product_permalinks' ], 10, 2 );
 30: 
 31: 			add_filter( 'wmc_woosea_product_data', [ $this, 'woosea_product_permalinks' ], 10 );
 32: 
 33: 			add_action( 'woosea_start_render_product_feed', [ $this, 'add_change_price_hook' ], 10 );
 34: 			add_action( 'woosea_end_render_product_feed', [ $this, 'remove_change_price_hook' ], 10 );
 35: 		}
 36: 	}
 37: 
 38: 	public function set_currency_for_bot() {
 39: 		$bot_currency = false;
 40: 		if ( $this->is_google_bot() ) {
 41: 			$bot_currency = apply_filters( 'wmc_set_currency_for_google_bot_index', $this->get_bot_currency() );
 42: 		} elseif ( $this->isBot() ) {
 43: 			$bot_currency = apply_filters( 'wmc_set_currency_for_bot_index', $this->get_bot_currency() );
 44: 		}
 45: 		if ( $bot_currency !== false ) {
 46: 			if ( $bot_currency ) {
 47: 				$this->settings->set_current_currency( $bot_currency );
 48: 			} else {
 49: 				$this->settings->set_fallback_currency();
 50: 			}
 51: 		}
 52: 	}
 53: 
 54: 	private function get_bot_currency() {
 55: 		if ( isset( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ) && ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( $_REQUEST['_woo_multi_currency_nonce'] ), 'woo_multi_currency_plugin' ) ) {
 56: 			return '';
 57: 		}
 58: 
 59: 		$bot_currency    = $this->settings->get_params( 'bot_currency' );
 60: 		$list_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 61: 		if ( $bot_currency === 'default_currency' ) {
 62: 			$bot_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
 63: 		} elseif ( $bot_currency ) {
 64: 			if ( empty( $list_currencies[ $bot_currency ] ) ) {
 65: 				$bot_currency = '';
 66: 			}
 67: 		}
 68: 		$passed_currency = '';
 69: 		if ( ! empty( $_GET['wmc-currency'] ) ) {
 70: 			$passed_currency = sanitize_text_field( $_GET['wmc-currency'] );
 71: 		} elseif ( ! empty( $_GET['currency'] ) ) {
 72: 			$passed_currency = sanitize_text_field( $_GET['currency'] );
 73: 		}
 74: 		if ( $passed_currency ) {
 75: 			if ( ! empty( $list_currencies[ $passed_currency ] ) ) {
 76: 				$bot_currency = $passed_currency;
 77: 			}
 78: 		}
 79: 
 80: 		return $bot_currency;
 81: 	}
 82: 
 83: 	public function is_google_bot() {
 84: 		$google_bots = apply_filters( 'wmc_google_bots_list', array(
 85: 			'googlebot',
 86: 			'google-sitemaps',
 87: 			'appEngine-google',
 88: 			'feedfetcher-google',
 89: 			'googlealert.com',
 90: 			'AdsBot-Google',
 91: 			'google'
 92: 		) );
 93: 		foreach ( $google_bots as $bot ) {
 94: 			if ( self::check_bot( $bot ) ) {
 95: 				return true;
 96: 			}
 97: 		}
 98: 
 99: 		return false;
100: 	}
101: 
102: 	public function isBot() {
103: 		$bots = apply_filters( 'wmc_other_bots_list', array(
104: //			'pixel',//confused with google pixel device
105: 			'facebook',
106: 			'rambler',
107: 			'aport',
108: 			'yahoo',
109: 			'msnbot',
110: 			'turtle',
111: 			'mail.ru',
112: 			'omsktele',
113: 			'yetibot',
114: 			'picsearch',
115: 			'sape.bot',
116: 			'sape_context',
117: 			'gigabot',
118: 			'snapbot',
119: 			'alexa.com',
120: 			'megadownload.net',
121: 			'askpeter.info',
122: 			'igde.ru',
123: 			'ask.com',
124: 			'qwartabot',
125: 			'yanga.co.uk',
126: 			'scoutjet',
127: 			'similarpages',
128: 			'oozbot',
129: 			'shrinktheweb.com',
130: 			'aboutusbot',
131: 			'followsite.com',
132: 			'dataparksearch',
133: 			'liveinternet.ru',
134: 			'xml-sitemaps.com',
135: 			'agama',
136: 			'metadatalabs.com',
137: 			'h1.hrn.ru',
138: 			'seo-rus.com',
139: 			'yaDirectBot',
140: 			'yandeG',
141: 			'yandex',
142: 			'yandexSomething',
143: 			'Copyscape.com',
144: 			'domaintools.com',
145: 			'Nigma.ru',
146: 			'bing.com',
147: 			'dotnetdotcom',
148: 		) );
149: 		foreach ( $bots as $bot ) {
150: 			if ( self::check_bot( $bot ) ) {
151: 				return true;
152: 			}
153: 		}
154: 
155: 		return false;
156: 	}
157: 
158: 	private static function check_bot( $bot ) {
159: 		return isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'] ) && ( stripos( $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'], $bot ) !== false || preg_match( '/bot|crawl|slurp|spider|mediapartners/i', $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'] ) );
160: 	}
161: 
162: 
163: 	public function add_currency_query_to_product_link( $link ) {
164: 		$bot_currency    = $this->settings->get_params( 'bot_currency' );
165: 		$list_currencies = $this->settings->get_currencies();
166: 
167: 		if ( $bot_currency === 'default_currency' ) {
168: 			$bot_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
169: 		} elseif ( $bot_currency ) {
170: 			if ( ! in_array( $bot_currency, $list_currencies ) ) {
171: 				$bot_currency = '';
172: 			}
173: 		}
174: 
175: 		return $bot_currency ? add_query_arg( [ 'wmc-currency' => $bot_currency ], $link ) : $link;
176: 	}
177: 
178: 	/**
179: 	 * @param $attributes
180: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
181: 	 * @param $adapter
182: 	 *
183: 	 * @return mixed
184: 	 */
185: 	public function modify_gg_product_attributes( $attributes, $product, $adapter ) {
186: 		$link               = ! empty( $attributes['link'] ) ? $attributes['link'] : $product->get_permalink();
187: 		$attributes['link'] = $this->add_currency_query_to_product_link( $link );
188: 
189: 		return $attributes;
190: 	}
191: 
192: 	public function convert_currency_regular_price( $price, $product, $tax_excluded ) {
193: 
194: 		return $price;
195: 	}
196: 
197: 	public function add_currency_arg_to_product_permalinks( $feed_item, $wc_product ) {
198: 		$feed_item->purchase_link = $this->add_currency_query_to_product_link( $feed_item->purchase_link );
199: 
200: 		return $feed_item;
201: 	}
202: 
203: 	public function woosea_product_permalinks( $product_data ) {
204: 		if ( ! empty( $product_data['link'] ) ) {
205: 			$product_data['link'] = $this->add_currency_query_to_product_link( $product_data['link'] );
206: 		}
207: 
208: 		return $product_data;
209: 	}
210: 
211: 	public function add_change_price_hook() {
212: 		/*Simple product*/
213: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_regular_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99, 2 );
214: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_sale_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99, 2 );
215: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99, 2 );
216: 
217: 		/*Variable price*/
218: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99, 2 );
219: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_regular_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99, 2 );
220: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_sale_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99, 2 );
221: 
222: 	}
223: 
224: 	public function remove_change_price_hook() {
225: 		/*Simple product*/
226: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_regular_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99 );
227: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_sale_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99 );
228: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99 );
229: 
230: 		/*Variable price*/
231: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99 );
232: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_regular_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99 );
233: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_sale_price', array( $this, 'convert_price' ), 99 );
234: 
235: 	}
236: 
237: 	public function convert_price( $price, $product ) {
238: 		if ( ! $price ) {
239: 			return $price;
240: 		}
241: 
242: 		if ( ! $this->woosea_currency ) {
243: 			$this->woosea_currency = $this->settings->get_params( 'bot_currency' );
244: 			$list_currencies       = $this->settings->get_currencies();
245: 
246: 			if ( $this->woosea_currency === 'default_currency' ) {
247: 				$this->woosea_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
248: 			} elseif ( $this->woosea_currency ) {
249: 				if ( ! in_array( $this->woosea_currency, $list_currencies ) ) {
250: 					$this->woosea_currency = '';
251: 				}
252: 			}
253: 		}
254: 
255: 		if ( $this->woosea_currency ) {
256: 			$price = wmc_get_price( $price, $this->woosea_currency );
257: 		}
258: 
259: 		return $price;
260: 	}
261: }

 20: 						$this,
 21: 						'learn_press_course_slash_regular_price'
 22: 					), 99, 2 );

 24: 						$this,

 26: 					), 99, 2 );

 32: 						$this,
 33: 						'learn_press_course_slash_price_html'

 53: 						$this,

 55: 					), 10, 4 );

 97: 						$this,

 99: 					), 10, 2 );
100: 				} else {
101: 					add_filter( 'learn-press/course-price', array( $this, 'learn_press_course_price' ), 99, 2 );
102: 					add_filter( 'learn_press_course_price_html', array(
103: 						$this,
104: 						'learn_press_course_price_html'
105: 					), 99, 2 );
106: 					add_filter( 'learn_press_course_origin_price_html', array(
107: 						$this,
108: 						'learn_press_course_origin_price_html'
109: 					), 99, 2 );
110: 				}
111: 			}
112: 		}
113: 	}
114: 
115: 	public function learn_press_slash_woo_course_price( $price, $course ) {
116: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
117: 	}

133: 	}

137: 			$price = $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $GLOBALS['LearnPress']->get_cart()->total ) );
138: 		}

142: 
143: 	public function learn_press_course_slash_price_html( $price_html, $has_sale, $course_id ) {
144: 		$course = learn_press_get_course( $course_id );
145: 		if ( $course ) {
146: 			if ( is_plugin_active( 'thim-course-builder/thim-course-builder.php' ) && function_exists( 'learn_press_format_price' ) ) {
147: 				$price_arr = explode( ' ', $price_html );
148: 				if ( count( $price_arr ) > 1 ) {
149: 					$price_html = sprintf( '<span class="origin-price">%s</span>', $this->wc_price( $course->get_regular_price() ) );
150: 					$price_html .= sprintf( '<span class="price">%s</span>', $this->wc_price( $course->get_price() ) );
151: 				} else {
152: 					$price_html = esc_html( $this->wc_price( $course->get_price() ) );
153: //					$price_html = $course->get_price();
154: //					$c_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
155: //					$current_currency_symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $c_currency );
156: //					return learn_press_format_price( $price_html, $current_currency_symbol );
157: 				}
158: 			} else {
159: 				if ( $has_sale ) {
160: 					$price_html = sprintf( '<span class="origin-price">%s</span>', $this->wc_price( $course->get_regular_price() ) );
161: 					$price_html .= sprintf( '<span class="price">%s</span>', $this->wc_price( $course->get_price() ) );
162: 				} else {
163: 					$price_html = esc_html( $this->wc_price( $course->get_price() ) );
164: 				}
165: 			}
166: 		}
167: 
168: 		return $price_html;
169: 	}
170: 
171: 	public function learn_press_course_slash_regular_price_html( $price, $course_id ) {

189: 		}
190:

192: 	}

199: 			if ( $course ) {

202: 			}
203: 		}

212: 	/**
213: 	 * @param $course_subtotal
214: 	 * @param $course LP_Course
215: 	 * @param $quantity
216: 	 * @param $lp_cart
217: 	 *
218: 	 * @return string
219: 	 */
220: 	public function learn_press_cart_item_subtotal( $course_subtotal, $course, $quantity, $lp_cart ) {
221: 		if ( ! $this->is_default_currency() ) {
222: 			$price           = $course->get_price();

224: 			$course_subtotal = $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $row_price ) );
225: 		}
226: 
227: 		return $course_subtotal;
228: 	}

248: //				$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
249: 		} elseif ( is_string( $price ) ) {
250: 			$course = learn_press_get_course( $course_id );
251: 			if ( $course ) {
252: 				$price = wmc_get_price( $course->get_regular_price() );
253: 				$price = $this->wc_price( $price );
254: 			}
255: 		}

258: 	}

260: 	public function learn_press_course_price_html_new( $price_html, $has_sale, $course_id ) {
261: 		$course = learn_press_get_course( $course_id );
262: 		if ( $course ) {
263: 			$price_html = '';
264: 			if ( $has_sale ) {
265: 				$price_html .= sprintf( '<span class="origin-price">%s</span>', $course->get_regular_price_html() );
266: 			}
267: 			$price_html .= sprintf( '<span class="price">%s</span>', $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $course->get_price() ) ) );
268: 		}
269: 
270: 		return $price_html;
271: 	}

273: 	public function learn_press_course_price( $price, $product_id ) {
274: 
275: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
276: 	}
277: 
278: 	/**
279: 	 * @param $price
280: 	 * @param $course LP_Course
281: 	 *
282: 	 * @return string
283: 	 */
284: 	public function learn_press_course_price_html( $price, $course ) {
285: 		return $this->wc_price( $course->get_price() );
286: 	}
287: 
288: 	/**
289: 	 * @param $sale_price
290: 	 * @param $course LP_Course
291: 	 *
292: 	 * @return string
293: 	 */
294: 	public function learn_press_course_origin_price_html( $sale_price, $course ) {
295: 		if ( $course ) {
296: 			if ( $course->has_sale_price() ) {
297: 				$sale_price = $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $course->get_origin_price() ) );
298: 			}
299: 		}
300: 
301: 		return $sale_price;
302: 	}
303: 
304: 	public function wc_price( $price, $args = array() ) {
305: 		extract(
306: 			apply_filters(
307: 				'wc_price_args', wp_parse_args(
308: 					$args, array(
309: 						'ex_tax_label'       => false,
310: 						'currency'           => get_woocommerce_currency_symbol(),
311: 						'decimal_separator'  => wc_get_price_decimal_separator(),
312: 						'thousand_separator' => wc_get_price_thousand_separator(),
313: 						'decimals'           => wc_get_price_decimals(),
314: 						'price_format'       => get_woocommerce_price_format(),
315: 					)
316: 				)
317: 			)
318: 		);
319: 
320: 		$negative = $price < 0;
321: 		$price    = apply_filters( 'raw_woocommerce_price', floatval( $negative ? $price * - 1 : $price ) );
322: 		$price    = apply_filters( 'formatted_woocommerce_price', number_format( $price, $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator ), $price, $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
323: 
324: 		if ( apply_filters( 'woocommerce_price_trim_zeros', false ) && $decimals > 0 ) {
325: 			$price = wc_trim_zeros( $price );
326: 		}
327: 		$formatted_price = ( $negative ? '-' : '' ) . sprintf( $price_format, $currency, $price );
328: 
329: 		return $formatted_price;
330: 	}
331: 
332: 	private function is_default_currency() {
333: 		return $this->settings->get_current_currency() === $this->settings->get_default_currency();
334: 	}
335: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/lumise.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Lumise
 5:  * Plugin: Lumise
 6:  */
 7: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 8: 	exit;
 9: }
10: 
11: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Lumise {
12: 	protected $settings;
13: 
14: 	public function __construct() {
15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() && is_plugin_active( 'lumise/lumise.php' ) ) {
17: 			add_filter( 'lumise_product_base_price', array( $this, 'lumise_product_base_price' ), 20, 2 );
18: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_widget_cart_item_quantity', array(
19: 				$this,
20: 				'woocommerce_widget_cart_item_quantity'
21: 			), 1000, 3 );
22: //			add_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', array( $this, 'woo_calculate_price' ), 9, 1 );
23: //			add_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', array( $this, 'woo_calculate_price_remove' ), 11, 1 );
24: 		}
25: 	}
26: 
27: 	public function woo_calculate_price( $cart_object ) {
28: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_price', array( $this, 'revert_price' ), 10, 2 );
29: 	}
30: 
31: 	public function woo_calculate_price_remove( $cart_object ) {
32: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_variation_get_price', array( $this, 'revert_price' ), 10 );
33: 	}
34: 
35: 	public function revert_price( $price ) {
36: 		return wmc_revert_price( $price );
37: 	}
38: 
39: 	public function lumise_product_base_price( $price, $product_id ) {
40: 		if ( $this->settings->get_default_currency() !== $this->settings->get_current_currency() ) {
41: 			$price = wmc_revert_price( $price );
42: 		}
43: 
44: 		return $price;
45: 	}
46: 
47: 	public function woocommerce_widget_cart_item_quantity( $html, $cart_item, $cart_item_key ) {
48: 		if ( isset( $cart_item['lumise_data'] ) ) {
49: 			foreach ( $cart_item['lumise_data']['attributes'] as $id => $attr ) {
50: 				if ( $attr->type == 'quantity' && isset( $cart_item['lumise_data']['options']->{$id} ) ) {
51: 					$total = $cart_item['lumise_data']['price']['total'];
52: 					$total = wmc_get_price( $total );
53: 					$qty   = @json_decode( $cart_item['lumise_data']['options']->{$id}, true );
54: 					if ( json_last_error() === 0 && is_array( $qty ) ) {
55: 						$qty = array_sum( $qty );
56: 					} else {
57: 						$qty = (Int) $cart_item['lumise_data']['options']->{$id};
58: 					}
59: 					$html = '<span class="quantity">' . sprintf( '%s &times; %s', $qty, wc_price( $total / $qty ) ) . '</span>';
60: 				}
61: 			}
62: 
63: 		}
64: 
65: 		return $html;
66: 	}
67: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/smart_bundle_for_woocommerce.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Smart_Bundle_For_WooCommerce
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Smart_Bundle_For_WooCommerce {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			if ( is_plugin_active( 'smart-bundle-for-woocommerce/smart-bundle-woocommerce.php' ) ) {
17: 				add_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', array(
18: 					$this,
19: 					'wcbp_bundle_product_before_calculate_totals'
20: 				), 11, 1 );
21: 			}
22: 		}
23: 	}
24: 
25: 	public function wcbp_bundle_product_before_calculate_totals( $cart_object ) {
26: 		//  This is necessary for WC 3.0+
27: 		if ( is_admin() && ! defined( 'DOING_AJAX' ) ) {
28: 			return;
29: 		}
30: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() === $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
31: 			return;
32: 		}
33: 		foreach ( $cart_object->get_cart() as $cart_item_key => $cart_item ) {
34: 			// child product price
35: 			if ( isset( $cart_item['wcbp_bundle_product_parent_id'] ) && ( '' != $cart_item['wcbp_bundle_product_parent_id'] ) ) {
36: 				$cart_item['data']->set_price( 0 );
37: 			}
38: 
39: 			// main product price
40: 			if ( isset( $cart_item['wcbp_product_bundle_ids'] ) && ( '' != $cart_item['wcbp_product_bundle_ids'] ) ) {
41: 				$wcbp_bundle_product_items = explode( ',', $cart_item['wcbp_product_bundle_ids'] );
42: 				$wcbp_bundle_product_items = array_count_values( $wcbp_bundle_product_items );
43: 				$product_id                = $cart_item['product_id'];
44: 				//$cart_item['data']->set_tax_status('none');
45: 				$wcbp_bundle_product_price = 0;
46: 				$pricing_type              = get_post_meta( $product_id, 'wcbp_bundle_prod_pricing', true );
47: 
48: 				if ( 'per_product_only' == $pricing_type || 'per_product_bundle' == $pricing_type ) {
49: 					if ( is_array( $wcbp_bundle_product_items ) && count( $wcbp_bundle_product_items ) > 0 ) {
50: 						foreach ( $wcbp_bundle_product_items as $wcbp_bundle_product_item => $qty ) {
51: 							$wcbp_bundle_product_item_id      = absint( $wcbp_bundle_product_item ? $wcbp_bundle_product_item : 0 );
52: 							$wcbp_bundle_product_item_qty     = absint( $qty ? $qty : 1 );
53: 							$wcbp_bundle_product_item_product = wc_get_product( $wcbp_bundle_product_item_id );
54: 
55: 							if ( ! $wcbp_bundle_product_item_product || $wcbp_bundle_product_item_product->is_type( 'bundle_product' ) ) {
56: 								continue;
57: 							}
58: 
59: 							// Quantity issue calculation fixed  	
60: 							foreach ( $cart_object->get_cart() as $cart_item_key_for_qty => $cart_item_for_qty ) {
61: 								if ( $cart_item_for_qty['product_id'] == $wcbp_bundle_product_item_id ) {
62: 									$cart_item_qty = $cart_item_for_qty['quantity'];
63: 								}
64: 							}
65: 							$wcbp_bundle_product_price += wmc_revert_price( $wcbp_bundle_product_item_product->get_price() ) * $cart_item_qty;
66: 							// Quantity issue calculation fixed  	
67: 						}
68: 					}
69: 				} else {
70: 					$bundle_product            = wc_get_product( $product_id );
71: 					$box_price                 = wmc_revert_price( $bundle_product->get_price() );
72: 					$wcbp_bundle_product_price = $box_price;
73: 				}
74: 				// per item + base price
75: 				if ( ( 'per_product_bundle' == $pricing_type ) && is_numeric( $wcbp_bundle_product_price ) ) {
76: 					$bundle_product            = wc_get_product( $product_id );
77: 					$box_price                 = wmc_revert_price( $bundle_product->get_price() );
78: 					$wcbp_bundle_product_price += $box_price;
79: 				}
80: 
81: 				$cart_item['data']->set_price( floatval( $wcbp_bundle_product_price ) );
82: 			}
83: 		}
84: 	}
85: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/subscriptions_for_woocommerce.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**Subscriptions for WooCommerce from WebToffee
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Subscriptions_For_WooCommerce
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Subscriptions_For_WooCommerce {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			add_filter( 'hf_subscription_product_price', array( $this, 'hf_subscription_product_price' ), 10, 2 );
17: 			add_filter( 'hf_subscriptions_product_signup_fee', array( $this, 'hf_subscriptions_product_signup_fee' ) );
18: 		}
19: 	}
20: 
21: 	/**
22: 	 * @param $price
23: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
24: 	 *
25: 	 * @return float|int|mixed
26: 	 */
27: 	public function hf_subscription_product_price( $price, $product ) {
28: 		if ( $product ) {
29: 			if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
30: 				$product_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_regular_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
31: 				$sale_price       = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_sale_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
32: 				$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
33: 				if ( isset( $product_price[ $current_currency ] ) && ! $product->is_on_sale( 'edit' ) && $product_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
34: 					return $product_price[ $current_currency ];
35: 				} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] ) && $sale_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
36: 					return $sale_price[ $current_currency ];
37: 				}
38: 			}
39: 		}
40: 
41: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
42: 	}
43: 
44: 	/**
45: 	 * @param $price
46: 	 *
47: 	 * @return float|int|mixed
48: 	 */
49: 	public function hf_subscriptions_product_signup_fee( $price ) {
50: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
51: 	}
52: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/the_events_calendar.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_The_Events_Calendar
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_The_Events_Calendar {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 
 15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 17: 			add_filter( 'tribe_get_cost', array( $this, 'tribe_get_cost' ), 10, 3 );
 18: 		}
 19: 	}
 20: 
 21: 	public function tribe_get_cost( $cost, $post_id, $with_currency_symbol ) {
 22: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 23: 		if ( $this->settings->get_default_currency() == $current_currency ) {
 24: 			return $cost;
 25: 		}
 26: 		$cost = get_post_meta( $post_id, '_EventCost' );
 27: 		if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
 28: 			$args      = array(
 29: 				'post_type'      => 'product',
 30: 				'post_status'    => 'publish',
 31: 				'posts_per_page' => - 1,
 32: 				'meta_key'       => '_tribe_wooticket_for_event',// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_key
 33: 				'meta_value'     => $post_id,// phpcs:ignore WordPress.DB.SlowDBQuery.slow_db_query_meta_value
 34: 				'order'          => 'ASC',
 35: 				'orderby'        => 'menu_order',
 36: 			);
 37: 			$the_query = new WP_Query( $args );
 38: 			$prs       = array();
 39: 			if ( $the_query->have_posts() ) {
 40: 				$count = 0;
 41: 				while ( $the_query->have_posts() ) {
 42: 					$the_query->the_post();
 43: 					$product_id = get_the_ID();
 44: 					$product    = wc_get_product( $product_id );
 45: 					if ( $product ) {
 46: 						$product_price = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
 47: 						$sale_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
 48: 						if ( $product->is_on_sale() ) {
 49: 							if ( isset( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] ) && $sale_price[ $current_currency ] ) {
 50: 								if ( $with_currency_symbol ) {
 51: 									$prs[] = $this->wc_price( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] );
 52: 
 53: 								} else {
 54: 									$prs[] = ( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] );
 55: 
 56: 								}
 57: 							} else {
 58: 								if ( $with_currency_symbol ) {
 59: 									$prs[] = $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cost[ $count ] ) );
 60: 								} else {
 61: 									$prs[] = wmc_get_price( $cost[ $count ] );
 62: 								}
 63: 							}
 64: 						} else {
 65: 							if ( isset( $product_price[ $current_currency ] ) && $product_price[ $current_currency ] ) {
 66: 								if ( $with_currency_symbol ) {
 67: 									$prs[] = $this->wc_price( $product_price[ $current_currency ] );
 68: 
 69: 								} else {
 70: 									$prs[] = ( $product_price[ $current_currency ] );
 71: 
 72: 								}
 73: 							} else {
 74: 
 75: 								if ( $with_currency_symbol ) {
 76: 									$prs[] = $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cost[ $count ] ) );
 77: 								} else {
 78: 									$prs[] = wmc_get_price( $cost[ $count ] );
 79: 								}
 80: 							}
 81: 						}
 82: 					}
 83: 					$count ++;
 84: 				}
 85: 			}
 86: 
 87: 			wp_reset_postdata();
 88: 			if ( count( $prs ) ) {
 89: 				return implode( ' - ', $prs );
 90: 			} else {
 91: 				return $cost;
 92: 			}
 93: 		}
 94: 		if ( is_array( $cost ) ) {
 95: 			$return = array();
 96: 			foreach ( $cost as $c ) {
 97: 				if ( $with_currency_symbol ) {
 98: 					$return[] = $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $c ) );
 99: 				} else {
100: 					$return[] = wmc_get_price( $c );
101: 				}
102: 			}
103: 
104: 			return implode( ' - ', $return );
105: 
106: 		} else {
107: 			if ( $with_currency_symbol ) {
108: 				return $this->wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cost ) );
109: 			} else {
110: 				return wmc_get_price( $cost );
111: 			}
112: 		}
113: 
114: 	}
115: 
116: 	public function wc_price( $price, $args = array() ) {
117: 		extract(
118: 			apply_filters(
119: 				'wc_price_args', wp_parse_args(
120: 					$args, array(
121: 						'ex_tax_label'       => false,
122: 						'currency'           => get_woocommerce_currency_symbol(),
123: 						'decimal_separator'  => wc_get_price_decimal_separator(),
124: 						'thousand_separator' => wc_get_price_thousand_separator(),
125: 						'decimals'           => wc_get_price_decimals(),
126: 						'price_format'       => get_woocommerce_price_format(),
127: 					)
128: 				)
129: 			)
130: 		);
131: 
132: 		$negative = $price < 0;
133: 		$price    = apply_filters( 'raw_woocommerce_price', floatval( $negative ? $price * - 1 : $price ) );
134: 		$price    = apply_filters( 'formatted_woocommerce_price', number_format( $price, $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator ), $price, $decimals, $decimal_separator, $thousand_separator );
135: 
136: 		if ( apply_filters( 'woocommerce_price_trim_zeros', false ) && $decimals > 0 ) {
137: 			$price = wc_trim_zeros( $price );
138: 		}
139: 		$formatted_price = ( $negative ? '-' : '' ) . sprintf( $price_format, $currency, $price );
140: 
141: 		return $formatted_price;
142: 	}
143: }

 16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 17: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'init' ) );

 22: 	 * Integrate with Visual Composer
 23: 	 * @return bool

 41: 				),
 42: 			)
