================
File: code_3/plugins/visual_product_builder.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Visual_Product_Builder
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Visual_Product_Builder {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 	protected static $vpc_options_price = array();
 13: 
 14: 	public function __construct() {
 15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 17: 			if ( class_exists( 'Vpc' ) ) {
 18: 				add_filter( 'vpc_options_price', array( $this, 'vpc_options_price' ), 10, 4 );
 19: 				villatheme_remove_object_filter( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', 'VPC_Public', 'get_cart_item_price', 10 );
 20: 				add_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', array( $this, 'get_cart_item_price' ) );
 21: 			}
 22: 		}
 23: 	}
 24: 
 25: 	public function get_cart_item_price( $cart ) {
 26: 		if ( ! get_option( 'vpc-license-key' ) ) {
 27: 			return;
 28: 		}
 29: 		// This is necessary for WC 3.0+
 30: 		if ( is_admin() && ! defined( 'DOING_AJAX' ) ) {
 31: 			return;
 32: 		}
 33: 
 34: 		// Avoiding hook repetition (when using price calculations for example)
 35: 		if ( did_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals' ) >= 2 ) {
 36: 			return;
 37: 		}
 38: 		global $vpc_settings;
 39: 		$hide_secondary_product_in_cart = get_proper_value( $vpc_settings, 'hide-wc-secondary-product-in-cart', 'Yes' );
 40: 
 41: 		if ( is_array( $cart->cart_contents ) ) {
 42: 			foreach ( $cart->cart_contents as $cart_item_key => $cart_item ) {
 43: 				if ( $cart_item['variation_id'] ) {
 44: 					$product_id = $cart_item['variation_id'];
 45: 				} else {
 46: 					$product_id = $cart_item['product_id'];
 47: 				}
 48: 
 49: 				$recap = get_recap_from_cart_item( $cart_item );
 50: 				if ( isset( $cart_item['vpc-is-secondary-product'] ) && $cart_item['vpc-is-secondary-product'] && $hide_secondary_product_in_cart == 'Yes' ) {
 51: 					if ( vpc_woocommerce_version_check() ) {
 52: 						$cart_item['data']->price = 0;
 53: 					} else {
 54: 						$cart_item['data']->set_price( 0 );
 55: 					}
 56: 				}
 57: 				$product = wc_get_product( $product_id );
 58: 
 59: 				if ( vpc_woocommerce_version_check() ) {
 60: 					$price = $cart_item['data']->price;
 61: 				} else {
 62: 					$price = $cart_item['data']->get_price();
 63: 				}
 64: 
 65: 				if ( $price ) {
 66: 					$price = wmc_revert_price( $price );
 67: 				}
 68: 
 69: 				if ( vpc_woocommerce_version_check() ) {
 70: 					$tax_status = $cart_item['data']->tax_status;
 71: 				} else {
 72: 					$tax_status = $cart_item['data']->get_tax_status();
 73: 				}
 74: 
 75: 				$a_price = 0;
 76: 				if ( ! empty( $recap ) ) {
 77: 					$a_price = self::get_config_price( $product_id, $recap, $cart_item, true );
 78: 					if ( isset( $tax_status ) && $tax_status != 'taxable' ) {
 79: 						$a_price = vpc_apply_taxes_on_price_if_needed( $a_price, $cart_item['data'] );
 80: 					}
 81: 				}
 82: 				if ( class_exists( 'Ofb' ) ) {
 83: 					if ( isset( $cart_item['form_data'] ) && ! empty( $cart_item['form_data'] ) ) {
 84: 						$form_data = $cart_item['form_data'];
 85: 						if ( isset( $form_data['id_ofb'] ) ) {
 86: 							$a_price += get_form_data( $form_data['id_ofb'], $form_data, $product_id, true );
 87: 						}
 88: 					}
 89: 				}
 90: 				if ( function_exists( 'vpc_get_price_before_discount' ) ) {
 91: 					$total = wmc_get_price( vpc_get_price_before_discount( $product_id, $price ) ) + $a_price;
 92: 					$total = wmc_revert_price( $total );
 93: 				} else {
 94: 					$total = $price + $a_price;
 95: 				}
 96: 
 97: 				if ( vpc_woocommerce_version_check() ) {
 98: 					$cart_item['data']->price = $total;
 99: 				} else {
100: 					$cart_item['data']->set_price( $total );
101: 				}
102: 			}
103: 		}
104: 	}
105: 
106: 	private static function get_config_price( $product_id, $config, $cart_item, $statut, $apply_wad_discount = true ) {
107: 		if ( ! get_option( 'vpc-license-key' ) ) {
108: 			return;
109: 		}
110: 		$original_config = get_product_config( $product_id );
111: 		$total_price     = 0;
112: 		$product         = wc_get_product( $product_id );
113: 		if ( is_array( $config ) ) {
114: 			foreach ( $config as $component => $raw_options ) {
115: 				$options_arr = $raw_options;
116: 				if ( ! is_array( $raw_options ) ) {
117: 					$options_arr = array( $raw_options );
118: 				}
119: 				foreach ( $options_arr as $option ) {
120: 					$linked_product = self::extract_option_field_from_config( $option, $component, $original_config->settings, 'product' );
121: 					$option_price   = self::extract_option_field_from_config( $option, $component, $original_config->settings, 'price' );
122: 
123: 					if ( strpos( $option_price, ',' ) ) {
124: 						$option_price = floatval( str_replace( ',', '.', $option_price ) );
125: 					}
126: 					if ( $linked_product ) {
127: 						$option_price = self::get_product_linked_price( $linked_product );
128: 						if ( function_exists( 'vpc_get_opt_price_before_dicount_in_cart' ) ) {
129: 							$option_price = vpc_get_opt_price_before_dicount_in_cart( $product_id, $linked_product, $option_price, $statut );
130: 						}
131: 					} else {
132: 						/*only convert price if it's not linked to a product*/
133: 						$option_price = wmc_get_price( $option_price );
134: 					}
135: 
136: 					// We make sure we're not handling any empty priced option
137: 					if ( empty( $option_price ) ) {
138: 						if ( ! $linked_product ) {
139: 							$option_price = self::extract_option_field_from_config( $option, $component, $original_config->settings, 'price' );
140: 							if ( $option_price !== false and $apply_wad_discount ) {
141: 								$option_price = 0;
142: 								if ( function_exists( 'vpc_get_wad_discount_for_opt_in_cart' ) ) {
143: 									$option_price = vpc_get_wad_discount_for_opt_in_cart( $product_id, $option_price );
144: 								}
145: 							} else {
146: 								$option_price = 0;
147: 							}
148: 						} else {
149: 							$option_price = 0;
150: 						}
151: 					} else {
152: 						if ( ! $linked_product && $apply_wad_discount ) {
153: 							if ( function_exists( 'vpc_get_wad_discount_for_opt_in_cart' ) ) {
154: 								$option_price = vpc_get_wad_discount_for_opt_in_cart( $product_id, $option_price );
155: 							}
156: 						}
157: 					}
158: 					$total_price += $option_price;
159: 				}
160: 			}
161: 		}
162: 
163: 		return apply_filters( 'vpc_config_price', $total_price, $product_id, $config, $cart_item, $statut );
164: 	}
165: 
166: 	private static function get_product_linked_price( $linked_product ) {
167: 		global $vpc_settings;
168: 		$hide_secondary_product_in_cart = get_proper_value( $vpc_settings, 'hide-wc-secondary-product-in-cart', 'Yes' );
169: 		if ( $hide_secondary_product_in_cart == 'Yes' ) {
170: 			$_product = wc_get_product( $linked_product );
171: 			if ( function_exists( 'wad_get_product_price' ) ) {
172: 				$option_price = wad_get_product_price( $_product );
173: 			} else {
174: 				$option_price = $_product->get_price();
175: 				if ( strpos( $option_price, ',' ) ) {
176: 					$option_price = floatval( str_replace( ',', '.', $option_price ) );
177: 				}
178: 			}
179: 		} else {
180: 			$option_price = 0;
181: 		}
182: 
183: 		return $option_price;
184: 	}
185: 
186: 	public static function extract_option_field_from_config( $searched_option, $searched_component, $config, $field = "icon" ) {
187: 		$unslashed_searched_option    = vpc_remove_special_characters( $searched_option );
188: 		$unslashed_searched_component = vpc_remove_special_characters( $searched_component );
189: 		$field                        = apply_filters( 'extracted_option_field_from_config', $field, $config );
190: 		if ( ! is_array( $config ) ) {
191: 			$config = unserialize( $config );
192: 		}
193: 		if ( isset( $config['components'] ) ) {
194: 			foreach ( $config['components'] as $i => $component ) {
195: 				if ( vpc_remove_special_characters( $component['cname'], '"' ) == $unslashed_searched_component ) {
196: 					foreach ( $component['options'] as $component_option ) {
197: 						if ( vpc_remove_special_characters( $component_option['name'], '"' ) == $unslashed_searched_option ) {
198: 							if ( isset( $component_option[ $field ] ) ) {
199: 								return $component_option[ $field ];
200: 							}
201: 						}
202: 					}
203: 				}
204: 			}
205: 		}
206: 
207: 		return false;
208: 	}
209: 
210: 	/**
211: 	 * @param $price
212: 	 * @param $option
213: 	 * @param $component
214: 	 * @param $vpc VPC_Default_Skin
215: 	 *
216: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
217: 	 */
218: 	public function vpc_options_price( $price, $option, $component, $vpc ) {
219: 		if ( ! empty( $option['product'] ) ) {//do not convert an option if it's linked to a product
220: 			return $price;
221: 		}
222: 		if ( ! isset( self::$vpc_options_price[ $option['option_id'] ] ) ) {
223: 			self::$vpc_options_price[ $option['option_id'] ] = wmc_get_price( $price );
224: 		}
225: 
226: 		return self::$vpc_options_price[ $option['option_id'] ];
227: 	}
228: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woo_discount_rules.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  4: 	exit;
  5: }
  6: 
  7: /**
  8:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woo_Discount_Rules
  9:  */
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woo_Discount_Rules {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 	protected $convert;
 13: 
 14: 	public function __construct() {
 15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 16: 		$this->convert  = false;
 17: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() && is_plugin_active( 'woo-discount-rules/woo-discount-rules.php' ) ) {
 18: 			add_action( 'admin_notices', array(
 19: 				$this,
 20: 				'admin_notices'
 21: 			) );
 22: 			add_filter( 'woo_discount_rules_on_display_discount_priced_in_cart_item_subtotal', array(
 23: 				$this,
 24: 				'woo_discount_rules_on_display_discount_priced_in_cart_item_subtotal'
 25: 			), 10, 4 );
 26: 			add_filter( 'advanced_woo_discount_rules_discounted_price_of_cart_item', array(
 27: 				$this,
 28: 				'advanced_woo_discount_rules_discounted_price_of_cart_item'
 29: 			), 10, 4 );
 30: 			add_filter( 'advanced_woo_discount_rules_converted_currency_value', array(
 31: 				$this,
 32: 				'advanced_woo_discount_rules_converted_currency_value'
 33: 			) );
 34: 			/*If using this filter, cart discount - fixed discount works properly but percentage discount not, and vice versa*/
 35: //			add_filter( 'advanced_woo_discount_rules_additional_fee_amount', array(
 36: //				$this,
 37: //				'advanced_woo_discount_rules_additional_fee_amount'
 38: //			) ,10,2);
 39: 			add_filter( 'advanced_woo_discount_rules_get_regular_price', array(
 40: 				$this,
 41: 				'advanced_woo_discount_rules_get_regular_price'
 42: 			), 10, 2 );
 43: 			add_filter( 'advanced_woo_discount_rules_bulk_table_ranges', array(
 44: 				$this,
 45: 				'convert_fixed_discount_table'
 46: 			), 10, 3 );
 47: 		}
 48: 	}
 49: 
 50: 	public function convert_fixed_discount_table( $response_ranges, $rules, $product ) {
 51: 		if ( count( $response_ranges ) && ! empty( $rules ) && ! empty( $product ) ) {
 52: 			foreach ( $response_ranges as &$range ) {
 53: 				if ( isset( $range['discount_type'] ) ) {
 54: 					if ( $range['discount_type'] === 'flat' || $range['discount_type'] === 'fixed_price' ) {
 55: 						$range['discount_value'] = wmc_get_price( $range['discount_value'] );
 56: 					}
 57: 				}
 58: 			}
 59: 		}
 60: 
 61: 		return $response_ranges;
 62: 	}
 63: 
 64: 	public function advanced_woo_discount_rules_get_regular_price( $price, $product ) {
 65: 		if ( $product && $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
 66: 			$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 67: 			if ( $current_currency !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 68: 				$fixed_price = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_regular_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
 69: 				if ( isset( $fixed_price[ $current_currency ] ) && $fixed_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
 70: 					$price = $fixed_price[ $current_currency ];
 71: 				}
 72: 			}
 73: 		}
 74: 
 75: 		return $price;
 76: 	}
 77: 
 78: 	public function admin_notices() {
 79: 		if ( class_exists( 'Wdr\App\Controllers\Configuration' ) ) {
 80: 			$advanced_config = new Wdr\App\Controllers\Configuration();
 81: 			if ( $advanced_config->getConfig( 'wdr_override_custom_price', 0 ) ) {
 82: 				?>
 83:                 <div class="notice notice-error">
 84:                     <p>
 85: 						<?php /* translators: %s: Woo Discount Rule settings link */
 86:                         printf( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( esc_html__( '<strong>Multi Currency for WooCommerce and Woo Discount Rules compatibility issue</strong>: To make the two plugins work properly, please go to <a href="%s">Woo Discount Rules/Settings/Third party plugin conflict fixes & options</a> and check the "No" checkbox next to "Do you have custom prices set using another plugin or custom code?"', 'woo-multi-currency' ) ), esc_url( admin_url( 'admin.php?page=woo_discount_rules&tab=settings#wdr_override_custom_price_1' ) ) ); // phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped ?>
 87:                     </p>
 88:                 </div>
 89: 				<?php
 90: 			}
 91: 		}
 92: 	}
 93: 
 94: 	protected function getYouSavedContent( $total_discounted_price ) {
 95: 		$subtotal_additional_text = '<span class="wdr_you_saved_con">';
 96: 		$config                   = new FlycartWooDiscountBase();
 97: 		$display_you_saved_string = $config->getConfigData( 'display_you_saved_text_value', " You saved: {{total_discount_price}}" );
 98: 		$display_you_saved_string = str_replace( '{{total_discount_price}}', '%s', $display_you_saved_string );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.WP.I18n.NonSingularStringLiteralText
 99: 		$subtotal_additional_text .= sprintf( esc_html__( $display_you_saved_string, 'woo-discount-rules' ), $total_discounted_price );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.WP.I18n.NonSingularStringLiteralText
100: 		$subtotal_additional_text .= '</span>';
101: 
102: 		return $subtotal_additional_text;
103: 	}
104: 
105: 	public function advanced_woo_discount_rules_additional_fee_amount( $price, $cart ) {
106: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
107: 			$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
108: 		}
109: 
110: 		return $price;
111: 	}
112: 
113: 	public function advanced_woo_discount_rules_converted_currency_value( $price ) {
114: 		if ( is_numeric( $price ) && ! empty( $price ) ) {
115: 			if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
116: 				$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
117: 			}
118: 		}
119: 
120: 		return $price;
121: 	}
122: 
123: 	public function advanced_woo_discount_rules_discounted_price_of_cart_item( $price, $cart_item, $cart_object, $discount_prices ) {
124: 		$awdr_compatibility = get_option( 'awdr_compatibility' );
125: 		if ( isset( $awdr_compatibility['compatible_cs_villatheme'] ) && $awdr_compatibility['compatible_cs_villatheme'] ) {
126: 			return $price;
127: 		}
128: 		if ( ! empty( $discount_prices ) && isset( $discount_prices['discounted_price'] ) ) {
129: 			if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
130: 				$price = wmc_revert_price( $price );
131: 			}
132: 		}
133: 
134: 		return $price;
135: 	}
136: 
137: 	public function woo_discount_rules_on_display_discount_priced_in_cart_item_subtotal( $subtotal_additional_text, $woo_discount, $cart_item, $subtotal ) {
138: 		if ( ! empty( $woo_discount['discount_amount_total'] ) ) {
139: 			$total_discounted_price   = FlycartWoocommerceProduct::wc_price( wmc_get_price( $woo_discount['discount_amount_total'] ) );
140: 			$subtotal_additional_text = $this->getYouSavedContent( $total_discounted_price );
141: 			$subtotal                 = $subtotal_additional_text;
142: 		}
143: 
144: 		return $subtotal;
145: 	}
146: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woo-product-bundle.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  4: 	exit;
  5: }
  6: 
  7: /**
  8:  * WPC Product Bundles by WPClever
  9:  *
 10:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woo_Product_Bundle
 11:  */
 12: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woo_Product_Bundle {
 13: 	protected $settings;
 14: 	protected static $end_ob;
 15: 
 16: 	public function __construct() {
 17: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 18: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() && is_plugin_active( 'woo-product-bundle/wpc-product-bundles.php' ) ) {
 19: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_add_to_cart', array( $this, 'before_add_to_cart' ), 1 );
 20: 			add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', array( $this, 'after_add_to_cart' ), - 1 );
 21: 			add_action( 'woosb_before_table', array( $this, 'woosb_before_table' ) );
 22: 			add_action( 'woosb_before_table', array( $this, 'woosb_before_table' ) );
 23: 			add_action( 'woosb_after_table', array( $this, 'woosb_after_table' ) );
 24: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_cart_item_price', array( $this, 'woosb_cart_item_price' ), 20, 2 );
 25: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_cart_item_subtotal', array( $this, 'woosb_cart_item_subtotal' ), 20, 2 );
 26: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_price_html', array( $this, 'woosb_get_price_html' ), 199, 2 );
 27: 		}
 28: 	}
 29: 
 30: 	public function woosb_before_table( $product ) {
 31: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() === $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 32: 			return;
 33: 		}
 34: 		self::$end_ob = true;
 35: 		ob_start();
 36: 	}
 37: 
 38: 	public function woosb_after_table( $product ) {
 39: 		if ( self::$end_ob ) {
 40: 			$discount_amount = $product->get_discount_amount();
 41: 			$html            = ob_get_clean();
 42: 			echo str_replace( 'data-discount-amount="' . esc_attr( $discount_amount ) . '"', 'data-discount-amount="' . esc_attr( wmc_get_price( $discount_amount ) ) . '"', $html );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
 43: 			self::$end_ob = false;
 44: 		}
 45: 	}
 46: 
 47: 	public function woosb_get_price_html( $price, $product ) {
 48: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() === $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 49: 			return $price;
 50: 		}
 51: 		if ( $product->is_type( 'woosb' ) && ( $items = $product->get_items() ) ) {
 52: 			$product_id   = $product->get_id();
 53: 			$custom_price = stripslashes( $product->get_meta( 'woosb_custom_price', true ) );
 54: 
 55: 			if ( ! empty( $custom_price ) ) {
 56: 				return $custom_price;
 57: 			}
 58: 
 59: 			if ( ! $product->is_fixed_price() ) {
 60: 				$discount_amount = wmc_get_price( $product->get_discount_amount() );
 61: 
 62: 				$discount_percentage = $product->get_discount();
 63: 
 64: 				if ( $product->is_optional() ) {
 65: 					// min price
 66: 					$prices = array();
 67: 
 68: 					foreach ( $items as $item ) {
 69: 						$_product = wc_get_product( $item['id'] );
 70: 
 71: 						if ( $_product ) {
 72: 							$prices[] = self::get_price_to_display( $_product, 1, 'min' );
 73: 						}
 74: 					}
 75: 
 76: 					if ( count( $prices ) > 0 ) {
 77: 						$min_price = min( $prices );
 78: 					} else {
 79: 						$min_price = 0;
 80: 					}
 81: 
 82: 					// min whole
 83: 					$min_whole = (float) ( $product->get_meta( 'woosb_limit_whole_min', true ) ?: 1 );
 84: 
 85: 					if ( $min_whole > 0 ) {
 86: 						$min_price *= $min_whole;
 87: 					}
 88: 
 89: 					// min each
 90: 					$min_each = (float) ( $product->get_meta( 'woosb_limit_each_min', true ) ?: 0 );
 91: 
 92: 					if ( $min_each > 0 ) {
 93: 						$min_price = 0;
 94: 
 95: 						foreach ( $prices as $pr ) {
 96: 							$min_price += (float) $pr;
 97: 						}
 98: 
 99: 						$min_price *= $min_each;
100: 					}
101: 
102: 					if ( $discount_amount ) {
103: 						$min_price -= (float) $discount_amount;
104: 					} elseif ( $discount_percentage ) {
105: 						$min_price *= (float) ( 100 - $discount_percentage ) / 100;
106: 					}
107: 
108: 					switch ( get_option( '_woosb_price_format', 'from_min' ) ) {
109: 						case 'min_only':
110: 							return wc_price( $min_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
111: 							break;
112: 						case 'from_min':
113: 							return esc_html__( 'From', 'woo-product-bundle' ) . ' ' . wc_price( $min_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
114: 							break;
115: 					}
116: 				} elseif ( $product->has_variables() ) {
117: 					$min_price = $max_price = 0;
118: 
119: 					foreach ( $items as $item ) {
120: 						$_product = wc_get_product( $item['id'] );
121: 
122: 						if ( $_product ) {
123: 							$min_price += self::get_price_to_display( $_product, $item['qty'], 'min' );
124: 							$max_price += self::get_price_to_display( $_product, $item['qty'], 'max' );
125: 						}
126: 					}
127: 
128: 					if ( $discount_amount ) {
129: 						$min_price -= (float) $discount_amount;
130: 						$max_price -= (float) $discount_amount;
131: 					} elseif ( $discount_percentage ) {
132: 						$min_price *= (float) ( 100 - $discount_percentage ) / 100;
133: 						$max_price *= (float) ( 100 - $discount_percentage ) / 100;
134: 					}
135: 
136: 					switch ( get_option( '_woosb_price_format', 'from_min' ) ) {
137: 						case 'min_only':
138: 							return wc_price( $min_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
139: 							break;
140: 						case 'min_max':
141: 							return wc_price( $min_price ) . ' - ' . wc_price( $max_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
142: 							break;
143: 						case 'from_min':
144: 							return esc_html__( 'From', 'woo-product-bundle' ) . ' ' . wc_price( $min_price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
145: 							break;
146: 					}
147: 				} else {
148: 					$price = $price_sale = 0;
149: 
150: 					foreach ( $items as $item ) {
151: 						$_product = wc_get_product( $item['id'] );
152: 
153: 						if ( $_product ) {
154: 							$_price = self::get_price_to_display( $_product, $item['qty'], 'min' );
155: 
156: 							$price += $_price;
157: 
158: 							if ( $discount_percentage ) {
159: 								// if haven't discount_amount, apply discount percentage
160: 								$price_sale += apply_filters( 'woosb_item_price_add_to_cart', $_price * ( 100 - $discount_percentage ) / 100, $item );
161: 							}
162: 						}
163: 					}
164: 
165: 					if ( $discount_amount ) {
166: 						$price_sale = $price - $discount_amount;
167: 					}
168: 
169: 					if ( $price_sale ) {
170: 						return wc_format_sale_price( wc_price( $price ), wc_price( $price_sale ) ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
171: 					}
172: 
173: 					return wc_price( $price ) . $product->get_price_suffix();
174: 				}
175: 			}
176: 		}
177: 
178: 		return $price;
179: 	}
180: 
181: 	public function woosb_cart_item_subtotal( $subtotal, $cart_item = null ) {
182: 		$new_subtotal = false;
183: 
184: 		if ( isset( $cart_item['woosb_ids'], $cart_item['woosb_price'], $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) && ! $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) {
185: 			$new_subtotal = true;
186: 			$subtotal     = wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cart_item['woosb_price'] ) * $cart_item['quantity'] );
187: 		}
188: 
189: 		if ( isset( $cart_item['woosb_parent_id'], $cart_item['woosb_price'], $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) && $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) {
190: 			$new_subtotal = true;
191: 			$subtotal     = wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cart_item['woosb_price'] ) * $cart_item['quantity'] );
192: 		}
193: 
194: 		if ( $new_subtotal && ( $cart_product = $cart_item['data'] ) ) {
195: 			if ( $cart_product->is_taxable() ) {
196: 				if ( WC()->cart->display_prices_including_tax() ) {
197: 					if ( ! wc_prices_include_tax() && WC()->cart->get_subtotal_tax() > 0 ) {
198: 						$subtotal .= ' <small class="tax_label">' . WC()->countries->inc_tax_or_vat() . '</small>';
199: 					}
200: 				} else {
201: 					if ( wc_prices_include_tax() && WC()->cart->get_subtotal_tax() > 0 ) {
202: 						$subtotal .= ' <small class="tax_label">' . WC()->countries->ex_tax_or_vat() . '</small>';
203: 					}
204: 				}
205: 			}
206: 		}
207: 
208: 		return $subtotal;
209: 	}
210: 
211: 	public function woosb_cart_item_price( $price, $cart_item ) {
212: 		if ( isset( $cart_item['woosb_ids'], $cart_item['woosb_price'], $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) && ! $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) {
213: 			return wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cart_item['woosb_price'] ) );
214: 		}
215: 
216: 		if ( isset( $cart_item['woosb_parent_id'], $cart_item['woosb_price'], $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) && $cart_item['woosb_fixed_price'] ) {
217: 			return wc_price( wmc_get_price( $cart_item['woosb_price'] ) );
218: 		}
219: 
220: 		return $price;
221: 	}
222: 
223: 	public function before_add_to_cart() {
224: 		add_filter( 'woosb_get_price', array( $this, 'woosb_get_price' ), 10, 3 );
225: 	}
226: 
227: 	public function after_add_to_cart() {
228: 		remove_filter( 'woosb_get_price', array( $this, 'woosb_get_price' ), 10 );
229: 	}
230: 
231: 	/**
232: 	 * @param $price
233: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
234: 	 * @param $min_or_max
235: 	 *
236: 	 * @return mixed
237: 	 */
238: 	public function woosb_get_price( $price, $product, $min_or_max ) {
239: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
240: 			$price = wmc_revert_price( $price );
241: 		}
242: 
243: 		return $price;
244: 	}
245: 
246: 	private static function get_price_to_display( $product, $qty, $min_or_max ) {
247: 		return is_callable( array(
248: 			'WPCleverWoosb_Helper',
249: 			'woosb_get_price_to_display'
250: 		) ) ? WPCleverWoosb_Helper::woosb_get_price_to_display( $product, $qty, $min_or_max ) : WPCleverWoosb_Helper::get_price_to_display( $product, $qty, $min_or_max );
251: 	}
252: }

File: code_3/plugins/woo-wallet.php

  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woo_Wallet
  5:  * Plugin: TeraWallet https://wordpress.org/plugins/woo-wallet/
  6:  */
  7: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  8: 	exit;
  9: }
 10: 
 11: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woo_Wallet {
 12: 	protected $settings;
 13: 	protected $skip_convert_credit = false;
 14: 
 15: 	public function __construct() {
 16: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 17: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'woo-wallet/woo-wallet.php' ) ) {
 18: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_current_balance', array( $this, 'woo_wallet_current_balance' ), 10, 2 );
 19: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_amount', array( $this, 'woo_wallet_amount' ), 10, 2 );
 20: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_rechargeable_amount', array( $this, 'revert_amount' ) );
 21: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_cashback_notice_text', array( $this, 'woo_wallet_cashback_notice_text' ), 10, 2 );
 22: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_new_user_registration_credit_amount', array(
 23: 				$this,
 24: 				'convert_price'
 25: 			) );
 26: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_get_option__wallet_settings_general_max_topup_amount', array(
 27: 				$this,
 28: 				'convert_price'
 29: 			) );
 30: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_get_option__wallet_settings_general_min_topup_amount', array(
 31: 				$this,
 32: 				'convert_price'
 33: 			) );
 34: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_new_order', array(
 35: 				$this,
 36: 				'maybe_skip_woo_wallet_credit_purchase_amount'
 37: 			), 10, 2 );
 38: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_credit_purchase_amount', array(
 39: 				$this,
 40: 				'woo_wallet_credit_purchase_amount'
 41: 			), 10, 2 );
 42: 			add_filter( 'woo_wallet_form_cart_cashback_amount', array(
 43: 				$this,
 44: 				'revert_amount'
 45: 			) );
 46: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_admin_order_item_headers', array(
 47: 				$this,
 48: 				'woocommerce_admin_order_item_headers'
 49: 			) );
 50: 			/*Set current currency by order currency so that credit is recorded in correct currency*/
 51: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_api_wc_gateway_uddoktapay', array(
 52: 				$this,
 53: 				'woocommerce_api_wc_gateway_uddoktapay'
 54: 			), 1 );
 55: 		}
 56: 	}
 57: 
 58: 	public function woocommerce_api_wc_gateway_uddoktapay() {
 59: 		$payload = file_get_contents( 'php://input' );
 60: 		if ( ! empty( $payload ) ) {
 61: 			$data = json_decode( $payload );
 62: 			if ( isset( $data->metadata->order_id ) ) {
 63: 				$order_id       = $data->metadata->order_id;
 64: 				$order_currency = get_post_meta( $order_id, '_order_currency', true );
 65: 				if ( $order_currency ) {
 66: 					$this->settings->set_current_currency( $order_currency );
 67: 				}
 68: 			}
 69: 		}
 70: 	}
 71: 
 72: 	public function woocommerce_admin_order_item_headers() {
 73: 		villatheme_remove_object_filter( 'woocommerce_admin_order_totals_after_tax', 'Woo_Wallet_Admin', 'add_wallet_payment_amount', 10 );
 74: 		add_action( 'woocommerce_admin_order_totals_after_tax', array(
 75: 			$this,
 76: 			'add_wallet_payment_amount'
 77: 		), 10, 1 );
 78: 	}
 79: 
 80: 	public function add_wallet_payment_amount( $order_id ) {
 81: 		$order = wc_get_order( $order_id );
 82: 		if ( $total_cashback_amount = get_total_order_cashback_amount( $order_id ) ) {
 83: 			$rate = '';
 84: 			if ( $order ) {
 85: 				$order_currency = $order->get_currency();
 86: 				$wmc_order_info = $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
 87: 				if ( $wmc_order_info ) {
 88: 					foreach ( $wmc_order_info as $key => $value ) {
 89: 						if ( isset( $value['is_main'] ) && $value['is_main'] ) {
 90: 							if ( $key !== $order_currency ) {
 91: 								if ( isset( $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] ) && $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] ) {
 92: 									$rate = $wmc_order_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'];
 93: 								}
 94: 							}
 95: 							break;
 96: 						}
 97: 					}
 98: 				}
 99: 			}
100: 			?>
101:             <tr>
102:                 <td class="label"><?php esc_html_e( 'Cashback', 'woo-wallet' ); ?>:</td>
103:                 <td width="1%"></td>
104:                 <td class="via-wallet">
105: 					<?php
106: 					if ( $rate ) {
107: 						echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( wc_price( $total_cashback_amount * $rate, array( 'currency' => $order->get_currency() ) ) );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
108: 					} else {
109: 						echo WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::wp_kses_post( wc_price( $total_cashback_amount, woo_wallet_wc_price_args( $order->get_customer_id() ) ) );// phpcs:ignore WordPress.Security.EscapeOutput.OutputNotEscaped
110: 					}
111: 					?>
112:                 </td>
113:             </tr>
114: 			<?php
115: 		}
116: 	}
117: 
118: 	/**
119: 	 * @param $order_id
120: 	 * @param $order
121: 	 */
122: 	public function maybe_skip_woo_wallet_credit_purchase_amount( $order_id, $order ) {
123: 		$this->skip_convert_credit = true;
124: 	}
125: 
126: 	/**
127: 	 * Only convert if order status is manually switched to paid statuses
128: 	 *
129: 	 * @param $amount
130: 	 * @param $order_id
131: 	 *
132: 	 * @return float|int
133: 	 */
134: 	public function woo_wallet_credit_purchase_amount( $amount, $order_id ) {
135: 		if ( ! apply_filters( 'wmc_woo_wallet_skip_convert_credit', $this->skip_convert_credit, $order_id ) ) {
136: 			$order_currency   = get_post_meta( $order_id, '_order_currency', true );
137: 			$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
138: 			if ( $order_currency !== $default_currency ) {
139: 				$currency_info = get_post_meta( $order_id, 'wmc_order_info', true );
140: 				if ( isset( $currency_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] ) && $currency_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] ) {
141: 					if ( isset( $currency_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] ) && $currency_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'] ) {
142: 						$amount = $amount / (float) $currency_info[ $order_currency ]['rate'];
143: 						$amount = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::convert_price_to_float( $amount, array( 'decimals' => absint( $currency_info[ $order_currency ]['decimals'] ) ) );
144: 					}
145: 				}
146: 			}
147: 			$this->skip_convert_credit = true;
148: 		}
149: 
150: 		return $amount;
151: 	}
152: 
153: 	/**
154: 	 * @param $amount
155: 	 *
156: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
157: 	 */
158: 	public function convert_price( $amount ) {
159: 		if ( ! $amount ) {
160: 			return $amount;
161: 		}
162: 
163: 		return wmc_get_price( $amount );
164: 	}
165: 
166: 	/**
167: 	 * @param $wallet_balance
168: 	 * @param $user_id
169: 	 *
170: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
171: 	 */
172: 	public function woo_wallet_current_balance( $wallet_balance, $user_id ) {
173: 		if ( $user_id ) {
174: 			$is_admin_setting_wallet = false;
175: 			if ( is_admin() && ! is_ajax() ) {
176: 				$page_id = get_current_screen()->id;
177: 				if ( in_array( $page_id, array( 'toplevel_page_woo-wallet', 'admin_page_woo-wallet-transactions' ) ) ) {
178: 					$is_admin_setting_wallet = true;
179: 				}
180: 			}
181: 			$wallet_balance = 0;
182: 			foreach ( $this->settings->get_list_currencies() as $currency => $currency_data ) {
183: 				$credit_amount  = array_sum( wp_list_pluck( get_wallet_transactions( array(
184: 					'user_id' => $user_id,
185: 					'where'   => array(
186: 						array(
187: 							'key'   => 'type',
188: 							'value' => 'credit'
189: 						),
190: 						array(
191: 							'key'   => 'currency',
192: 							'value' => $currency
193: 						)
194: 					)
195: 				) ), 'amount' ) );
196: 				$debit_amount   = array_sum( wp_list_pluck( get_wallet_transactions( array(
197: 					'user_id' => $user_id,
198: 					'where'   => array(
199: 						array(
200: 							'key'   => 'type',
201: 							'value' => 'debit'
202: 						),
203: 						array(
204: 							'key'   => 'currency',
205: 							'value' => $currency
206: 						)
207: 					)
208: 				) ), 'amount' ) );
209: 				$balance        = $credit_amount - $debit_amount;
210: 				$wallet_balance += $is_admin_setting_wallet ? $balance : ( $balance / (float) $currency_data['rate'] );
211: 			}
212: 			$wallet_balance = wmc_get_price( $wallet_balance );
213: 		}
214: 
215: 		return $wallet_balance;
216: 	}
217: 
218: 	public function revert_amount( $amount ) {
219: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
220: 			$amount = wmc_revert_price( $amount );
221: 		}
222: 
223: 		return $amount;
224: 	}
225: 
226: 	public function woo_wallet_amount( $amount, $currency ) {
227: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
228: 		if ( is_admin() && ! wp_doing_ajax() ) {
229: 			$is_admin_setting_wallet = false;
230: 			$page_id = get_current_screen()->id;
231: 			if ( in_array( $page_id, array( 'admin_page_woo-wallet-transactions' ) ) ) {
232: 				$is_admin_setting_wallet = true;
233: 			}
234: 			$list_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
235: 			if ( ! empty( $list_currencies[ $currency ]['rate'] ) ) {
236: 				if ( $currency !== $default_currency ) {
237: 					$amount = $is_admin_setting_wallet ? $amount : $amount / (float) $list_currencies[ $currency ]['rate'];
238: 				}
239: 			}
240: 		} else {
241: 			$wmc_current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
242: 			if ( $currency !== $default_currency ) {
243: 				$amount = wmc_revert_price( $amount, $currency );
244: 			}
245: 			if ( $wmc_current_currency !== $default_currency ) {
246: 				$amount = wmc_get_price( $amount );
247: 			}
248: 		}
249: 
250: 		return $amount;
251: 	}
252: 
253: 	public function woo_wallet_cashback_notice_text( $text, $cashback_amount ) {
254: 		$cashback_amount = wmc_get_price( $cashback_amount );
255: 		if ( is_user_logged_in() ) {
256: 			/* translators: %s: cashback value */
257: 			$text = sprintf( esc_html__( 'Upon placing this order a cashback of %s will be credited to your wallet.', 'woo-wallet' ), wc_price( $cashback_amount, woo_wallet_wc_price_args() ) );
258: 		} else {
259: 			/* translators: %1$s: login url, %2$s: cashback value */
260: 			$text = sprintf( esc_html__( 'Please <a href="%1$s">log in</a> to avail %2$s cashback from this order.', 'woo-wallet' ), esc_url( get_permalink( get_option( 'woocommerce_myaccount_page_id' ) ) ), wc_price( $cashback_amount, woo_wallet_wc_price_args() ) );
261: 		}
262: 
263: 		return $text;
264: 	}
265: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce_appointments.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woocommerce_Appointments
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woocommerce_Appointments {
11: 	protected static $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		self::$settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-appointments/woocommerce-appointments.php' ) ) {
16: 			add_filter( 'wc_appointments_adjust_addon_cost', array(
17: 				$this,
18: 				'wc_appointments_adjust_addon_cost'
19: 			), 10, 4 );
20: 		}
21: 	}
22: 
23: 	public function wc_appointments_adjust_addon_cost( $adjusted_cost, $appointment_cost, $product, $posted ) {
24: 		if ( self::$settings->get_current_currency() !== self::$settings->get_default_currency() ) {
25: 			// Get addon cost.
26: 			$addon_cost = $posted['wc_appointments_field_addons_cost'] ?? 0;
27: 
28: 			// Adjust.
29: 			if ( $addon_cost !== 0 ) {
30: 				$adjusted_cost = floatval( $appointment_cost ) + wmc_revert_price( $addon_cost );
31: 				$adjusted_cost = $adjusted_cost > 0 ? $adjusted_cost : 0; #turn negative cost to zero.
32: 				// Do nothing.
33: 			} else {
34: 				$adjusted_cost = $appointment_cost;
35: 			}
36: 		}
37: 
38: 		return $adjusted_cost;
39: 	}
40: }

File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce_bookings.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Bookings
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Bookings {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_bookings_calculated_booking_cost_success_output', array(
 17: 				$this,
 18: 				'woocommerce_bookings_calculated_booking_cost_success_output'
 19: 			), 9, 3 );
 20: 			add_filter( 'booking_form_params', array(
 21: 				$this,
 22: 				'booking_form_params'
 23: 			) );
 24: 			add_filter( 'booking_form_fields', array(
 25: 				$this,
 26: 				'booking_form_fields'
 27: 			) );
 28: 		}
 29: 	}
 30: 
 31: 	/**
 32: 	 * @param $params
 33: 	 *
 34: 	 * @return mixed
 35: 	 */
 36: 	public function booking_form_params( $params ) {
 37: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_resource_block_costs', array(
 38: 			$this,
 39: 			'woocommerce_product_get_resource_block_costs'
 40: 		) );
 41: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_resource_base_costs', array(
 42: 			$this,
 43: 			'woocommerce_product_get_resource_base_costs'
 44: 		) );
 45: 
 46: 		return $params;
 47: 	}
 48: 
 49: 	/**
 50: 	 * @param $fields
 51: 	 *
 52: 	 * @return mixed
 53: 	 */
 54: 	public function booking_form_fields( $fields ) {
 55: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_resource_block_costs', array(
 56: 			$this,
 57: 			'woocommerce_product_get_resource_block_costs'
 58: 		) );
 59: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_product_get_resource_base_costs', array(
 60: 			$this,
 61: 			'woocommerce_product_get_resource_base_costs'
 62: 		) );
 63: 
 64: 		return $fields;
 65: 	}
 66: 
 67: 	/**
 68: 	 * @param $resource_data
 69: 	 *
 70: 	 * @return array
 71: 	 */
 72: 	public function woocommerce_product_get_resource_block_costs( $resource_data ) {
 73: 		return $this->convert_resource_data( $resource_data );
 74: 	}
 75: 
 76: 	/**
 77: 	 * @param $resource_data
 78: 	 *
 79: 	 * @return array
 80: 	 */
 81: 	public function woocommerce_product_get_resource_base_costs( $resource_data ) {
 82: 		return $this->convert_resource_data( $resource_data );
 83: 	}
 84: 
 85: 	/**
 86: 	 * @param $resource_data
 87: 	 *
 88: 	 * @return array
 89: 	 */
 90: 	private function convert_resource_data( $resource_data ) {
 91: 		if ( $this->settings->get_current_currency() !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 92: 			if ( is_array( $resource_data ) && count( $resource_data ) ) {
 93: 				$resource_data = array_map( 'wmc_get_price', $resource_data );
 94: 			}
 95: 		}
 96: 
 97: 		return $resource_data;
 98: 	}
 99: 
100: 	/**
101: 	 * @param $output
102: 	 * @param $display_price
103: 	 * @param $product
104: 	 *
105: 	 * @return mixed
106: 	 */
107: 	public function woocommerce_bookings_calculated_booking_cost_success_output( $output, $display_price, $product ) {
108: 		$display_price = wmc_get_price( $display_price );
109: 		if ( version_compare( WC_VERSION, '2.4.0', '>=' ) ) {
110: 			$price_suffix = $product->get_price_suffix( $display_price, 1 );
111: 		} else {
112: 			$price_suffix = $product->get_price_suffix();
113: 		}
114: 		$output        = apply_filters( 'woocommerce_bookings_booking_cost_string', esc_html__( 'Booking cost', 'woocommerce-bookings' ), $product ) . ': <strong>' . wc_price( $display_price, array(
115: 				'currency' => $this->settings->get_current_currency(),
116: 			) ) . $price_suffix . '</strong>';
117: 
118: 		return $output;
119: 	}
120: }

15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			add_filter( 'wmc_excluded_shipping_methods_from_converting', array(
17: 				$this,
18: 				'wmc_excluded_shipping_methods_from_converting'
19: 			) );
20: 		}
21: 	}
22: 
23: 	public function wmc_excluded_shipping_methods_from_converting( $methods ) {
24: 		if ( class_exists( 'WC_Edostavka' ) ) {
25: 			$edostavka_methods = apply_filters( 'woocommerce_edostavka_shipping_methods_classes', array(
26: 				'edostavka-package-door'                  => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Package_Door',
27: 				'edostavka-package-door-door'             => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Package_Door_Door',
28: 				'edostavka-package-door-stock'            => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Package_Door_Stock',
29: 				'edostavka-package-stock'                 => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Package_Stock',
30: 				'edostavka-econom-door'                   => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Econom_Door',
31: 				'edostavka-econom-stock'                  => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Econom_Stock',
32: 				'edostavka-express-light-door'            => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Express_Light_Door',
33: 				'edostavka-express-light-stock'           => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Express_Light_Stock',
34: 				'edostavka-express-light-door-stock'      => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Express_Light_Door_Stock',
35: 				'edostavka-express-light-door-door'       => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Express_Light_Door_Door',
36: 				'edostavka-international-express-door'    => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_International_Express_Door',
37: 				'edostavka-magistral-express-stock'       => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Magistral_Express_Stock',
38: 				'edostavka-magistral-super-express-stock' => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Magistral_Super_Express_Stock',
39: 				'edostavka-oversize-express-stock'        => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Oversize_Express_Stock',
40: 				'edostavka-oversize-express-door'         => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Oversize_Express_Door',
41: 				'edostavka-oversize-express-door-stock'   => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Oversize_Express_Door_Stock',

58: 				'edostavka-express-stock-postamat'        => 'WC_Edostavka_Shipping_Express_Stock_Postamat'
59: 			) );

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce_product_addons.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woocommerce_Product_Addons
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: 
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woocommerce_Product_Addons {
 11: 	protected static $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		self::$settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_addons_price_raw', array(
 16: 			$this,
 17: 			'woocommerce_product_addons_price_raw'
 18: 		), 10, 2 );
 19: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_get_item_data', array( $this, 'woocommerce_get_item_data' ), 11, 2 );
 20: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_addon_cart_item_data', array(
 21: 			$this,
 22: 			'woocommerce_product_addon_cart_item_data'
 23: 		), 10, 4 );
 24: 
 25: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_addons_order_line_item_meta', array(
 26: 			$this,
 27: 			'woocommerce_product_addons_order_line_item_meta'
 28: 		), 10, 4 );
 29: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_product_addons_option_price_raw', array(
 30: 			$this,
 31: 			'woocommerce_product_addons_price_raw'
 32: 		), 10, 2 );
 33: 	}
 34: 
 35: 	public function woocommerce_product_addon_cart_item_data( $data, $addon, $product_id, $post_data ) {
 36: 		if ( count( $data ) ) {
 37: 			foreach ( $data as $key => $value ) {
 38: 				if ( isset( $value['field_type'] ) && $value['field_type'] === 'custom_price' ) {
 39: 					$data[ $key ]['price'] = wmc_revert_price( $value['price'] );
 40: 					$data[ $key ]['value'] = $data[ $key ]['price'];
 41: 				}
 42: 			}
 43: 		}
 44: 
 45: 		return $data;
 46: 	}
 47: 
 48: 	public function woocommerce_product_addons_price_raw( $addon_price, $addon ) {
 49: 		$price_type = isset( $addon['price_type'] ) ? $addon['price_type'] : '';
 50: 		switch ( $price_type ) {
 51: 			case 'percentage_based':
 52: 				break;
 53: 			case 'quantity_based':
 54: 				if ( self::$settings->get_current_currency() !== self::$settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 55: 					$addon_price = wmc_get_price( $addon_price );
 56: 				}
 57: 				break;
 58: 			default:
 59: 				$addon_price = wmc_get_price( $addon_price );
 60: 		}
 61: 
 62: 		return $addon_price;
 63: 	}
 64: 
 65: 	public function woocommerce_get_item_data( $other_data, $cart_item ) {
 66: 		if ( self::$settings->get_default_currency() !== self::$settings->get_current_currency() && class_exists( 'WC_Product_Addons_Helper' ) ) {
 67: 			if ( ! empty( $cart_item['addons'] ) ) {
 68: 				foreach ( $cart_item['addons'] as $addon ) {
 69: 					$price = isset( $cart_item['addons_price_before_calc'] ) ? $cart_item['addons_price_before_calc'] : $addon['price'];
 70: 					$name  = $addon['name'];
 71: 
 72: 					if ( 0 == $addon['price'] ) {
 73: 
 74: 					} elseif ( 'percentage_based' === $addon['price_type'] && 0 == $price ) {
 75: 
 76: 					} elseif ( 'percentage_based' !== $addon['price_type'] && $addon['price'] && apply_filters( 'woocommerce_addons_add_price_to_name', true, $addon ) ) {
 77: 						$old_name = $name . ' (' . wc_price( WC_Product_Addons_Helper::get_product_addon_price_for_display( $addon['price'], $cart_item['data'], true ) ) . ')';
 78: 						foreach ( $other_data as $other_data_k => $other_data_v ) {
 79: 							if ( $other_data_v['name'] === $old_name && $other_data_v['value'] === $addon['value'] ) {
 80: 								unset( $other_data[ $other_data_k ] );
 81: 								$other_data = array_values( $other_data );
 82: 								break;
 83: 							}
 84: 						}
 85: 						$name         .= ' (' . wc_price( wmc_get_price( WC_Product_Addons_Helper::get_product_addon_price_for_display( $addon['price'], $cart_item['data'], true ) ) ) . ')';
 86: 						$other_data[] = array(
 87: 							'name'    => $name,
 88: 							'value'   => $addon['value'],
 89: 							'display' => $addon['field_type'] === 'custom_price' ? wc_price( wmc_get_price( $addon['price'] ) ) : ( isset( $addon['display'] ) ? $addon['display'] : '' ),
 90: 						);
 91: 					} else {
 92: 
 93: 					}
 94: 				}
 95: 			}
 96: 		}
 97: 
 98: 		return $other_data;
 99: 	}
100: 
101: 	public function woocommerce_product_addons_order_line_item_meta( $meta_data, $addon, $item, $values ) {
102: 		$key           = $addon['name'];
103: 		$price_type    = $addon['price_type'];
104: 		$product       = $item->get_product();
105: 		$product_price = $product->get_price();
106: 
107: 		if ( $addon['price'] && 'percentage_based' === $price_type && 0 != $product_price ) {
108: 			$addon_price = $product_price * ( $addon['price'] / 100 );
109: 		} else {
110: 			$addon_price = $addon['price'];
111: 		}
112: 
113: 		$price = html_entity_decode(
114: 			wp_strip_all_tags( wc_price( wmc_get_price( WC_Product_Addons_Helper::get_product_addon_price_for_display( $addon_price, $values['data'] ) ) ) ),
115: 			ENT_QUOTES, get_bloginfo( 'charset' )
116: 		);
117: 
118: 		if ( $addon['price'] && apply_filters( 'woocommerce_addons_add_price_to_name', true ) ) {
119: 			$key .= ' (' . $price . ')';
120: 		}
121: 
122: 		if ( 'custom_price' === $addon['field_type'] ) {
123: 			$addon['value'] = $addon['price'];
124: 		}
125: 
126: 		$meta_data = [
127: 			'key'   => $key,
128: 			'value' => $addon['value'],
129: 			'id'    => $addon['id']
130: 		];
131: 
132: 		return $meta_data;
133: 	}
134: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce_product_bundles.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Product_Bundles
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Product_Bundles {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 
15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
17: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_bundle_front_end_params', array( $this, 'woocommerce_bundle_front_end_params' ) );
18: 		}
19: 	}
20: 
21: 	/**
22: 	 * Integrate with Yith Product Bundles
23: 	 * @return bool
24: 	 */
25: 	public function woocommerce_bundle_front_end_params( $data ) {
26: 		if ( isset( $data['currency_symbol'] ) ) {
27: 			preg_match( '/#PRICE#/i', $data['currency_symbol'], $result );
28: 			if ( count( array_filter( $result ) ) ) {
29: 				$data['currency_symbol'] = str_replace( '#PRICE#', '', $data['currency_symbol'] );
30: 			}
31: 		}
32: 
33: 		return $data;
34: 	}
35: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce_subscriptions.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Subscriptions
  5:  * Author: WooCommerce
  6:  */
  7: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  8: 	exit;
  9: }
 10: 
 11: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Subscriptions {
 12: 	protected $settings;
 13: 
 14: 	public function __construct() {
 15: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 16: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() && is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-subscriptions/woocommerce-subscriptions.php' ) ) {
 17: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_subscriptions_product_price', array( $this, 'get_price' ) );
 18: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_subscriptions_product_sale_price', array( $this, 'revert_sale_price' ), 10, 2 );
 19: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_subscriptions_product_sign_up_fee', array(
 20: 				$this,
 21: 				'woocommerce_subscriptions_product_sign_up_fee'
 22: 			) );
 23: 			/*Use fixed price if enabled*/
 24: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_subscriptions_product_price', array(
 25: 				$this,
 26: 				'woocommerce_subscriptions_product_price'
 27: 			), 10, 2 );
 28: 			/*Convert renewal cart to default currency*/
 29: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_load_cart_from_session', array(
 30: 				$this,
 31: 				'woocommerce_load_cart_from_session'
 32: 			) );
 33: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_cart_loaded_from_session', array(
 34: 				$this,
 35: 				'woocommerce_cart_loaded_from_session'
 36: 			) );
 37: 		}
 38: 	}
 39: 
 40: 	/**
 41: 	 * @param $price
 42: 	 *
 43: 	 * @return float|int|mixed
 44: 	 */
 45: 	public function get_price( $price ) {
 46: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
 47: 	}
 48: 
 49: 	/**
 50: 	 * @param $sale_price
 51: 	 * @param $product
 52: 	 *
 53: 	 * @return mixed
 54: 	 */
 55: 	public function revert_sale_price( $sale_price, $product ) {
 56: 		$sale_price = $product->get_sale_price( 'edit' );
 57: 
 58: 		return $sale_price;
 59: 	}
 60: 
 61: 	/**
 62: 	 * Simple subscription
 63: 	 *
 64: 	 * @param $price
 65: 	 *
 66: 	 * @return mixed
 67: 	 */
 68: 	public function woocommerce_subscriptions_product_sign_up_fee( $price ) {
 69: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
 70: 	}
 71: 
 72: 	/**
 73: 	 * @param $price
 74: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
 75: 	 *
 76: 	 * @return mixed
 77: 	 */
 78: 	public function woocommerce_subscriptions_product_price( $price, $product ) {
 79: 		if ( $product ) {
 80: 			if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
 81: 				$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
 82: 				if ( $current_currency !== $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
 83: 					$product_price = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_regular_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
 84: 					$sale_price    = wmc_adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $product->get_meta( '_sale_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
 85: 					if ( isset( $product_price[ $current_currency ] ) && ! $product->is_on_sale( 'edit' ) && $product_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
 86: 						$price = $product_price[ $current_currency ];
 87: 					} elseif ( isset( $sale_price[ $current_currency ] ) && $sale_price[ $current_currency ] > 0 ) {
 88: 						$price = $sale_price[ $current_currency ];
 89: 					}
 90: 				}
 91: 			}
 92: 		}
 93: 
 94: 		return $price;
 95: 	}
 96: 
 97: 	/**
 98: 	 *
 99: 	 */
100: 	public function woocommerce_load_cart_from_session() {
101: 		add_filter( 'woocommerce_order_get_items', array(
102: 			$this,
103: 			'woocommerce_order_get_items'
104: 		), 10, 2 );
105: 	}
106: 
107: 	/**
108: 	 *
109: 	 */
110: 	public function woocommerce_cart_loaded_from_session() {
111: 		remove_filter( 'woocommerce_order_get_items', array( $this, 'woocommerce_order_get_items' ) );
112: 	}
113: 
114: 	/**
115: 	 * @param $items
116: 	 * @param $order WC_Order
117: 	 *
118: 	 * @return array
119: 	 */
120: 	public function woocommerce_order_get_items( $items, $order ) {
121: 		if ( ! wcs_is_subscription( $order ) ) {
122: 			return $items;
123: 		}
124: 		$renewal_order_id = $order->get_id();
125: 		$related_order_id = wp_get_post_parent_id( $renewal_order_id );
126: 		if ( $related_order_id ) {
127: 			$order_currency = get_post_meta( $related_order_id, '_order_currency', true );
128: 			$wmc_order_info = get_post_meta( $related_order_id, 'wmc_order_info', true );
129: 		} else {
130: 			$order_currency = $order->get_meta('_order_currency', true );
131: 			$wmc_order_info = $order->get_meta('wmc_order_info', true );
132: 		}
133: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
134: 		$list_currencies  = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
135: 		/*Skip if base currency is different*/
136: 		if ( $wmc_order_info && ( ! isset( $wmc_order_info[ $default_currency ] ) || ! isset( $wmc_order_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] ) || $wmc_order_info[ $default_currency ]['is_main'] != 1 ) ) {
137: 			return $items;
138: 		}
139: 		/*Skip if order currency does not exist*/
140: 		if ( ! isset( $list_currencies[ $order_currency ] ) ) {
141: 			return $items;
142: 		}
143: 		$return_items = array();
144: 
145: 		foreach ( $items as $item_id => $item ) {
146: 			if ( $item && is_a( $item, 'WC_Order_Item_Product' ) ) {
147: 				$item = clone $item;
148: 				$item->set_subtotal( wmc_revert_price( $item->get_subtotal(), $order_currency ) );
149: 				$item->set_total( wmc_revert_price( $item->get_total(), $order_currency ) );
150: 			}
151: 			$return_items[ $item_id ] = $item;
152: 		}
153: 
154: 		return $return_items;
155: 	}
156: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce_wholesale_prices.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woocommerce_Wholesale_Prices
  5:  */
  6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  7: 	exit;
  8: }
  9: if ( is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-wholesale-prices/woocommerce-wholesale-prices.bootstrap.php' ) ) {
 10: 	class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woocommerce_Wholesale_Prices {
 11: 		protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 		public function __construct() {
 14: 			$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 
 16: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_product_options_pricing', array( $this, 'add_wholesale_price_fields' ), 12 );
 17: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_process_product_meta_simple', array(
 18: 				$this,
 19: 				'save_wholesale_price_fields'
 20: 			), 10, 1 );
 21: 
 22: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_product_after_variable_attributes', array(
 23: 				$this,
 24: 				'add_wholesale_price_fields_variable'
 25: 			), 11, 3 );
 26: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_save_product_variation', array(
 27: 				$this,
 28: 				'save_wholesale_price_fields_variable'
 29: 			), 10, 2 );
 30: 
 31: 			if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 32: 				add_filter( 'wwp_pass_wholesale_price_through_taxing', array(
 33: 					$this,
 34: 					'wwp_pass_wholesale_price_through_taxing'
 35: 				), 10, 3 );
 36: 				add_filter( 'wwp_filter_wholesale_price_cart', array(
 37: 					$this,
 38: 					'wwp_filter_wholesale_price_cart'
 39: 				), 10, 3 );
 40: 			}
 41: 		}
 42: 
 43: 		public function save_wholesale_price_fields( $post_id ) {
 44: 			/*Check Permission*/
 45: 			if ( ! current_user_can( 'manage_woocommerce' ) ) {
 46: 				return;
 47: 			}
 48: 			/*Check send from product edit page*/
 49: 			if ( ! isset( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ) || ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_save_simple_product_currency' ) ) {
 50: 				return;
 51: 			}
 52:             $wc_product = wc_get_product( $post_id );
 53: 			if ( isset( $_POST['_wholesale_prices_wmcp'] ) ) {
 54: 				$_wholesale_prices_wmcp = wc_clean( $_POST['_wholesale_prices_wmcp'] );
 55: 				$wc_product->update_meta_data('_wholesale_prices_wmcp', wp_json_encode( $_wholesale_prices_wmcp ) );
 56: 				$wc_product->save_meta_data();
 57: 			}
 58: 		}
 59: 
 60: 
 61: 		public function add_wholesale_price_fields_variable( $loop, $variation_data, $variation ) {
 62: 			$currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
 63: 
 64: 			$wholesale_roles_obj = new WWP_Wholesale_Roles();
 65: 			$all_wholesale_roles = $wholesale_roles_obj->getAllRegisteredWholesaleRoles();
 66: 			$variation_product = wc_get_product( $variation->ID );
 67: 			$wholesale_prices    = json_decode( $variation_product->get_meta('_wholesale_prices_wmcp', true ), true );
 68: 			if ( count( $currencies ) ) {
 69: 				foreach ( $currencies as $key => $value ) {
 70: 					if ( $this->settings->get_default_currency() == $key ) {
 71: 						continue;
 72: 					}
 73: 					?>
 74: 
 75:                     <div class="wholesale-prices-options-group options-group"
 76:                          style="border-top: 1px solid #EEEEEE;">
 77: 
 78:                         <header>
 79:                             <h4 style="padding-bottom: 10px;"><?php esc_html_e( 'Wholesale Prices', 'woocommerce-wholesale-prices' );
 80: 								echo esc_html( "($key)" ); ?></h4>
 81:                         </header>
 82: 
 83: 						<?php foreach ( $all_wholesale_roles as $role_key => $role ) {
 84: 
 85: 							$currency_symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $key );
 86: 							if ( array_key_exists( 'currency_symbol', $role ) && ! empty( $role['currency_symbol'] ) ) {
 87: 								$currency_symbol = $role['currency_symbol'];
 88: 							}
 89: 
 90: 							$wholesale_price = isset( $wholesale_prices[ $key ][ $role_key ] ) ? $wholesale_prices[ $key ][ $role_key ] : '';
 91: 							$field_id        = "_wholesale_prices_wmcp_variable_{$loop}_{$key}_{$role_key}_";
 92: 							$field_name      = "_wholesale_prices_wmcp_variable[$loop][$key][$role_key]";
 93: 							$field_label     = $role['roleName'] . " (" . $currency_symbol . ")";
 94: 							/* translators: %1$s: user role name */
 95: 							$field_desc      = sprintf( esc_html__( 'Only applies to users with the role of %1$s', 'woocommerce-wholesale-prices' ), $role['roleName'] );
 96: 
 97: 							woocommerce_wp_text_input( array(
 98: 								'id'          => $field_id,
 99: 								'name'        => $field_name,
100: 								'class'       => $role_key . '_wholesale_price wholesale_price short',
101: 								'label'       => $field_label,
102: 								'placeholder' => '',
103: 								'desc_tip'    => 'true',
104: 								'description' => $field_desc,
105: 								'data_type'   => 'price',
106: 								'value'       => $wholesale_price
107: 							) );
108: 
109: 						} ?>
110: 
111:                     </div><!--.options_group-->
112: 
113: 					<?php
114: 				}
115: 			}
116: 		}
117: 
118: 		public function save_wholesale_price_fields_variable( $variation_id, $i ) {
119: 
120: 			/*Check Permission*/
121: 			if ( ! current_user_can( 'manage_woocommerce' ) ) {
122: 				return;
123: 			}
124: 			/*Check send from product edit page*/
125: 			if ( ! isset( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ) || ! wp_verify_nonce( sanitize_text_field( wp_unslash( $_POST['_wmc_nonce'] ) ), 'wmc_save_variable_product_currency' ) ) {
126: 				return;
127: 			}
128: 
129: 			if ( isset( $_POST['_wholesale_prices_wmcp_variable'] ) ) {
130: 				$_regular_price_wmcp = wc_clean( $_POST['_wholesale_prices_wmcp_variable'] );
131: 				$variation_product = wc_get_product( $variation_id );
132: 				$variation_product->update_meta_data('_wholesale_prices_wmcp', wp_json_encode( $_regular_price_wmcp[ $i ] ) );
133: 				$variation_product->save_meta_data();
134: 			}
135: 		}
136: 
137: 		public function add_wholesale_price_fields( $product_type = 'simple' ) {
138: 
139: 			global $post;
140: 			$product_id = $post->ID;
141: 			$product    = wc_get_product( $product_id );
142: 			if ( $product->get_type() == 'variable' ) {
143: 				return;
144: 			}
145: 			$currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
146: 
147: 			$wholesale_roles_obj = new WWP_Wholesale_Roles();
148: 			$all_wholesale_roles = $wholesale_roles_obj->getAllRegisteredWholesaleRoles();
149: 			$wholesale_prices    = json_decode( $product->get_meta('_wholesale_prices_wmcp', true ), true );
150: 			if ( count( $currencies ) ) {
151: 				foreach ( $currencies as $key => $value ) {
152: 					if ( $this->settings->get_default_currency() == $key ) {
153: 						continue;
154: 					}
155: 					?>
156: 
157:                     <div class="wholesale-prices-options-group options-group options_group"
158:                          style="border-top: 1px solid #EEEEEE;">
159: 
160:                         <header>
161:                             <h3 style="padding-bottom: 10px;"><?php esc_html_e( 'Wholesale Prices', 'woocommerce-wholesale-prices' );
162: 								echo esc_html( "($key)" ); ?></h3>
163:                         </header>
164: 
165: 						<?php foreach ( $all_wholesale_roles as $role_key => $role ) {
166: 
167: 							$currency_symbol = get_woocommerce_currency_symbol( $key );
168: 							if ( array_key_exists( 'currency_symbol', $role ) && ! empty( $role['currency_symbol'] ) ) {
169: 								$currency_symbol = $role['currency_symbol'];
170: 							}
171: 
172: 							$wholesale_price = isset( $wholesale_prices[ $key ][ $role_key ] ) ? $wholesale_prices[ $key ][ $role_key ] : '';
173: 							$field_id        = "_wholesale_prices_wmcp_{$key}_{$role_key}_";
174: 							$field_name      = "_wholesale_prices_wmcp[$key][$role_key]";
175: 							$field_label     = $role['roleName'] . " (" . $currency_symbol . ")";
176: 							/* translators: %1$s: user role name */
177: 							$field_desc      = sprintf( esc_html__( 'Only applies to users with the role of %1$s', 'woocommerce-wholesale-prices' ), $role['roleName'] );
178: 
179: 							woocommerce_wp_text_input( array(
180: 								'id'          => $field_id,
181: 								'name'        => $field_name,
182: 								'class'       => $role_key . '_wholesale_price wholesale_price short',
183: 								'label'       => $field_label,
184: 								'placeholder' => '',
185: 								'desc_tip'    => 'true',
186: 								'description' => $field_desc,
187: 								'data_type'   => 'price',
188: 								'value'       => $wholesale_price
189: 							) );
190: 
191: 						} ?>
192: 
193:                     </div><!--.options_group-->
194: 
195: 					<?php
196: 				}
197: 			}
198: 
199: 
200: 		}
201: 
202: 		/**
203: 		 * Integrate with WooCommerce Wholesales Prices
204: 		 * @return bool
205: 		 */
206: 		public function wwp_pass_wholesale_price_through_taxing( $wholesale_price, $product_id, $user_wholesale_role ) {
207: 
208: 			if ( ! $wholesale_price ) {
209: 				return $wholesale_price;
210: 			}
211: 			if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
212: 				$currenct_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
213: 				if ( $currenct_currency != $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
214: 				    $wc_sale_product = wc_get_product( $product_id );
215: 					$wholesale_prices = json_decode( $wc_sale_product->get_meta('_wholesale_prices_wmcp', true ), true );
216: 					if ( is_array( $user_wholesale_role ) && count( $user_wholesale_role ) ) {
217: 						foreach ( $user_wholesale_role as $key => $value ) {
218: 							if ( isset( $wholesale_prices[ $currenct_currency ][ $value ] ) && $wholesale_prices[ $currenct_currency ][ $value ] > 0 ) {
219: 								$wholesale_price = $wholesale_prices[ $currenct_currency ][ $value ];
220: 							} else {
221: 								$wholesale_price = wmc_get_price( $wholesale_price );
222: 							}
223: 						}
224: 					}
225: 				}
226: 
227: 			} else {
228: 				$wholesale_price = wmc_get_price( $wholesale_price );
229: 			}
230: 
231: 
232: 			return $wholesale_price;
233: 		}
234: 
235: 		public function wwp_filter_wholesale_price_cart( $result, $product_id, $user_wholesale_role ) {
236: 			$wholesale_price = $result['wholesale_price'];
237: 			if ( ! $wholesale_price ) {
238: 				return $wholesale_price;
239: 			}
240: 			if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
241: 				$currenct_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
242: 				if ( $currenct_currency != $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
243: 					$wc_sale_product = wc_get_product( $product_id );
244: 					$wholesale_prices = json_decode( $wc_sale_product->get_meta('_wholesale_prices_wmcp', true ), true );
245: 					if ( is_array( $user_wholesale_role ) && count( $user_wholesale_role ) ) {
246: 						foreach ( $user_wholesale_role as $key => $value ) {
247: 							if ( isset( $wholesale_prices[ $currenct_currency ][ $value ] ) && $wholesale_prices[ $currenct_currency ][ $value ] > 0 ) {
248: 								$wholesale_price = $wholesale_prices[ $currenct_currency ][ $value ] / $this->settings->get_list_currencies()[ $this->settings->get_current_currency() ]['rate'];;
249: 							}
250: 						}
251: 					}
252: 				}
253: 
254: 			}
255: 			$result['wholesale_price'] = $wholesale_price;
256: 
257: 			return $result;
258: 		}
259: 
260: 	}
261: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce-name-your-price.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 3: 	exit;
 4: }
 5: 
 6: /**
 7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Name_Your_Price
 8:  * WooCommerce TM Extra Product Options By ThemeComplete
 9:  */
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Name_Your_Price {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() && is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-name-your-price/woocommerce-name-your-price.php' ) ) {
16: 			add_action( 'init', array( $this, 'init_hooks' ) );
17: 		}
18: 	}
19: 
20: 	public function init_hooks() {
21: 		// Compatible with WC Name Your Price
22: 		if ( is_callable( array(
23: 				'WC_Name_Your_Price_Compatibility',
24: 				'is_nyp_gte'
25: 			) ) && WC_Name_Your_Price_Compatibility::is_nyp_gte( '3.0' ) ) {
26: 			add_filter( 'wc_nyp_raw_minimum_variation_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
27: 			add_filter( 'wc_nyp_raw_minimum_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
28: 			add_filter( 'wc_nyp_raw_suggested_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
29: 			add_filter( 'wc_nyp_raw_maximum_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
30: 			add_filter( 'wc_nyp_get_posted_price', array( $this, 'wc_nyp_get_posted_price' ), 10, 3 );
31: 			add_filter( 'wc_nyp_price_input_attributes', array( $this, 'wc_nyp_price_input_attributes' ), 10, 3 );
32: 		} else {
33: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_raw_minimum_variation_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
34: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_raw_minimum_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
35: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_raw_suggested_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
36: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_raw_maximum_price', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
37: 		}
38: 	}
39: 
40: 	/**
41: 	 * @param $price_raw
42: 	 *
43: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
44: 	 */
45: 	public function change_price( $price_raw ) {
46: 		return $price_raw ? wmc_get_price( $price_raw ) : $price_raw;
47: 	}
48: 
49: 	/**
50: 	 * @param $args
51: 	 * @param $product
52: 	 * @param $suffix
53: 	 *
54: 	 * @return mixed
55: 	 */
56: 	public function wc_nyp_price_input_attributes( $args, $product, $suffix ) {
57: 		if ( $args['input_value'] ) {
58: 			$args['input_value'] = wmc_get_price( $args['input_value'] );
59: 		}
60: 
61: 		return $args;
62: 	}
63: 
64: 	/**
65: 	 * @param $posted_price
66: 	 * @param $product
67: 	 * @param $suffix
68: 	 *
69: 	 * @return bool|float|int|string
70: 	 */
71: 	public function wc_nyp_get_posted_price( $posted_price, $product, $suffix ) {
72: 		$posted_price = wmc_revert_price( $posted_price );
73: 
74: 		return $posted_price;
75: 	}
76: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce-payments.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Payments
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_Payments {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			$list_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
17: 			if ( count( $list_currencies ) ) {
18: 				foreach ( $list_currencies as $currency => $currency_info ) {
19: 					add_filter( 'wcpay_' . strtolower( $currency ) . '_format', array(
20: 						$this,
21: 						'wcpay_currency_format'
22: 					), PHP_INT_MAX );
23: 				}
24: 			}
25: 			add_filter( 'wcpay_multi_currency_should_convert_product_price', '__return_false' );
26: 		}
27: 	}
28: 
29: 	/**
30: 	 * Override currency format
31: 	 *
32: 	 * @param $format
33: 	 *
34: 	 * @return mixed
35: 	 */
36: 	public function wcpay_currency_format( $format ) {
37: 		$list_currencies  = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
38: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
39: 		if ( isset( $list_currencies[ $current_currency ] ) ) {
40: 			if ( $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['pos'] ) {
41: 				$format['currency_pos'] = $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['pos'];
42: 			}
43: 			$format['thousand_sep'] = get_option( 'woocommerce_price_thousand_sep' );
44: 			$format['decimal_sep']  = get_option( 'woocommerce_price_decimal_sep' );
45: 			$format['num_decimals'] = $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['decimals'];
46: 		}
47: 
48: 		return $format;
49: 	}
50: }

17: 		add_filter( 'ppom_option_price', array( $this, 'ppom_option_price' ), 10 );
18: 		add_filter( 'ppom_cart_fixed_fee', array( $this, 'ppom_cart_fixed_fee' ) );
19: 	}

22: 	 * @param $product_price
23: 	 * @param $product
24: 	 *

29: 	}

33: 	 *
34: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void

38: 	}

41: 	 * @param $option_price
42: 	 *
43: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void

46: 		return wmc_get_price( $option_price );
47: 	}
48: 
49: 	/**
50: 	 * @param $value
51: 	 * @param $cart_item
52: 	 *
53: 	 * @return mixed
54: 	 */
55: 	public function ppom_product_price_on_cart( $value, $cart_item ) {
56: 		$wc_product = $cart_item['data'];
57: 		if ( $wc_product ) {
58: 			$value = $wc_product->get_price( 'edit' );
59: 		}
60: 
61: 		return $value;
62: 	}
63: }
