================
File: code_3/plugins/woocommerce-tm-extra-product-options.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
  3: 	exit;
  4: }
  5: 
  6: /**
  7:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_TM_Extra_Product_Options
  8:  * WooCommerce TM Extra Product Options By ThemeComplete
  9:  */
 10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WooCommerce_TM_Extra_Product_Options {
 11: 	protected $settings;
 12: 
 13: 	public function __construct() {
 14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 16: 			if ( $this->settings->check_fixed_price() ) {
 17: 				add_filter( 'wc_epo_enabled_currencies', array( $this, 'wc_epo_enabled_currencies' ) );
 18: 			}
 19: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_option_price_correction', array( $this, 'revert_price' ) );
 20: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_get_current_currency_price', array(
 21: 				$this,
 22: 				'wc_epo_get_current_currency_price'
 23: 			), 10, 6 );
 24: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_convert_to_currency', array( $this, 'wc_epo_convert_to_currency' ), 10, 3 );
 25: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_remove_current_currency_price', array(
 26: 				$this,
 27: 				'wc_epo_remove_current_currency_price'
 28: 			), 10, 9 );
 29: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_get_currency_price', array( $this, 'tm_wc_epo_get_currency_price' ), 10, 7 );
 30: 
 31: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_price_on_cart', array( $this, 'wc_epo_price_on_cart' ), 10, 2 );
 32: 
 33: //			add_filter( 'wc_epo_add_cart_item_calculated_price1', array( $this, 'revert_price' ) );
 34: //			add_filter( 'wc_epo_add_cart_item_calculated_price2', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
 35: 
 36: 			/*These hooks may be removed*/
 37: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_tm_epo_price_on_cart', array( $this, 'change_price' ) );
 38: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_calculate_price', array( $this, 'wc_epo_calculate_price' ), 10, 13 );
 39: 			add_filter( 'wc_epo_cart_options_prices', array( $this, 'change_price' ), 10, 2 );
 40: 		}
 41: 	}
 42: 
 43: 	/**
 44: 	 * @param $price
 45: 	 * @param $cart_item
 46: 	 *
 47: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
 48: 	 */
 49: 	public function wc_epo_price_on_cart( $price, $cart_item ) {
 50: 		if ( ! empty( $cart_item['tm_epo_product_original_price'] ) && floatval( $cart_item['tm_epo_product_original_price'] ) === floatval( $price ) ) {
 51: 			$price = $this->change_price( $price );
 52: 		}
 53: 
 54: 		return $price;
 55: 	}
 56: 
 57: 	/**
 58: 	 * @param string $price
 59: 	 * @param bool $currency
 60: 	 * @param string $price_type
 61: 	 * @param bool $current_currency
 62: 	 * @param null $price_per_currencies
 63: 	 * @param null $key
 64: 	 * @param null $attribute
 65: 	 *
 66: 	 * @return array|float|int|mixed|string|void
 67: 	 */
 68: 	public function tm_wc_epo_get_currency_price( $price = '', $currency = false, $price_type = '', $current_currency = false, $price_per_currencies = null, $key = null, $attribute = null ) {
 69: 		if ( ! $currency ) {
 70: 			return $this->wc_epo_get_current_currency_price( $price, $price_type, $currency );
 71: 		}
 72: 		$tc_get_default_currency = apply_filters( 'tc_get_default_currency', $this->settings->get_default_currency() );
 73: 
 74: 		if ( $current_currency && $current_currency === $currency && $current_currency === $tc_get_default_currency ) {
 75: 			return $price;
 76: 		}
 77: 
 78: 		$price = $this->get_price_in_currency( $price, $currency, null, $price_per_currencies, $price_type, $key, $attribute );
 79: 
 80: 		return $price;
 81: 
 82: 	}
 83: 
 84: 	/**
 85: 	 * @param string $price
 86: 	 * @param string $type
 87: 	 * @param null $to_currency
 88: 	 * @param null $from_currency
 89: 	 * @param null $currencies
 90: 	 * @param null $key
 91: 	 * @param null $attribute
 92: 	 * @param array $cart_item
 93: 	 *
 94: 	 * @return array|mixed|string|void
 95: 	 */
 96: 	public function wc_epo_remove_current_currency_price( $price = '', $type = '', $to_currency = null, $from_currency = null, $currencies = null, $key = null, $attribute = null, $cart_item = [] ) {
 97: 		$price = $this->get_price_in_currency( $price, $to_currency, $from_currency, $currencies, $type, $key, $attribute );
 98: 
 99: 		return $price;
100: 	}
101: 
102: 	/**
103: 	 * @param string $price
104: 	 * @param bool $from_currency
105: 	 * @param bool $to_currency
106: 	 *
107: 	 * @return array|mixed|string|void
108: 	 */
109: 	public function wc_epo_convert_to_currency( $price = '', $from_currency = false, $to_currency = false ) {
110: 		if ( ! $from_currency || ! $to_currency || $from_currency === $to_currency ) {
111: 			return $price;
112: 		}
113: 
114: 		// todo: if needed extend this as the whole method is only used for fixed conversions.
115: 		$price = $this->get_price_in_currency( $price, $to_currency, $from_currency );
116: 
117: 		return $price;
118: 
119: 	}
120: 
121: 	/**
122: 	 * @param $price
123: 	 * @param null $to_currency
124: 	 * @param null $from_currency
125: 	 * @param null $currencies
126: 	 * @param null $type
127: 	 * @param null $key
128: 	 * @param null $attribute
129: 	 *
130: 	 * @return array|mixed|void
131: 	 */
132: 	protected function get_price_in_currency( $price, $to_currency = null, $from_currency = null, $currencies = null, $type = null, $key = null, $attribute = null ) {
133: 		if ( empty( $from_currency ) ) {
134: 			$from_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
135: 		}
136: 		if ( empty( $to_currency ) ) {
137: 			$to_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
138: 		}
139: 		if ( $from_currency === $to_currency ) {
140: 			return $price;
141: 		}
142: 		if ( null !== $type && in_array( (string) $type, [
143: 				'',
144: 				'word',
145: 				'wordnon',
146: 				'char',
147: 				'step',
148: 				'intervalstep',
149: 				'charnofirst',
150: 				'charnospaces',
151: 				'charnon',
152: 				'charnonnospaces',
153: 				'fee',
154: 				'stepfee',
155: 				'subscriptionfee'
156: 			], true ) && is_array( $currencies ) && isset( $currencies[ $to_currency ] ) ) {
157: 			$v = $currencies[ $to_currency ];
158: 			if ( null !== $key && isset( $v[ $key ] ) ) {
159: 				$v = $v[ $key ];
160: 			}
161: 			if ( is_array( $v ) ) {
162: 				$v = array_values( $v );
163: 				$v = $v[0];
164: 				if ( is_array( $v ) ) {
165: 					$v = array_values( $v );
166: 					$v = $v[0];
167: 				}
168: 			}
169: 
170: 			if ( '' !== $v ) {
171: 				return $v;
172: 			}
173: 		}
174: 
175: 		$default_currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
176: 		if ( $default_currency && $from_currency != $default_currency ) {
177: 			$price = wmc_revert_price( $price, $from_currency );
178: 		}
179: 
180: 		return apply_filters( 'wmc_change_3rd_plugin_price', $price, $from_currency, $to_currency );
181: 	}
182: 
183: 	/**
184: 	 * @return mixed|void
185: 	 */
186: 	public function wc_epo_enabled_currencies() {
187: 		return $this->settings->get_currencies();
188: 	}
189: 
190: 	/**
191: 	 * @param $_price
192: 	 * @param $post_data
193: 	 * @param $element
194: 	 * @param $key
195: 	 * @param $attribute
196: 	 * @param $per_product_pricing
197: 	 * @param $cpf_product_price
198: 	 * @param $variation_id
199: 	 * @param $price_default_value
200: 	 * @param $currency
201: 	 * @param $current_currency
202: 	 * @param $price_per_currencies
203: 	 * @param $_price_type
204: 	 *
205: 	 * @return bool|float|int|string
206: 	 */
207: 	public function wc_epo_calculate_price( $_price, $post_data, $element, $key, $attribute, $per_product_pricing, $cpf_product_price, $variation_id, $price_default_value, $currency, $current_currency, $price_per_currencies, $_price_type ) {
208: 		if ( in_array( $_price_type, array( 'percent', 'percentcurrenttotal' ) ) ) {
209: 			$wmc_current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
210: 			$default_currency     = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
211: 			if ( $current_currency !== false ) {
212: 				if ( $wmc_current_currency === $default_currency ) {
213: 					$_price = wmc_revert_price( $_price, $current_currency );
214: 				}
215: 			}
216: 		}
217: 
218: 		return $_price;
219: 	}
220: 
221: 	/**
222: 	 * @param $price_raw
223: 	 *
224: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
225: 	 */
226: 	public function change_price( $price_raw ) {
227: 		return $price_raw ? wmc_get_price( $price_raw ) : $price_raw;
228: 	}
229: 
230: 	/**
231: 	 * @param string $price
232: 	 * @param string $type
233: 	 * @param null $currencies
234: 	 * @param bool $currency
235: 	 * @param bool $product_price
236: 	 * @param bool $tc_added_in_currency
237: 	 *
238: 	 * @return array|float|int|mixed|string|void
239: 	 */
240: 	public function wc_epo_get_current_currency_price( $price = '', $type = '', $currencies = null, $currency = false, $product_price = false, $tc_added_in_currency = false ) {
241: 		if ( is_array( $type ) ) {
242: 			$type = '';
243: 		}
244: 		// Check if the price should be processed only once.
245: 		if ( in_array( (string) $type, [
246: 			'',
247: 			'math',
248: 			'fixedcurrenttotal',
249: 			'word',
250: 			'wordnon',
251: 			'char',
252: 			'step',
253: 			'intervalstep',
254: 			'charnofirst',
255: 			'charnospaces',
256: 			'charnon',
257: 			'charnonnospaces',
258: 			'fee',
259: 			'stepfee',
260: 			'subscriptionfee'
261: 		], true ) ) {
262: 
263: 			$price = $this->get_price_in_currency( $price, $currency, null, $currencies, $type );
264: 
265: 		} elseif ( false !== $product_price && false !== $tc_added_in_currency && 'percent' === (string) $type ) {
266: 
267: 			$product_price = $this->get_price_in_currency( $product_price, $tc_added_in_currency, null, $currencies, '' );
268: 			$price         = $product_price * ( $price / 100 );
269: 
270: 		}
271: 
272: 		return $price;
273: 	}
274: 
275: 	/**
276: 	 * @param $price
277: 	 *
278: 	 * @return bool|float|int|string
279: 	 */
280: 	public function revert_price( $price ) {
281: 		return wmc_revert_price( $price );
282: 	}
283: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/woofunnels_order_bump.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woofunnels_Order_Bump
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Woofunnels_Order_Bump {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			add_filter( 'wfob_show_product_price', array(
17: 				$this,
18: 				'wfob_show_product_price'
19: 			), 10, 2 );
20: 			add_filter( 'wfob_show_product_price_placeholder', array(
21: 				$this,
22: 				'wfob_show_product_price_placeholder'
23: 			), 10, 4 );
24: 		}
25: 	}
26: 
27: 	/**
28: 	 * @param $status
29: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
30: 	 *
31: 	 * @return mixed
32: 	 */
33: 	public function wfob_show_product_price( $status, $product ) {
34: 		if ( ! in_array( $product->get_type(), WFOB_Common::get_subscription_product_type() ) ) {
35: 			$status = false;
36: 		}
37: 
38: 		return $status;
39: 	}
40: 
41: 	/**
42: 	 * @param $price_html
43: 	 * @param $product WC_Product
44: 	 * @param $cart_item_key
45: 	 * @param $price_data
46: 	 *
47: 	 * @return bool
48: 	 */
49: 	public function wfob_show_product_price_placeholder( $price_html, $product, $cart_item_key, $price_data ) {
50: 		if ( ! in_array( $product->get_type(), WFOB_Common::get_subscription_product_type() ) ) {
51: 			if ( $price_data['price'] > 0 && ( absint( $price_data['price'] ) !== absint( $price_data['regular_org'] ) ) ) {
52: 				$price_html = wc_format_sale_price( wmc_get_price( $price_data['regular_org'] ), wmc_get_price( $price_data['price'] ) );
53: 			} else {
54: 				$price_html = wc_price( wmc_get_price( $price_data['price'] ) );
55: 			}
56: 		}
57: 
58: 		return $price_html;
59: 	}
60: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/wp_rocket.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: defined( 'ABSPATH' ) or die();
  3: 
  4: if ( ! class_exists( 'WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WP_Rocket' ) ) {
  5: 
  6: 	class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_WP_Rocket {
  7: 		protected $settings;
  8: 
  9: 		public function __construct() {
 10: 			$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
 11: 			if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
 12: 				// Add cookie ID to cookkies for dynamic caches.
 13: 				add_filter( 'rocket_cache_dynamic_cookies', array( $this, 'cache_dynamic_cookie' ) );
 14: 				add_filter( 'rocket_cache_mandatory_cookies', array( $this, 'cache_mandatory_cookie' ) );
 15: 
 16: 				// Remove .htaccess-based rewrites, since we need to detect the cookie,
 17: 				// which happens in inc/front/process.php.
 18: 				add_filter( 'rocket_htaccess_mod_rewrite', '__return_false', 64 );
 19: 				register_activation_hook( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_FILE, array( $this, 'activate' ) );
 20: 				register_deactivation_hook( WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_FILE, array( $this, 'deactivate' ) );
 21: 			}
 22: 		}
 23: 
 24: 		/**
 25: 		 * @param $cookies
 26: 		 *
 27: 		 * @return array
 28: 		 */
 29: 		public function cache_dynamic_cookie( $cookies ) {
 30: 			if ( ! $this->settings->get_params( 'use_session' ) ) {
 31: 				$auto_detect = $this->settings->get_auto_detect();
 32: 				$cookies[]   = 'wmc_current_currency';
 33: 				$cookies[]   = 'wmc_current_currency_old';
 34: 				if ( $auto_detect === 1 || $auto_detect === 2 ) {
 35: 					$cookies[] = 'wmc_ip_info';
 36: 					if ( $this->settings->get_geo_api() != 2 ) {
 37: 						$cookies[] = 'wmc_ip_add';
 38: 					}
 39: 				}
 40: 			}
 41: 
 42: 			return $cookies;
 43: 		}
 44: 
 45: 		public function cache_mandatory_cookie( $cookies ) {
 46: 			if ( ! $this->settings->get_params( 'use_session' ) ) {
 47: 				$auto_detect = $this->settings->get_auto_detect();
 48: 				if ( $auto_detect === 1 || $auto_detect === 2 ) {
 49: 					$cookies[] = 'wmc_current_currency';
 50: 					$cookies[] = 'wmc_current_currency_old';
 51: 					$cookies[] = 'wmc_ip_info';
 52: 					if ( $this->settings->get_geo_api() != 2 ) {
 53: 						$cookies[] = 'wmc_ip_add';
 54: 					}
 55: 				}
 56: 			}
 57: 
 58: 			return $cookies;
 59: 		}
 60: 
 61: 
 62: 		/**
 63: 		 * Updates .htaccess, regenerates WP Rocket config file.
 64: 		 *
 65: 		 * @author Caspar Hübinger
 66: 		 */
 67: 		public function flush_wp_rocket() {
 68: 
 69: 			if ( ! function_exists( 'flush_rocket_htaccess' )
 70: 			     || ! function_exists( 'rocket_generate_config_file' ) ) {
 71: 				return;
 72: 			}
 73: 
 74: 			// Update WP Rocket .htaccess rules.
 75: 			flush_rocket_htaccess();
 76: 
 77: 			// Regenerate WP Rocket config file.
 78: 			rocket_generate_config_file();
 79: 		}
 80: 
 81: 		/**
 82: 		 * Add customizations, updates .htaccess, regenerates config file.
 83: 		 *
 84: 		 * @author Caspar Hübinger
 85: 		 */
 86: 		public function activate() {
 87: 			// Add customizations upon activation.
 88: 			add_filter( 'rocket_htaccess_mod_rewrite', '__return_false', 64 );
 89: 			add_filter( 'rocket_cache_dynamic_cookies', array( $this, 'cache_dynamic_cookie' ) );
 90: //			add_filter( 'rocket_cache_mandatory_cookies', array( $this, 'cache_dynamic_cookie' ) );
 91: 			// Flush .htaccess rules, and regenerate WP Rocket config file.
 92: 			$this->flush_wp_rocket();
 93: 		}
 94: 
 95: 		/**
 96: 		 * Removes customizations, updates .htaccess, regenerates config file.
 97: 		 *
 98: 		 * @author Caspar Hübinger
 99: 		 */
100: 		public function deactivate() {
101: 			// Remove customizations upon deactivation.
102: 			remove_filter( 'rocket_htaccess_mod_rewrite', '__return_false', 64 );
103: 			remove_filter( 'rocket_cache_dynamic_cookies', array( $this, 'cache_dynamic_cookie' ) );
104: //			remove_filter( 'rocket_cache_mandatory_cookies', array( $this, 'cache_dynamic_cookie' ) );
105: 
106: 			// Flush .htaccess rules, and regenerate WP Rocket config file.
107: 			$this->flush_wp_rocket();
108: 		}
109: 	}
110: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/yith_add_on.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: /**
 3:  * Created by PhpStorm.
 4:  * User: Administrator
 5:  * Date: 21/06/2019
 6:  * Time: 9:11 CH
 7:  */
 8: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 9: 	exit;
10: }
11: 
12: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Yith_Add_On {
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'yith-woocommerce-product-add-ons/init.php' ) || is_plugin_active( 'yith-woocommerce-advanced-product-options-premium/init.php' ) ) {
15: 			add_filter( 'wapo_print_option_price', array( $this, 'compatible_yith_add_on' ) );
16: 
17: //			add_filter( 'yith_wapo_option_price', array( $this, 'compatible_yith_add_on_price' ) );
18: //			add_filter( 'yith_wapo_option_price_sale', array( $this, 'compatible_yith_add_on_price_sale' ) );
19: 			add_filter( 'yith_wapo_get_addon_price', array( $this, 'yith_modify_addon_price' ), 10, 5 );
20: 			add_filter( 'yith_wapo_get_addon_sale_price', array( $this, 'yith_modify_addon_price_sale' ), 10, 5 );
21: 			add_filter( 'yith_wapo_convert_price', array( $this, 'yith_modify_addon_price' ), 10, 5 );
22: 			add_filter( 'yith_wapo_total_item_price', array( $this, 'yith_modify_addon_revert_price' ) );
23: 
24: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals', array( $this, 'woocommerce_before_calculate_totals' ) );
25: 		}
26: 	}
27: 
28: 	public function compatible_yith_add_on( $price ) {
29: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
30: 	}
31: 
32: 	public function compatible_yith_add_on_price( $price ) {
33: 
34: 		return wmc_get_price( $price );
35: 	}
36: 
37: 	public function compatible_yith_add_on_price_sale( $price ) {
38: 
39: 		return '' == $price ? '' : wmc_get_price( $price );
40: 	}
41: 
42: 	public function yith_modify_addon_price( $price, $allow_modification = false, $price_method = 'free', $price_type = 'fixed', $index = 0 ) {
43: 		if ( 'free' !== $price_method || $allow_modification ) {
44: 			if ( 'percentage' !== $price_type || $allow_modification ) {
45: 				$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
46: 			}
47: 		}
48: 
49: 		return $price;
50: 	}
51: 
52: 	public function yith_modify_addon_price_sale( $price, $allow_modification = false, $price_method = 'free', $price_type = 'fixed', $index = 0 ) {
53: 		if ( $price == '' ) {
54: 			return $price;
55: 		}
56: 		if ( 'free' !== $price_method || $allow_modification ) {
57: 			if ( 'percentage' !== $price_type || $allow_modification ) {
58: 				$price = wmc_get_price( $price );
59: 			}
60: 		}
61: 
62: 		return $price;
63: 	}
64: 
65: 	public function yith_modify_addon_revert_price( $price ) {
66: 		if ( $price == '' ) {
67: 			return $price;
68: 		}
69: 
70: 		return wmc_revert_price( $price );
71: 	}
72: 
73: 	public function woocommerce_before_calculate_totals( $data ) {
74: 		$cart_contents = WC()->cart->get_cart_contents();
75: 		foreach ( $cart_contents as $key => $content ) {
76: 			if ( isset( $content['yith_wapo_options'] ) && is_array( $content['yith_wapo_options'] ) && count( $content['yith_wapo_options'] ) ) {
77: 				foreach ( $content['yith_wapo_options'] as $sub_key => $option ) {
78: 					if ( isset( $option['price_original'] ) && $option['price_original'] ) {
79: 						$cart_contents[ $key ]['yith_wapo_options'][ $sub_key ]['price'] = wmc_get_price( $option['price_original'] );
80: 					}
81: 				}
82: 			}
83: 		}
84: 
85: 		WC()->cart->set_cart_contents( $cart_contents );
86: 	}
87: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/yith_product_bundles.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Yith_Product_Bundles
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Yith_Product_Bundles {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 	protected $decimal_separator;
13: 
14: 	public function __construct() {
15: 
16: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
17: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
18: 			add_action( 'woocommerce_process_product_meta_yith_bundle', array( $this, 'product_price_fields' ) );
19: 		}
20: 	}
21: 
22: 	/**
23: 	 * Integrate with Yith Product Bundles
24: 	 * @return bool
25: 	 */
26: 	public function product_price_fields() {
27: 		global $post;
28: 		$currencies    = $this->settings->get_currencies();
29: 		$yi_product    = wc_get_product( $post->ID );
30: 		$regular_price = $this->adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $yi_product->get_meta('_regular_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
31: 		$sale_price    = $this->adjust_fixed_price( json_decode( $yi_product->get_meta('_sale_price_wmcp', true ), true ) );
32: 		foreach ( $currencies as $currency ) {
33: 			if ( $currency != $this->settings->get_default_currency() ) {
34: 				?>
35:                 <div style="border-left: 5px solid #f78080;">
36:                     <p class="form-field ">
37:                         <label for="_regular_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>"><?php echo esc_html__( 'Regular Price', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $currency ) . ')'; ?></label>
38:                         <input id="_regular_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>"
39:                                class="short wc_input_price" type="text"
40:                                value="<?php echo isset( $regular_price[ $currency ] ) ? esc_attr( $regular_price[ $currency ] ) : ''; ?>"
41:                                name="_regular_price_wmcp[<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>]">
42:                     </p>
43:                     <p class="form-field ">
44:                         <label for="_sale_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>"><?php echo esc_html__( 'Sale Price', 'woo-multi-currency' ) . ' (' . esc_html( $currency ) . ')'; ?></label>
45:                         <input id="_sale_price_wmcp_<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>" class="short wc_input_price"
46:                                type="text"
47:                                value="<?php echo isset( $sale_price[ $currency ] ) ? esc_attr( $sale_price[ $currency ] ) : ''; ?>"
48:                                name="_sale_price_wmcp[<?php echo esc_attr( $currency ); ?>]">
49:                     </p>
50:                 </div>
51: 				<?php
52: 			}
53: 		}
54: 		wp_nonce_field( 'wmc_save_simple_product_currency', '_wmc_nonce' );
55: 	}
56: 
57: 	private function adjust_fixed_price( $fixed_price ) {
58: 		if ( ! $this->decimal_separator ) {
59: 			$this->decimal_separator = stripslashes( get_option( 'woocommerce_price_decimal_sep', '.' ) );
60: 		}
61: 		if ( $this->decimal_separator !== '.' && is_array( $fixed_price ) && count( $fixed_price ) ) {
62: 			foreach ( $fixed_price as $key => $value ) {
63: 				$fixed_price[ $key ] = str_replace( '.', $this->decimal_separator, $value );
64: 			}
65: 		}
66: 
67: 		return $fixed_price;
68: 	}
69: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/yith-frequently-bought-together.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Yith_Frequently_Bought_Together
 5:  */
 6: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 7: 	exit;
 8: }
 9: 
10: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Yith_Frequently_Bought_Together {
11: 	protected $settings;
12: 
13: 	public function __construct() {
14: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
15: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
16: 			add_filter( 'woocommerce_coupon_get_amount', array( $this, 'woocommerce_coupon_get_amount' ), 20, 2 );
17: 			add_filter( 'yith_wfbt_total_html', array(
18: 				$this,
19: 				'yith_wfbt_total_html'
20: 			), 10, 5 );
21: 			add_filter( 'yith_wfbt_discount_html', array(
22: 				$this,
23: 				'yith_wfbt_discount_html'
24: 			), 10, 3 );
25: 		}
26: 	}
27: 
28: 	/**
29: 	 * @param $data
30: 	 * @param $obj WC_Coupon
31: 	 *
32: 	 * @return float|int|mixed|void
33: 	 */
34: 	public function woocommerce_coupon_get_amount( $data, $obj ) {
35: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'yith-woocommerce-frequently-bought-together-premium/init.php' ) ) {
36: 			$yith_coupon = yith_wfbt_discount_code_validation( get_option( 'yith-wfbt-discount-name', 'frequently-bought-discount' ) );
37: 			$coupon_code = $obj->get_code();
38: 			if ( ( $yith_coupon && $coupon_code === $yith_coupon ) || $coupon_code === 'frequently-bought-discount' ) {
39: 				$data = wmc_revert_price( $data );
40: 			}
41: 		}
42: 
43: 		return $data;
44: 	}
45: 
46: 	/**
47: 	 * @param $total_html
48: 	 * @param $total
49: 	 * @param $total_discount
50: 	 * @param $product_id
51: 	 * @param $products
52: 	 *
53: 	 * @return string
54: 	 */
55: 	public function yith_wfbt_total_html( $total_html, $total, $total_discount, $product_id, $products ) {
56: 		$total_html = ! is_null( $total_discount ) ? do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency_exchange price=" . wmc_revert_price( $total_discount ) . " original_price=" . wmc_revert_price( $total ) . "]" ) : do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency_exchange price=" . wmc_revert_price( $total ) . "]" );
57: 
58: 		return $total_html;
59: 	}
60: 
61: 	public function yith_wfbt_discount_html( $discount, $product_id, $products ) {
62: 
63: 		return do_shortcode( "[woo_multi_currency_exchange price=" . wmc_revert_price( $discount ) . "]" );
64: 	}
65: }

================
File: code_3/plugins/yith-woocommerce-points-and-rewards-premium.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 3: 	exit;
 4: }
 5: 
 6: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Plugin_Yith_WooCommerce_Points_And_Rewards_Premium {
 7: 	protected $settings;
 8: 
 9: 	public function __construct() {
10: 		$this->settings = WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_Data::get_ins();
11: 		if ( $this->settings->get_enable() ) {
12: 			add_filter( 'ywpar_rewards_conversion_rate', array( $this, 'ywpar_rewards_conversion_rate' ) );
13: 			add_filter( 'ywpar_conversion_points_rate', array( $this, 'ywpar_conversion_points_rate' ) );
14: 		}
15: 	}
16: 
17: 	public function ywpar_conversion_points_rate( $conversion ) {
18: 		$currency         = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
19: 		$current_currency = $this->settings->get_current_currency();
20: 
21: 		if ( $currency !== $current_currency ) {
22: 			$list_currencies = $this->settings->get_list_currencies();
23: 			if ( ! empty( $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] ) ) {
24: 				$conversion = array( 'points' => 1, 'money' => $list_currencies[ $current_currency ]['rate'] );
25: 			}
26: 		}
27: 
28: 		return $conversion;
29: 	}
30: 
31: 	public function get_conversion_method() {
32: 		return apply_filters( 'ywpar_conversion_method', ywpar_get_option( 'conversion_rate_method' ) );
33: 	}
34: 
35: 	public function ywpar_rewards_conversion_rate( $conversion_rate ) {
36: 		$currency = $this->settings->get_default_currency();
37: 		if ( $currency !== $this->settings->get_current_currency() ) {
38: 			$customer    = ywpar_get_customer( null );
39: 			$valid_rules = YITH_WC_Points_Rewards_Helper::get_valid_redeeming_rules( $customer );
40: 			$conversion  = array();
41: 			if ( $valid_rules ) {
42: 				foreach ( $valid_rules as $rule ) {
43: 					$rule = ywpar_get_redeeming_rule( $rule );
44: 					if ( 'conversion_rate' === $rule->get_type() ) {
45: 						$conversions = 'fixed' === $this->get_conversion_method() ? $rule->get_conversion_rate() : $rule->get_percentage_conversion_rate();
46: 						if ( isset( $conversions[ $currency ] ) ) {
47: 							$conversion = $conversions[ $currency ];
48: 							break;
49: 						}
50: 					}
51: 				}
52: 			}
53: 			if ( empty( $conversion ) ) {
54: 				$conversion = $this->get_main_conversion_rate( $currency );
55: 			}
56: 			if ( ! empty( $conversion['money'] && ! empty( $conversion['points'] ) ) ) {
57: 				$conversion['money'] = wmc_get_price( $conversion['money'] );
58: 				$conversion_rate     = $conversion;
59: 			}
60: 		}
61: 
62: 		return $conversion_rate;
63: 	}
64: 
65: 	public function get_main_conversion_rate( $currency ) {
66: 		$currency = ywpar_get_currency( $currency );
67: 		if ( 'fixed' === $this->get_conversion_method() ) {
68: 			$conversions = ywpar_get_option( 'rewards_conversion_rate' );
69: 			$conversion  = isset( $conversions[ $currency ] ) ? $conversions[ $currency ] : array(
70: 				'money'  => 0,
71: 				'points' => 0,
72: 			);
73: 
74: 			$conversion['money']  = ( empty( $conversion['money'] ) ) ? 1 : $conversion['money'];
75: 			$conversion['points'] = ( empty( $conversion['points'] ) ) ? 1 : $conversion['points'];
76: 		} else {
77: 			$conversions = ywpar_get_option( 'rewards_percentual_conversion_rate' );
78: 			$conversion  = isset( $conversions[ $currency ] ) ? $conversions[ $currency ] : array(
79: 				'points'   => 0,
80: 				'discount' => 0,
81: 			);
82: 			$conversion  = apply_filters( 'ywpar_rewards_percentual_conversion_rate', $conversion );
83: 
84: 			$conversion['points']   = ( empty( $conversion['points'] ) ) ? 1 : $conversion['points'];
85: 			$conversion['discount'] = ( empty( $conversion['discount'] ) ) ? 1 : $conversion['discount'];
86: 		}
87: 
88: 		return $conversion;
89: 	}
90: }

================
File: code_3/templates/woo-multi-currency-selector.php
================
 1: <?php
 2: /**
 3:  * Show widget
 4:  *
 5:  * This template can be overridden by copying it to yourtheme/woo-multi-currency/woo-multi-currency-selector.php
 6:  *
 7:  */
 8: 
 9: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
10: 	exit;
11: }
12: $currencies       = $settings->get_list_currencies();
13: $current_currency = $settings->get_current_currency();
14: $links            = $settings->get_links();
15: $currency_name    = get_woocommerce_currencies();
16: ?>
17: <div class="woo-multi-currency wmc-shortcode">
18:     <div class="wmc-currency">
19:         <select class="wmc-nav"
20:                 onchange="this.options[this.selectedIndex].value && (window.location = this.options[this.selectedIndex].value);">
21: 			<?php
22: 			foreach ( $links as $code => $link ) {
23: 				$value = esc_url( $link );
24: 				$name  = $shortcode == 'default' ? $currency_name[ $code ] : ( $shortcode == 'listbox_code' ? $code : '' );
25: 				$name  = apply_filters('wmc_shortcode_currency_display_text', $name, $code);
26: 				?>
27:                 <option <?php selected( $current_currency, $code ) ?> value="<?php echo esc_attr( $value ) ?>"
28:                                                                       data-currency="<?php echo esc_attr( $code ) ?>">
29: 					<?php echo esc_html( $name ) ?>
30:                 </option>
31: 			<?php } ?>
32: 
33:         </select>
34:     </div>
35: </div>

================
File: code_3/woo-multi-currency.php
================
  1: <?php
  2: /**
  3:  * Plugin Name: CURCY - Multi Currency for WooCommerce
  4:  * Plugin URI: https://villatheme.com/extensions/woo-multi-currency/
  5:  * Description: Allows you to display prices and accepts payments in multiple currencies. Working only with WooCommerce.
  6:  * Version: 2.2.9
  7:  * Author: VillaTheme
  8:  * Author URI: https://villatheme.com
  9:  * License:           GPL v2 or later
 10:  * License URI:       https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
 11:  * Copyright 2016-2025 VillaTheme.com. All rights reserved.
 12:  * Text Domain: woo-multi-currency
 13:  * Requires Plugins: woocommerce
 14:  * Tested up to: 6.8
 15:  * WC requires at least: 7.0
 16:  * WC tested up to: 10.0
 17:  * Elementor tested up to: 3.6.5
 18:  * Requires PHP: 7.0
 19:  */
 20: if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
 21: 	exit;
 22: }
 23: define( 'WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_VERSION', '2.2.9' );
 24: define( 'WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F_FILE', __FILE__ );
 25: 
 26: /**
 27:  * Class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F
 28:  */
 29: class WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F {
 30: 	public function __construct() {
 31: 		register_activation_hook( __FILE__, array( $this, 'install' ) );
 32: //		add_action( 'admin_notices', array( $this, 'global_note' ) );
 33: 		add_action( 'plugins_loaded', array( $this, 'init' ) );
 34: 
 35: 		//Compatible with High-Performance order storage (COT)
 36: 		add_action( 'before_woocommerce_init', array( $this, 'before_woocommerce_init' ) );
 37: 	}
 38: 
 39: 	public function init() {
 40: 		if ( ! function_exists( 'is_plugin_active' ) ) {
 41: 			require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/plugin.php';
 42: 		}
 43: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-multi-currency/woocommerce-multi-currency.php' ) ) {
 44: 			return;
 45: 		}
 46: 
 47: 		if ( ! class_exists( 'VillaTheme_Require_Environment' ) ) {
 48: 			require_once WP_PLUGIN_DIR . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . "woo-multi-currency" . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . "includes" . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . "support.php";
 49: 		}
 50: 
 51: 		$environment = new VillaTheme_Require_Environment( [
 52: 				'plugin_name'     => 'CURCY - Multi Currency for WooCommerce',
 53: 				'php_version'     => '7.0',
 54: 				'wp_version'      => '6.0',
 55: 				'require_plugins' => [
 56: 					[
 57: 						'slug'    => 'woocommerce',
 58: 						'name'    => 'WooCommerce',
 59: 						'defined_version' => 'WC_VERSION',
 60: 						'version' => '7.0'
 61: 					],
 62: 				]
 63: 			]
 64: 		);
 65: 
 66: 		if ( $environment->has_error() ) {
 67: 			return;
 68: 		}
 69: 
 70: 		$init_file = WP_PLUGIN_DIR . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . 'woo-multi-currency' . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . "includes" . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . "define.php";
 71: 		require_once $init_file;
 72: 	}
 73: 
 74: 	/**
 75: 	 * Notify if WooCommerce is not activated
 76: 	 */
 77: 	function global_note() {
 78: 		if ( ! is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce/woocommerce.php' ) ) {
 79: 			?>
 80:             <div id="message" class="error">
 81:                 <p><?php esc_html_e( 'Please install and activate WooCommerce to use Multi Currency for WooCommerce plugin.', 'woo-multi-currency' ); ?></p>
 82:             </div>
 83: 			<?php
 84: 		}
 85: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'woo-multi-currency-pro/woo-multi-currency-pro.php' ) ) {
 86: 			deactivate_plugins( 'woo-multi-currency-pro/woo-multi-currency-pro.php' );
 87: 			unset( $_GET['activate'] );
 88: 		}
 89: 	}
 90: 
 91: 	public function before_woocommerce_init() {
 92: 		if ( class_exists( '\Automattic\WooCommerce\Utilities\FeaturesUtil' ) ) {
 93: 			\Automattic\WooCommerce\Utilities\FeaturesUtil::declare_compatibility( 'custom_order_tables', __FILE__, true );
 94: //			\Automattic\WooCommerce\Utilities\FeaturesUtil::declare_compatibility( 'cart_checkout_blocks', __FILE__, true );
 95: 		}
 96: 	}
 97: 
 98: 	/**
 99: 	 * When active plugin Function will be call
100: 	 */
101: 	public function install() {
102: 		if ( ! function_exists( 'is_plugin_active' ) ) {
103: 			require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/plugin.php';
104: 		}
105: 		if ( is_plugin_active( 'woocommerce-multi-currency/woocommerce-multi-currency.php' ) ) {
106: 			return;
107: 		}
108: 		global $wp_version;
109: 		if ( version_compare( $wp_version, "5.0", "<" ) ) {
110: //			deactivate_plugins( basename( __FILE__ ) ); // Deactivate our plugin
111: //			wp_die( "This plugin requires WordPress version 5.0 or higher." );
112: 		} else {
113: 
114: 			$data_init = array(
115: 				"auto_detect"          => "0",
116: 				"enable_design"        => "1",
117: 				"design_title"         => "Select your currency",
118: 				"design_position"      => "1",
119: 				"text_color"           => "#ffffff",
120: 				"main_color"           => "#f78080",
121: 				"background_color"     => "#212121",
122: 				"is_checkout"          => "1",
123: 				"is_cart"              => "1",
124: 				"conditional_tags"     => "",
125: 				"flag_custom"          => "",
126: 				"custom_css"           => "",
127: 				"enable_multi_payment" => "1",
128: 				"update_exchange_rate" => "0",
129: 				"finance_api"          => "0",
130: 				"rate_decimals"        => "5",
131: 				"key"                  => "",
132: 			);
133: 			if ( ! get_option( 'woo_multi_currency_params', '' ) ) {
134: 				update_option( 'woo_multi_currency_params', $data_init );
135: 			}
136: 		}
137: 	}
138: }
139: 
140: new WOOMULTI_CURRENCY_F();
